story:
English explanation below!!

Unsere Kampagnen-Updates findest ihr hier.

Mehr Updates gibt es auf unserem Youtube-Kanal...

---

 

...oder so kann man sicher sein Internet teilen,

ohne Angst haben zu müssen eine Abmahnung zu bekommen.

 

Pain point oder wo drückt der Schuh?

Immer mehr Anbieter von WLANs wurden und werden abgemahnt und stellen deshalb ihr Internetangebot ein. Wir bieten eine einfache, effektive und kostengünstige Lösung, dass weiterhin an möglichst vielen Orten WLAN angeboten werden kann.

sorglosbox

Die sorglosbox bietet Inhabern von Cafés, Hostels oder WGs Schutz vor Abmahnungen. Damit können diese Euch einen einfachen und registrierungsfreien Internetnetzugang anbieten, ohne Angst vor Haftungsfragen haben zu müssen. Davon profitiert ihr und der Inhaber gleichermaßen.

Die wichtigsten Charakterzüge der sorglosbox:

  • alles ist voreingestellt
  • einfach an die bestehende Internetverbindung anschließen
  • ab dann sicher das Internet teilen

Wie kannst Du uns helfen? 

  • Erzähle möglichst vielen Freunden von uns, denen die sorglosbox helfen könnte.
  • Sprich den Inhaber Deines Lieblings-Cafés auf die Abmahnproblematik an
  • Unterstütz' uns und teil die sorglos Geschichte mit möglichst vielen Freunden. z.B. bei Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/sorglosinternet
  • Feedback & Fragen sind immer willkommen: info@sorglosinternet.de

Wie verwenden wir Deine Unterstützung?

  • Gründungskosten 
  • Technische Anpassung des Routers
  • Programmierung einer professionellen Website

Und denkt dran: Laßt Euch nicht abmahnen! :)

 

Video-Updates:

Mehr findet ihr auch auf unserem Youtube-Kanal oder auf Facebook.

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------- 

For our english supporters: 

Worryfree-Internet

...or don’t be liable, when your customers break the law.

 

Pain point

More and more WI-FI´s in Germany are being shut down due to the fact that the account owner is liable when something illegal happens on their internet connection. Interested in diving more into the topic? Check out: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abmahnung

We will provide a simple, effective and non-expensive solution, that enables WIFI owners to simply share their internet connection without any risk of legal action.

worryfree-box

Our box allows WIFI providers to bypass any liability risk while providing a straighforward and frictionless service to their customers. 

Our solution is a win win for both the people wanting WIFI-access those providing it.

The three most imporant specs of the worryfree-box: 

  • everything is preconfigured
  • simple plug and play
  • surf and share your internet safely

How can you help us? 

  • Spread the word by telling people that want free WIFI when they are in a cafe, travel or simply work from a public space about us. 
  • Talk about the issue with your local coffe shop owner.
  • Support us through sharing and funding this idea. Find us also on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/sorglosinternet
  • Share your feedback & questions ( you can reach us at :  info@sorglosinternet.de )

How do you make a difference with your support?

You enable us to:

  • Raise startup costs  
  • Do the technical configuration of the worry-free box (router)
  • set up a professional website , where payments will run through

And remeber: Don’t let yourself get a cease-and-desist letter.

story:
Complete Website Overhaul:

An Educational Webcast

Hey there, my name is Brandon Jacoby, I am 16 years old, I am the World's Youngest Adobe Certified Expert, and I am the Founder of The Creative Youth. I am also an overall creative (mostly photography + design).

The Creative Youth is rapidly growing, and is quickly outgrowing it's current website. I am going to completely overhaul & revamp the website, and I want to take you along for the ride. What I mean, is I am going to webcast the entire process, and you can watch it all unfold live!

Topics We'll Cover:

  • Brainstorming & Idea Sessions
  • Web Design In Adobe Photoshop
  • HTML/CSS, and other modern web design techniques.
  • WordPress Development
  • Project Management
  • Preparing The Site
  • Launching The All-New Website

As you read above, the entire process is going to be a live webcast, split up into different sections—And just by choosing one of the rewards below, you'll be able to watch it all again at a later date.

Where Your Money Is Going:

All money raised will go into purchasing the neccisary equipment to make the webcast (professional microphones, website assets, etc), the rest of the money will go directly back into The Creative Youth to help make it even more awesome. :)

Whether you're a a complete beginner looking to make his first website/blog, or a fellow web-designer looking to gain knowledge, a designer looking to brush up on some new techniques, or just a person with a big heart who wants to help a passionate person out, please consider donating! Thank you all!

story:
WHY DO THIS?

Tone of Color is being created to fill a void within the Home Design Industry. Utilizing brand new social broadcasting technology, Tone of Color is set to become the first website to allow fully interactive color consultations live and in real time. Not only does Tone of Color allow you access to color and design advice anytime, anywhere, but we also setup designer profile pages that allow you to choose Design and Contractor Professionals based upon specialties and ratings that fit your needs.

The most common situation we encounter while working in the Home Design field, is a customer who is on a budget, and simply needs some help sprucing up a room.  The customer tries so hard to describe the layout of the home, so that we know what rooms connect and how, what colors those rooms are, etc.  Its impossible to really visualize it accurately, till now.  

  • Tone Purzycki

Tone Purzycki has spent equal time in both The Creative Arts as well as The Business of Entertainment. His journey began in the outdoors as a Landscape Architect/Contractor. The ability to both design the environment as well as construct them was an allure that ultimately brought Tone into the world of Entertainment. The doors of Hollywood proved challenging to break down, that is until Tone conceived a new form of entertainment that didn't require studio assistance. Alternetreality.com is the worlds first Socially Broadcast-ed Online Entertainment Experience, allowing the audience to have direct contact and influence over the story presented by engaging the characters Live and in Real Time. As Tone’s creative team at Mikrotone Entertainment develops larger scale content, Tone has been busy building a personal brand in the Color Industry.
For the last 4 years, Tone Purzycki has ventured inside the home, providing In-Home Color Consultations to residents of the Northern New Jersey area. Based on his success with the technology used for Alternetreality.com, he began coordinating and presenting Socially Broadcast-ed Live Seminars covering all ends of the Home Design Industry. It was all these ventures combined, that led Tone to the creation of Tone of Color, the first ever Social Broadcast Color Consultation company, or “Color Concast”.

  • Cyrus Timchula

The son of a Painter and an Architect, Cyrus Timchula has a natural knack for Color Consultation. Picking colors that help his clients express themselves and expand their ideas in color theory is his expertise. He studied Art and Art History ever since he had the opportunity to take such classes, and went on to study Economics and International Business at Rollins College. Cyrus is also an experienced painter, both interior and exterior, giving his clients access to both his creativity and functionality.
Cyrus experienced success as a Sales Representative and Manager at Vector Marketing before exploring Business Development and Marketing at iSpeech, inc. iSpeech is where he found a passion using technology, especially Software as a Service, for helping a broader range of clients achieve their personal and professional goals in a convenient and cost effective manner.

  • Mikrotone Ent.

Mikrotone creates story driven experiences like no other.  It is our belief that a story exists in everything; every person, every object, every business.  Our goal is to tell that story across multiple platforms, allowing it to expand into reality.

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHY

We need $10,000.00 to start work on the online experience for ToneofColor.com

This online experience has a lot of moving parts behing the scenes, parts such as the website itself that requires a custom shopping system. A Smartphone App that not only streams in real time, but also allows back and forth audio, and most importantly, Search Engine Optimization and tons of Marketing.  Luckily, we are capable of all those things, with your help of course.

The Reach

Signing up Designers & Contractors
Before we bring people to the site to use its services, we need to first build a network of Professionals to provide the key ingredient of the service itself. Our C.E.O. already has relationships with some of the top associations in the Design Industry, and we will be pursuing there participation immediately.

Finding Customers
Marketing is an essential element of all business, and ToneofColor.com is no exception. The functionality of the site could be absolute perfection, and it would be worthless if nobody knows the site exists. Our team will be building relationships with Paint Distributors and participating in Coop Marketing plans with them to reach the core customers for a service such as this. We will also be attending Home Design Consumer Conventions, as well as taking ads in Home Magazines.

The Technology

Building the Phone App to meet our needs.
Our team is already very experienced in the Web Development field, however we are still learning in the field of Smartphone Apps. Building the App itself is going to be a slight challenge that we know we can overcome. A year ago known of us knew HTML or PHP Coding, now we are designing constantly for our other company http://www.alternetreality.com.
Phone Apps are the future now, and we will be working our minds beyond the limits to learn everything and anything needed to design the App for ToneofColor.com

User Experience
At the end of everything, its all about our customers. As we develop ToneofColor.com we will be repeatedly testing our site to make the best possible user-friendly experience we can. Simplicity is key.

 

HERE IS HOW IT WORKS

The site will work in a very simple way.  

  1. Sign up
  2. Pick your needs
  3. Schedule a date/time
  4. Stream LIVE with your selected Designer

 

ALSO...

Help us spread the word and attract more people by sharing our Facebook & Twitter page.

story:
We believe that the world is ready for a New Social Network focused on Change and Sharing Good. ShareGood will be the first of its kind social networking website where you can connect to a global community of people who want to do and share awesome initiatives in the world!

 

 


A mobile app for iPhone and Android allows people to share good On-the-Go. You can stay updated on what’s going on in your network of friends, groups and organizations. Post your own inspiring stories, news or photos and videos of your best moments captured from your mobile device.


ShareGood is an alternative to the current social networks that don't focus on #Good. We all use the big social media sites every day and doesn't it seems obvious that personal and worthy messages and missions are too often overlooked? While other social networks are full of meaningless noise, ShareGood will be a social platform where everybody comes together to make a positive change in the world.


  • Decrease Worldsuck - this is a word we came to use to describe the lack of good in the world.
  • Inspire people to believe in the world again
  • Create a positive alternative to the current social media networks
  • Participate in a ‘Social Change Network’ – A social tool that will allow people to create petitions and launch a fundraiser for a cause
  • Allow volunteers, charities, fundraisers, non-profit organizations and conscious businesses to network and share good around the world
  • Create mass-scale positive energy around the planet
  • Create an awesome mobile app for IPhone and Android to #ShareGood on the go!

All the Gifts will be shipped at the end of campaign. An online survey will be sent out where you will be able to select your exact Gifts, Colors and Sizes!  


ShareGood Wall is a place of honor on our website, a Sponsorship Page where all supporters have their Profile Photos. They will also be linked to their ShareGood Profile Page once the website goes Live.

It is a place of all the people and organizations who helped ShareGood become a reality! #ShareGoodWall

Certificate of Donation: Every person or organization who supported ShareGood will receive a personal "Certificate of Donation" indicating that their name, photo or company Logo is on the ShareGood Wall!


We will build these features even if the targets are not met, but without additional funding, it will take us much much longer. Additional funding will also allow us to hire and expand our team, introduce more new features and reach more people and organizations. With your support, we can make ShareGood a reality and make a positive Change in the World!

The first $100,000 will give us enough money to develop the ShareGood social platform for desktop and mobile on IPhone and Android. This will allow us start growing our registered user base and reach organizations and good businesses for sponsorship after which the ShareGood project can be self-sustaining.

ShareGood is not only a Social Platform for Change but also a Non-profit organization. The aims of the Foundation is to support and launch non-profit projects and campaigns that would support Sharing Good in the world. Part of the funding will also go towards various social initiatives to raise awareness about conscious living and sustainable development in the world.



We want the world to know all the good stuff that is happening out there! We want to create a positive vibration that will rock the planet and restore people’s faith in goodness, in themselves and in the fact that even small actions can make a big change. Let's network a better world. Let's connect all the good. Let's Make it Happen!

1) Why is this important for the world at this time?

There is too much negative information on our daily mainstream media. We don’t need more information - we need to believe in ourselves. We want to create a global platform for positive change where people can connect and share the good things that are happening around them - good deeds, acts of kindness, good causes, uplifting news, awesomeness and important events focused on creating positive change. 

2) How is this different from Facebook?

We don’t want to create another social network - we are inspired to build a Social Change Network! This will be a social platform focused on connecting individuals, events, organizations and communities who want to create a positive change in the world. We want to give people the tool to network a better world by connecting and sharing their awesome ideas, causes and good work. 

We want to kickstart the second wave in the social media revolution. The first wave was about connecting people together to share bits and pieces of their lives - experiences, opinions, things they like or dislike, and yes...cat photos. It was about connecting minds.  

The second wave is all about connecting hearts. 

We want the world to shout out all the freaking good stuff that is happening out there! We want to create a positive vibe that will rock the planet and restore people’s faith in the goodness that is all around us, but usually goes unrecognized.


3) When will it be launched?

We are aiming to launch ShareGood.co in December 2016. Wit your help and support we can achieve our goals and milestones and start our mission to network a better world by sharing the good. 


4) How will the funds be used?

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, marketing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the ShareGood platform. We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.

5) What happens if you don't get fully funded?


If we are not fully funded we will reevaluate our goals and write a newsletter with all of our revised plans that will go out to all of our funders. This will let you know when you can expect your perks and how ShareGood will move forward.


6) How can I get involved and help if I don't have any money to contribute?
You can still help us in other ways if you don’t have the financial means to support. You can help us spread the word about this campaign to your friends and connections on the social media. On the left hand side of this page there are social media icons. You can use these to share this page to your social network and invite other people to do the same. We thank you wholeheartedly for your support! 

7) Can anybody join this website or is it only for charity organizations?

It is for everyone who wants to share, participate or be inspired by the goodness our world has to offer.

Organizations already doing community or charity work for a cause, local or global, can expand their reach to other communities across social or geographical borders and inspire others to join or support their cause. As it grows, the network will link individuals to communities and to events, causes, volunteers and more. We want to link good people with good things and make a change! 

Businesses that are contributing to the world either through sustainable products, socially conscious projects and other good means can also share out loud their positive work to the world. 

And of course any individual can join communities or create his own. You can be inspired by the positive stuff other people or communities are doing and support them by sharing the good and spreading it out.

We want the world to shout out all the freaking good stuff that is happening out there! We want to create a positive vibe that will rock the planet and restore people’s faith in the goodness that
is all around us, but usually goes unrecognized.
3) When will it be launched?


We are aiming to launch ShareGood.co in December 2016. Wit your help and support we can achieve our goals and milestones and start our mission to network a better world by sharing the good. 
4) How will the funds be used?Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, marketing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the ShareGood platform. We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.5) What happens if you don't get fully funded?



If we are not
         fully funded we will reevaluate our goals and write a newsletter with
         all of our revised plans that will go out to all of our funders. 
         This will let you know when you can expect your perks and how ShareGood will move forward.

6) How can I get involved and help if I don't have any money to contribute?


You can still help us in other ways if you don’t have the financial means to support. You can help us spread the word about this campaign to your friends and connections on the social media. On the left hand side of this page there are social media icons. You can use these to share this page to your social network and invite other people to do the same. We thank you wholeheartedly for your support! 


7) Can anybody join this website or is it only for charity organizations?


It is for everyone who wants to share, participate or be inspired by the goodness our world has to offer.
Organizations already doing community or charity work for a cause, local or global, can expand their reach to other communities across social or geographical borders and inspire others to join or support their cause. As it grows, the network will link individuals to communities and to events, causes, volunteers and more. We want to link good people with good things and make a change! 
Businesses that are contributing to the world either through sustainable products, socially conscious projects and other good means can also share out loud their positive work to the world. 
And of course any individual can join communities or create his own. You can be inspired by the positive stuff other people or communities are doing and support them by sharing the good and spreading it out.

story:
We are Orangered Life. We celebrate simplicity and smart design. After 3 successful 30° ruler crowdfunding campaigns, £90k+ in funding, and delivering 10,000+ products, we’re back and better with the 30° ruler 4.0! 

 

What makes 30° ruler different?

The key change we've added is a 30° slope on the ruler's face. It's a simple, yet incredibly effective, update and it makes the 30° Ruler so much easier to use.

 

Instead of a flat ruler, this one is angled at a 30° slope. You can read the measurements from a glance without having to lean over (improving your already questionable posture).  And also you can easily grab it without having to drag it towards the edge of the table.  Finally, the angled nature of the ruler makes it safe for cutting.

 

 

 

 

Apart from its signature sloped design, the 30° Ruler also has a couple of new features. 

 

 

For starters, the new ruler starts at zero; meaning you can start measuring from the very edge of the ruler instead of having to make adjustments for the useless blank space before the laser engraved measurements.

 

 

This 2-in-1 ruler has millimetres and centimetres on one side, inches on the reverse. Inch and centimetres are labelled in the same direction allowing for easy conversions. 

 

 

The 30° Ruler is designed to eliminate the confusion and strain of reading your typical ruler with every tick mark labelled. On the English side, all hash marks are labelled to eliminate guessing and counting of lines. On the Metric side, both the millimetres and centimetres are numbered and the hash marks rise and fall making it easy to identify specific millimetre measurements.

 

 

The ruler itself is made from Aerospace grade aluminium while the measurements are laser targeted. In addition to making it more durable, the materials used also make the 30° Ruler more lightweight and scratch-resistant. 

 

 

Scratch-resistant

What’s New？

30° Ruler 4.0 is made with the same high-quality Aerospace-grade aluminium while the measurements are laser targeted as the original, but there are a few new things to make it even better:

  • New wider design for better grip and easier to read.
  • Larger font size and non-glare surface makes reading quicker and easier in any environment
  • New colour: vivid white markings with a classic black background.

 

 

 

Two Colors, Three Sizes.

While not all rulers don’t have it (which they definitely should), the 30° Ruler has two different measurements etched on both sides. The ruler also comes in 3 sizes of 6, 8, and 12 inches, so you can choose the right sized ruler depending on what you’re measuring. 

 

 

Thank you

We are passionate about what we do, and the opportunity to serve you and bring such a fantastic product to market has been an incredible adventure.

story:
BUY A PENCIL • FUND A REVOLUTION

At ReFUND we believe that simple instruments can lead to revolutionary change, and that something even as small as a pencil can be used to power that revolution. Each ReFUND pencil sold as part of this project will be used to empower its owner in the first crowd funded experiment of its kind - a financial experiment designed to both educate and inform while generating real results that can be handed down to the next generation of Indiegogo campaigns. Think of it as paying it forward over and over and over again.


FUND • LEARN • VOTE • REPEAT

How it works

2015 ReFUND supporters will be part of an active community of self directed, crowdfunding investors looking for change. The funds raised as part of this campaign will be used as a proof of concept for the latest in options trading strategies and methodologies with all trades (good or bad) tracked through the ReFUND website (complete with detailed explanations on stock selection as well as entry and exit criteria). After 3 months of activity, each supporter will use their voting rights (based on perk level) to determine how any gains made during the experiment will be handed down to other Indiegogo campaigns. This process will continue indefinitely. In the unlikely event the project is deemed no longer productive the entire pool of remaining funds will be refunded back into the Indiegogo system either as a single lump sum contribution or as multiple smaller contributions based upon the supporters collective votes.


THE BOTTOM LINE IS YOU LEARN, SOME LUCKY INDIEGOGO PROJECTS GET FUNDED AND IN THE PROCESS YOU BECOME AN EMPOWERED, KNOWLEDGEABLE SELF DIRECTED INVESTOR


FAQ

Why are you running this experiment?

We are running this experiment because we believe there is a better way of investing that can take advantage of current technologies and information in a way never possible before. Our hope is this experiment will prove that, and in doing so allow its contributors to be part of a new generation of crowd funding supporters who want to pay it forward.

How will the experiments gains be distributed?

Every 3 months the initial group of contributors will be allowed to vote on a pool of current Indiegogo campaigns. From that pool we will select 3 finalists and distribute the gains accordingly. If funds allow we may elect to select more then 3 finalists.

What if the experiment fails?

If the experiment fails to produce any meaningful gains after 12 months, the remaining pool of funds will be redistributed back into the Indiegogo ecosystem based on a vote by the initial group of contributors.

Who will receive the 'perks' if ReFUND is successful?

Once the initial group of contributors has voted on the finalists for a given cycle, a random draw will be performed to select the lucky recipients. And as long as the experiment runs we will continue to distribute perks. In other words, your $10 or $20 dollar contribution could translate into much much more.

How can I participate in the 2015 ReFUND experiment?

If you are interested in participating in this experiment simply choose your perk level to purchase a 2015 ReFUND pencil. Everyone who purchases a pencil will become an active participant in determining how any gains are dispersed to other Indiegogo campaigns, and become eligible to receive any perks from those campaigns.

What can I do with my pencil?

Most importantly you can use it to vote on how ReFUND distributes its gains every year to other Indiegogo campaigns. Other then that the choice is yours - we suggest you use it for grocery lists, doodling or possibly even other, more productive endeavours.

Why should I buy a ReFUND pencil?

When you buy one of our pencils you're not only buying a powerful voting instrument, you're helping to fund the first crowd sourced financial experiment of its kind. An experiment that will not only prove there is a better way to invest, but will help to support the very community that makes projects like this a reality.

But why the pencil?

To be honest we never felt comfortable just asking for money. We wanted you to own a tangeable item that could be used as part of the voting process and act as a meaningful representation for this experiment. Are they expensive? Yes. But remember, these aren't ordinary pencils.

Who are you?

We are self directed investors who believe there is a better, more powerful way of doing things. Proving this is our primary mission (and we don't mind paying it forward in the process).

Who we are not

ReFUND does not provide investment or financial advice or make investment recommendations. If you're really interested please read the fine print below.

The Fine Print

Neither ReFUND or any of its officers, directors, employees, other personnel, representatives, agents or independent contractors is, in such capacities, a licensed financial advisor, registered investment advisor, registered broker-dealer or FINRA|SIPC|NFA-member firm. ReFUND does not provide investment or financial advice or make investment recommendations. Nothing contained in our content constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, promotion, or endorsement of any particular security, other investment product, transaction or investment.

story:
What is wlroots?

We represent the small-time projects in the Wayland scene. Together we have worked to build a new library to support our compositors: wlroots. Our new library allows us to share our implementations of important (and difficult!) features, and to promote the adoption of portable standards across the Wayland ecosystem.

Our work is nearing its completion and we're ready to make the final push. Usually, we must work on these projects in our spare time. With your support, a 2 week hackathon of full-time work on our projects will get more done than we might accomplish in a year.

Who's involved?

The core committers on wlroots will all be there: acrisci, emersion, and SirCmpwn. Together we represent the Sway project. We've also invited Timidger, the maintainer of Way Cooler, to join us if we meet our stretch goal. Assisting us remotely (in their spare time) are Ongy, the maintainer of waymonad, and other contributors to wlroots. Together our work improves the Sway, Way Cooler, Waymonad, and bspwc projects, as well as (hopefully) many future compositors.

Why is wlroots worth it?

For Sway and Way Cooler, this library enables us to build features that were never possible without it. Projects like waymonad and bspwc likely wouldn't exist at all if it weren't for wlroots. Features we will be able to support with wlroots include:

  • Display rotation and mirroring
  • More exotic display configurations like daisy-chaining DisplayPort
  • Touch screen and drawing tablet support
  • Mixed-DPI desktops and fractional scaling
  • Third party bars, lock screens, etc

A more exhaustive list of features now possible is available here. The wlroots approach represents a fundamental shift in how we build our compositors together - and we're only scratching the surface of what'll be possible.

What's the plan?

We'll gather the wlroots core contributors from around the world at SirCmpwn's Philadelphia apartment from March 26th to April 6th. We will be live streaming our work on Twitch as we work primarily on wlroots and Sway (and on wlroots-rs, Timidger's Rust bindings to wlroots, if we reach our stretch goal).

Your money will be spent on travel costs to bring acrisci and emersion to Philadelphia, from Atlanta, Georgia and Paris, France, respectively. If we meet our stretch goal of $2000, we'll also bring Timidger (the maintainer of Way Cooler) in from Boston. These numbers are padded a little bit to accomodate for price changes and unexpected events. The extra will be spent on fulfilling rewards and food for the team, and whatever is left will be stowed away for later use (domains, servers, test hardware, etc).

What's in it for me?

Taking time away from our work on the project to fulfill complex rewards is something we want to avoid. However, we want to make sure you're properly thanked for your contribution. We are offering two rewards: access to a special IRC channel for hanging out with us during the hackathon, and a set of stickers from each compositor involved (to be fulfilled a short time after the hackathon is completed). The real reward, however, is the excellent Wayland compositors you'll get to use when we're done! If you wish, you may contribute any amount outside of our reward tiers to show your support for the projects.

Additionally, everyone who supports the hackathon will be thanked by name in the release notes for Sway 1.0, regardless of their level of support.

Risks & Challenges

We cannot guarantee that we will complete the products you have been looking forward to, such as Sway 1.0. However, the progress we'll make will dramatically reduce the timeline for the releases of these projects. We are a skilled team of software engineers that are already well aquainted with each other and our codebases, and as a result we expect to be highly productive during this time.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our campaign with your friends and on whatever social media platforms tickle your fancy! We may also be accepting small donations during the hackathon for food.

Questions?

Please reach out to Drew DeVault <sir@cmpwn.com> via email if you have any questions.

story:
Video: Santcoin Brings Great Wealth for Everyone!


Here is the screenshot of what the app looks like:

Here is our Send Money screen. See how simple it is to send money to someone? Anyone can do this.

  1. You simply open the app on your phone,

  2. Enter your friend’s Santcoin ID number,

  3. Put in the amount, and press Send.

Zap! Now the first half of the transaction is complete – the money has left your account and entered our system and has generated a unique one-time use 10-digit code that identifies the transaction.

You take this 10-digit code and give it to your friend by any means you like. You can send it in a text message, a phone call, an Email, whatever is easiest.

Then he performs his half of the transaction – he simply enters the ten-digit code into his app on his phone. The system authenticates the transaction, and the exact amount you’ve sent is added to his balance. Done! There are no service fees, no hassles, and no chance of being hacked.









http://www.santcoin.com

We hope you will consider getting involved with our organization and supporting our system. Please visit our community Website and join other members, and get more credits by sending invitations to your friends.

* Notice:

Limited Time Perks: Perks ending or Changing may be announced and applied immediately without previous notification.

** Updates: 

How to Earn Money with Santcoin? Here



What if I have a question isn’t answered here?

We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have about the SantCoin Engine , the Indiegogo campaign, and our company as a whole. 

Email us at: admin@santcoin.com / santcoin@hotmail.com




In these days of digital commerce, we are sending money electronically all the time. However, there are hackers everywhere, trying their best to get their grubby hands on your money. Plus, most of the existing payment services charge hefty fees.

What if I could tell you it didn’t need to be that way? Would you be interested? I’ll bet you would. Our SantCoin program offers you a whole new way.

This new platform gives you a way to securely send money from your phone to an individual anywhere in the world, regardless if he has a bank account, an Internet connection, or even a Government-issued identity card. And here’s the big reveal – it’s FREE.

SantCoin is the answer. You’ve heard of Bitcoin – SantCoin is the next generation of digital currency and we have added many improvements over the original platform. This an app we  have developed that is fast, simple, secure, and incredibly easy to use, even for people who are not Internet-savvy.

We have improved the security of your transactions, the anonymity, the profitability, even the options to add advertising, and tracking.

In 2015, Payments made with debit and credit cards and other non-cash methods jumped 9 percent last year to 390 billion transactions, Capgemini report said.

In USA, the credit  cards number average per consumer is 4.4 , one in ten Americans has more than 10 credit cards. and the card payment users expect more than 35.54 billion as potential worldwide losses because of payment card fraud in 2020.

With a number of smartphone users is forecast to grow to around 2.5 billion in 2019. Mobile payments grew significantly in volume – by 170 percent – to reach 4.5 billion transactions. and there is many reason for that.

Making payment from phone is more convenient and less time consuming, and shopper more likely to use their coupons when they use phone to pay, and unlike the credit card, tracking and recovering your phone in case it gets lost is much easier, and most mobile phones can be locked with a pin, so gaining access to sensitive account information or making transactions is made more difficult.

The speed, security, privacy, information management, simplicity and convenience factors in mobile payments is higher as opposed to credit card payments. There is just one limitation, the cost. The main payment channel for this mobile pay systems still credit and some debit cards. this payment method are operated under financial regulation and require processing the payment by different parties that cost big interchange and processing fees that exceed 20 billion annually just in USA.

Mobile payments technology don’t require a big infrastructure to work. Hundreds millions of merchants around the world will immigrate to mobile phone as an alternative way of payment, but they still have to lose up to 3.5 % of their gross revenue as processing and interchange fees, and in many cases that means the difference between the success and the lose of the business.

Thanks to using a new digital currency concept, SantCoin has none of traditional payment methods limitations, SantCoin  is a scalable system , With an architecture that offer security, audit trail, transparency and speed. And by offering a free service, SantCoin is ideal for merchants and will help them increase their profit and sales.

Further advances could come from SantCoin Engine. The freedom, the new model, and the adaptation ability  give Santcoin the potential to grow fast and win not just the mobile payment contest, but the power to reach the unbanked population and take the leadership in the money transfer game.

Banking the unbanked is a global serious challenge, Different Statistics shows that that is 38 % of the global population that represent 2 billion adults are still unbanked, and others 1.3 billion account-owning adults still use cash to pay utility bills.

this big numbers that reflect 59% of adults in developing economies, or 3/4 of the world’s poor according to The Global Findex do not have a bank account, not only because of poverty, but also due to costs, travel distance and paperwork involved.

SantCoin can solve that, allowing those unbanker poor to get a virtual digital bank checking account using their mobiles without any document requirement, better than that with SanCtion system they will get a free money allotment to start using the system, that is will encourage those unbanked to join the digital banking business, and allow them to send and receive digital money for free, solving the next global issues.

Globally, sending remittances costs an average of 7.37 percent of the amount sent,or 25 billion dollar annually. SantCoin charge no fees for money transfer and will save this full amount. These funds would simply remain to migrants and their families and could contribute significantly to improving the living conditions of the migrants themselves as well as reducing poverty in their countries of origin.


SantCoin: Digital global currency 2.0

SantCoin is a new alternative currency with many new features, The American patent application of the new digital currency and the new system was filed in December 2015 by SantCoin Inc., a start-up based in Boston MA USA.


SantCoin is a personal decentralized banking system and a Peer-to-Peer decentralized Payment System. Individuals and merchants can use the SantCoin App to make payments to other individuals or merchants without involving a third-party, such as a bank or financial institution, for the purpose of validation. Instead, transactions are cleared and validated within the system through the closed source. As a precautionary measure, a copy of every device ledger is sent to the cloud and stored permanently in the public ledger that records and publicly displays all SantCoin transactions that have been executed within the SantCoin system.


The SantCoin integrated system allows two parties to settle a transaction outside the traditional financial system, and even outside any network. SantCoin allows online and offline payments to be sent directly from one party to another without going through any third party, such as a financial institution (bank) or even any kind of electronic connection or any network like internet, phone network or Wi-Fi.


SantCoin uses a local ledger to store and spend the currency; an integrated algorithm in the closed code source to validate every transaction, and a distributed global ledger technology to monitor the currency transactions.


Each transaction has a special key that represents the transaction information encrypted by the beneficiary SantCoin Address (SantCoin ID); SantCoin Keys must be generated by a computerized method, but it can be printed and stored on paper for the exclusive use by the specific beneficiary. With this exclusive technology SantCoin offers 2 types of personal banking system:

A) An Online banking system that stores digital money on the global digital bank ledger relating to a personal SantCoin Address (SantCoin ID).

B) An Offline banking system that stores digital money on a personal device or a personal printed ledger, both of which are specific to the beneficiary address (SantCoin ID) and can become digital money anytime the beneficiary types the Special Key into his SantCoin App or he connects his device to the internet. The information from every transaction will be sent to the global ledger when one of the transactors connects to the internet.

SantCoin Advantages

First of all, SantCoin is a digital currency or virtual currency or virtual money, but it is not a cryptocurrency; it includes many evolutions and improvements from the original bitcoin and other altcoins. A great deal of thought, and development, has gone into the creation of this coin. Most importantly, it is intuitive and easy for a beginner to use! The following Paragraphs outline some of the key improvements introduced in this new coin.

  • Money back guarantee

SantCoin is the only currency that comes with a lifetime permanent satisfaction, money back guarantee. When you buy or borrow SantCoin packages from SantCoin Inc., you can exchange your coins for goods and services, or you can return the full package at any time to SantCoin Inc. and be refunded 100%.

This lifetime guarantee on the SantCoin packages protects your SantCoins’ value for as long as you can return the full package (the same volume of SantCoin as your purchase). The guarantee is effective even if you sell it, trade it, or give it away! The actual owner of the package will get the refund.  

  • Mobile User Interface

Our platform is equipped with a mobile application that facilitates the transferring of stored value between two users of the system in the physical world.

  • Offline Payments

The mobile application has the capability to send, or receive, transactions in an offline state. No other technology is currently offering this.

  • Unique Technology

Our system introduces a new integrated technology, which is a way of associating your wallet’s Address (SantCoin ID) with your printed or electronic stored money. This unique technology is what enables the offline payment system. When your device generates a transaction key (10 digits), the amount of money is encrypted in this Special Key using your Address as an encryption Key.

  • Instantaneous

On the SantCoin system transactions take place immediately, it does not take even one second; it is faster than a credit card and all other cryptocurrencies. That is because SantCoin is not a cryptocurrency; there is no mining process and no external verification needed.

  • Privacy protection

The SantCoin system does not require any personal information to get a user’s address (SantCoin ID). Sending, storing, and receiving money can be done with absolute anonymity unless the user has chosen to share some information.


  • Worldwide Coin Distribution

SantCoin is a global and borderless currency. It can be used anywhere, anytime, and upon launch of the coin, every person around the world will be eligible to receive an allotment of the digital currency.

  • Democratic

SantCoin is not a democracy friendly currency just because anybody can create an equal share of the currency; better than that, SantCoin has a voting system that allows the community to make decisions over the currency, conditional upon 80% of voters being in agreement.

  • Autonomous

SantCoin is not regulated by any government or financial institution. SantCoin is the only system that does not need the internet to function; users can generate transaction keys in places where there is no internet connection. Beneficiary users can store keys on paper for a long time until they get a new phone and install the App and then they can use their printed money.

  • Environmentally friendly  

Since there is no need to solve very difficult problems to mine the coin, a lot of computer power will be saved and used more efficiently.

  • Inflation Proof

With only one way to create SantCoin, SantCoin currency volume is controlled and related to the currency community volume, which is exactly the initial share multiplied by the number of people. SantCoins are always created at a predictable and limited rate, related to humans and not some kind of puzzle like the cryptocurrency case, where mining requires a certain amount of machine work for each block of coins.  

  • Anonymous Targeted Marketing

The SantCoin wallet is equipped with a means of analyzing spending patterns and can target relevant offers and deals to your App without sharing your identity to 3rd parties.

New Digital currency, way not bitcoin?

What are bitcoins, Altcoins, and cryptocurrency?Bitcoin, or cryptocurrency, is a new phenomenon that is disrupting the financial sector. It was launched by an anonymous person, or group, as an electronic store of value, that could become more stable than fiat currency.

Due to Bitcoin’s surge in growth, and a lack of centralized development / evolution, the blockchain is becoming quickly dated. Bitcoin remains static, and un-evolving, while the community argues over how to improve the infrastructure.

Another major disadvantage of bitcoin is its sheer complexity.  Attempting to understand how bitcoin works and exactly how transactions are verified can leave many people shaking their heads in confusion.  As a result, some people are unwilling to commit to a monetary concept they can’t manage to grasp.

All the while, altcoins are released that push the envelope of the technology. Coins like Lite coin and Dark coin are born from a lack of Bitcoin’s ability to evolve.

Our Santcoin is jam packed with features, and will evolve over time… More importantly than any of the features listed above, are two key principles that were employed while creating this coin.

  • SantCoin is not another Altcoin!

Altcoins have proven to be clones, and sometimes clones of clones. The original Bitcoin source code is taken, and slightly modified or reconfigured to suit a different user group, and re-released under a different name… We DO NOT fall under this category! This coin employs new tactics, environmental features, and technologies.

  • Decentralization vs No Organization

As noted above, one of the primary flaws with Bitcoin is the lack of evolution. This lack of evolution comes from a stalemate that has been caused by the lack of an authority, and arguments between people that believe they are empowered, or represent sections of the community stalling progress.

This coin is designed with foresight, and with a method of appointing a committee that represents the coin’s best interests. The coin can still be decentralized, and stable, while empowering a committee to make decisions and evolve.

Conclusion: SantCoin is Superior to Bitcoin

As mentioned throughout this campaign, Bitcoin simply has not evolved over time, and a sea of Altcoins has been released due to the lack of organization within the Bitcoin ecosystem. Our new Santcoin system desires to make significant improvements to the feature set of Bitcoin, while also fixing the flaws that allowed this stalemate to occur within that community.

This coin is designed to empower the world to use digital currency, and to bring an easy-to-use interface into the mainstream. Utilizing offline modes, “TargetID Technology”, to facilitate transactions. this coin is moving into new and innovative areas.

Poverty: The plague we can treat.

The plague was the most devastating disaster in human history. For anybody who lived in that age, finding a cure for this Black Death would have been the top priority.

In our time, we are also experiencing huge losses, due to an old plague, capable of corrupting our minds so that even we believe it is untreatable; it is poverty, which, like any other disease, could be cured with cooperation and innovation.

Symptoms: pollution, illness, death, crime, immigration, wars and more bad things...

Children from poor families are more likely to die at birth or in infancy than children born into richer families. They are more likely to suffer chronic illness during childhood or to have a disability and if they live to be seniors, their life average is 8 years shorter than for a wealthy person.


Poverty causes illness and premature death; 842 million people are undernourished and malnutrition is the cause of death for more than 8000 children under 5 every day; that is 3.1 million children every year. 300 million children go to sleep hungry or cold each night and 250,000 to 500,000 children go blind annually from vitamin A deficiency, half of whom die within 12 months.


Poverty increases the risk of homelessness. There are over 100 million street children and the remaining poor children live in bad housing with bad sanitation and lack of basic hygiene, which makes it easier to spread old and new diseases; hunger and lack of water make people more vulnerable to these diseases.

Poverty creates an environment where kids can't simply go to school. Poor children often work to provide an income for their family, facing crippling accidents due to unsafe working environments and other work hazards such as lead poisoning, pesticide poisoning and bites from wild animals. And for those who can actually go to school, they simply don't see how education can improve their life because they see educated relatives unable to find a job.


Children from low income families often forgo events that most of us take for granted. They miss school trips, can’t invite friends round for tea and can’t afford a one-week holiday away from home.


Poverty badly affects a person’s personality, body and brain. Children born in the poorest areas, on average, weigh 200 grams less at birth than those born in the richest areas. Children from poorer backgrounds lag at all stages of education and people of limited means are more likely to make mistakes and bad decisions that may be amplified by, and perpetuate, their financial woes. This has significant effects on their physical and mental health, as well as their educational achievement. Without an education, people are unlikely to find a paying job.


When they are unemployed and homeless, social unrest can take over, which leads to increases in crime. When they have nothing, no money to buy necessities, they may be forced to turn to theft in order to survive.


Homelessness and high crime rates impact on a country’s people and can create many problems within society; crime prevents businesses from thriving because it generates instability and uncertainty.


Poverty fuels terrorism by creating a state of misery and frustration that pushes people to join terrorist organizations; most terrorists come from poor countries with high unemployment and terrorist organizations often provide salaries. The relationship is explicit between poverty and terrorism and other self-destructing plagues such as addictive substance abuse and trying to cope with huge amounts of stress and despair.


Poverty hurts economics, peoples and nations; it is a major cause of social tensions and threatens to divide nations. It can lead to terrorism, wars, mass emigrationand environmental destruction and outcomes such as an increased number of riots and clashes. The Arab Spring is a great example of how revolts can start because of few job opportunities and high poverty levels.


Poverty causes ignorance, disease, war, famine; it weakens families, traps individuals and decreases mobility. It causes unemployment, stagnation and reversal of human progress and leads to a breakdown of civilization.


Poverty is a very dangerous factor that can destabilize an entire world. It is therefore a very expensive proposition for all of us. If allowed to run unchecked, it will result in terrible living conditions for nearly everyone until it threatens the very existence of the human race.  


However, the worst thing about the poverty is the vicious cycle that forces people to inherit lifelong handicaps and troubles that are passed on from one generation to another.


The best thing is, for the first time in the history, we have the ability to break the poverty cycle. We know what poverty causes, but to be able to overcome it, we first need to figure out what poverty is, and what causes it.

Diagnosis: Wealth inequality

By definition, poverty is about not having enough money to meet basic needs including food, clothing, shelter and education (we call this extreme or absolute poverty), but poverty in general is lacking the required amount to fulfil basic standards of living.

We have a rising concentration of global wealth, estimated to be almost half of the world’s wealth, now owned by just 1 percent of the population who own $110 trillion, which is 65 times the total wealth of the bottom half of the world’s population.

1125 dollar billionaires own $4.4 trillion; that represent four times more than the accumulated worth of 50% of the poor people of the world. In most countries with available data, the share held by the 1 percent wealthiest population is rising at the expense of the bottom 90 percent population.

By supporting the monetary development policy, economies could prosper, health could improve and countries could develop into strong global presences. All countries will benefit when decreasing global poverty becomes established.

Poverty and wealth inequality are intrinsically linked; all the evidence confirms that rising inequality and poverty are related and showsthat a more equal distribution of income and assets can foster growth, whereas high inequality can retard it. Thus, reducing inequalities can be doubly beneficial for the poor.

Treatment: monetary policy.

  • wealth distribution monetary policy

If poverty occurs when the wealth is poorly distributed among peoples and when a tiny minority has a majority of the money, what we call inequality, than poverty (and inequality) is reversible.

The increasing levels of economic inequality have a connection with decreasing levels of economic mobility and rising levels of poverty. There is an untapped potential for reducing poverty through wealth distribution, and poverty reduction can be greatly enhanced through distributional policies.

Influenced by the power of technology to find creative solutions for complicated issues, the SantCoin vision considers that poverty is not an exception. Tackling inequality by a monetary policy does not harm growth, provided this policy is well designed and implemented.

  • Development and collaboration fund

Small changes in distribution can have a very large effect on poverty reduction and the global distribution of SantCoin digital currency could make that explicit, but distribution objectives, particularly for assets, should be an integral part of the cooperation and development fund. It follows that a currency policy should not only be pursued to reduce income inequalities but also to sustain long-term growth.

SantCoin digital currency policy has a dual approach; to end poverty and its effects first and then support the global cooperation and development effort through local government lead by technology.

SantCoin policy gives priority to the eight areas deemed necessary for securing the welfare or happiness of any individual or community, as f:

  • Health and wellness

  • Nutrition and water

  • Education and professional training

  • Adequate housing

  • Transport and clean energy

  • Science and Technology

  • Environment and resources

  • Safety and Happiness.

Video: Santcoin Brings Great Wealth for Everyone!









Here is the screenshot of what the app looks like:

Here is our Send Money screen. See how simple it is to send money to someone? Anyone can do this.



You simply open the app on your phone,
Enter your friend’s Santcoin ID number,
Put in the amount, and press Send.

Zap! Now the first half of the transaction is complete – the money has left your account and entered our system and has generated a unique one-time use 10-digit code that identifies the transaction.
You take this 10-digit code and give it to your friend by any means you like. You can send it in a text message, a phone call, an Email, whatever is easiest.
Then he performs his half of the transaction – he simply enters the ten-digit code into his app on his phone. The system authenticates the transaction, and the exact amount you’ve sent is added to his balance. Done! There are no service fees, no hassles, and no chance of being hacked.








































http://www.santcoin.com
We hope you will consider getting involved with our organization and supporting our system. Please visit our community Website and join other members, and get more credits by sending invitations to your friends.

Limited Time Perks: Perks ending or Changing may be announced and applied immediately without previous notification.

How to Earn Money with Santcoin? Here

We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have about the SantCoin Engine , the Indiegogo campaign, and our company as a whole. 
Email us at: admin@santcoin.com / santcoin@hotmail.com



In these days of digital commerce, we are sending money electronically all the time. However, there are hackers everywhere, trying their best to get their grubby hands on your money. Plus, most of the existing payment services charge hefty fees.
What if I could tell you it didn’t need to be that way? Would you be interested? I’ll bet you would. Our SantCoin program offers you a whole new way.
This new platform gives you a way to securely send money from your phone to an individual anywhere in the world, regardless if he has a bank account, an Internet connection, or even a Government-issued identity card. And here’s the big reveal – it’s FREE.
SantCoin is the answer. You’ve heard of Bitcoin – SantCoin is the next generation of digital currency and we have added many improvements over the original platform. This an app we  have developed that is fast, simple, secure, and incredibly easy to use, even for people who are not Internet-savvy.
We have improved the security of your transactions, the anonymity, the profitability, even the options to add advertising, and tracking.
In 2015, Payments made with debit and credit cards and other non-cash methods jumped 9 percent last year to 390 billion transactions, Capgemini report said.
In USA, the credit  cards number average per consumer is 4.4 , one in ten Americans has more than 10 credit cards. and the card payment users expect more than 35.54 billion as potential worldwide losses because of payment card fraud in 2020.
With a number of smartphone users is forecast to grow to around 2.5 billion in 2019. Mobile payments grew significantly in volume – by 170 percent – to reach 4.5 billion transactions. and there is many reason for that.
Making payment from phone is more convenient and less time consuming, and shopper more likely to use their coupons when they use phone to pay, and unlike the credit card, tracking and recovering your phone in case it gets lost is much easier, and most mobile phones can be locked with a pin, so gaining access to sensitive account information or making transactions is made more difficult.
The speed, security, privacy, information management, simplicity and convenience factors in mobile payments is higher as opposed to credit card payments. There is just one limitation, the cost. The main payment channel for this mobile pay systems still credit and some debit cards. this payment method are operated under financial regulation and require processing the payment by different parties that cost big interchange and processing fees that exceed 20 billion annually just in USA.
Mobile payments technology don’t require a big infrastructure to work. Hundreds millions of merchants around the world will immigrate to mobile phone as an alternative way of payment, but they still have to lose up to 3.5 % of their gross revenue as processing and interchange fees, and in many cases that means the difference between the success and the lose of the business.
Thanks to using a new digital currency concept, SantCoin has none of traditional payment methods limitations, SantCoin  is a scalable system , With an architecture that offer security, audit trail, transparency and speed. And by offering a free service, SantCoin is ideal for merchants and will help them increase their profit and sales.
Further advances could come from SantCoin Engine. The freedom, the new model, and the adaptation ability  give Santcoin the potential to grow fast and win not just the mobile payment contest, but the power to reach the unbanked population and take the leadership in the money transfer game.
Banking the unbanked is a global serious challenge, Different Statistics shows that that is 38 % of the global population that represent 2 billion adults are still unbanked, and others 1.3 billion account-owning adults still use cash to pay utility bills.
this big numbers that reflect 59% of adults in developing economies, or 3/4 of the world’s poor according to The Global Findex do not have a bank account, not only because of poverty, but also due to costs, travel distance and paperwork involved.
SantCoin can solve that, allowing those unbanker poor to get a virtual digital bank checking account using their mobiles without any document requirement, better than that with SanCtion system they will get a free money allotment to start using the system, that is will encourage those unbanked to join the digital banking business, and allow them to send and receive digital money for free, solving the next global issues.
Globally, sending remittances costs an average of 7.37 percent of the amount sent,or 25 billion dollar annually. SantCoin charge no fees for money transfer and will save this full amount. These funds would simply remain to migrants and their families and could contribute significantly to improving the living conditions of the migrants themselves as well as reducing poverty in their countries of origin.

Thus, reducing inequalities can be doubly beneficial for the poor.
Treatment: monetary policy.
wealth distribution monetary policy
If poverty occurs when the wealth is poorly distributed among peoples and when a tiny minority has a majority of the money, what we call inequality, than poverty (and inequality) is reversible.
The increasing levels of economic inequality have a connection with decreasing levels of economic mobility and rising levels of poverty. There is an untapped potential for reducing poverty through wealth distribution, and poverty reduction can be greatly enhanced through distributional policies.
Influenced by the power of technology to find creative solutions for complicated issues, the SantCoin vision considers that poverty is not an exception. Tackling inequality by a monetary policy does not harm growth, provided this policy is well designed and implemented.
Development and collaboration fund
Small changes in distribution can have a very large effect on poverty reduction and the global distribution of SantCoin digital currency could make that explicit, but distribution objectives, particularly for assets, should be an integral part of the cooperation and development fund. It follows that a currency policy should not only be pursued to reduce income inequalities but also to sustain long-term growth.
SantCoin digital currency policy has a dual approach; to end poverty and its effects first and then support the global cooperation and development effort through local government lead by technology.
SantCoin policy gives priority to the eight areas deemed necessary for securing the welfare or happiness of any individual or community, as f:

Health and wellness
Nutrition and water
Education and professional training
Adequate housing
Transport and clean energy
Science and Technology
Environment and resources
Safety and Happiness.

story:
Walking down the street, you see it – every third person is zooming around with a to-go drink. We see disposable cups everywhere. At work, in stores, on a train, on a plane, on a boat with a goat… The paper cup is the emblem of people on the go. These to-go cups have also become the symbol of our throwaway culture. At Vessel we want to show that being productive doesn’t have to mean living disposably, and that living sustainably doesn’t mean sacrificing convenience. Vessel’s goal is to make sustainability visible, accessible, and easily integrated into your life, which is why we’ve created a product that is as on-the-go as you are.


VESSEL EXISTS TO SOLVE A PROBLEM


THE PROBLEM

"But paper cups are... paper. Paper is natural. It biodegrades, it's basically like drinking out of an apple. Right?"

Because we know paper is made from trees we have this idea that it is somehow connected to the ecosystem in a very "green" way. We imagine these paper cups being made from something natural, and then just as seamlessly, absorbing back into the natural landscape once recycled. This idea that anything made out of paper can't really be bad for the environment because... it is the environment is intuitive but...

Well...

THE SOLUTION: Vessel

Vessel is the solution to the paper cup problem


Vessel is a FREE check-out system of stainless steel to-go mugs. The insulated mug keeps your drink hot or cold, and the silicone lid lets you travel across town without thinking about spills. We have pick up and drop off locations throughout the city, so whenever you are finished with your drink, instead of ditching it in a trashcan (and banishing it to a landfill) you can ditch it at a Vessel kiosk to be washed and then whenever you want another drink, a new, clean Vessel awaits at a nearby cafe. We handle the hassle, you sip in style.


A NETWORK OF MUGS

The lending system of Vessel is super simple. You pick up your cup at a cafe and drop it off when you're finished. But what makes Vessel special is the interconnectivity between each of our locations, which means picking up at one location and having the ability to drop it off at another. Pick up a Vessel in DUMBO, drop it off on the Lower East Side. Pick up a new one in Greenwich and drop it off in Midtown.

We understand convenience is paramount. At Vessel we want to help you accomplish your goals, we just want to do it better than a paper cup ever has.


How It Works

1. Sign up in a cafe or online through vesselwrks.com.

Is your whole office interested? With our in-office sign up options, we come to you. All you have to do is ask.


2. Pick up your member card at a participating cafe to start using Vessel.


3. Order your beverage and request it be put in a Vessel mug.


4. Enjoy your beverage on the go in a Vessel that has been checked out to you!


5. Return your mug within 5 days to any of our participating locations and start over with a fresh one the next time you order a drink!


WHAT'S NEXT FOR VESSEL

We are using your pledge to grow Vessel in three specific areas.


1. More locations

Vessel has run pilot launches in 4 locations throughout Brooklyn and Manhattan, but in order to bring this service to everyone, we must first be accessible! Your pledge will give us the ability to add more pick-up and drop-off locations throughout the city, and the US.

Here are our current locations. Where to next? 


2. Quantified self delivery platform

(or "What about an App?')

With our app we will provide real-time quantified self data to our members through a personalized user interface! We want to bring you your information, and we want to bring it to you fast. Along with getting stats on your coffee use, and social impact, you will also be able to see all of the Vessel locations in your area, how many mugs you have checked, when they are due back, and by adding a Family Plan functionality, we will make it easy for everyone to Vessel under one roof. Your pledge will help us get a move on implementing these types of technologies!

We want to make Vessel more accessible in all areas. What better way to gamify our system and give you real-time quantified self data? Apart from having one of our members following you around with a clipboard, documenting your every move and then reminding you of it all at the end of the day before you fall asleep.. there really is no better way to give you this information than through an app. Your pledge will help us build, generate, and roll out our Vessel app in order to turn this technological dream into a reality!

3. Different sizes

Vessel currently offers a 16 oz. stainless steel cup with a silicon lid. This allows users to  have their choice of a standard size “small medium large” amount of drink. In the future, however, we want users to be able to customize their cup to their drink. If you are getting a small coffee, you will be able to get it in a small Vessel. We want to grow our size beyond the standard 16 ounces as well, so if you're feeling particularly draggy from the night before, we want to be able to help you out. Your pledge will allow us to start rolling out these new sizes!

BREAKING DOWN "QUANTIFIED-SELF"

You keep track of your steps, don't you want to keep track of how awesome you're being at diverting waste?

Vessel provides our users more than just a drink in a sexy cup.

We are a culture that is obsessed with quantifying our inputs and outputs. Tallying everything up and then reflecting on the big ideas of what it all means about us as an individual. At Vessel we want to provide you with all of the classic information about personal consumption, but we also want to show you all of the different ways that using Vessel has made an impact on areas we don't always think about when we order that bleary-eyed coffee. How much coffee did you drink this month? How much of it was Fair Trade? How did my Fair Trade purchases affect the people who made it? How many local coffee shops did I visit this month? How much waste did I divert from landfills? How many tax dollars did my waste diversion save? 

Vessel wants to give you this information.




WITH VESSEL EVERYBODY WINS


Customers WIN

With Vessel's insulated material, customer's drinks stay hot or cold, and thanks to Vessel's beautiful solid material, gone are the days of having to worry about leaky paper cups. Customers also gain access to information about the purchases they are making everyday. Pleasurable drinking experience + access to quantified-self information + lessening personal waste = WIN


Cafes WIN

The average cafe spends more money on your paper cup than it does on your coffee beans. Every time a Vessel is scanned out to a customer, the cafe pays Vessel half of what they would be spending on a paper cup. Vessel also alerts customers to Vessel-enabled cafes in their area, bringing new customers through the doors. All while improving corporate social responsibility. Save money + bring in new customers  + reduce waste + improve corporate social responsibility = WIN



Cities WIN

Vessel saves the taxpayer money. In NYC the city spends 3.2 million dollars a year burying paper cups. It is your tax dollars that are picking up the bill. Help lower those costs and lessen those growing piles in the landfill. Reduce taxes + reduce waste = WIN

WHAT ABOUT THE PERKS?

Warm Fuzzy's

We all have stuff. Lots and lots of stuff.  Did you know that, the average U.S. household has 300,000 items? We consume nearly twice as many material goods today as we did 50 years ago and these things, that we've started consuming at a faster rate than ever, end up in storage spaces (which have grown to an upwards of 50,000 in the US) – or in landfills.

This massive-scale stuff accruement is at the heart of what Vessel is trying to remedy.

For every $15 you spend, you replace 2,000 paper and plastic cups with one Vessel. That means for every $15 you spend, you remove 2,000 disposable cups from landfills. 

"Sponsor-A-Cup" 

Along with the sheer joy that comes from knowing you had a hand in making a physical dent in a landfill, with your pledge you also gain access to our "Sponsor-A-Cup" program.

When you sponsor a cup, you can receive letters, photos and waste diversion information. This includes updates on where your cup is now, where it's been, and the impact it has been having on the community near and far! You can change a cup’s life from one of hardship and loneliness to one of hope and meaning. You have the opportunity to literally shift the way our culture thinks of disposability and reduce tons of waste – all while looking good!



OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Help get the word out!

You are a crucial link in spreading the Vessel love.

Let us know that you are hip with Vessel culture! Our Facebook, Instagram and Twitter are waiting for some action!

You can also share the link to our video on your preferred social-networking site! (e-harmony, reddit, chat-roulette, all of the above?)

Use the hashtags #howdoyouvessel #vesselNYC #makeitcount

Do you know anyone who would be interested in Vessel? Someone who likes big ideas, and realistic implementations? Help us help them! Follow this link to share Vessel with your friends, family, colleagues, teammates, theater troupe, book club, christian mingle contact list, and anyone else you think might be interested!



FAQs


Q: I am a Cafe and I want this for my customers NOW!

A: We want this for your customers too! We are currently NYC based but are expanding. Contact us!


Q: I am an Investor. What is your revenue generation model?

A: We are so glad you asked! Contact us to talk nuts and bolts.


Q: Where are these so called "locations" I keep hearing about?

A: Currently Vessel is on the ground in Manhattan at Spreadhouse Cafe. After two successful pilots in Brooklyn and Manhattan we are confident in our potential for expansion! Is there somewhere you want Vessel to be? Request a location here!


Q: No but really.. how much does it cost?

A: Nothing! There is no charge to individuals to participate in the program! You will only be charged if you decide to keep the mug and therefore take it out of circulation for others. The current price of a missing mug is $15.


Q: How long can I keep a Vessel mug for?

A: Once you register, and check out a Vessel mug you can keep it for 5 days before returning it at any of our locations.


Q: What if I forget to return it?

A: Let’s be real. You’ll forget. You’ll go out of town and leave it sitting on your counter next to your succulents that you bought because your other plants died because you could never remember to water them. We understand. We have dead plants too. That’s why we give you a realistic return time and allow you to have two Vessel’s checked out at a time. If you decide to keep it forever you pay us $15. We will remind you when your due date is coming up, and days before you are ever charged.


Q: Can I buy a Vessel mug?

A: We love them too! However, just like a library book, our Vessel's are meant to remain in the commons, for all to use and love.


Q: Where do I return the mug?

A: Right now we have four locations, but are in the process of expansion!


Q: I already bring my own cup so why should I even bother?

A: Yay! You’re already a change-maker extraordinaire. You obviously care about the impact your choices as a consumer/individual/lover/fighter make on the world around you! By signing up (for free!) you are helping us bring this free service to those people who might not be able to bring their own cup, or who might think it is too difficult. Help us to help you accomplish your already stellar goal of reducing waste.


Q: You don't have them available in my area so why should I donate?

A: We want to be in your area! In fact we can’t WAIT to be in your area (*cough* neither can the whales *cough*) By signing up, and donating you are proving that there are individuals who don’t want to think disposably anymore, and want to be able to have Vessel’s circulating throughout their community. Tell us where you want Vessel to be!


Q: Yeah, sorry, I am not big into the environment... what’s in it for me?

A: Not everyone at Vessel likes the feel of grass between their toes and sunshine on their skin. In fact, some of us only get outside if we are trying to catch a Charizard in Pokemon Go. Getting your caffeine fix is easy with a paper cup, but it is just as easy with a Vessel, the only difference is that it keeps your drink at your preferred temperature and cuts back on the clean up fees (TAXES) that your city (TAXES) spends to haul off those paper cups (TAXES) and send them to a waste treatment plant (TAXES) and then haul them off to a landfill dumping site (TAXES).


Q: This seems to good to be true, what’s the catch?

A: Vessel is currently in the third phase of our pilot launch. We are working out the kinks in our technology and our cafe implementation. We need your help to transition from pilot to full-scale, city-wide implementation.
