story:
MARA PEN is a cutting-edge blend of highly precise sensors and state-of-the-art aircraft navigation technology that makes navigating on-screen presentations a breeze, and much more accurate than any existing method.

 

MARA PEN offers a more flexible and intuitive way of controlling the computer from any vantage point. Its highly sensitive motion sensors control the cursor on your screen with pinpoint accuracy while algorithms translate the movement of your hand.

  

 

 

Professional presenters, lecturers, and speakers no longer need to switch between devices to control their presentation. MARA PEN gives everyone freedom of movement: No more walking back and forth between the computer and the stage.

MARA PEN enables an interactive digital classroom. Lessons are no longer limited by the form of constant slides. Your are free to make learning fun by engaging more animations, videos, or 3D demos. You can use MARA PEN to easily operate among different kinds of medias while still stand close to your audience, plus the motion of your hand and the digital content help students learn faster!

Architects, designers, and engineers can use MARA PEN to rotate their visualisations in three dimensions. It provides a simple and unified solution that makes it easy to open documents, highlight text and use software during your slideshow. You can drag and drop elements, even draw on slides and showcase 3D models – simply by moving the pen in mid-air. MARA PEN lets you control your screen’s cursor like a conductor.

MARA PEN is a great gadget for everyone to use in various situations. For example, you can use the MARA PEN as a remote control on Netflix! Just insert the USB dongle into the computer and sit back and relax! Open any Netflix series, pause them, and more, all of that from a distance sitting in your couch. Show MARA PEN in action to your friends- they will be impressed! Guaranteed!

MARA PEN comes with a built-in rechargeable battery and a magnetic charging port, which enables you to connect the charger from two different angles.

Connecting the pen to the charger is as simple as a gentle touch. Standardized USB connector allows the charger to be powered by your laptop or any other USB power adaptor.  

MARA PEN is more precise than any comparable device. The product is supported by our leading performance motion sensing technology which provides a complete solution allowing for orientation reading in 3D.

The motion sensing solution takes the advantages of a unique processing method developed by SYD Dynamics. It offers great dynamic performance while keeping the preciseness.

Every product detail matters! From overhauling the entire shape down to tiny corner of the connector, we elaborate and the more efforts we put, the closer we get to the idlest of the very design within our imagination.

A simple design lasts. While focusing on details improves the quality, making it clean and simple enhances user experience. MARA PEN has only three buttons and a LED indicator, yet it features all the necessary functions we could ask for when executing a perfect presentation or other recreational purpose.

The first batch of MARA PENs have just been assembled in January 2017.

 

Risks and challenges

We have ensured a strong production setup and found our manufacturing partners. Our approach to challenges and unforeseen circumstances is proactive and we anticipate the worst case scenario in order to be prepared. However, we are not able to foresee the future, so should an issue arise that affects when the MARA PEN is delivered to you, we will let you know immediately.

-- Hacker pack backers, please note -- 
Damage to the software of the MARA PEN as a result of your further development on MARA PEN is your full responsibility.

 

FAQ

Why should I buy MARA PEN?
MARA PEN offers a totally new way of controlling your cursor on your computer or tablet. It allows you to showcase design drafts, 2D and 3D models, navigate in computer-aided design (CAD) environments and through 3D worlds.

How do I charge my MARA PEN?
Simply attach the charger to a USB outlet and place MARA PEN on the charger contacts. One charging cycle will take 3 hours and will fully charge MARA PEN. A charge is good for 24 hours of non-stop use.

Does MARA PEN work with my device?
MARA PEN works with all devices that support a USB computer mouse.

Which additional software do I need?
You don’t need any additional software to use or charge MARA PEN.

Where will you be shipping the rewards from?
We will be shipping all rewards from our office in Sonderborg in Denmark.

What shipping service are you using?
We will be shipping all rewards with Postnord(www.postnord.dk).

MARA PEN offers a more flexible and intuitive way of controlling the computer from any vantage point. Its highly sensitive motion sensors control the cursor on your screen with pinpoint accuracy while algorithms translate the movement of your hand.



  



 

 










Professional presenters, lecturers, and speakers no longer need to switch between devices to control their presentation. MARA PEN gives everyone freedom of movement: No more walking back and forth between the computer and the stage.

MARA PEN enables an interactive digital classroom. Lessons are no longer limited by the form of constant slides. Your are free to make learning fun by engaging more animations, videos, or 3D demos. You can use MARA PEN to easily operate among different kinds of medias while still stand close to your audience, plus the motion of your hand and the digital content help students learn faster!



Architects, designers, and engineers can use MARA PEN to rotate their visualisations in three dimensions. It provides a simple and unified solution that makes it easy to open documents, highlight text and use software during your slideshow. You can drag and drop elements, even draw on slides and showcase 3D models – simply by moving the pen in mid-air. MARA PEN lets you control your screen’s cursor like a conductor.

MARA PEN is a great gadget for everyone to use in various situations. For example, you can use the MARA PEN as a remote control on Netflix! Just insert the USB dongle into the computer and sit back and relax! Open any Netflix series, pause them, and more, all of that from a distance sitting in your couch. Show MARA PEN in action to your friends- they will be impressed! Guaranteed!















MARA PEN comes with a built-in rechargeable battery and a magnetic charging port, which enables you to connect the charger from two different angles.

Connecting the pen to the charger is as simple as a gentle touch. Standardized USB connector allows the charger to be powered by your laptop or any other USB power adaptor.  


MARA PEN is more precise than any comparable device. The product is supported by our leading performance motion sensing technology which provides a complete solution allowing for orientation reading in 3D.


The motion sensing solution takes the advantages of a unique processing method developed by SYD Dynamics. It offers great dynamic performance while keeping the preciseness.

Every product detail matters! From overhauling the entire shape down to tiny corner of the connector, we elaborate and the more efforts we put, the closer we get to the idlest of the very design within our imagination.

A simple design lasts. While focusing on details improves the quality, making it clean and simple enhances user experience. MARA PEN has only three buttons and a LED indicator, yet it features all the necessary functions we could ask for when executing a perfect presentation or other recreational purpose.











The first batch of MARA PENs have just been assembled in January 2017.



 
Risks and challenges
We have ensured a strong production setup and found our manufacturing partners. Our approach to challenges and unforeseen circumstances is proactive and we anticipate the worst case scenario in order to be prepared. However, we are not able to foresee the future, so should an issue arise that affects when the MARA PEN is delivered to you, we will let you know immediately.

-- Hacker pack backers, please note -- Damage to the software of the MARA PEN as a result of your further development on MARA PEN is your full responsibility.
 
FAQ
Why should I buy MARA PEN?MARA PEN offers a totally new way of controlling your cursor on your computer or tablet. It allows you to showcase design drafts, 2D and 3D models, navigate in computer-aided design (CAD) environments and through 3D worlds.
How do I charge my MARA PEN?Simply attach the charger to a USB outlet and place MARA PEN on the charger contacts. One charging cycle will take 3 hours and will fully charge MARA PEN. A charge is good for 24 hours of non-stop use.
Does MARA PEN work with my device?MARA PEN works with all devices that support a USB computer mouse.
Which additional software do I need?You don’t need any additional software to use or charge MARA PEN.
Where will you be shipping the rewards from?We will be shipping all rewards from our office in Sonderborg in Denmark.
What shipping service are you using?We will be shipping all rewards with Postnord(www.postnord.dk).

story:
Have you ever been paid to do what you've always wanted to do?

How Tryve Works:

  • Select a pre-set event/challenge to invest yourself in (ex. drinking water every day, working out for 60 minutes a day, etc.)
  • Upload a photo to show your progress and have it authenticated by the Tryve Admin Team
  • Share your story with friends and see the progress of the rest of the Tryve community
  • Complete 100% of your goal by your deadline and get 100% of your money back in addition to an incentive

Note: All information on this page is trademarked by EINC. All rights reserved.

Our Story:

As time goes on, virtual investment is becoming more popular and widely used. We realized that there is no better way to do investments than to invest in something you truly believe in because that's how investment works; it starts with 1) the initial belief that something is the best and 2) the initial step in having trust, faith, and love in that something. 

What that something can be is...A Better You.

At the end of the day, we all want to become better versions of ourselves, and we can do that by investing. When most of us think of the term "investment," we might associate it with the words "money" and "risky." But we want to change this perception of "investment" from being seen as too risky to a step towards personal growth because A Better You is what you are investing in. The amount of risk and predictability is determined by you. After all, who can you trust more in the world other than yourself? 

With Tryve, you are both the investor and the investment. As long as you have 1) the initial belief that you are your own best product/company and take 2.) the initial step to have trust, faith, and love in yourself, your investment will be worthwhile and will prove to you that you are worth investing in, as there is no better investment than yourself in this world!

We provide a variety of categories you can improve in, ranging from emotional & mental health, education, spirituality, fitness health, sleep, diet, sex, and much more areas that you can develop yourself and achieve your best state in.

You already know the kind of lifestyle, financial goals, and habits you want to harness. Tryve is just a tool and motivator to help you get to where you want to be in your life. It all comes down to you and how will you try, thrive, strive, and "Tryve" today.

So why not grow your own money and your own wellness at the same time? This is what Tryve was designed for you to do. You have nothing to lose as long as you are investing in A Better You.

What We Need And What You Get:

Dear Backers,

We will need as much support as we can get to bring Tryve to life. Here are the perks that we are happy to offer our supporters:

  • Tier 1 ($5 or more):
    • ​SUPPORT US AND STAY CONNECTED: Give us a little support and receive backer's updates on our progress and project information + Receive a thank you email from our team :) 
  • Tier 2 ($19 or more):
    • Your name included in a customized, end-of-the-campaign video to thank those who helped in the process of building Tryve 
  • Tier 3 ($39 or more):
    • Tier 2 + EINC merchandise/care package (TBD)
  • Tier 4 ($69 or more):
    • Tier 3 + Custom message/ad in our thank you video
  • Tier 5 ($200 or more):
    • Tier 3 + Tier 4 + Early access to beta version + One of our founders will be your Tryve friend and share progress/newsfeed on Tryve app
  • Tier 6 ($500 or more)​
    • Tier 3 + Tier 4 + Tier 5 + Free 1-year subscription to premium service on Tryve + XX seconds personalized video + Thank You Virtual Party With Tryve Team
  • Tier 7 ($1000 or more)
    • Once Tryve comes to the market, you get to create your own unique event/goals separate from the pre-set events/goals set by our team.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We are looking for talented individuals to join our team
  • Tell your network about the possibilities with Tryve.app
  • Visit www.einc.biz to learn more about projects that you can support

Stay Connected

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eincbiz/

FaceBook: https://www.facebook.com/officialeinc

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/eincbiz

Twitter: https://twitter.com/eincbiz

story:
Finally an inexpensive way to collaborate from anywhere


Turn almost any surface into a virtual whiteboard


All you need is your smartphone and the pen. It's that simple!



Product Overview
Ships Early 2017

Smartphone App

$5 /mo (USD)

Captures writing in real time and stores it in a secured database. From the app you can invite people to view or write on your board, as well as make changes such as the color of the virtual pen you are writing in.

Supported Platforms:

Apple: iPhone 5S and above
Android: Coming Soon!

Pen or Marker

$15 /Pen (USD)

$25 /Marker (USD)

The pen is designed for writing on smaller pages and comes in several different color inks.

The marker is used for writing on larger surfaces such as whiteboards. Designed with an easily replaceable cap, you can swap out the marker inside.

Holder (Optional)

$20 (USD)

The holder provides a simple yet secure way to position your phone while writing. For vertical surfaces like a whiteboard or a wall, the holder uses powerful magnets or screws to attach to the surface.

Website

Viewing is FREE!

You control your content. Share your writing in real time with anyone around the world through our secure website. You can also upload images so that your writing appears on top of an image. Playback features enable you to record your writing and play it back at a later time. Additional exciting features in development!


FAQs

What is Pixcil?
Pixcil is a writing tool that is tracked by your smartphone’s camera, instantly recording a digital copy of your handwriting.

What do I need in order to use Pixcil?
You will need an iPhone 5S or newer model loaded with the Pixcil App, and either the Pixcil Pen or Marker. The smartphone holder is optional, but is recommended to help your phone stay in place while tracking.

Why can't I use my own pen?
Your smartphone’s camera tracks the light emitted from the Pixcil Pen or Marker making it incompatible with just an ordinary pen.

Can I replace the ink cartridge inside the pen or marker?
The Pixcil Marker allows you to easily replace the inserted marker, enabling you to write in multiple colors. However, the pen does not have this feature.

How is Pixcil so inexpensive?
Your smartphone is a powerful device that you already paid for and we think you should get the most out of it! Pixcil’s App takes advantage of your smartphone’s muscle minimizing the number of expensive components that we need in our hardware.

Why should I use Pixcil?
Have you ever paused a meeting to email a picture of the whiteboard? Tried to explain exactly why the design would fail over the phone? Had to talk yourself in circles until your web conference became more frustrating than productive? If you have answered yes, then we recommend a dose of Pixcil to relieve that headache.

Who can use Pixcil?
Basically everyone! Here's a few ideas:

  • Consultants working on global projects
  • Working professionals collaborating on projects
  • Engineers working on plan drawings remotely
  • Designers (Graphic, fashion, web, you name it!)
  • Teachers sharing content with their students
  • Students in group projects
  • Ecofriendly paper savers (using our inkless marker insert!)
  • Anyone on a business trip
  • Anyone who wants to work from home
  • You name it, they can use it!

    • Credits
    Crowdfunding Video Production by http://startmotionmedia.com

story:
Short Summary

Wool - Mini Mill in Iceland

The Producer

My name is Hulda Brynjólfsdóttir. I live on a farm in South of Iceland.
As well as farming with sheep and cattle, I am a handcrafter with a great love for everything made from wool.
My dream is to run a mini mill on my farm and make yarn from my own wool, as well as from local farmer’s wool.
I found a factory in Canada that makes machinery for small wool-mills. After looking very carefully into it, I and my family decided that starting our own business running a professional mini mill, will be the right next step for us.

What We Need & What You Get

The Product
The goal is to produce high quality Icelandic yarn from our own wool and the wool being produced here in the area. This wool will be handled more carefully and respectfully and the yarn will be softer than what is available on the market now.
It will be traceable back to the farm where it originates and you can be sure that all these animals are cared for in the best possible way.  I will make yarn in the natural colors of the Icelandic sheep, and also bats for those who want to spin yarn by hand on their spinning wheel.
We believe that there is a huge and growing interest in good quality Icelandic made yarns straight from the farm – a market that currently is not supplied.
We are planning to start production in October 2017.

The Impact

In Iceland we have exceptional quality wool. But as everywhere farmers don't get fair price for their wool. I hope when my mill has started to sell high quality yarn and wool products for handcrafting and spinning, I can pay them fairer price.
The wool I yearn to work with is of the natural colors of the Icelandic sheep, which are very diverse. The Icelandic wool also has the spectacular quality of double fiber; tog and thel, which can be separated, the thel being so much softer than the tog or both of the materials bind together. Making yarn in natural colors and in softer yarn is bound to attract lovers of the true nature and I just know that we will have lots of buyers of our yarn.
By being able to pay farmers a higher price, than they get today, I hope to encourage them to put more weight into their wonderful product, being even more interested in breeding their sheep with fiber quality in mind. Considering the texture of their wool and the colors of the heard.
Equally importantly I intend to produce yarn and wool products to meet up with your needs for quality and artistic work. The yarn will be of natural colors of the sheep or plant-dyed. The softness will be of more variety and the thickness of the yarn will be up to the buyers desire.
So the numerous knitters, both in Iceland and abroad will be able to have additional yarn to choose from.

Risks & Challenges

The machinery cost a lot and I have to take a bank loan to get them to Iceland. We are the first one's to get a mini mill started in my country and we hear of lot of people who want to be able to buy that kind of yarn and wool products. I have also heard from my neighbor farmers that they are eager to sell me their wool for my production. Many of my neighbors have also shown interest in having their wool spun into yarn for their own use and I hope I can stand up to the expectations people are having for my mill. We are even asked by people from foreign countries for yarn to knit and crochet. So the demand is not only in our own country.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to support me with donation. Please spread the word and share this campaign among your friends. 
Tell everyone you know. Send e-mail to people you know. Share on facebook.
Thank you so much for good thoughts and spreading the word. It's also a help.
And when we get started, let people know where they can buy high quality Icelandic yarn.

Remember to use indiegogo.com 

 

 

Við erum sunnlenskir sauðfjárbændur sem langar að auka tekjur sauðfjárbænda og um leið vinna úr hráefni sem hefur óendanlega möguleika í hverskyns listsköpun.
Við ætlum að flytja inn vélar frá Kanada til að spinna ull í band og selja hérlendis og erlendis. Garnið verður í náttúrulegum sauðalitum og heldur mýkra en það sem hægt er að fá vélspunnið hérlendis í dag. Einnig verður hægt að koma með ull til okkar og fá hana spunna að eigin óskum. Vélarnar eiga þar að auki að ráða við geitafiðu og vona ég að ég nái að æfa þá tækni ásamt ullarvinnslunni.
Á þessari síðu er hægt að styrkja verkefnið, annað hvort með framlagi að eigin ósk og fá þakklæti fyrir eða fyrirfram ákveðna upphæð sem gefur litla gjöf í þakklætisskyni. Hver gjöf telur, sama hversu stór eða lítil hún er. Því miður gat ég ekki haft þetta á íslensku annars vegar og öðru tungumáli hins vegar, en ég set inn örfá orð á íslensku þar sem því er viðkomið. 

Okkur þætti vænt um ef þessu yrði deilt sem víðast. Hjartans þakkir.

story:
A More Organize Lifestyle

 We organize our various everyday belongings with magnets, rubber bands, and buttons,but lack one cohesive device that can do it all.
 Thus, we introduce the Brunt Clip, a tool that solves this problem by combining all these different functions. 
 

 

 

Various Usages

 Both in organizing daily supplies as well as serving as a stylish accessory.

 

Mounted on metal surfaces

 The Brunt Clip has neodymium magnets that allow it to be mounted on metal surfaces.
It can be easily used with the Brunt Metal Plate to ensure a compatible metal surface wherever you go for maximum convenience.

 

 

Vegetable Leather

The leather of the Brunt Clip is made of natural, carefully crafted vegetable-tanned leather.
The entire surface is gently and naturally colored using the plant extract tannin instead of chemicals. Over time, it gradually and naturally tans, adding depth to both the piece itself as well as your style.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We’ve almost finished production of the clips so there is no problem in the delivery schedule process. Through Indiegogo campaign, we will improve product quality as much as we can be funded

 

 

Timeline

 

 

About team

Brunt is a compound word formed from “Brush,” “Paint,” and “Technology.”

Brush and paint represent artistic creativity, while technology refers to our increasingly digital modern society. 

We create our products and services with these elements mind, striving to balance them together and create tools for a sophisticated, futuristic world. We are confident that Brunt products will greatly increase daily convenience and empower you in crafting your own unique lifestyle in the digital age.

 We organize our various everyday belongings with magnets, rubber bands, and buttons,but lack one cohesive device that can do it all. Thus, we introduce the Brunt Clip, a tool that solves this problem by combining all these different functions.  


 
 
Various Usages
 Both in organizing daily supplies as well as serving as a stylish accessory.







 
Mounted on metal surfaces
 The Brunt Clip has neodymium magnets that allow it to be mounted on metal surfaces.It can be easily used with the Brunt Metal Plate to ensure a compatible metal surface wherever you go for maximum convenience.



 
 
Vegetable Leather
The leather of the Brunt Clip is made of natural, carefully crafted vegetable-tanned leather.The entire surface is gently and naturally colored using the plant extract tannin instead of chemicals. Over time, it gradually and naturally tans, adding depth to both the piece itself as well as your style.

 
 
Risks & Challenges
We’ve almost finished production of the clips so there is no problem in the delivery schedule process. Through Indiegogo campaign, we will improve product quality as much as we can be funded
 
 

Timeline

 
 
About team
Brunt is a compound word formed from “Brush,” “Paint,” and “Technology.”
Brush and paint represent artistic creativity, while technology refers to our increasingly digital modern society. 
We create our products and services with these elements mind, striving to balance them together and create tools for a sophisticated, futuristic world. We are confident that Brunt products will greatly increase daily convenience and empower you in crafting your own unique lifestyle in the digital age.

story:
Drawing from elements of minimalistic design, DESKAPE has completely redefined the workspace. Since January of 2018, we’ve carefully designed each item in our complete desk set. Working through countless design iterations and material choices, we put an emphasis on high-grade materials and a sleek feel. We’ve finally unveiled DESKAPE, a new all-in-one desk set with a premium look at an affordable price.

Ultimately, we were able to find the perfect balance between intuitive usability and ultra-minimal design.

 

 

 

 

 

Each item in DESKAPE is made of high-grade billet aluminum and is designed to last a lifetime. We put our focus on sourcing the highest quality materials, using powerful aluminum extrusion to produce highest quality products.

A cluttered desk is a cluttered mind. A chaotic workspace hurts your productivity and makes you feel unfocused and unorganized. It’s time to upgrade your boring old desk into a chic and modern workspace that brings you peace of mind every time you sit down.

Not only will you feel great sitting at a clean desk, but our premium and uniquely designed organizers will be sure to impress clients and coworkers!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We designed DESKAPE with Modern Architecture in mind. Each shape must be very purposeful and without extraneous features. Great design has been well-thought out. Each piece should perform its intended function. We’ve thought deeply about the user experience for DESKAPE. This is why we chose Modern Architecture as a source of our inspiration.   

< Ideation Sketchs By "Ways Of Design" >

After many design iterations, we selected "Extrusion" which works as a common design language between each product, as well as the cohesive manufacturing process. This is what gives DESKAPE the minimalist look and feel that you now see. 

< Physical Sketchs By "Ways Of Design" >

 

 

 

DESKAPE is made with "Aluminum Extrusion," using high-grade billet aluminum and we are fully committed to using only the best materials we can find through our trustful suppliers. We believe that a superior product is made of superior materials. 

We spent a lot of time refining the manufacturing process to ensure the highest quality possible. When we first ran a small batch of manufacturing for quality assurance, it didn't take long for us to realize what mattered the most was the very material itself. It wasn't the size of the machine. It wasn't the skill, BUT the quality of the raw materials that dictated everything. 

Our design choices, from the sketches all the way down to the material we use in each piece of DESKAPE have been refined over time so that we deliver a sleek-looking product that is sure to turn heads in the workplace. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Our goal is to fundamentally improve how people work and collaborate at workspaces around the world. We want to provide solutions that impact the lives of our backers. We come from diverse backgrounds, including design, education, mechanical engineering, and digital marketing. We started Constella in San Francisco, and now we have expanded to Korea, where we manage and optimize product manufacturing in Asia. 

As we highly value co-creation and collaboration with our users and customers, we are incredibly pleased to be part of the Kickstarter community, where we can engage and hear feedback from backers around the world.  

AMANDA LAWSON
With more than ten years of experience in education and a keen eye on interior design and architecture, Amanda co-founded Constella to solve problems with team collaborations in tech companies. 

SEAN LIM
After spending the last decade in product development and design project management at fortune 500 companies, Sean left the full-time position as a principal engineer to evangelize the importance of team collaboration and "Agile Work Environment."

When it comes to product design and development, we highly value co-creation and collaboration. As fresh as we are, we teamed up with a new design studio in Munich Ways Of Design. As we commonly idolize the Bauhaus movement, Ways of Design is known for turning ordinary objects into an art piece while improving the functionality of the product. With the studio as our Maestro, we were able to achieve the level of design that is more thoughtful, sophisticated, and boldly minimal.
Ways of Design IG: @ways_of_design

 

Why Are We Crowdfunding?

It has always been our goal to create a "total workspace solution" for current and upcoming generations who are just now joining the modern workforce. 

Last year, we launched our first product, Artemis Sprint Desk, which is our modular desk designed explicitly for the Agile work environment in R&D companies. As we do more show and tell to spread the words about our desk, we felt the need to develop something for the desktop as well. Something that went along with the design of the Artemis Sprint desk.
 
At first, we tried source existing products, but we weren't happy with what found, so we activated our designer genes, rolled up our sleeves, and came up with our own product. 
 
We hope DESKAPE Desk Organizers showcases our design philosophy and the quality standard we aim to achieve in coming years.

 

 

 

 

 

 

THANK YOU!
*Please note that “additional” customs duties may apply upon delivery depends on your country, and we are not responsible for any “additional”  clearance fees. Thank you for understanding.

story:
We are Orangered Life. We celebrate simplicity and smart design. After 4 successful crowdfunding campaign, £70k+ in funding and delivering 10,000+ products, we’re back and better with the new 30° ruler, TAKE A LOOK! 

 

What makes 30° ruler different? 

The key change we've added is a 30° slope on the ruler's face. It's a simple, yet incredibly effective, update and it makes the 30° Ruler soooo much easier to use.

Tired of measuring mistakes! Now it’s quick and easy accurate measurement at a glance. 

The 30° Ruler does away with teeny measurements, instead opting for large fonts and clear indications. This means you can read the measurements at a distance and you'll always be sure to make your mark.  

Places its measurements at a comfortable 30° degree angle. This simple improvement means you no longer have to lean over to use the device, thus improving your posture and at the same time making your life easier. 

 

Every tick mark labeled

The new 30° Rulers is designed to eliminate the confusion and strain of reading your typical ruler.

On the English side, all hash marks are labeled to eliminate guessing and counting of lines. On the Metric side, both the millimeters and centimeters are numbered and the hash marks rise and fall making it easy to identify specific millimeter measurements.

 

Measure faster & with more confidence

The  30° Ruler has many small innovations that add up to a big difference in ease of use. 

 

Easy to Grab

Easier to pick up from any surface than a traditional ruler.

 

Start at Zero 

Unique zero starts design makes it possible to measure directly with high accuracy – Start from the edge of the ruler up to an item you are measuring and get an accurate reading quickly and easily.

 

Two in One

This 2-in-1 ruler has millimeters and centimeters on one side, inches on reverse.

 

Measurements and Sizes

There Different measurement range ruler suitable for different measuring jobs.

 

Laser Targeted & Durable 

Perfect combination of Aerospace grade aluminum and superb engineering resulting in the right balance of great looks, strength, precision and lightweight portability.

A deep everlasting finish is not the way traditional rulers are made. Laser-engraving is complex, time consuming and comes at a price... but then the 30° Ruler is not just any ruler.

When we create our designs we use a number of tools and it was while we were designing some of the others that we thought it was about time we looked at one of those tools in a new light.

story:
English further down!

Hallo! Ich heiße Saman, und ich wünsche mir von Herzen mein Samankocht-Mobil. Dazu brauche ich deine finanzielle Unterstützung hier auf crowdfunding.

Samankocht

  • Bio
  • 5 Elemente
  • Vegetarisch
  • Mit Liebe
  • Mobil – mit deiner Hilfe!!

Ich bin dreifacher Papa, hab lange in der Gastronomie gearbeitet und die Ausbildung zum Ernährungsberater nach der traditionell chinesischen Medizin gemacht. Mein Samankocht - Mobil ermöglicht mir Kochen nach den 5 Elementen in Bio-Qualität, dort und dann, wo meine Küche gebraucht wird. Bio, regional, vor Ort und vegetarisch sind meine Beiträge zum Erhalt der Natur für meine Kinder und Kindeskinder. Abgesehen davon brauch ich die Natur beim Kochen: Draußen und in Bewegung spür ich den Wind, bin inspiriert. Ich brauch auch die Flexibilität und Mobilität- Ich beweg mich gern.

Bitte hilf mir, meinen Lebenstraum von Saman kocht zu verwirklichen und klicke auf den "Spende-Link" - In Euros nur mit Kreditkarte oder via Paypal. Mit dem Geld finanziere ich den Kauf des Bio-Mobils: Ein umgebauter Ape-Kleinlaster mit eingebauter Küche – energieautark, wenn es darauf ankommt!

Ich weiß, dass es eine Herausforderung ist, mit meinem kleinen Betrieb einen alternativen Weg zu gehen. Ich weiß auch, dass ich es schaffen kann, weil ich mir in meinem Leben nichts anderes Wünsche, weil es der einzige Weg ist, der mich glücklich macht. Es kommen jetzt bereits Anfragen herein und die Behörden haben das Samankocht – Mobil schon abgesegnet! Immer wieder koche ich in den letzten Monaten privat bei Seminaren/Festen von Freunden – das Feedback ist jedesmal so überwältigend, dass ich meinen Ohren kaum traue. Ich kann und will Samankocht leben – und das mobil, um die Menschen erreichen zu können, die meine Küche brauchen und schätzen.

Ich dank dir von Herzen und schenk als Dank auch Saman kocht- TCM-Bio-Essen zurück- inklusive Lieferung mit dem Samankocht-Mobil!

  • -  Ich bekomme mein Bio-Mobil und kann mich selbstständig machen
  • -  Du bekommst leckeres Essen aus meiner mobile Küche

Ich möchte mit Samankocht einen kleinen Beitrag zum Erhalt der Natur leisten. Setzte bitte gemeinsam mit mir ein Zeichen, indem du mich unterstützt.

Außer deiner Unterstützung mit einer Spende, kann ich noch mehr Hilfe gebrauchen: Bitte verbreite die Information, dass Samankocht in 60 Tagen verwirklicht werden möchte. Hilf mir, das Geld fließen zu lassen: Bitte via Idiegogo, email, facebook, twitter, sms, Brief und einfach mündlich verbreiten!! So kann mein größter Weihnachtswunsch in Erfüllung gehen! Ich wünsche euch viel Licht und Liebe in dieser Jahreszeit und danke dir von Herzen!!


English:

Hello! My name is Saman, and, from the bottom of my heart, I wish for my "Samankocht" Mobile Kitchen. To make my wish come true, I need your financial support, here on crowdfunding.

Samankocht:

  • Organic
  • 5 Elements
  • Vegetarian
  • With Love
  • Mobile – with your support!!

I am father of three, have worked a lot in gastronomy and trained for nutrition adviser according to the Traditional Chinese Medicine. My “Samankocht” Mobile Kitchen would make it possible for me to cook according to the 5 Elements in bio-quality, right on the spot, wherever and whenever my “Kitchen” is needed. Cooking organic, regional, and vegetarian is my contribution to saving this planet for my children and grandchildren. Aside from that, I need nature when cooking. Being outside, moving and feeling a breeze, are of great inspiration to me. As I like to move, flexibility and mobility are just what I need.

Please help me make my dream of a “Samankocht” Mobile Kitchen come true and click the donation button - In Euros only via creditcard or paypal! With the incoming money I will finance my Bio-Mobile: A pimped Ape-truck with integrated kitchen – energy-independent when necessary.

I thank you in advance from the bottom of my heart and will, in return, deliver “Samankocht” TCM-organic meals with my “Samankocht” Mobile.

  • -  I get my Samankocht-Bio-Mobile and can start my own business
  • -  You get yummy food from my mobile kitchen

With “Samankocht” I want to make a small contribution to saving nature. Please join me in setting a signal and contribute today!

I know it’s a challenge to go an alternative way with my small business. I also know that I can do it, since I wish for nothing more in life, since it’s the only way to make me happy. Already now I have requests and also state officials have given their approval tot he Samankocht-Mobile! Over the last months I’ve been cooking for seminars/receptions of friends – the feedback has been so overwhelming, that I can hardly believe it. I know I can and will live Samankocht – in a mobile manner, to serve those who want and appreciate my cooking.

Except for your donation support I can more of your help: Please spread the news that Samankocht wants to be realized within 60 days. Help me let the cash flow: Please spread on Indiegogo, facebook, twitter, sms, (postal) letters and by word!! That will make my biggest Christmas Wish come true! Here’s wishing you love and warmth throughout this season and thank you so much!!!

story:
Short story shorter.

Xcavator is a simple 25 watt ASIC-based Bitcoin mining unit which produces an average mining rate of 9600 Mhash/s.

So, what about it ?

In the world of Bitcoin mining, all you want is a faster mining rate without a higher power draw. Miners heavily invest on their mining rig and utility bill, however we are able to make mining Bitcoin easier and faster with Xcavator.

What's with the 10 days length ?

Bitcoins are like currency and they have their own unique value which makes their difficulty of mining them increase as time progress so, I would like to crowdfund this project as soon as possible to get the units out before their hashing rate become worthless.

Okay I get it but will you SHIP or just prolong it ?

You guys have to take note that I am working as an individual to hand-assemble the units plus the unit will be an upgrade from my personal project so I cannot say exactly when but I can give you a specific timeline.

How much is Shipping ?

It's free. (Included in the contribution)

What if you don't ship then what about my contribution (money) ?

I cannot guarantee a 100% return but I can try my best to return mosst of it if the project does not succeed.

 

(Sorry for my bad English, this is a translated text as I am not fluent in it)

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING.

*If  you have any question feel free to  shot it at me.

story:
What is Thrive?

Thrive is a business project developed by a team of four students in the Design MFA program at California College of the Arts, San Francisco. Chris, Ramune, Sarah, and Wioleta created Thrive to foster empathy for the environment by helping you keep your plants healthy and happy.

Do you love plants, but have a hard time keeping them alive? Are you too busy between work, living in the cloud, & basejumping to remember to check on them? Do you need a reminder to water them? We are here to help!

Thrive is a low cost, low impact, sensor and app that gives your plant a personality and helps you visualize its moisture and light levels. By tracking your plant’s vitals over time, the app helps you gain insight into its needs. The sensor is compatible with all types of plants, so you don’t mistakenly drown your rare Bolivian cactus or undersun your voluptuous Hibiscus acetosella.

How it Works

Thrive is easy to setup and use:

  1. Place the sensor into the soil, and download the app.
  2. Locate the new sensor on the app, pick the plant’s species, name it, and take a photo.
  3. When your plant needs attention, it will “holla at choo” in real time, telling you how to help it thrive.

You can also check the health of your plant at anytime. The Thrive sensor will push its data to your smartphone so you can check your plant’s health on the go. You can even set up weekly alerts to remind you to take a new photo of your plant. On your plant’s birthday, you will get a time-lapse video of its growth that you can share with your friends and family.

Our Goal

As design students, this project has given us an opportunity to learn how to build a sustainable and realistic business model from ideation to execution. With your support and enthusiasm we will be able to prove our concept to our peers and ourselves.

What We Need

We need your votes! We are competing with the rest of the class to raise at least $500. By donating a suggested $1, you can vote for our project. Each donation counts as one vote. The money raised over the course of the competition will be donated to Architecture for Humanity, a nonprofit design services firm that creates sustainable and innovative structures for communities in need worldwide. As a token of our appreciation , we will send you a personal thank you email and include you in our donor family tree, that will be sent to you at the end of our campaign. Additionally, you will receive acknowledgment on our Facebook page and your name will be included on the thank you slide of our final presentation. We need your support! Help us weed out the competition by placing your vote for Thrive NOW.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us spread the word by Liking us on Facebook and sending our campaign to your friends and family! Thank you for your support!

 

Plant - Grow - Thrive

 

 

Music: Reign by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a CC Attribution 3.0
story_txt:
What is Thrive?
Thrive is a business project developed by a team of four students in the Design MFA program at California College of the Arts, San Francisco. Chris, Ramune, Sarah, and Wioleta created Thrive to foster empathy for the environment by helping you keep your plants healthy and happy.
Do you love plants, but have a hard time keeping them alive? Are you too busy between work, living in the cloud, & basejumping to remember to check on them? Do you need a reminder to water them? We are here to help!
Thrive is a low cost, low impact, sensor and app that gives your plant a personality and helps you visualize its moisture and light levels. By tracking your plant’s vitals over time, the app helps you gain insight into its needs. The sensor is compatible with all types of plants, so you don’t mistakenly drown your rare Bolivian cactus or undersun your voluptuous Hibiscus acetosella.
How it Works
Thrive is easy to setup and use:

Place the sensor into the soil, and download the app.
Locate the new sensor on the app, pick the plant’s species, name it, and take a photo.
When your plant needs attention, it will “holla at choo” in real time, telling you how to help it thrive.
You can also check the health of your plant at anytime. The Thrive sensor will push its data to your smartphone so you can check your plant’s health on the go. You can even set up weekly alerts to remind you to take a new photo of your plant. On your plant’s birthday, you will get a time-lapse video of its growth that you can share with your friends and family.
Our Goal
As design students, this project has given us an opportunity to learn how to build a sustainable and realistic business model from ideation to execution. With your support and enthusiasm we will be able to prove our concept to our peers and ourselves.
What We Need
We need your votes! We are competing with the rest of the class to raise at least $500. By donating a suggested $1, you can vote for our project. Each donation counts as one vote. The money raised over the course of the competition will be donated to Architecture for Humanity, a nonprofit design services firm that creates sustainable and innovative structures for communities in need worldwide. As a token of our appreciation , we will send you a personal thank you email and include you in our donor family tree, that will be sent to you at the end of our campaign. Additionally, you will receive acknowledgment on our Facebook page and your name will be included on the thank you slide of our final presentation. We need your support! Help us weed out the competition by placing your vote for Thrive NOW.
Other Ways You Can Help
Please help us spread the word by Liking us on Facebook and sending our campaign to your friends and family! Thank you for your support!
 
Plant - Grow - Thrive

story:
Update:

Our Progress With Only a Few Days Left:

The Pocket 3D Printer takes two existing technologies, a robotic arm, and a 3D printing pen called the CreoPop, and simply combines them into the Pocket 3D Printer. The result is a fully portable 3D printer that has the advantages of standard 3D printers, but without the heat or smell! 

With the funding received so far, I will be able to build the printers that have been ordered. However, my goal in reaching out to the crowdfunding community is not just to build 1, or 5, or even 50 Pocket 3D Printers. My end goal is to start a business researching, developing, and marketing, 3D Printers. 

3D printers have already changed the world, they can be used to print shoes, custom wood shop clamps, precise measuring cups for cooking, all at a very low cost.

In this video, https://www.youtube.com/watchv=YqXlR4pfZvE&app=desktop, Preeflow demonstrates one of the key concepts that will be used in the Pocket 3D Printer.  

Crowdfunding is a wonderful tool that can help anyone bring concepts to reality! Special thanks to the generous backers so far. With our current resources, we have been able to put together a prototype with a working armature shown in the pictures below. 

Pictures of the Latest Prototype:

3D Printing is For You!

You're riding to work on the train, listening to your favorite music on your phone. Suddenly, your phone slips out of your grasp and crashes to the floor, tumbling along the aisle. You quickly chase after it, only to find the case has cracked. You calmly sit back in your seat, pull out your Pocket 3D Printer from your bag, and print yourself a new case before you get to work.

Sound impossible? Not any more. The future of 3D printing is here - and it's portable! Check out the article on 3ders.org! http://www.3ders.org/articles/20141009-pocket-sized-pocket3dprinter-will-be-a-portable-combination-fdm-sla-technology.html

WHY IS THE POCKET 3D PRINTER SO SPECIAL?

The Pocket 3D Printer lives up to it’s name. It collapses down to a pocket-size, easy-travel system no larger than an iPad Mini. No heat - The Pocket Printer prints using a photo-polymer resin. When the print is done, just grab it and go. No need to wait for a hot extruder to cool down. 

SIMPLE TO USE!

The Pocket 3D Printer is also simple to use. You can download free files of predesigned models that are ready to print from sites like Thingiverse. Through the Pocket 3D Printer app, you can also download and print straight from your phone. The Pocket 3D Printer app also comes preloaded with it's own library of parts ready for you to print. You can also design your own parts with free design programs like Google Sketchup!

HOW DOES THE POCKET 3D PRINTER PRINT?

The Pocket 3D Printer prints layer by layer like a standard FDM plastic printer, except instead of heating up plastic, the Pocket Printer prints using a ultra violet photopolymer resin. What does that mean exactly? It means no smell and no fumes! Using a UV LED at the tip of the printing arm, the resin is cured instantly. The Pocket 3D Printer combines Fused Deposition Modeling (FDM) technology with  DLP technology into one affordable, portable, and powerful 3D printer!

SOME AMAZING FEATURES OF THE POCKET PRINTER

  • Bluetooth connectivity - print wirelessly from any device

  • Extremely portable and lightweight

  • Convenient, cool-touch no heat printing

  • Easy to use, starts up with 1 button (sort of like that one smartphone)

  • Fast - with a UV curable photopolymer, speed satisfies your need

3D PRINTING SHOULD BE FOR EVERYONE! 

The Pocket 3D Printer is designed to provide everyone with the ability to create toys, models, working prototypes and more - your imagination is the limit. 

The Pocket 3D Printer makes a great gift for anyone with ideas, including:

  • artists
  • engineers
  • inventors
  • teenagers
  • computer scientists
  • and anyone who likes to see their ideas instantly come to life!

THE POCKET 3D PRINTER IS AFFORDABLE, EASY, AND SAFE!

3D printing should be for anyone who likes to create. That’s why the Pocket 3D Printer is here. It’s an affordable solution to an expensive problem. The Pocket 3D Printer is affordable, for everyone, by everyone. 

It’s easy to use - no engineering degree required! 3D printing is for everyone, such as the home baker who printed custom-designed cookie cutters! The possibilities of what you can do with 3D printing are limited only by your imagination! 

TECHNICAL WHAT? BLAH, BLAH, BLAH!

Printer Specifications:

Printable Area:

6” X 6” X 5” or 8” X 8” X7”

Dimensions:

Overall Dimensions When Closed:

1” X 6” X 7” or 1”X 8” X 9”

Electronic Stuff:

Wireless: Built in bluetooth, prints from your phone.

Power: Runs off of a rechargeable battery pack or power supply. Power supply and battery pack included, Prints for up to 3 hours on one charge!

Printing Material: Prints using the latest and greatest no heat, UV curable, high resolution, photopolymer resin!!! 

WHAT CAN YOU DO TO FUND THE POCKET 3D PRINTER? 

With your help and support, here is what will happen:

The Pocket 3D Printer becomes a reality! It’s not going to print itself without you, yet...

$25,000 is the goal. This will cover the cost of marketing, injection molds, machined aluminum surfaces, including tempered glass for the printing area, and other manufacturing and marketing expenses. 

In exchange for your donation, there are some amazing perks and discounts on the first printers ordered. Your contribution will help bring the Pocket 3D Printer to everyone!

Be a part of addictive, I mean additive manufacturing, with the click of a button. The Pocket 3D Printer is just around the corner. Someone will build this sooner or later, why not be a part of it now with your donation?

WHAT DO YOU GET FOR FUNDING THE POCKET 3D PRINTER? 

For a donation of $299 or more, you get a full Pocket 3D Printer kit! The kit includes the following awesomeness:

  • A Pocket 3D Printer, pre-loaded with software and ready to go!
  • A rechargable battery pack
  • An A/C power supply
  • 2 Refillable printing cartridges

SOME OTHER GREAT PERKS FOR DONATING!

  • LED Pen: Limited Edition with Pocket Printer logo (Logo not shown on pen)

  • Battery Pack: Limited Edition with Pocket Printer logo

ABOUT ME

I’m a Mechanical Design Engineer with a Master's Degree in Materials Science. I have worked several years designing and prototyping complex electro-mechanical systems.  I have been using a 3D Printer at home for over a year, designing all sorts of gadgets that my wife loves, she loves every single one, all of which have been useful. On the side I enjoy utilizing my creativity and quirky ideas to make ideas come to fruition, like the Pocket Printer! This and other great inventions brought to you by Lab51! Learn more about me here: http://middletonsa.wix.com/portfolio

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you can't contribute money, you can still make a difference:

  • Ask your friends, find a geek, spread the word that the Pocket 3D Printer is on the move.
  • Take advantage of the Indiegogo share tools - FaceBook, Twitter and Pinterest will love this!

ROAD MAP

  • Docking station with extra large resin cartridge
  • Extra battery pack for extended printing
  • Larger foldable Pocket Printer
  • Printing in other materials

story:
Our story

Our team consists of people of different trades. 

Among us are professionals utilities (Max), information technology (Ernest), student (Victoria).

We live in the village Agarino and we often use ATV.

Almost everybody, who has small trailer for ATV, mini-tractor and etc. in his housekeeping faces with such problems, as unreliability and quick damage of tent.

Our team has developed and build up the Platform AWNING , more exactly, the metal roof. You will have no similar problems with our platform awning. It does not tear. It does not pass moisture. 


Pros

It does not take special care because it is made of a metal leaf.

Your cargo will be protected from sun beams, rain and snow. Moreover, our trailer is enough capacious. We did not see analogues our development.

During production of our trailer we are using a morgen technologies and reliable fixing details.


We came to our development proceeding from the  personal experience. And we are ready to show it to you.

Perks

* $25 - M&E Tralers stiker A5.


* $75 - M&E Tralers stiker + authors one-page calendar  2015


* $249 - 5 M&E Tralers stiker + authors twelve-page calendar 2015



* $449 - 5 stikers + authors twelve-page calendar 2015 + 2 cups with our team logo


Risks & Challenges

When we faced with problems of unreliability of Platform AWNING, which was made of fabric, we decided to make our one. After prototype making and testing we are sure in benefit of our development and we want to share it with you.
