story:
Builder is a new Integrated Development Environment I'm developing to make it easier to write software for Linux. By simplifying the development process, I hope to increase the number of people who can contribute to our platform. To do this, I need your support so that I can work on Builder full time. I'm asking for $30,000 to cover my costs for the next 3-5 months while I implement Builder's core features.

Over the last few of years, I've worked with people trying to get started developing for Linux. Almost universally, I found that getting started was the single hardest problem. I want builder to be the easiest way to get started.

I've worked on virtual machines, databases, graphics tool-kits, compiler tools, and programming languages. I think that puts me in a unique position to be successful in a project as large and complicated as an IDE. I hope you'll agree and contribute to my campaign.


Planned Features

Project Management

Builder is designed to manage your autotools based project. We manage the complex bits so you don't have to. Focus time more on writing your application and less time on build system rules.

Asset Catalog

To simplify the management of user interface templates, icons, setting schemas, CSS styling, and embedded files, we've included a built in asset manager. Just navigate to your project details to see more.

API Exploration

Learning new APIs can be a time consuming process. To save you time we've added support for navigating types from right within the source code editor. You can jump to a type declaration with just a click.

Split Views

With Builder you can place content where you want it. Multiple editors side by side is no problem. You can even place documentation next to code so you don't have to keep switching contexts.

Jump to Symbol

Navigating large files can be difficult. So Builder includes everything you need to jump around your source code whether it's within the same file, or somewhere else in your source tree.

Global Search

At the top of Builder is the Global Search bar. You can use this to jump between files, open new files, locate symbols, search documentation and more.

Glade Built In

By integrating Glade, Builder simplifies creating new Gtk+ widgets with templates, embedded icon themes, CSS, and more. Jump between the designer and code in an instant.

Documentation

Browse the comprehensive documentation provided with the libraries you use most. If you don't find what you are looking for or don't understand it, you can flag the documentation for improvement by the GNOME developers.

Quick Help

When auto completion is enabled we'll provide you documentation right at your fingertips as you type. No more jumping between documentation and code to see what that parameter means.

Global Navigation

To make it easier to jump back to what you were just doing we've added Global Navigation. It works just like your web browser. We keep track of where you are in the IDE and you can move freely backwards and forwards.

IDE Scripting4

You can optimize your workflow with the scripting capabilities provided by GObject Introspection and GJS. You'll have access to all the APIs inside of Builder to make it do exactly what you want.

GNOME Simulator9

Builder provides a simulator allowing you to test your application on multiple versions of GNOME. The SDK is provided by OSTree and GNOME Continuous. You can test against released versions of GNOME as well as stay up to date with the development version in Git.

Connect Hardware Devices5

If you have a GNOME powered tablet, phone, or development board you can connect it to Builder to run and debug applications remotely. Sit back and debug from your workstation while you run the application interactively on your tablet.

Collaborative Editing7

Sometimes you just need an extra eye. Or maybe you need some code review? Our collaborative editor feature built upon libinifity will allow you and a teammate to solve that problem together just as if you had two keyboards at the same computer.

Compilers

Builder uses the two most common compilers on the market today. Code navigation and analysis features are provided by clang and built with GCC.

Graphical Debugger5

Nobody wishes to debug, but when it's needed you want a solid debugger on your side. Builder integrates Nemiver, the GDB frontend to help you track threads, variables, breakpoints, watchpoints and more. You can even view and edit memory directly using the hex editor.

Leak Detection7

Builder will help you find leaks in your applications using the GObject runtime statistics. Additionally, more powerful tools like valgrind will help you narrow that leak to the exact line of code.

Code Search9

When documentation is short it can help to look at other examples of code in the GNOME repositories. Our code search feature will help you find uses of GNOME APIs throughout code hosted on git.gnome.org.

Track Issues10

Browsing and searching Bugzilla can be a chore. So we'll cache the bug information for your project locally so you can check that bug report quickly without leaving the IDE. Using git-bz we can even attach patches and close bugs on your behalf.

Auto Completion6

The Clang compiler toolchain provides you with a robust auto completion engine for C and C++. No matter where you are in your source code, you can determine what is possible with just a press of a key. We will add auto completion support for Python and Vala if we reach our fundraising target.

Auto Indentation

Nobody wants to spend all of their time formatting code. Builder will attempt to format the code for you as you type leaving you to focus on the important part. We currently support C, Python, and XML with more languages on the way.

Powerful Snippets

The Builder team knows how powerful snippets can be in the daily tasks of a developer. We built the snippet system we always wanted, and now it's yours too! You can have multiple tab stops, linked entry points, and dynamic content. Snippets within snippets? No problem!

Tutorials4

Builder comes with a set of tutorials to help you get started with GNOME and Builder. Start by creating your first Gtk+ application.

Quick Open

Open any file in your project quickly using the Global Search bar. Just start typing a few distinctive characters of the files name and press Enter.

Markdown and HTML Preview

Editing markdown and HTML can be frustrating when you are constantly switching between code and preview. So Builder includes a live preview right in the IDE to save you time and patience.

Live Issues

Tired of switching back and forth to a terminal to compile your code just to get the line number of the error? Save time with errors shown right as you type them.

Fix-It!

If the compiler knows how to fix an issue that is preventing your program from compiling, simply click the Fix-It! button to fix the error rather than solving it yourself.

Version Tracking

Git has won the version control wars and so we natuarly chose it as our SCM of choice in GNOME. We bring the power of Git to you in a simple and easy to understand way. You can create branches, commit, push, pull, and more.

Snapshots

Ever wanted to try that crazy new idea without risking your project? Builder includes a snapshoting to save your project so that if you break something you can easily rollback to where you were.

JavaScript4

You can write applications using JavaScript and deploy them just like they were a natively compiled language. Builder will bundle all of your resources together and bootstrap the JavaScript runtime for you. Just choose JavaScript for your next project.

Python6

Love Python? We do too. So we added support for Python right into Builder. You have auto indentation and auto completion right at your fingertips. Get all the benefits of the project management features found in C and C++ projects like settings, CSS, UI templates and more.

Powerful VIM-style Editing

Longstanding VIM users know firsthand the power of a modal editor. Our developers don't want you to feel left out so we created a robust VIM engine within Builder to help you feel at home. "ll^[Ihe^[Ao" to you too buddy!

Command Bar

If you ever need to get at the internals of Builder while it is running you can use the Firefox-inspired command bar. You can even execute commands internal to builder exposed via GAction.

D-Bus4

Creating and consuming D-Bus services can be a daunting task for those new to the platform. So we've created all the tools you need to create your own or connect to an existing service. Just browse to the service installed on your system and click to add it to your project.

Unit Testing7

The industry aggress that tests are important for the long term stability of your project. Wouldn't it be nice to see how your project has performed over time? We'll track those unit test results and store them in git-notes so you can graph them later.

GNOME Shell Extensions10

Create and test your shell extension without breaking your running GNOME session! You can create a new GNOME shell extension and test it from within the simulator. That means you can test it against multiple GNOME versions including what is currently under development from Git.

The Perks!

$25 – Casual Observer

This tier is meant for people that may not use the final product but want to support our effort anyway. We are thrilled to have your help and hope that someday you benefit from GNOME or a piece of software made by a happier GNOME developer.

To show our appreciation, we'll mention you in the credits.

Donate Now!

$100 – Student

This tier is meant for students with limited income. We'll send you a set of laptop stickers as thanks for your donation. Additionally, you'll get a digital copy of the USB stick image. You can dd it to a USB stick of your choice or boot it in a Virtual Machine.

To help you study software design, we'll give you a digital copy of the design documents used to create Builder. That will cover plans, specifications, and drawings. We hope that this will help you in your journey to becoming a Software Engineer.

And of course, we'll mention you in the credits.

Donate Now!

$250 – Young Professional

At this tier, we'll send you a USB stick with Builder and GNOME 3.16 as a token of our appreciation. Additionally we'll send you a set of Builder laptop stickers. A digital copy of the engineering journal including plans, specifications, and drawings will be included as well.

You'll also get access to the bi-weekly contributors video chat where you can keep up to date on development and ask questions.

And of course, we'll mention you in the credits.

Donate Now!

$400 – Professional

At this tier you'll get a comfy American Apparel zip-up hoodie with the Builder logo for those rainy day hacking sessions. We'll send you a USB stick with a copy of Builder and GNOME 3.16 along with a set of laptop stickers. You'll receive a digital copy of the engineering journal including plans, specifications, and drawings.

You'll also get access to the bi-weekly contributors video chat where you can keep up to date on development and ask questions.

And of course, we'll mention you in the credits.

Donate Now!

$1,000 – Hardware Hacker

At this tier, we have a really special perk for you. We will be shipping you a Tablet running GNOME 3.16 or newer. We haven't finalized hardware, but it will likely be a tablet in the 7-10” range. We are going to do our best to source quality hardware for you. We also want to ship hardware with open drivers if possible.

If we raise $50,000 then we will have the resources necessary to add support for building, running, and debugging applications on the tablet directly from Builder.

Additionally, we'll send you a comfy American Apparel hoodie with the Builder logo for those rainy day hacking sessions. You'll receive a digital copy of the engineering journal including plans, specifications, and drawings. You'll also get a set of laptop stickers with the Builder logo.

You'll also get access to the bi-weekly contributors video chat where you can keep up to date on development and ask questions.

And of course, we'll mention you in the credits.

Donate Now!

$2,000 – Philanthropist

If you really believe in what we are doing, and have some money to spare, we would really appreciate your support at the philanthropist tier. This tier includes everything the hardware hacker tier receives but also includes a special dinner at GUADEC 2015 to thank you for your support and listen to any comments you have about the GNOME platform and where we should be going.

You'll also get access to the bi-weekly contributors video chat where you can keep up to date on development and ask questions.

Donate Now!

$10,000 – Corporate Sponsor

Do you control the budget for a company that uses GNOME technology? We would love to have your support at this tier! Your company will receive its name in the credits, 5 tablets for your development team to play with, and 5 hoodies too. We'll send you a box of swag including USB sticks, laptop stickers and mugs.

You'll also get access to the bi-weekly contributors video chat where you can keep up to date on development and ask questions.

We'd also like to invite up to 5 of your team members to a special thank you dinner at GUADEC 2015 where you can share with us everything you think we need to hear.

Additionally, we'd be happy to do a full-day training session on Builder either at GUADEC 2015 or at your office (travel not included).

Donate Now!

Community Support

These days, an operating system is as good as the application ecosystem around it; Builder enriches the GNOME platform with a simple yet powerful developer workflow, designed to maximize productivity and to make it as easy as possible to turn an idea into a beautiful, integrated application. I'm personally thrilled by the opportunities this project will open up in our community.

Cosimo Cecchi

Free/libre software lives in an interesting but precarious place, where it is moot to charge for the actual software, but development still costs time and money. I am extremely happy that Christian took the plunge to stop being an unpaid volunteer and turn himself into a crowdfunded toolmaker. High-quality, pleasant tools are hard to find, and Builder is an excellent opportunity to make it possible for more people to develop beautiful software for GNOME. Support the development of Builder and help improve free software for everyone!

Federico Mena Quintero

Stretch Goals

If we reach our goal, we'll be able to complete the third milestone of Builder. Each tier afterwards helps us reach additional milestones. The more that we raise, the longer I can focus my life and energy on Builder.

$40,000 - Milestone 4

If we reach $40,000, we'll have enough to reach the fourth milestone of Builder. This includes IDE scripting, JavaScript applications, and tight D-Bus integration. These are needed as a foundation for further milestones.

$50,000 - Milestone 5

If we reach $50,000, we'll have enough funds to reach the fifth milestone of Builder. This includes a graphical debugger and integration with external hardware such as tablets and ARM-based hardware devices.

$60,000 - Milestone 6

If we reach $60,000, we'll have enough funds to reach the sixth milestone of Builder. This includes support for writing GNOME applications in both Python and Vala.

$75,000 - Milestone 7

If we reach $75,000, we'll have enough funds to reach the seventh milestone of Builder. This includes support for unit testing, application leak detection, split views within a single document and collaborative editing features.

$90,000 - Milestone 8

If we reach $90,000, we'll have enough funds to reach the eighth milestone of Builder. This includes the addition of a GNOME simulator to help developers test their application in multiple versions of a pristine GNOME experience. Additionally, we'll add server side support to GNOMEs infrastructure for a robust code search that can be accessed from the IDE.

$100,000 - Milestone 9

If we reach $100,000, we'll have enough funds to reach the ninth milestone of Builder. This will add support for writing GNOME Shell Extensions within the IDE. You'll be able to test them inside of the GNOME simulator to ensure that you don't break your currently running GNOME environment. Additionally, we'll add support for bugzilla issue tracking right in the IDE.

Alternative Payment

We understand that credit cards aren't for everyone. If you cannot or do not want to pay by credit card, eCheck, or paypal, contact christian@hergert.me to make alternate arrangements.

Like the music in our video? Get the album from Highcastle on soundcloud.

The GNOME trademark is used with permission from the GNOME Foundation.
story_txt:
Builder is a new Integrated Development Environment I'm developing to make it easier to write software for Linux.
  By simplifying the development process, I hope to increase the number of people who can contribute to our platform.
  To do this, I need your support so that I can work on Builder full time.
  I'm asking for $30,000 to cover my costs for the next 3-5 months while I implement Builder's core features.


  Over the last few of years, I've worked with people trying to get started developing for Linux.
  Almost universally, I found that getting started was the single hardest problem.
  I want builder to be the easiest way to get started.


  I've worked on virtual machines, databases, graphics tool-kits, compiler tools, and programming languages. I think that puts me in a unique position to be successful in a project as large and complicated as an IDE.
  I hope you'll agree and contribute to my campaign.





Planned Features




Project Management


        Builder is designed to manage your autotools based project. We
        manage the complex bits so you don't have to. Focus time more on
        writing your application and less time on build system rules.
      

Asset Catalog


          To simplify the management of user interface templates, icons,
          setting schemas, CSS styling, and embedded files, we've included a
          built in asset manager. Just navigate to your project details to
          see more.
        
      


API Exploration


          Learning new APIs can be a time consuming process. To save you
          time we've added support for navigating types from right within
          the source code editor. You can jump to a type declaration with
          just a click.
        


Split Views

          With Builder you can place content where you want it. Multiple
          editors side by side is no problem. You can even place
          documentation next to code so you don't have to keep switching
          contexts.
        


Jump to Symbol


          Navigating large files can be difficult. So Builder includes
          everything you need to jump around your source code whether it's
          within the same file, or somewhere else in your source tree.
        

Global Search


        At the top of Builder is the Global Search bar. You can use this
        to jump between files, open new files, locate symbols, search
        documentation and more.
      

Glade Built In


          By integrating Glade, Builder simplifies creating new Gtk+
          widgets with templates, embedded icon themes, CSS, and more.
          Jump between the designer and code in an instant.
        

Documentation

        Browse the comprehensive documentation provided with the libraries
        you use most. If you don't find what you are looking for or don't
        understand it, you can flag the documentation for improvement by
        the GNOME developers.
      
Quick Help


        When auto completion is enabled we'll provide you documentation right
        at your fingertips as you type. No more jumping between documentation
        and code to see what that parameter means.
      
Global Navigation

        To make it easier to jump back to what you were just doing we've
        added Global Navigation. It works just like your web browser. We
        keep track of where you are in the IDE and you can move freely
        backwards and forwards.
      
IDE Scripting4


        You can optimize your workflow with the scripting
        capabilities provided by GObject Introspection and GJS. You'll have
        access to all the APIs inside of Builder to make it do exactly what
        you want.
      


GNOME Simulator9


          Builder provides a simulator allowing you to test your application
          on multiple versions of GNOME. The SDK is provided by OSTree and
          GNOME Continuous. You can test against released versions of GNOME
          as well as stay up to date with the development version in Git.
        

Connect Hardware Devices5


        If you have a GNOME powered tablet, phone, or development board you
        can connect it to Builder to run and debug applications remotely.
        Sit back and debug from your workstation while you run the
        application interactively on your tablet.
      
Collaborative Editing7


        Sometimes you just need an extra eye. Or maybe you need some code
        review? Our collaborative editor feature built upon libinifity will
        allow you and a teammate to solve that problem together just as if
        you had two keyboards at the same computer.
      
Compilers

        Builder uses the two most common compilers on the market today.
        Code navigation and analysis features are provided by clang and
        built with GCC.
      

Graphical Debugger5


          Nobody wishes to debug, but when it's needed you want a solid
          debugger on your side. Builder integrates Nemiver, the GDB
          frontend to help you track threads, variables, breakpoints,
          watchpoints and more. You can even view and edit memory directly
          using the hex editor.
        

Leak Detection7


        Builder will help you find leaks in your applications using the
        GObject runtime statistics. Additionally, more powerful tools like
        valgrind will help you narrow that leak to the exact line of code.
      
Code Search9


        When documentation is short it can help to look at other examples
        of code in the GNOME repositories. Our code search feature will help
        you find uses of GNOME APIs throughout code hosted on git.gnome.org.
      
Track Issues10


        Browsing and searching Bugzilla can be a chore. So we'll cache the
        bug information for your project locally so you can check that bug
        report quickly without leaving the IDE. Using
        git-bz
        we can even attach patches and close bugs on your behalf.
      



Auto Completion6


          The Clang compiler toolchain provides you with a robust auto completion engine for C and C++.
          No matter where you are in your source code, you can determine what is possible with just a press of a key.
          We will add auto completion support for Python and Vala if we reach our fundraising target.
        

Auto Indentation

        Nobody wants to spend all of their time formatting code. Builder
        will attempt to format the code for you as you type leaving you
        to focus on the important part. We currently support C, Python,
        and XML with more languages on the way.
      
Powerful Snippets

        The Builder team knows how powerful snippets can be in the daily
        tasks of a developer. We built the snippet system we always wanted,
        and now it's yours too! You can have multiple tab stops, linked
        entry points, and dynamic content. Snippets within snippets?
        No problem!
      
Tutorials4


        Builder comes with a set of tutorials to help you get started with
        GNOME and Builder. Start by creating your first Gtk+ application.
      
Quick Open


        Open any file in your project quickly using the Global Search bar.
        Just start typing a few distinctive characters of the files name
        and press Enter.
      
Markdown and HTML Preview


        Editing markdown and HTML can be frustrating when you are constantly
        switching between code and preview. So Builder includes a live preview
        right in the IDE to save you time and patience.
      

Live Issues

          Tired of switching back and forth to a terminal to compile your
          code just to get the line number of the error? Save time with
          errors shown right as you type them.
        

Fix-It!


        If the compiler knows how to fix an issue that is preventing your
        program from compiling, simply click the Fix-It! button to fix the
        error rather than solving it yourself.
      


Version Tracking


          Git has won the version control wars and so we natuarly chose it
          as our SCM of choice in GNOME. We bring the power of Git to you
          in a simple and easy to understand way. You can create branches,
          commit, push, pull, and more.
        

Snapshots


        Ever wanted to try that crazy new idea without risking your project?
        Builder includes a snapshoting to save your project so that if you
        break something you can easily rollback to where you were.
      

JavaScript4


          You can write applications using JavaScript and deploy them just
          like they were a natively compiled language. Builder will bundle
          all of your resources together and bootstrap the JavaScript runtime
          for you. Just choose JavaScript for your next project.
        


Python6



          Love Python? We do too. So we added support for Python right into
          Builder. You have auto indentation and auto completion right at
          your fingertips. Get all the benefits of the project management
          features found in C and C++ projects like settings, CSS, UI
          templates and more.
        

Powerful VIM-style Editing

        Longstanding VIM users know firsthand the power of a modal editor.
        Our developers don't want you to feel left out so we created a robust
        VIM engine within Builder to help you feel at home. "ll^[Ihe^[Ao" to you too buddy!
      
Command Bar


        If you ever need to get at the internals of Builder while it is running
        you can use the Firefox-inspired command bar. You can even execute
        commands internal to builder exposed via GAction.
      
D-Bus4


        Creating and consuming D-Bus services can be a daunting task for those
        new to the platform. So we've created all the tools you need to
        create your own or connect to an existing service. Just browse to
        the service installed on your system and click to add it to your project.
      
Unit Testing7


        The industry aggress that tests are important for the long term
        stability of your project. Wouldn't it be nice to see how your project
        has performed over time? We'll track those unit test results and store
        them in git-notes so
        you can graph them later.
      


GNOME Shell Extensions10


          Create and test your shell extension without breaking your running GNOME session!
          You can create a new GNOME shell extension and test it from within the simulator.
          That means you can test it against multiple GNOME versions including what is currently under development from Git.
        





The Perks!
$25 – Casual Observer
This tier is meant for people that may not use the final product
but want to support our effort anyway. We are thrilled to have your
help and hope that someday you benefit from GNOME or a piece of
software made by a happier GNOME developer.
To show our appreciation, we'll mention you in the credits.
Donate Now!
$100 – Student
This tier is meant for students with limited income. We'll send
you a set of laptop stickers as thanks for your donation.
Additionally, you'll get a digital copy of the USB stick image. You
can dd it to a USB stick of your choice or boot it in a Virtual Machine.
To help you study software design, we'll give you a digital copy
of the design documents used to create Builder. That will cover
plans, specifications, and drawings. We hope that this will help you
in your journey to becoming a Software Engineer.
And of course, we'll mention you in the credits.
Donate Now!
$250 – Young Professional
At this tier, we'll send you a USB stick with Builder and GNOME 3.16 as a token of our appreciation. Additionally we'll send you a
set of Builder laptop stickers. A digital copy of the engineering
journal including plans, specifications, and drawings will be
included as well.
You'll also get access to the bi-weekly contributors video chat where you can keep up to date on development and ask questions.
And of course, we'll mention you in the credits.
Donate Now!
$400 – Professional
At this tier you'll get a comfy American Apparel zip-up hoodie

engineering journal including plans, specifications, and drawings.You'll also get access to the bi-weekly contributors video chat where you can keep up to date on development and ask questions.
And of course, we'll mention you in the credits.

shipping you a Tablet running GNOME 3.16 or newer. We haven't finalized hardware, but it will likely be a

And of course, we'll mention you in the credits.

You'll also get access to the bi-weekly contributors video chat where you can keep up to date on development and ask questions.

story:
(English version below)

Aidez Les Fruits Défendus à sauver les fruits oubliés de Montréal! 

Les Fruits Défendus est un collectif de cueillette de fruits en milieu urbain né en 2011 à Montréal. Nous facilitons la rencontre de propriétaires d’arbres fruitiers et de cueilleurs bénévoles afin de donner aux délicieux fruits de la ville un destin plus heureux que de pourrir au sol.

Nos objectifs principaux sont:

  • Réduire le gaspillage
  • Faire bon usage d’une production locale et la rendre accessible à tous et toutes
  • Faciliter le partage des connaissances sur la récolte des fruits en ville
  • Encourager l’engagement communautaire

Depuis 2011, nous avons organisé plus de 200 cueillettes et récolté plus de 7000 livres de fruits, dont plus de 4500 livres ont été donné à des organismes communautaires. La demande pour notre soutien dans l'exploitation du potentiel fruitier à Montréal ne cesse de s’accroître ce qui fait que nous avons besoin de VOTRE soutien! 

    Objectifs

    Nous aimerions continuer de faire croître le projet: plus de fruits, plus de gens, plus de quartiers! Nos plans actuels:

    •  acheter de l'équipement de cueillette additionnel pour permettre d'effectuer des cueillettes dans de nouveaux quartiers
    • obtenir du financement pour un poste rémunéré pendant l'hiver 2015 afin d'assurer le bon déroulement de la saison 2015. Nous aimerions former d'autres chefs de cueillette et des personnes clés pour de nouveaux quartiers.  Il est peu évident de mettre à profit les talents de notre réseau bénévole sans une personne clé désignée!

    Cadeaux de remerciement

    Pour vous remercier, nous vous offrons des confitures, sirops, beurres de fruits et tartinades confectionnées à partir de fruits urbains.  Nous vous offrons aussi des macarons et des sacs en toile qui vous permettront de mettre de l'avant votre amour pour le projet!  Tous ces prix seront disponibles au Santropol Roulant, 111 rue Roy Est à Montréal, du lundi au samedi de 9h30 à 17h30) du 10 au 24 décembre.  Super cadeaux du temps des fêtes, non?  Si vous n'êtes pas en mesure de passer prendre vos récompenses, il nous fera plaisir de vous les poster, par compte nous vous demandons de couvrir les frais de poste en donnant un montant additionnel.

    La portée

    Votre soutien financier nous permettra d'offrir un meilleur accès à de la nourriture saine, locale et gratuite aux montréalais.  Nous continuerons aussi à renforcer la vie communautaire ainsi que la connaissance liée à la cueillette de variétés de fruits locaux, nécessitant moins de transport que les variétés offertes en supermarché!

    De multiples manières de nous soutenir! 

    Peu importe votre situation financière, vous pouvez  tout de même nous aider en partageant cette campagne auprès de vos amis par courriel, Facebook, fonction 'share' d'Indiegogo, Twitter, et même en personne!

    Merci! N'hésitez pas à nous contacter si vous avez des questions ou des idées en écrivant à info@lesfruitsdefendus.org .

    ......................


    Help Les Fruits Défendus save Montreal's forgotten fruit

    Les Fruits Défendus is a collective that has been harvesting urban fruit in Montreal since 2011.  We connect fruit tree owners with volunteer harvesters so that urban fruit can meet a more glorious end than rotting at the foot of a tree.

    Our main goals are:

    • Waste reduction
    • Making good use of local produce by making it more accessible to Montrealers 
    • Growing and sharing knowledge of urban fruit harvesting
    • Fostering engagement in community life

    Over the past 4 years, we have organized over 200 harvests, salvaged over 7,000 pounds of fruit, of which over 4,500 pounds were donated to community organizations.  The fruit is ripe, the volunteers are keen, and we need your support to help meet the demand for these activities. 

    What We Need

    Our goal is to grow the project: more fruit, more people, more neighbourhoods! We would like to:

    • Acquire more harvesting equipment (ladders, bike trailers, poles, etc) so that we can send more volunteer teams out across the city. 
    • Hire a part-time coordinator this winter to better prepare the 2015 harvest season.  Our teams are lead by volunteers and we want to invest in the leadership of our organization by hiring one paid staff member. This part-time coordinator can help to train new volunteers, respond to requests for harvests, and steward strategic partnerships so that the project can flourish in more neighbourhoods through the 2015 season.

    Perks

    To thank you for your support we will gladly reward you with delicious jams, syrups and spreads made with love, from local fruit.  We are also offering pin-back buttons and totes so that you can show your love for the project and carry your fruit!  All rewards will be available for pick-up at Santropol Roulant, 111 Roy street east (Monday-Saturday 9:30am to 5:30 pm) from December 10th to 24th.  Perfect timing for holiday gifts.  If you are unable to pick up your reward in Montreal, we can mail it to you within Canada, we just ask that you add a little extra to cover the cost of shipping.

      The Impact

      Your donation helps us provide Montrealers with greater access to healthy, local, affordable fruit.  We are building ties within our communities and growing knowledge the varieties of fruit that are suited to our climate. We are offering alternatives to commercially produced fruit which often travels over long distances, arriving past peak freshness. 

        Many ways to help us!

        Regardless of your budget, you can help us by sharing this campaign with friends and family via email, Facebook, Indiegogo's share tools and twitter. 

        Send an email to Simon (info@lesfruitsdefendus.org) if you have any questions, we would love to hear from you. 

        Thank you!

Montréal, du lundi au samedi de 9h30 à 17h30) du 10 au 24 décembre.  
Super cadeaux du temps des fêtes, non?  Si vous n'êtes pas en mesure de 
passer prendre vos récompenses, il nous fera plaisir de vous les poster,
 par compte nous vous demandons de couvrir les frais de poste en donnant
 un montant additionnel. 
La portée 

Votre soutien financier nous 
permettra d'offrir un meilleur accès à de la nourriture saine, locale et 
gratuite aux montréalais.  Nous continuerons aussi à renforcer la vie 
communautaire ainsi que la connaissance liée à la cueillette de variétés
 de fruits locaux, nécessitant moins de transport que les variétés 
offertes en supermarché!






De multiples manières de nous soutenir!   

Peu importe votre situation financière, vous pouvez  tout de même nous aider en partageant cette campagne auprès de vos amis par courriel, Facebook, fonction 'share' d'Indiegogo, Twitter, et même en personne!
Merci! N'hésitez pas à nous contacter si vous avez des questions ou des idées en écrivant à info@lesfruitsdefendus.org .
......................




Help Les Fruits Défendus save Montreal's forgotten fruit
Les Fruits Défendus is a collective that has been harvesting urban fruit in Montreal since 2011.  We connect fruit tree owners with volunteer harvesters so that urban fruit can meet a more glorious end than rotting at the foot of a tree.
Our main goals are:
Waste reduction
Making good use of local produce by making it more accessible to Montrealers 
Growing and sharing knowledge of urban fruit harvesting
Fostering engagement in community life
Over the past 4 years, we have organized over 200 harvests, salvaged over 7,000 pounds of fruit, of which over 4,500 pounds were donated to community organizations.  The fruit is ripe, the volunteers are keen, and we need your support to help meet the demand for these activities.    What We Need 

 Our goal is to grow the project: more fruit, more people, more neighbourhoods! We would like to:
Acquire more harvesting equipment (ladders, bike trailers, poles, etc) so that we can send more volunteer teams out across the city. 
Hire a part-time coordinator this winter to better prepare the 2015 harvest season.  Our teams are lead by volunteers and we want to invest in the leadership of our organization by hiring one paid staff member. This part-time coordinator can help to train new volunteers, respond to requests for harvests, and steward strategic partnerships so that the project can flourish in more neighbourhoods through the 2015 season.


Perks
To thank you for your support we will gladly reward you with delicious jams, syrups and spreads made with love, from local fruit.  We are also offering pin-back buttons and totes so that you can show your love for the project and carry your fruit!  All rewards will be available for pick-up at Santropol Roulant, 111 Roy street east (Monday-Saturday 9:30am to 5:30 pm) from December 10th to 24th.  Perfect timing for holiday gifts.  If you are unable to pick up your reward in Montreal, we can mail it to you within Canada, we just ask that you add a little extra to cover the cost of shipping.

  The Impact Your donation helps us provide Montrealers with greater access to healthy, local, affordable fruit.  We are building ties within our communities and growing knowledge the varieties of fruit that are suited to our climate. We are offering alternatives to commercially produced fruit which often travels over long distances, arriving past peak freshness.  
  Many ways to help us!

Regardless of your budget, you can help us by sharing this campaign with friends and family via email, Facebook, Indiegogo's share tools and twitter. 
Send an email to Simon (info@lesfruitsdefendus.org) if you have any questions, we would love to hear from you. 
Thank you!

story:
Story

MEDIA about FinGears :

A hands-on review of FinGears rings from Paul, the Friendly Reviewer!

 

 Hands-on experience from Magnetic Games:

 

German review of FinGears from Gadget-Rausch :

"Spinners are a thing of the past with the coming of FinGears. The magnetic rings should not only calm the nerves, but also improve your skill and dexterity.

If you are looking for an addiction-free way to calm yourself in stressful situations , you can support FinGears on Kickstarter ."

 "...Rather than simply ‘spinning your spinner’, FinGears allows you to play a wide array of games and try awesome tricks. And if you’re content with spinning, the non-concentric nature of the FinGears offers unlimited spinning possibilities."

 FinGears are magnetic free-style rings unlike any other fidget or stress relief gadget. 

You can spin them, whirl them, do tricks, stick them to surfaces, play games with friends… the possibilities are endless!

Other fidgets or gadgets have specific purposes and uses. FinGears are completely modular and free-style. 

 

We created a streamlined, universal design of snappy magnets encased in colorful vibrant rings with multi-directional spin. Our goal was to make something that has more creative freedom for the user than anything else! And we're sure we succeeded!  

 Here's our own experience, as users:  We've invented tricks for them, played "billiards" and "air hockey", stuck them to whiteboards to imitate retro pinball.

We used them to focus our thoughts and unwind to the snappy rhythm after a long day. 

 We've had. So. Much. Fun.

 So, we want to share our excitement with you! 

 
 

 Planetary Orbit trick

 We invented some tricks during our own experimentation. Some were created by our engineers, some - by friends, some - by our office crew. We're completely sure the community can create much more. We've only just begun! 

 Eclipse trick

 Axis Blade trick

 The Katana trick

 Magnetic Split trick

 Tower Spin trick

 Figure Eight trick

Additional MOVES, GAMES and TRICKS from reviewers and testers:

You can also check out our more detailed trick tutorial with our most experienced FinGears user - Denis.  Can you think of more ideas for tricks? Let us know and we'll make updates for the trick library!  

 
 

 The beauty of FinGears as a fidget / gadget is that you can invent so many uses for them! Just through the natural property of magnets and the sleek spinning ring elements, you can create games and fun shapes with them.

 It's a cooperative experience that unites people (and we're not just saying that, our entire office is now full of people doing stuff with the rings together!).

Magnetic Billiards - see what moves you can achieve without magnetizing your ring.  

 The easiest game - Magnetic Hockey. Avoid the magnetic field as you send the ring back and forth! 

Check out our detailed video on the basic games we developed. Let us know YOUR OWN new ideas on what  games can be created! 

 
 

Our first backers will receive a serious discount from both the Kickstarter and market price as a special thanks for supporting us!

Backers that aren't in time for the early-bird prices will still receive a great deal compared to future possible market price, especially considering we will ship FREE worldwide!

The more boxes of FinGears you purchase per pledge, the more you save. Share the fun with friends, give a TRULY original gift, build awesome shapes and games, scale them to your imagination!

 

Our rings come in three types of boxes by size: small (green box), medium (orange box) and large (blue box).

 Small rings are designed for a finger diameter of 16mm (approx. 0.6 inches).

Medium rings are designed for a finger diameter of 18mm (approx. 0.7 inches).

Large rings are designed for a finger diameter of 21mm (approx. 0.8 inches).

Each box has a highlighted finger shape that's 1mm larger than the appropriate finger size. You can use it to fit your index finger inside the shape for an approximate idea for your ring size.

We developed a print-out PDF to measure your finger size before you get the box too. This way, you can see with your own eyes which ring sizes are best for you.

You can download the PDF file here: https://bit.ly/34DUIR6 

Print on standard A4 paper. Make sure you select the "actual size" option when printing (or similar wording, based on your software) so it keeps the correct dimensions and doesn't change the borders. Please note that it's not the most exact of measuring processes due to different printers, software, paper etc. But it should give you a general idea!

  Our initial launch will include 8 color combinations:

  • Orange (main color) - blue (inner line)
  • Blue (main color) - orange (inner line)
  • Green (main color) - black (inner line)
  • Black (main color) - green (inner line)
  • Blue (main color) - black (inner line)
  • Black (main color) - blue (inner line)
  • Orange (main color) - black (inner line)
  • Black (main color) - orange (inner line)

We plan to expand our color line-up in the future, adding purple, other colors (and possibly other materials and elements!) as we expand our production and shipping capabilities.

Due to initial launch constraints, each box will have a single color COMBINATION (for example - three rings in Blue-orange or three rings in Green-black). However, we've found it quite cool to have more than one box: mix different sizes and colors to scale the games and tricks!

IMPORTANT: You will be able to choose your size and color combination through our pledge management addon once the campaign finishes.



 

While the result is elegant and intuitive, we've had a long road to developing the perfect shape, geometry, rotation methods, magnet placements and more.

We started out from just the idea of magnetic gears you can rotate and stick together into shapes. We moved from wood to plastic (for colors), and then had a lightning flash of an idea... make the rings easy to whirl, manipulate, carry, spin. 

Make them universal for both the human hand and the human mind!

While the result may look simple, it was an engineering feat of its own, and we're very proud of our team and achievement! 

 

FinGears is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 950+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $400M raised between them.

 

Risks and challenges

As with any physical product, the challenges are related to the manufacturing and delivery of the goods. As to our manufacturing capabilities: we have already created not only the prototypes, but also the final versions of the rings, fine-tuned the materials and are ready to go with our production. All we need is the support of the awesome Kickstarter community to push the "launch button", as it were. We have the product, we have the magnetic awesomeness, all we need are our backers! We have experience in producing various models in a variety of materials, we have great engineers and designers and we're confident we can deliver an awesome product. In regards to delivery, we have the support of experienced logistics specialists that have already shipped many types of products worldwide, from the U.S. to Europe, to Asia. While delays in shipping are always possible (and it's not something we have complete control over), we are also confident we will deliver all the items to our backers. Overall, our team is really passionate about bringing these amazing Magnetic Rings to you, to share our own joy and fun around the globe!

story:
iPad Pro is the most powerful and useful tablet available today. However, it remains limited by its virtual keyboard, which takes up half of the display and makes typing for long periods of time problematic.

Recently, Apple created an entirely separate operating system: “iPad OS” for iPad which allows it to operate more like a MacBook. One of the great features of iPad OS is mouse support, which greatly boosts the iPad’s productivity potential when used with an external keyboard… 

So we created Libra, a Bluetooth keyboard with trackpad, backlighting, and function keys to provide a user experience like a MacBook, without sacrificing the advantages of a tablet. Libra maximizes your iPad productivity while at home or on-the-go. Libra is compatible with iPad Pro 9.7", 10.5", 11" and 12.9".

 Hands-On Review

Check Us from Youtube Channel Unbox Therapy! Unbox Therapy specializes in consumers the newest smartphone to surprising gadgets and technology. Thanks so much for this awesome work! 
 

  •  MacBook-style Design 

Libra’s sleek aluminum housing perfectly captures Apple’s aesthetic and matches with the iPad Pro with colors of space gray and silver. It’s the perfect complement to the iPad Pro and when combined, looks similar to a full-size MacBook.

  •  Trackpad for iPad Pro 

Libra is the world’s first iPad keyboard with a built-in trackpad, bringing you MacBook-like gesture and touch control. With the mouse support feature in the iPad OS, iPad Pro rivals the usability of a laptop now. (*More gesture control features will be added after the iPad OS released)


 

  • Function Keys 

Like a laptop, a dedicated row of function keys makes adjusting the iPad's volume and screen brightness a quick tap away. There are also shortcuts to perform other tasks such as switching the typing language, copy/paste, and more which makes typing and getting work done more efficiently.
 

  • Adjustable Backlit Keys 

The keyboard has backlit keys with three levels of brightness which makes the keyboard easier to use at night. The color and effect of the backlight are adjustable to create the perfect look. 

The keys are the same shape and size as the ones on Apple's last-generation MacBook Pro. Featuring the scissor-switch structure that makes typing on a MacBook so satisfying, Libra delivers the perfect tactile, responsive, and quiet typing experience.
 

  •  Magnetic Cover for 12.9-inch iPad Pro 

We consider device protection essential and with that in mind, Libra comes with a snap-on magnetic cover that can protect your iPad Pro from scratches and dents. 

  • Unique Case for 9.7, 10.5, and 11-inch iPad Pro

We provide a special case for 11-inch iPad Pro only and make the iPad Pro perfectly fit the Libra keyboard. It can fully cover your iPad Pro and protect it from crashing. Four colors of the case are available: space gray, red, green and blue. We're offering the case for 9.7" iPad Pro (2nd.gen) and 10.5" iPad Pro(2nd.gen) now which will be made in the mass production phase. 

  •  Smart Connection

Getting started with Libra is easy. After a simple initial Bluetooth connection set up, Libra will pair with your iPad Pro automatically whenever you turn on the keyboard. A seamless, reliable, Bluetooth 5.1 connection is always ready. 

  • Get a Better View

Different applications require different viewing angles. The smooth keyboard hinge can be adjusted from 0-120 degrees to achieve the perfect angle for your task.
 

The keyboard has a 4000mAh built-in battery that delivers up to 200 days of battery life per charge. It can charge your iPad/ iPhone through the USB C output port in an emergency.

story:
Thanks everyone to make Appy a reality!

 

Entrepreneurism is the heartbeat of economic growth, the cradle of innovation, and the instrument of change, but why do 8 out of 10 small, start-up businesses fail within the first 18 months?

 

Summary

The startups  & Small Businesses challenge

You face a unique set of challenges as a start-up or a small business. Chief among these challenges, however, is money. Money: you need plenty of it just to get started, and if you want to keep your doors open, you need to start making more than you are spending very quickly. If this sounds like a difficult proposition, that is because it is. It is so difficult, in fact, that the vast majority of start-ups never make it past their first year of business. This is bad news for everyone, from the investors to the customers who could have benefited from whatever product the company was making.

Our Solution

Fortunately, there is a solution. In order to cut one major cost – software licenses and subscriptions– our team has developed Appy, the ultimate all-on-one inbound marketing and management software package. Appy has been engineered for ease of use, effective security, flexibility, multilingualism, and power, replacing a number of programs that start-ups otherwise spend thousands of dollars purchasing. With Appy, you can track all the activity in your business: warehouse stock, sales orders, CRM, eCommerce, statistics, payments, quotes, and much more.

This is business software done intelligently...

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have come to you, Crowdfunder, in order to raise $22,000.00 These funds will cover the costs of pushing Appy through the final stages of development so that we can release a world-class product to the market by the end of fiscal year 2017. As a thank-you to everyone who contributes to our campaign, we have planned such rewards as lifetime access to our software, and advertising privileges.

Our Plans 

 

Appy vs others

The Impact

Appy is the sort of software package that comes along only once in a decade, up-ending several industries at once.

What we want to do is cut software out of the equation when start-up companies are figuring out their budgets, giving the most innovative companies more leeway as they plan for their first year of business and beyond.

If we do this right, millions of lives around the world could be improved as a result of the entrepreneurship we foster.

 

Risks and challenges

 

Business Software is an amazing, powerful option to make your business more efficient and capable and to offer your customers power and novel ways to engage with you which bring them enormous value. 

However, a business software project is an expensive and risky undertaking and a badly failed business software project can end up producing nothing of value at great expense. 

Here are the three ways, we'll use, to reduce risk on our software development project and make sure to end up with a viable, positive outcome.

1. Taking Small Bites: Minimum Viable Product

Getting real-world feedback early means we have an opportunity to measure real response to our software.

2. Identifing and Addressing Technical Risks Early.

By verifying early that technical challenges are solvable, we greatly reduce the risk of large failures late in the project when we’ve made a large investment.

3. Engaging Users Early and Often in the Project.
Users will tend to describe what they’re already used to, rather than what they really need. Small but loud minorities of users may skew the results by raising more concern about a particular issue than is warranted.

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family on Facebook and Twitter and all your colleagues on LinkedIn. The more entrepreneurs know about Appy by the time we are ready to launch, the smoother our introduction will go.

We appreciate your support greatly.

Thank you for your time.

story:
Who We Are?

W-MKT.com is a global full digital marketing consultancy which specializes in LinkedIn authority branding, positioning and publishing solutions, as well as in automation tools for entrepreneurs and businesses worldwide.

Over the years, the company has managed to successfully develop and grow over 350 niche websites in more than 40 fields with a total monthly audience of over 25,000,000 active readers . Our social media fans count is over 5,000,000 spread on various social media platform like Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest.

For the past 7 years, the company has consulted hundreds of what so-called "influencers", global leaders and companies to better position themselves and companies in the largest business network in the world - LinkedIn.

The Product

Our LinkedIn Auto Messaging Software was born out of the rapidly growing interest of businesses for LinkedIn automation tools.

Our product is a break-through technology that allows businesses and individuals like marketers, public speakers, entrepreneurs to effectively generate new leads and instantly drive more sales.

What's the different between our software and all the software on the market?

Compared to all other LinkedIn software available on the market, our software actually generates you money. None of the current software on the web can offer you that!

LinkedIn Autopilot tells you they will increase your LinkedIn Profile rank. So what? If this ranking doesn't bring you money on the table, what's the point of using it on a monthly basis?

Why for LinkedIn?

With over 384,000,000 users LinkedIn is the largest business network in the world. 

More than 80% of the LinkedIn members are considered key decision makers compared to Facebook.

Compared to other social networks, members on LinkedIn have more trust in the professional information they receive on LinkedIn – 82% for LinkedIn compared to 28% and 23% for Twitter and Facebook!

Bottom line: When you are using LinkedIn, you are dealing strictly with high-caliber professionals willing to connect and do business with you.

LinkedIn is the largest business network in the world. Its publishing platform – Pulse is becoming more and more popular among managers, executives, entrepreneurs, marketers, public speakers, and businesses. The idea of becoming an “Influencer” and getting your post seen by millions of business and recruitment oriented audience becomes more lucrative.


Our Linkedin Auto Messaging software has 2 essential functions to fully automated your leads generation needs:

1) Message to Group Members: Allows you to send direct message to each group member (with subject and body) to ALL members of selected groups automatically.* - Limited messages due to LinkedIn policies changes
2) Message to all your contacts/connections (no limitations to the number of daily messages that you can send!)

See for yourself how it works:

Features:

* Personalized messages (replaces [FIRST_NAME] by actual name)
* Ability to Pause/Resume from last stopped point ( may be aborted by user, or by unexpected errors like browser crash)
* Simulates user interactions automatically (to avoid getting blocked by Linkedin)
* Customizable Delay + Random variation = Delay between each message sending
* Creates Logs/Reports of each message sent.
* Doesn’t disturb normal browsing activities
* Elegant Design

Recent updates 
-Ability to save messages(subject and body templates) into list.
-Ability to start from given page and member index

Requirements:

* Google Chrome Browser
* Any OS with chrome installed

Software FAQ and specifications

1. How Do I Make Money Using Your Software?

It's really simple. Whether you use the software for personal purposes or you have a sales team, you can use your/their accounts and build your network and get in touch with your relevant audience. Once you've built your network you can now start approaching your leads. We give you the tools(the software) and it's up to you how effectively you will use it. If you are not good at sales or marketing, hire a specialist to write you messages and test them out.

The software has been tested on tens of accounts generating instant results and respectively revenue. 

2. I have heard that LinkedIn limits the number of messages that could be sent to group members. Is this software capable of overcome that?

Yes! After spending years on research and development, we have found a way which allows you to send unlimited number of messages to any group members. Even if you get “You are no longer authorized to message to this member” message, the software can send message without any problem. So you don’t have to worry about that.

*Hot Tip: Keep the count below 50-100 per day.

3. Does it work on Mac OS

Yes, it works on any OS that supports Google Chrome browser. It is a Google chrome extension ( which is not available on Google Play store).

See what some of our happy clients have to say about our product:

What Do We Need and Why Are Why Promoting This Product through Indiegogo?

The product was launched at the beginning of August and we believe that more businesses should know about it. This is your great opportunity to automate your sales and online revenue at a very special early bird price!

Why do we need 500 euro only and how will this money be spent?

So far we invested over $35,000 in the development of the product. We would like to compliment our existing and new clients(you) with new features and better user friendly interface. 

  • The money will be spent towards the development of new features and the development of the current features and for fixing any bugs and/or new restrictions that LinkedIn may place for sending messages.

What is in for you?

  • Early access to our LinkedIn automation software + a lifetime LinkedIn Automation Software support & updates membership on our website w-mkt.com Cost of the perk: $250 (normal price on w-mkt.com is $700!)

  • Sponsored Twitter & Facebook Shoutouts to total of 5 million fans spread on several viral Facebook and Twitter pages in exchange of your support!
See some of our accounts:

  • Marketing tools membership on our website(paid 1 year in advance - normal monthly subscription price: $199). Learn more about our subscription levels and what is in for you using this perk, please click here.

What is your LinkedIn Influencer Programme all about?

LinkedIn is the largest business network in the world. Its publishing platform – Pulse is becoming more and more popular among managers, executives, entrepreneurs, marketers, public speakers, and businesses. The idea of becoming an “Influencer” and getting your post seen by millions of business and recruitment oriented audience becomes more lucrative.

Why?

Because it gives once in a lifetime opportunity to change your life, drive millions in sales, position yourself and business as a leader on the market, connect to investors, potential partners, get a new job, or hire a talent for your company!

Our programme will help you to reach your goals. We don’t and can’t say that it is easy to become influential, but with hard work, plus our help, and your dedication, we can do miracles! Our programme requires a dedication and a contract with us for at least 6 months. This way, we can assure that you get the best traction and results within your goals, deadlines and ideas.

This service is not cheap, but if you are on this page, you clearly understand its value – money don’t buy everything. The unlimited opportunities that will come to you can’t be measured. We will guide you and be helping you all the way to reaching your business goals.

FAQ:

Q: Why should I choose you?

A: After 7 years of successfully consulting and positioning entrepreneurs, executives, marketing gurus, public speakers, and businesses, we have a proven track of positioning and authority branding individuals. We currently run 10 LinkedIn marketing websites. We partner with a number of reputation management firms in the United States and the United Kingdom.

Q: Who should participate in this programme?

A: This programme is perfect for individuals and businesses planning to build authority branding, drive more traffic to their websites; individuals who want to generate more leads, get new business opportunities, and drive more sales.

Q: Why your program lasts for 6 months?

A: Millions of people and businesses are now realizing the power of LinkedIn Pulse and what is the added value that Pulse brings them to the table: new business opportunities, more revenue, higher rankings in Google, Yahoo and Bing searches. What most of them don’t realize or understand is how to become popular on Pulse and how to increase your ROI by using it. Well, we specialize in just that.

We have the blueprint and we are here to help you. Our programme lasts for 6 months because our experience clearly shows that getting to the influencer status and getting your Pulse articles picked by LinkedIn takes time, dedication, and money investment. However, the results are invaluable!

Q: If I apply for your program and pass the full programme, what’s next for me?

A: This is not the end for you. We will be here for you and we will help you to continue to maintain and develop your public status on LinkedIn. This is how we build strong business relations based on trust, results, and transparency.

Q: How does the payment work?

A: All of our Programme Plans require 1-time payment. After you complete the payment, we will get in touch with you within 1-2 Business Days with more details on how to start.

Q:Why do you ask for so much money in advance? Can’t I just pay on month-to-month basis?

A: Our programme requires dedication, time, and energy. We believe that if we are committed to work with you and provide the best possible outcome for you, the programme won’t work for you for only 1 month. Best results come within the first 3 to 6 months. Please feel more than welcome to try our Free Trial service*.

What happens after I order any of your perks?

1) If you chose to pay with Paypal:

  • We will be able to complete and/or deliver all the perks at the beginning of November, 2015 after Indiegogo clears the payments.
Optional: If you don't want to wait until the beginning of November, 2015, we can also deliver all perks instantly, but you will have to get in touch with us at info@kaaso.com to settle the payment and discuss your requirements(depending on the perk you choose eg. Influencer Programme, etc.)

2) If you chose to pay with your credit/debit card:

  • We will be able to complete and/or deliver all the perks at the beginning of January, 2016 after Indiegogo clears the payments.
Optional: If you don't want to wait until the beginning of November, 2015, we can also deliver all perks instantly, but you will have to get in touch with us at info@kaaso.com to settle the payment and discuss your requirements(depending on the perk you choose eg. Influencer Programme, etc.)

Risks & Challenges

We have already made the big step investing time and over $35,000 in this project. It's time to make it full available to the business world. We won't be able to make it without your support. 

Testimonies from happy clients about our consultancy work and software:

Other Ways You Can Help

We thank you for your support. New risks and challenges will pop up throughout this project. Our next step is to continue developing our existing product and find new clients among the way.

story:
Meet Nuzzle. An advanced pet collar that locates your pet via GPS using nationwide cellular coverage and bluetooth connectivity, at no additional cost to you.


Ever wonder what they're doing when you're not there? With the Nuzzle app, you'll get real-time updates on your pet throughout the day.  

You can see if your dog or cat is resting, playing, or active.  


Have more than one pet? No problem! The Nuzzle app allows you to add multiple pets and track them all simultaneously. 



Unlike other pet trackers, Nuzzle has no monthly or annual fees.

We believe it is important to provide the most advanced collar to people with the most easy and convenient experience possible.


We have other revenue sources and partners that will offset the costs of cellular data, such as our simple and mobile-optimized pet insurance.


During your daily walks, the Nuzzle app keeps track of your route, distance you’ve traveled, the pace of your walk, and the time you spend with your pet.

Nuzzle is partnering with a US cellular provider to provide users with reliable, nationwide 3G coverage. You'll be able to track your pet from anywhere, anytime.


Set up an innovative geo-fence around your house to get instant alerts on your phone if your dog or cat ever leaves the designated area.


Nuzzle weighs approximately 1 ounce, making it the lightest pet tracking device available. We didn't want Nuzzle to be clunky or look too mechanical.

Nuzzle's simple design will be light, secure, and fashionable, so your small dogs and cats will have an easy and enjoyable experience wearing Nuzzle on a daily basis.




Nationwide Cellular GPS Coverage

Nuzzle’s tracking is made possible by nationwide cellular coverage provided by one of the leading cell carriers.  


Long Battery Life - Up to 5 Days

Our cutting edge battery is engineered to last longer than any other collar in its class. Nuzzle's propriety technology allows for extended battery life of up to 5 days.


Removable, Rechargeable Battery

Nuzzle has the longest lasting rechargeable batteries on the market. Easily pop out the batteries and charge them using the Nuzzle Charging Base (pictured below).

We’re providing 2 batteries in every Nuzzle package, so your pet's collar is always on and working, with a total battery life of up to 10 days.


A Tracker Attachment That Fits Your Style

We know that pets and pet owners enjoy their own personal collection of collars and harnesses. The Nuzzle tracker can be easily re-attached onto your own collar or harness using our customized attachment piece.  *Included with every Nuzzle


With the Nuzzle app, you'll have access to your pet's insurance information and medical records on your smartphone, so you can make on-the-spot medical decisions when it really matters.

We want to keep your pets healthy and happy. In a mobile-first world, we think pet insurance on your smartphone is absolutely critical.

That's why we're offering optional pet insurance in a smartphone app, so you can get a no-obligation quote from leading industry pet insurers.  



Our journey begins with co-founder Megan Rice's experiences as a pet parent and proud owner of her bulldog, Henry. 

Here's her story.


We're Nuzzle.

A technology-focused pet insurance company created by a team of pet lovers and tech enthusiasts with a mission to provide a better and smarter pet care products for animal lovers.



We've been working since October 2014 on creating the Nuzzle collar with the goal  to create a smarter pet collar that will improve the lives of pet owners.

We teamed up with Ammunition Design Group, named #1 on Fast Company's list of "The World's Most Innovative Companies of 2015 in Design." They have designed, in our humble opinion, the most beautiful collar available: sleek and user-friendly. 

We worked hand-in-hand with Ammunition to ensure you have the best collar and user experience possible! With their help, Nuzzle is a collar with a simple and compact design that your pet will love to wear.

As we are starting our manufacturing run, we're so excited to share the results of the last year with all of you. 

Thank you for visiting our page and hearing our story. Our mission is to build products that can improve your experience as a pet owner, and we're glad to have you with us!

We are pet people. Most of us will go to ridiculous lengths to keep our animals happy. Some of us will enthusiastically admit to it. Others keep quiet. But deep down we know that we’re all a little crazy. That’s fine by us.



A standard Nuzzle package includes 1 orange Nuzzle collar, 1 attachment for third-party collars and harnesses, 2 batteries, 1 charging base, and 1 USB cord.


Nuzzle will be shipped in early 2016. Currently, Nuzzle is only available in the United States, and shipping in the U.S. is included for free.


Follow Nuzzle to receive updates:             


GENERAL

How do I get a free Nuzzle Collar?

When logged in on Indiegogo and viewing our campaign page, clicking the "link" icon to the left of our main video will allow you to copy this personal link. You can also share this link by clicking any of the social media icons to the left of the video. Use this link to share our page with your friends. If 5 of them make a purchase, you will get a $85 refund. If 10 of them make a purchase, you will get a $169 refund. *If you bought at the Early Bird price, the respective refundable amounts are $75 and $149.

Q: How do I contact the Nuzzle team?

A: Email us at contact@hellonuzzle.com or direct message us on Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter. 

Q: How does Nuzzle locate my pet?

A: Nuzzle uses GPS to pinpoint your pet's location when its away from your home. When your pet is close to your home, the collar can communicate with the base station directly, greatly extending battery life.  This is unlike most Bluetooth collars that will not be able to find your dog or cat if it is outside of BT range.  

Q: When will Nuzzle start shipping? How much will shipping cost?

A: Nuzzle will start shipping in March 2016. The shipping will be free.

Q: Is Nuzzle available outside of the US?

A: Unfortunately, Nuzzle is only currently available in the U.S. Stay tuned for updates on when the International Edition will be available.

Q: Is Nuzzle available in stores or online?

A: Currently, Nuzzle is only open for orders via our Indiegogo campaign.


COLLAR FEATURES

Q: Is the Nuzzle collar waterproof?

A: Yes!

Q: Can my cat use Nuzzle as well?

A: Yes! Nuzzle can be used on both cats and dogs.

Q: How does Nuzzle locate my pet?

A: Nuzzle uses cellular GPS connectivity in addition to bluetooth. That way, unlike most bluetooth only pet collars, if your dog or cat runs off a long distance, you’ll still be able to locate him/her from anywhere.

Q: Can I use Nuzzle with my dog’s personal collection of collars and harnesses?

A: The Nuzzle tracker can be detached and reattached to your own collars and harnesses.

Q: Do I need to add Nuzzle to my data plan?

A: No! The Nuzzle collar has no additional fees. We factor the data costs into the cost of the collar, so you don’t need to worry about monthly payments.

Q: Who do I contact for tech support and questions about using my Nuzzle collar?

A: Please email us at contact@hellonuzzle.com


INSURANCE

Q: Do I need to buy insurance if I get a collar?

A:  No.  The insurance is strictly optional.  

Q: Can I use the app if I don't buy the insurance?

A:  Of course.  There will never be any restrictions on the app or collar usage.

We are pet people. Most of us will go to ridiculous lengths to keep our animals happy. Some of us will enthusiastically admit to it. Others keep quiet. But deep down we know that we’re all a little crazy. That’s fine by us.













A standard Nuzzle package includes 1 orange Nuzzle collar, 1 attachment for third-party collars and harnesses, 2 batteries, 1 charging base, and 1 USB cord.






Nuzzle will be shipped in early 2016. Currently, Nuzzle is only available in the United States, and shipping in the U.S. is included for free.

Follow Nuzzle to receive updates:             





GENERAL

How do I get a free Nuzzle Collar?
When logged in on Indiegogo and viewing our campaign page, clicking the "link" icon to the left of our main video will allow you to copy this personal link. You can also share this link by clicking any of the social media icons to the left of the video. Use this link to share our page with your friends. If 5 of them make a purchase, you will get a $85 refund. If 10 of them make a purchase, you will get a $169 refund. *If you bought at the Early Bird price, the respective refundable amounts are $75 and $149.


Q: How do I contact the Nuzzle team?
A: Email us at contact@hellonuzzle.com or direct message us on Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter. 
Q: How does Nuzzle locate my pet?
A: Nuzzle uses GPS to pinpoint your pet's location when its away from your home. When your pet is close to your home, the collar can communicate with the base station directly, greatly extending battery life.  This is unlike most Bluetooth collars that will not be able to find your dog or cat if it is outside of BT range.  
Q: When will Nuzzle start shipping? How much will shipping cost?
A: Nuzzle will start shipping in March 2016. The shipping will be free.
Q: Is Nuzzle available outside of the US?
A: Unfortunately, Nuzzle is only currently available in the U.S. Stay tuned for updates on when the International Edition will be available.
Q: Is Nuzzle available in stores or online?
A: Currently, Nuzzle is only open for orders via our Indiegogo campaign.

COLLAR FEATURES
Q: Is the Nuzzle collar waterproof?
A: Yes!
Q: Can my cat use Nuzzle as well?
A: Yes! Nuzzle can be used on both cats and dogs.
Q: How does Nuzzle locate my pet? 
A: Nuzzle uses cellular GPS connectivity in addition to bluetooth. That way, unlike most bluetooth only pet collars, if your dog or cat runs off a long distance, you’ll still be able to locate him/her from anywhere.
Q: Can I use Nuzzle with my dog’s personal collection of collars and harnesses?
A: The Nuzzle tracker can be detached and reattached to your own collars and harnesses.
Q: Do I need to add Nuzzle to my data plan?
A: No! The Nuzzle collar has no additional fees. We factor the data costs into the cost of the collar, so you don’t need to worry about monthly payments.
Q: Who do I contact for tech support and questions about using my Nuzzle collar?
A: Please email us at contact@hellonuzzle.com

INSURANCE
Q: Do I need to buy insurance if I get a collar?
A:  No.  The insurance is strictly optional.  
Q: Can I use the app if I don't buy the insurance?


A:  Of course.  There will never be any restrictions on the app or collar usage.

story:
Welcome to Mentor Her. We are an Irish company that hosts a 6 week program four times a year connecting female Mentors and Mentees across a variety of categories all around the world! We are passionate about helping women begin or grow their business, pursue a successful career or follow their dreams in the creative sphere by connecting them with a woman who has already achieved success in their fields.

 

As an Irish company, Mentor Her is now taking on the global stage to help women around the world get to that next level, with the help of women who have experience and want to help. You can sign up to be a Mentor or a Mentee or both by purchasing a perk and filling out the application forms on our website at www.mentorher.global.  Our next program begins on April 12th 2021.

Mentor Her is an Irish company that has decided to take our program global so that we can help women around the world fulfill their full potential and conquer their dreams. We are only ten months old, but have already helped a vast amount of women achieve success, confidence, support and motivation in getting to the next stage of their careers.

Whatever your industry, whatever your stage- join our 6-week program to help get to that next level whether you're running a business, pursuing a career or following a creative dream!

Our Matching Process is a proven technique that has already led to the successful matching of over 200 women. You'll be matched as a Mentor or a Mentee based on the criteria included in your application.  We not only match you according to your experience and the needs of the Mentee, but we also take into consideration your personality, ambition and outlooks. If you fill in your application and we feel we need more information in order to match you successfully, we will send you an email or set up a call. 

Our Matching takes place a few days before our program begins. For our next program, Mentors will receive their Mentee match by the 9th of April. Once Mentors confirm their acceptance of their Mentee, Mentees will receive confirmation by the 11th of April and then we will put you in contact. 

Mentors and Mentees choose a time that suits them to meet once a week for one hour each session,  while Mentor Her provides support in the background. 

We look forward to having you on this journey with us and as part of our community as a whole!

 

 

As we launch our campaign on a global stage, our biggest focus and utmost ambition is to reach more women in locations around the world so that we can help more and more people in the coming years. Whether you're a business owner that runs an online store or a woman running a hairdressers to a fintech entrepreneur; a woman trying to move up the fashion industry, or looking for a new opportunity in marketing or sales. Our belief is that we can help any woman, at any stage, in any industry. We believe that we can change the world when women support one another. Below, you'll also find our research that we carried out in September 2020 to see the real figures behind female representation in the workplace. This survey was conducted on global companies who turned over 1 billion euro in Ireland in 2019.
