story:
Coach App

Chores have never been so much fun


 

The Coach App is home to coaches of different expertise who help you to organize your life. Get stuff done, find out about food allergies, track calories, work out and get analytics on everything. This app does it all. With character. Select your coach and start becoming a better you.

Meet the Coaches

Sergeant: He is the right one if you need directions. Unlike a normal reminder he will nag you .. until you finished. Recurring tasks, work-out routines, dead lines ... adjust his yelling-ness to your liking and get it done.

Dr. Sugar: Beside diabetes he can help you to deal with a lot of different illnesses by maintaining a special medical diary. Find out about food intolerance and allergies, check if your mood reflects on your body functions and get insights with statistics and conclusions.
BTW: Data collected by Dr. Sugar will help your real life doctor to make a better diagnose.

Horny: She is a unicorn. Can help you with decisions, wasting time and guided procrastination. 

Early Bird: He used to sleep in, but now he learned to get out of bed early. So can you! Learn to maintain a good sleep circle and become perfectly relaxed.

Yogi: Mindful breaks during the day, guided meditation, small yoga exercises ... the yogi is your master.

Mom: Do you miss your mother telling you to dress and eat properly, how she's always right and about her opinion on everything. Seize your chance with this Coach. "YES MOM!"

Chat Bot: Daily diary, questions about your day and collecting random data you want to make sense of with statistics and analytics. This robot will not complain .. after all, he's just a bot.

Why the coaches need you?

Even coaches need to improve.

While the basic functionalities of the smart phone app are already working, the coaches need to get more convenient features and polished dialogues. With your money you support the coaching of the coaches for an even better experience for all users. And we can make the Sergeant and his fellow coaches available to voice enabled home devices by the time of the official release. Help us move to different platforms so everyone can use the app on as many platforms as possible in sync. And let us add more fun.

Official release of the coach app in February 2018! Please subscribe for beta testing now so you can start working on your new year resolution right away and give us valuable feedback.

-> www.pianobear.cool/Coach#Beta

 

What you get out of it:

  • Discipline
  • Insight on your health and life
  • Daily routines
  • Get rid of bad habits
  • much more!

... and with supporting the project now you get a special discount up to -50%. 
All money collected with this campaign goes directly to the coaches so they can do a better job answering questions, reminding you and helping you. 

IT MAKES TOTAL SENSE TO TELL EVERYONE ABOUT IT!
The more people who support us, the faster we can build additional features that further improve the experience with the Coach app for everyone. So please spread the word and enjoy the improvements together.

What happens if we receive more money than we asked for:

> 5.000 EUR
German Version and Viennese slang.

> 7.000 EUR
Additional Language. Vote for your favorite language -> www.pianobear.cool/Coach#VoteLanguage

>  10.000 EUR
Mini-Game featuring Sergeant and Horny in the app

> 15.000 EUR
2 Additional Coaches. Vote for them -> www.pianobear.cool/Coach#NewCoaches

What the future will bring: actual hardware devices to change bad eating habits, connecting with IoT and smart homes, improve story telling with the characters and many other things.

 

How it works:


Chat (or use the easy data interfaces) with different coaches (customized chat-bots) on your Smart Phone, web browser or voice enabled home devices like Amazon Alexa to achieve your goals and collect data on your life. 
Every Coach has different abilities. Choose the right coaches based on your needs.
What they do:

  • Daily Diary / Mood Diary / Baby Journal / Period tracker / Checklist / Sleep Tracking
  • Health Diary / Food Allergy Calculator / Medicine Comparer / Loose Weight
  • Habit Changer / Dynamic Routines / Motivator / "todo list that screams at you"
  • Annoying Reminder / Flexible Calendar  / Workout Drill
  • Nutrition Information (Calories, Carbohydrates, fats ...)
  • Analytics: Compare your data, get insight and draw conclusions (eg. every time I eat carbohydrates I feel bad)
  • A word a day .. learn a new language word by word
  • Vocabulary trainer
  • Hands-free time tracking for work, house work and other activities
  • more to come when the app is released

Coach app is synced accross multiple devices. It works on iOS and Android, on Web Browsers and voice enabled home devices like Amazon Echo (Alexa) or Google Home. You can enter data anytime and get the best possible effortless user experience. Talk to Siri, Google Now or Amazon Alexa while you prepare your meal to ask about nutrition information or tell the sergeant how many pull-ups you just finished while working out. Hands-free! 

Integration with sport devices and custom hardware tracking devices coming soon. 

Have devices that you want to be connected to the coaches?
We're looking forward to your suggestions for further improvements and integrations.

 

Why it works:


While classic todo list apps, reminders and diaries just send you standard notifications, these coaches really chat with you. They get angry when you don't fill in your diary data or don't start with your assignment one week before deadline. They support you when you need help to finish stuff or want to learn more about your health. They give feedback on your performance so you know exactly how well you did. They motivate you throughout the day and all hobbies. Push your limits!

Do you have a problem finishing the tasks on your todo list? Sergeant can help you with that!
Do you forget to make entries in your health diary? Dr. Sugar will nag you until you do it ....

 

Risks:


None. We make use of the Sergeant Coach ourselves so no procrastination can stop us from finishing this app. Sergeant helps everyone to finish tasks!
We already created a working prototype and need to polish it for public release in February. Subscribe for beta-testing now to give it a try -> www.pianobear.cool/Coach

 

"Best investment ever" ...


"Outstanding value for only so little money" ... some even say it's much more reliable than investing in bitcoins. We are talking about self-investment. Make an investment in yourself and add the coaches to your team today. They'll do their best to improve your life style. Enjoy the new you!

 

Support the coaches

... so they can support you

  • Invest in one or more perks we offer our backers
  • Become a Beta-Tester (www.pianobear.cool/Coach) and give the Coach app a try
  • Tell others with unfinished todo-lists or health problems about this app
  • Check out other apps of the father of the coaches, PianoBear (www.pianobear.cool)


Support us now so we can support you! Looking forward meeting you on your device!

Yours,

Dr. Sugar
Horny
Sergeant
Bot
Early
Yogi
Mom

story:
THE WORLD’S MOST ADVANCED, FASTEST, PORTABLE CHARGER

  • Charge all of your devices 2X faster.
  • Charge 3 devices at the same time, same speed.
  • Put it in your pocket without even noticing that it’s there.
  • Reusable 5000maH Built-in Lithium-ion Battery, no batteries required.
  • Exry can get charged through the 5V Input Port, over your laptop through the USB Port or you can just charge it by connecting the USB Port to the second Exry. We are making sure that you never run out of battery.



Get charged in just 3 easy steps. 

  1. Get your Exry
  2. Put the USB Port, plug it in your device (s) , switch it on with 1 button.
  3. Get your device(s) fully-charged, way faster, way better.


Introducing you EXRY 

Exry charges your device while you enjoy your every-day routine. Our main goal is to provide a better, faster and easier charging solution to every person around the world. Exry loves diversity and that’s why it works with the majority of phones which support USB Charging, so you won’t have to worry if you own an iPhone or Android.

Exry is a portable charger, small as a lipstick which makes it easier for you to keep it with your self wherever you go. Whether you are a social media user or an athlete, Exry fits everywhere. We handled all the hard work so you can charge your phone at ease with the push of a single button!

Meet Exry (Kosovo patent pending)


2X Faster than your normal charger

Today, time is valuable and that’s why Exry charges your phone 2X Faster than your normal charger. Exry mode is turned on by default, whether you are charging a single device or 3 devices at once which is a revolutionary step in the industry. 

Exry focuses all of its power toward charging your devices in parallel, simply by using every possible maH of its integrated 5000maH Lithium-ion Battery, which is reusable – anytime you want.

“Lost time is never found again.”
Benjamin Franklin

Small in size, giant in action.

Exry is 5cm (1.96 inch) by 1.8cm (0.70 inch) which is almost the size of a lipstick. After countless days and sleepless nights of designing, sketching and developing different prototypes, we decided to make Exry in this size and shape so it can fit in your pocket or bag without using too much space,  while you enjoy a full battery and still do your every-day tasks without a single hassle.


Easy ways of charging Exry.

You can charge your it through the 5V Input port using its own adapter which comes with Exry or you can charge it over your laptop through the USB Port. We are commited to provide you easier solutions when it comes to charging, especially if you’re in a rush. 

That’s why we also created a device that charges itself, but what does this mean ?

You’re probably meeting with a friend who also has an Exry device but his device is out of battery, no problem. Simply USB connect it with yours and you will have enough battery in both devices, which can be used toward charging 6 other devices. 


Exry works pretty much with every device.

Exry is compatible with every phone and device that supports USB Charging. USB Charging technology has been around for ages and it will still be around for a long-time. Along with easy solutions, we want to provide diversity so you don’t need to worry if you own an iPhone or Android.

If your phone or device can be charged through an USB cable, Exry takes care of it.


Exry is a solution for many people.

Smartphones, social media and their usage has been growing rapidly throughout the years and that’s why we all need battery so we can keep in touch and access the world at our fingertips. Whether you’re a freelancer, athlete or a businessman, you still need battery for your device.


After Indiegogo Campaign

Exry’s regular retail price after crowdfunding campaign will be $20 (including 2 years warranty & charger) and the Exry Special Edition (including 2 years warranty, charger, 3 in 1 cable) will be $25

For our Indiegogo backers, we have created sweet discounts for the official Exry introduction.


Exry Team

The founders, Redon Selimi and Hatice Dindar, started working on Exry in the early 2014. After countless hours of sketching, dumping paper, re-designing, testing prototypes and starting all over again..  we have built a team with a wild ambitious and entrepreneurial spirit. 



Our Timeline


FAQ

Q: Does my device work with Exry?

A: Exry works with any device that supports USB Charging. This means that it works with smartphones, tablets, media players etc .. The brand of your device is not important, as long as it can be charged through USB, Exry takes care of it.

Q: Are shipping fees included in the prices?

A: No, shipping fees are not included. You do not need to add anything for today, except for picking your perk of choice. Once we start shipping, we will personally contact you by e-mail so you can confirm your shipping information. Shipping will be at cost and it will be declared for you inside your Exry package. We won’t subsidize it or make any profit from it.

Q: What are the advantages of Exry compared to other chargers ?

A: Exry uses a 5000maH built-in lithium-ion battery which is a high capacity for such a small charger. It is portable and cheap in price. It can charge up to 3 devices at once, charging all of them at the same speed.

Q: I’d like to post in my blog or write a bigger story about Exry. Where can I find more material or a press kit?

A: Awesome! You can check our official website for more informations about us as a startup, the idea behind exry, press articles or even contact us, right here : http://www.exry.co

Q: Will you be able to successfully pull this off?

A: We are commited and confident that we we can successfully deliver. Yet, this is still a crowdfunding campaign with “risks” that are inherent to crowdfunding. Before we launched this campaign, we spent countless hours and sleepless nights organizing everything in its own place, one by one. For this exact reason we have spent a lot of time and energy to find the right partners, manufacturers and we built a lot of working prototypes until we came with the final product. We have a detailed business plan, agreements and contracts  in place - to take the final steps towards production and shipping. We are commited and confident that with your help, we can bring Exry to life and successfully deliver all chosen perks to our backers, just in time, according to our timeline. 

Credits
Intro Music: Redon Selimi - Unnamed
Presentation Music: Life of Riley
Voiceover Artist: Jim Bennet
Vectors used for icons: Freepik

Exry mode is turned on by default, whether you are charging a single device or 3 devices at once which is a revolutionary step in the industry. Exry focuses all of its power toward charging your devices in parallel, simply by using every possible maH of its integrated 5000maH Lithium-ion Battery, which is reusable – anytime you want.“Lost time is never found again.”Benjamin Franklin
Small in size, giant in action.Exry is 5cm (1.96 inch) by 1.8cm (0.70 inch) which is almost the size of a lipstick. After countless days and sleepless nights of designing, sketching and developing different prototypes, we decided to make Exry in this size and shape so it can fit in your pocket or bag without using too much space,  while you enjoy a full battery and still do your every-day tasks without a single hassle.Easy ways of charging Exry.You can charge your it through the 5V Input port using its own adapter which comes with Exry or you can charge it over your laptop through the USB Port. We are commited to provide you easier solutions when it comes to charging, especially if you’re in a rush. That’s why we also created a device that charges itself, but what does this mean ?You’re probably meeting with a friend who also has an Exry device but his device is out of battery, no problem. Simply USB connect it with yours and you will have enough battery in both devices, which can be used toward charging 6 other devices. Exry works pretty much with every device.Exry is compatible with every phone and device that supports USB Charging. USB Charging technology has been around for ages and it will still be around for a long-time. Along with easy solutions, we want to provide diversity so you don’t need to worry if you own an iPhone or Android.If your phone or device can be charged through an USB cable, Exry takes care of it.Exry is a solution for many people.Smartphones, social media and their usage has been growing rapidly throughout the years and that’s why we all need battery so we can keep in touch and access the world at our fingertips. Whether you’re a freelancer, athlete or a businessman, you still need battery for your device.After Indiegogo CampaignExry’s regular retail price after crowdfunding campaign will be $20 (including 2 years warranty & charger) and the Exry Special Edition (including 2 years warranty, charger, 3 in 1 cable) will be $25For our Indiegogo backers, we have created sweet discounts for the official Exry introduction.Exry TeamThe founders, Redon Selimi and Hatice Dindar, started working on Exry in the early 2014. After countless hours of sketching, dumping paper, re-designing, testing prototypes and starting all over again..  we have built a team with a wild ambitious and entrepreneurial spirit. Our TimelineFAQQ: Does my device work with Exry?A: Exry works with any device that supports USB Charging. This means that it works with smartphones, tablets, media players etc .. The brand of your device is not important, as long as it can be charged through USB, Exry takes care of it.Q: Are shipping fees included in the prices?A: No, shipping fees are not included. You do not need to add anything for today, except for picking your perk of choice. Once we start shipping, we will personally contact you by e-mail so you can confirm your shipping information. Shipping will be at cost and it will be declared for you inside your Exry package. We won’t subsidize it or make any profit from it.Q: What are the advantages of Exry compared to other chargers ?A: Exry uses a 5000maH built-in lithium-ion battery which is a high capacity for such a small charger. It is portable and cheap in price. It can charge up to 3 devices at once, charging all of them at the same speed.Q: I’d like to post in my blog or write a bigger story about Exry. Where can I find more material or a press kit?A: Awesome! You can check our official website for more informations about us as a startup, the idea behind exry, press articles or even contact us, right here : http://www.exry.coQ: Will you be able to successfully pull this off?A: We are commited and confident that we we can successfully deliver. Yet, this is still a crowdfunding campaign with “risks” that are inherent to crowdfunding. Before we launched this campaign, we spent countless hours and sleepless nights organizing everything in its own place, one by one. For this exact reason we have spent a lot of time and energy to find the right partners, manufacturers and we built a lot of working prototypes until we came with the final product. We have a detailed business plan, agreements and contracts  in place - to take the final steps towards production and shipping. We are commited and confident that with your help, we can bring Exry to life and successfully deliver all chosen perks to our backers, just in time, according to our timeline. 
CreditsIntro Music: Redon Selimi - UnnamedPresentation Music: Life of RileyVoiceover Artist: Jim BennetVectors used for icons: Freepik

story:
Let's pitch !

Based on the need for startups to generate visibility, feedback and boosted sales to efficiently grow, Pick & Pow is a platform introducing innovative products to early adopters, giving the startups the opportunity to be empowered by the correct targeted market.

We classified these products in 4 categories :

  • Smart : Disruptive tech products making your life easier and seamless.
  • Music : Innovation meets musical artefacts & instruments. 
  • Ecology : Green innovative products with impactful vision. 
  • Design/Art : Groundbreaking work of designers & artists pushing the boundaries of creativity. 

 Pick & Pow is also a resourceful online magazine with insightful articles, interviews, as well as documentaries, about all upcoming innovative ideas and trends.

Affiliation model

Through an affiliation model established with innovative startups, we select and display their latest and most impactful products. We built Pick&Pow to link early adopters and other innovation-oriented users to these new products. For every product you like, you’ll be able to visit its e-shop to buy and empower it !

Tick tock, tick tock...

Every product on our platform has a lifespan, visible through a countdown on its page. Each time a Pick&Pow user visits the product website, or shares it with his friends, we add extra hours to the project lifespan.

For visiting the startup website : 1 extra hours

For sharing the product with friends : 12 extra hours

-> Members are indeed empowering the products by allowing them to stay visible on the website, and by providing feedback.

I'm a winner !

Yes, YOU really are ! To thank you for the incredible help you’re providing to startups, we decided to share our commissions with you. What ?! What do you mean ? We give away a piece of the cake in the form of permanent discounts ! And last but not least, you’ll have the privilege of joining the first “innovation 1st” community.


Today, an aggressive number of startups are founded around a physical product to sell. The simple fact that people take the risk to start up should be enough to unveil their project.

However, with technology moving at an exponentially faster pace, people don’t have the time to hear about and discover all innovative projects, especially those lacking online visibility. Therefore, in addition to bringing awareness on today’s coolest & most impactful innovations, our main goal is to help startups to gain visibility, feedback and sales: to be empowered.

On the other hand, part of our objective is to counteract complex and discriminating marketplace that only highlights popular products. We want to design a new way to introduce new products to early adopters, by focusing on the ones with real innovation impact and by showcasing all available products, not just the popular ones.

The simple fact that people take the risk to start up should be enough to unveil their project.However, with technology moving at an exponentially faster pace, people don’t have the time to hear about and discover all innovative projects, especially those lacking online visibility. Therefore, in addition to bringing awareness on today’s coolest & most impactful innovations, our main goal is to help startups to gain visibility, feedback and sales: to be empowered.On the other hand, part of our objective is to counteract complex and discriminating marketplace that only highlights popular products. We want to design a new way to introduce new products to early adopters, by focusing on the ones with real innovation impact and by showcasing all available products, not just the popular ones.
STARTUPS: Startups display their new products on a dedicated platform, and get to target early adopters. Moreover, startups will have access to a private network in order to share concerns, solutions and discuss smart partnerships with other startups.
USER: In addition to the permanent discounts, the user will be able to create an account in our innovation district; a community of innovators eager to connect with each others, share ideas, trends and updates around Innovation.
Our Pick & Pow magazine will offer readers carefully curated content and entertaining videos on upcoming ideas and latest trends.

 Since we started the Pick&Pow adventure, we wanted to show people that innovation is as extremely interesting and relevant as cool ! Thus, we created an Innovation Vlog (youtube channel) where we release entertaining and unconventional videos presenting cool products !
Today, we need you guys to allow us (Alex, Hilaire and Lina) to continue our great project and empower it ;)
Started from scratch on our student loans, we now need to finalize the UX/UI and construction of our platform to launch in September.
What will you do if backers go above 3500€? Well, that would be incredibly promising! Your humbling extra help will allow us to invest more in online marketing/communication and maybe join a coworking place to create more synergies with other innovators !


P&P started in Barcelona with two friends : Hilaire, the cheese & wine lover from France, and Alex, the tequila & burritos lover from Mexico. The co-founders currently live in Barcelona, and are both passionated by entrepreneurship and cool innovative products. A perfect match !
Recently, another Frenchie joined the adventure: Lina Lahrache, helping us with our marketing and growth efforts.






Pick & Pow faces three exciting challenges : 
- Finding increasingly more innovative products in order to match the early adopters frantic desire for innovation ! 
- Keep collaborating with influential bloggers & journalists, and publish relevant content aligned with our users interest.
- Hiring a talented full-stack developer to keep on improving the platform, and your experience on it.
Just like all the startups around us, we grow and thrive in a risky environment !
Our main risk is to not gather enough users and partners on the platform.THANK YOU VERY MUCH!

story:
Most pocket projectors on the market cannot reach perfect balance among features—big screen, long utility time, high image quality, and compact body. Apart from that, a traditional pico projector still needs a tripod to stand, so it’s not easy to carry. We believe a good projector should be enjoyed by everyone, whether at home or at the office, so we created the Vankyo Leisure 520W to be both high performing and wallet friendly.

 

Backers who pre-order via this campaign will receive their Vankyo Leisure 520W from our first production batches—fully tested and ready for mass consumption. The Vankyo Leisure 520W will never sell for this low price again!

 

 

 

 

 

☛ Brighter Is Better

Unlike other pico projectors that offer only low luminance and a dim, grainy image, the Leisure 520W offers brilliant, cinema-quality colors and deep blacks that deliver strong contrasts while staying sharp to 200 inches, thanks to 2400+ lumens of projection power. Day or night, you’ll enjoy HD viewing of stunning clarity.

 

☛ Immersive 200” Cinematic Experience

Today, more and more people use their smartphones, tablets, and notebooks to enjoy media content. But due to these devices’ limited screen size, sharing content with others is not easy. The best solution—whether for a business trip, an office presentation, or a movie—is a portable projector.

With a maximum available screen size of 200 inches and a throw from 1.15 to 6 m, the Leisure 520W portable projector can convert your living room to a home theater.

 

☛ Superior Viewing Experience

Leisure 520W features a native resolution of 720P with brightness of 2400 Lumens, while supporting content in 1280 × 720P resolution. It delivers bright images and vivid colors for superior viewing.

 

☛ Easy Wi-Fi Connection

Get rid of that terrible connection cable! Vankyo Leisure 520W offers an easier way to mirror the screen using wire-free or wired connections. The latest Wi-Fi connection function is compatible with IOS and Android phones. You don't need a conversion cable. With just a one-time Wi-Fi connection, you can easily connect your device to this small Wi-Fi projector whenever you want.

 

☛ Easy Control at Your Fingertips

Intuitive and touch-sensitive, Leisure 520W can be controlled with one finger. Six touch icons around the central touch area makes for easy control of volume, screen dimension, and navigation. You won’t need to interrupt your presentation or your favorite movie to adjust the picture or volume. Too, the Leisure 520W remote allows you to select media, apps, and more with drag-and-click simplicity.

 

 

☛ Versatile Design

The Leisure 520W is compatible with TV sticks, smartphones, tablets, TVs, laptops, USB sticks, TF cards (max 32GB), and DVD players. Plus, for exciting games, it connects easily to your smartphone, PS3, PS4, X-Box ONE, or Wii.

 

 

☛ A Lifetime of Entertainment

Unlike traditional projectors, the Leisure 520W uses a highly efficient LED light source, allowing its projections to stay perfectly crisp, clear, and bright for its entire LED lifespan of 30,000 hours—4 hours of daily viewing for over 20 years!


Why LED Projector

 

☛ Adjust the Image Just as You Like It

Keystone correction makes it easy to project ideally aligned images within ±15° from a variety of angles.

 

☛ Quality Is Our Greatest Concern

Each projector has undergone more than 200+ inspection processes, including heat dissipation, drop, aging, noise tests, and accessory-wire bending. Acquired certifications include PSE, FCC, CE, and ROHS.

 

It is easy to win these FREE Gifts, simply follow the steps and share Vankyo Leisure 520W to your family and friends.

[How to participate​]：

1. Log into your Indiegogo account. 

2. Click the ‘Link’ icon at the top of the campaign page. You will see a popup with your unique link. Copy your unique URL (shown below) and share it to your social media or email your friends, etc

[Note]：

Anyone who has backed Vankyo Leisure 520W campaign can participate in this referral contest.

If the backer cancels their order or requests a refund before delivery, it will be regarded as an invalid order.

Don't forget to share after logging in the Indiegogo account, otherwise it will be regarded as invalid order.

[Rules]:

All refers will be only valid before your package shipped out. We will ship your winning gifts together with your order. After that, your refers will not be counted.

[Some helpful tips to help you win]:

Paste that link to anywhere with large viewership, like your emails, Facebook groups, Linkedin groups, personal blogs, or some forums, anywhere. The more you share, the better chance to win!

Share this pixeled link on some good forum. Many great forums like Reddit, CNET, Engadget forums, etc, if you are playing on those great forums, it is great to share over there.

 

 


 

For over half year we have been working on Vankyo Lesuire 520, which evolved from an idea to the product you see right now. And spent a lot of time on CAD for prototypes. 

Vankyo Leisure 520 have entered the pre-production stage. We honor our brand and also cherish our relationship with the customers and we promise guaranteed delivery as an official team

Unbox Video of Prototype

 

 

Mission

We aim to provide our customers the highest quality products and the most attentive service at the most competitive price.

Our Story

Vankyo, established in 2017, has always been about innovation. As a well-known manufacturer in the field of smart projectors, has gained strong momentum in recent years, earning a high sales ranking in Amazon’s projector category. We always focuses on delivering exciting, fantastic, and immersive visual feasts to viewers worldwide. Innovation lies at the core of our business, and our mission is to empower people to explore and enjoy a better life.

Today, we have developed a variety of visual display products, like projectors and tablets, and built multiple on- and offline channels. We are trusted by tens of millions of customers worldwide, and we're just getting started. As our business continues to evolve and grow, we remain focused on delivering prime products and services to customers across the globe.

For any questions or peoblem, please contact vankyocrowdfuning@gmail.com.

story:
Task Queue

We have already written a blueprint to describe the design of the solution. It will be a replacement for our existing celery_tryton library but deeply integrated in the core of Tryton. Thus it would be used by the standard modules.
But as many other pluggable tools of Tryton, it will be possible to replace the queue by another implementation.

Advantages

  • Available for standard modules
  • Use only PostgreSQL (no extra database)
  • Easy to use inside Tryton modules
  • Fallback in case the back-end is not supported
  • Transactional queue (job starts only when transaction is committed)

Notification

A blueprint exists since some times now. This new feature will allow the user to react quicker to business events because he will be notified in real-time. Also if the user starts a long running task (thanks to the queue), we will be able to notify him directly when the task is finished. From the notification he will be able to see the result. The notification will also be able to warn user about possible future saving conflicts when two users are editing the same record. It will also allow to send message (info, warning or error) when the user is filling a form but before he saves it (from an on_change query).

Advantages

  • Faster notifications (could replace email in many cases)
  • More interactions between the system and the user
  • Prevent issue earlier
  • Feed the user with information at the right time (when filling form instead of saving)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute with money, you can help:

By testing the software and report issues.

Spread the world about this campaign.

Extra Funds

We will spend the extra funds to convert existing modules to use tasks and notifications.

story:
If You Have A Pet, You Must Have Petnutz


                                       Petnutz Demonstration Video

Have you ever thought that your pets may be deprived of their own Social Network? 

We at Petnutz identified the need for a global Pets Social Network that generates all the pets needs and wants ALL IN ONE. We make it easier and accessible to care for your pets; Save time and money; Receive help and support from professionals; Find the best parks and pet boarding in your area; Call out to the closest SOS when a pet is lost; Find a dog walker or sitter near you: Locate the nearest vet in your vicinity or when you are traveling. It's a great way to meet new friends or partners that love pets as much as you. We invite you to create with us a strong stable helpful  local  and global pet-lovers community. 

Petnutz App is a free integrated social network and business platform (one Stop Shop) Mobile Application GPS based  for IOS and Android.

IOS link for IPhone
Android link to Play Store

Petnutz community is a One Stop Shop for all pets needs, services and products, where anyone can open a personal profile for himself and his pets, include medical history file, and share their passion and knowledge with others. Or, open a shop on the Social Map to offer products and services.

Petnutz is a great platform to Chat, Post pictures and videos on the Wall. Group up with old friends and establish new ones. the GPS based social map provides a local interaction with other “PetNutzs” and immediate direct contact with relevant shops, suppliers and services from local to global. Petnutz makes it easy and simple to to take care of all 360º for our pets. 

                                          Petnutz Short Tutorial

Petnutz Menu

Social Map

                             


Petnutz enables you to create your own groups or interact with existing groups for any purpose throughout the whole life cycle of each pet:From searching where to buy or to adopt; Healthcare or breeding; grooming to training; dog walking and sitting; Playmates AND SO MUCH MORE!

On Petnutz WikiPetia you can establish yourself as an expert in the pet community, write articles using your experience and know how, give tips and answer other members of the community questions. Get rated by Readers.


What We Need 

We want your support in order to continue to develop the App and expand the marketing efforts and to create a global pet lovers community. 

We plan to translate the app to more languages as Spanish, French, Chinese, Russian and Japanese.

The Impact

Our vision for the Pet Lovers community is to connect caring and responsible people worldwide. It is an optimal alternative on a positive social network platform

Risks & Challenges

Our main goal and challenge is to reach out to millions of households that care for pets. Therefore  we are very attentive to our community needs. THIS IS OUR CHALLENGE and  THIS IS WHY WE WANT YOUR HELP. 

Help create and support our vision.

Ways You Can Help

The best way you can support us is by downloading Petnutz, connecting your pets and friends,  creating groups for your specific interests and activities while sharing your passion and expertise within the  pet lovers community.

We designed great T-Shirts for you to choose from as a reward for your donations. Every little bit helps.

Some people can't donate, but it doesn't mean they can't contribute. Share with your friends and spread the word  and make some noise about Petnutz.

This will be a great help for our beloved pets, Thank You!

Do you have questions or suggestions? Or if you are a member of the press or blogger that like to write about us and need more info.                             Please contact - udi@petnutzapp.com



Dog T

Cat T

YOU can contact us directly for more designs to choose from in the Gallery.

We at Petnutz identified the need for a global Pets Social Network that generates all the pets needs and wants ALL IN ONE. We make it easier and accessible to care for your pets; Save time and money; Receive help and support from professionals; Find the best parks and pet boarding in your area; Call out to the closest SOS when a pet is lost; Find a dog walker or sitter near you: Locate the nearest vet in your vicinity or when you are traveling. It's a great way to meet new friends or partners that love pets as much as you. We invite you to create with us a strong stable helpful  local  and global pet-lovers community. 
Petnutz App is a free integrated social network and business platform (one Stop Shop) Mobile Application GPS based  for IOS and Android.

IOS link for IPhoneAndroid link to Play Store 




Petnutz community is a One Stop Shop for all pets needs, services and products, where anyone can open a personal profile for himself and his pets, include medical history file, and share their passion and knowledge with others. Or, open a shop on the Social Map to offer products and services.
Petnutz is a great platform to Chat, Post pictures and videos on the Wall. Group up with old friends and establish new ones. the GPS based social map provides a local interaction with other “PetNutzs” and immediate direct contact with relevant shops, suppliers and services from local to global. Petnutz makes it easy and simple to to take care of all 360º for our pets. 
                                          Petnutz Short Tutorial

Petnutz Menu




Social Map


                             


Petnutz enables you to create your own groups or interact with existing groups for any purpose throughout the whole life cycle of each pet:From searching where to buy or to adopt; Healthcare or breeding; grooming to training; dog walking and sitting; Playmates AND SO MUCH MORE!
On Petnutz WikiPetia you can establish yourself as an expert in the pet community, write articles using your experience and know how, give tips and answer other members of the community questions. Get rated by Readers.



What We Need 
We want your support in order to continue to develop the App and expand the marketing efforts and to create a global pet lovers community. 
We plan to translate the app to more languages as Spanish, French, Chinese, Russian and Japanese.
The Impact
 Our vision for the Pet Lovers community is to connect caring and responsible people worldwide. It is an optimal alternative on a positive social network platform
Risks & Challenges


Our main goal and challenge is to reach out to millions of households that care for pets. Therefore  we are very attentive to our community needs. THIS IS OUR CHALLENGE and  THIS IS WHY WE WANT YOUR HELP. 
Help create and support our vision.

    Ways You Can Help
The best way you can support us is by downloading Petnutz, connecting your pets and friends,  creating groups for your specific interests and activities while sharing your passion and expertise within the  pet lovers community. We designed great T-Shirts for you to choose from as a reward for your donations. Every little bit helps.
Some people can't donate, but it doesn't mean they can't contribute. Share with your friends and spread the word  and make some noise about Petnutz.
This will be a great help for our beloved pets, Thank You!
Do you have questions or suggestions? Or if you are a member of the press or blogger that like to write about us and need more info.                             Please contact - udi@petnutzapp.com

Dog T

Cat T
YOU can contact us directly for more designs to choose from in the Gallery.

story:
In the last few months, with the help of people like you, we raised over $10,000 here on Indiegogo. 

We're now proud to introduce our 4th product: The Polar Note.

With aerospace grade aluminum shell and indestructible stone paper, Polar Note is pocketable, 100% eco-friendly, waterproof, and weather-resistant.

Normal notepads easily are wrinkled or damaged. We often end up not capturing the critical information we need in time. It's frustrating to miss that important idea just because your notepad gets damaged, you're missing a pen or you simply don't have time to fish everything out of your bag.

The Polar Note solves all of these problems!

Quick notes: clever and convenient spring loaded open has you writing in no time flat.

Richard Branson, the founder of Virgin Group, has been known to carry a notebook with him everywhere he goes, and credits writing things down as one of his most powerful success habits. He once said: "An idea not written down is an idea lost. When inspiration calls, you've got to capture it."

The benefits of note-taking include the ability to "make better decisions, solve problems, and work more efficiently as a group".

A perfect pocketable size: only 2.9*4.4 inch, it's designed for quick noting and portability.

Totally waterproof: No need to worry about losing your valuable notes. Just dry it and keep writing!

Indestructible and Weather-resistant: The aerospace grade aluminum shell protects your note in any situation. We ran it over with 3 cars on a slushy day. We cleaned it and continued using it! 

Eco-friendly: Stone paper uses no trees! With stone paper, Polar Note is authentically green. Manufactured from calcium carbonate bonded with high-density polyethylene, stone paper is strong and durable. It collects no static charge, is acid-free with a neutral pH, has no grain, is water, grease, and insect resistant, and tears with difficulty due to a latex-like texture. The pulp paper products that we use in our daily life can result deforestation and habitat disaster.

Pledge now and get yours today!

story:
Raring to Go!

I am a Baby Boomer. I hate to say it, but I just don't have the physical strength or range of motion I used to have.
I am "retired" and while working in the garden and around the house I realized I can't do at age 65 what I could do at age 45. Digging holes to plant trees, etc. is pretty much out of the question without some kind of mechanical assistance. Sure there are mini versions of tractors and the like but even those are too large or expensive for most of us.

I Want to design Can-Do-Tools

Can-Do-Tools will help those of us with limited strength or range of motion to be more active and do what we want.
The name of my company will be Jouleup (joule-the unit of power, up-to fill with.)
I will need some tools to be able to design and make the prototypes.
Please help me get the first tool, it is a 5 Head 3D Printer which is coming out as a Kickstarter project. The project is from ORDSolutions.com the picture of the printer shown is from them (used with permission.) Sorry for the poor quality of my picture, I borrowed it from their campaign page and I don't have the software to make it look as good as theirs. The title of this project is 5 Color/Material 3D Filament Printer - Made In Canada. The printer will cost $2314.00 including shipping and some filament. Their campaign is over in a few days, but they have kept the purchase window open until November 30, 2013.
  • Over the years I have picked-up a considerable amount of electronic and mechanical skills. I want to put this knowledge to good use.
  • I want to design what I call Can-Do-Tools that will assist those of us with limited strength and or range of motion to do what we want to do.
  • When these Can-Do-Tools have all the bugs out, I want to get them manufactured and offer them to the public.
What the money will be used for:
  • Purchasing the printer $2314.
  • Stickers, key-chains and other perks $250.
  • Indiegogo and other fees $230.
If the goal is not reached, the money will go towards other tools, software or materials for the same purpose. 

Your donation could potentially make people all over the world with physical limitations, be more active and happy!

Please spread the word of this campaign to your family, friends, neighbors and on social networking.

Thank you!

story:
Thank you for taking interest and visiting our Indiegogo page for eConcierge Marketing Assistant. This is a working title for our project subject to trademark review...there are multiple eConcerge's in the hotel industry and Xerox has one in printing, this is the first one focused on Marketing.

This project is dedicated to all of the motivated, active doers out there – people that are marking it happen, starting an organization or business, or possibly struggling to run one.  There’s a lot to know about online branding, social media, promotional campaigns and events, or whatever else you might need for awareness of your organization or to compete better.

I’m working with my colleagues in marketing and digital media to create an app to solve this problem by providing people free marketing information.  Our team is dedicated to bringing high-level expertise to everyone and simplifying it through a series of clicks: providing answers and access to resources. But we don’t have a budget for this…it’s a new thing we think deserves to come alive and you can join us in making this dream a reality.

A bit more on who we are: I’m a marketing consultant and I got my start in professional media in 1994 when I worked on writing and production of a Warner Brothers DVD title.  Since then, the years have consisted of consulting with various companies in entertainment, technology and health care. During this time, my network of designers and media technologists has grown. This idea all started with a group chat about our clients.  We all noticed that one frustration kept reemerging in this current online era: our non-profits and small to medium business customers were frustrated that they couldn’t afford to stay on top of all the media and marketing changes.

So, we wondered….why do our corporate clients get to jump on every emerging opportunity while other clients struggle?  Each startup or non-profit group we talked to seemed flummoxed whereas the corporate folks could get a new expert for each new thing. The problem was one of scale. A single person or a small operation can’t afford to hire a Social Media Manager…so how could they get the same kind of consulting advice for smaller organizations as well?

Seeking to solve the problem, the idea of eConcierge Marketing Assistant was born.  It’s not fair that only large enterprises can get the expertise they need for new online opportunities.  With so much to sort through, so many challenges to finding answers, people need a helpful tool.

On this note, the eConcierge M.A. app will be available on major phone and pad platforms (iOS, Android) to provide answers to current digital marketing struggles.  Whether you need to create a catchy brand and get it live on the Web for your cause, or to have a better presence on social media, eConcierge will help.

How the app will work: The user experience we’ve designed for the app is a drilldown approach.  For example, you’ll first select a broad information category like Social Media, this click will present you some choices like: Selecting best ones for your needs; Creating content plans; or How to easily manage your media.  This will give you more specific areas to learn about, like product or service oriented social media – Pinterest for example, is better for products than services.  From these final clicks, you’ll get a HOW TO page that provides: An overview of how to do it best, recommended steps to go through, and resources which will include a mixture of recommended service companies, online references, and keywords to use for more information. 

The budget breakdown:

$5,000 – Registering trademark, legal, creating related Web site
$15,000 – User interface design and app coding, content database development
$5,000 – Media buy to promote the app and get feedback for improvements

Total $25,000

If we exceed this goal, we will put more money into additional features and broader media buys to get the word out to even more people.

Get involved!: We’re excited to take our categorized and growing library of reference information with fresh techniques and info from our combined years of marketing and media consulting experience and get it out to everybody as a user-friendly tool!  The app will have a wealth of information on dozens of current subjects, get updated frequently, and provide actual steps to take for success.

To get the app created, we are giving this project until February 28th to hit its funding goal and then we’ll start designing, programming and promoting it.  With your support, eConciergeMA will be available for download in the Spring.  As we manage the software design and development process, we will also create a Web page with a portion of the funds to continue to update our contributors about progress.

Thank you for your interest and support of this new app project. It will enable so many.

story: .

Sounds fab, now what's in it for me...

Shift is an internship programme; bridging the gap between college and gaining a job in the creative industry.

Our not for profit agency is real and the briefs the interns are working on are real, no one is just here to make the tea, everyone is ;). This is a real opportunity for all disciplines to gain experience, we are putting togerther in one place disciplines from many different backgrounds to learn how to work together and collaborate. Any intern will learn new ways of thinking and new methods cross-discipline collaboration that will better prepare them for the future.

We've already had success working on client briefs and with some of our interns already have gone on to new careers. We are always on the look out for the next collaborator, whether it be an art director, copywriter, illustrator, product designer, producers, animator, doer.

We want to share Shift and this new way of thinking with you in an awesome showcase party event planned for the 26th October. One of our discounted early bird tickets are available to your right :)

What should you expect...

ALL INCLUDED IN THE TICKET PRICE

The planned line up for the day is as follows:

2pm - 3pm - Arrival and walk around Shift showcase exhibition (Northern Design Centre, See Gallery above). 

3pm - 4:30pm - Main stage and guest speakers - Gabrielle Omar from The Apprentice, will talk about her collaborative experience with her own creative company www.lolliandsquare.com, not to mention her time collaborating on The Apprentice. (keep checking for more announcements).

4:30pm - 4:50pm - Food and refreshments. “You cannot do anything until you’ve finished your tea”.

5pm - 6.30pm – Workshop section where participants will collaborate together to progress from the initial concept stage to defining an idea, right the way through to the final pitch. At each stage we will be using both methods that work and some madness, from rap battling to thought showers (we call it the Method and the Madness). With a view of defining new ways of thinking and taking creativity forward.

7pm - 8pm –After Party arrival for drinks and giggles (St. Marys Church, Gateshead, See Gallery above)

For those who can't attend we will be producing the first edition of 'white paper' (See Gallery above) a must have publication documenting our early trails, tribulations and triumphs. Accompanying that will be a DVD featuring our findings, exclusive interviews, coverage of our event and much more.

All you have to do to show your support is treat yourself to one of our perks! >>>

Please Note: We'll be updating this page regularly with more information on our perks, so keep popping back.

Right, so who's behind it...

Shift was founded by Nick Johnson, MD of creative agency, Studio Precept. Driven by a niggling urge to take projects beyond the brief, not to do things right, but to do the right thing. Alongside Nick you'll find co-founder and Shift Studio Manager Andrew Kilburn and studio's current interns, which are anything from 10-20 at any one time.


Great, so where will the money go...

The $15,000 (or whatever we raise) will help make goes back into the internship programme and our vision for the 'Taking Creativity Forward' event a reality and allow us to produce and amazing publication in our first edition of 'white paper'.


Finally, what does the future hold for Shift...

As well as an innovation lab Shift is available to clients and brands just like any other agency; however, they will be getting something completely new and often unexpected - and because it's ran by interns it's really cost effective too.

We have already had success working on rebrand projects and viral campaigns, get involved, do your bit to support new thinking and for the future of the creative industries - help us take creativity forward.

If the perks don't work for you then contact andy(at)studioprecept.co.uk to offer alternative forms of support. Every little counts and a 'Good Luck' message will go a long way.

Thanks for reading, pretty please share this link at the top of the page.

Kind Regards - The Shift team :)

story:
The Folded Leaf, is an online store based in Germany, that specialises in importing high quality fine-art and lifestyle magazines. We especially want to help small yet passionate magazine companies to see their publications reach the European market, and create a simple, collaborative and communicative online space to advertise them. In specialising in independent creative magazines that feature handmade culture, photography, art and stories, our website allows our customers to explore and discover new publications with complementary content and style.

Right now, it’s extremely costly, difficult and sometimes not even possible for Europeans to buy fine-art magazines from overseas. There are many creative people who are living in Europe who would benefit from being able to access these publications, which are not usually media-based or nationally-exclusive in their content and therefore just as relevant in Europe as they would be anywhere else. 

We provide a fast and easy way for customers to buy magazines, and we provide magazines with a valuable stockist connection in Europe.


www.hearthmagazine.com - www.readcereal.com -  www.puregreenmag.com

 www.chickpeamagazine.com - www.wolftree.co - www.ohcomely.co.uk

www.taprootmag.com - www.holeandcornermagazine.com 

... and more! We're adding to this list every day. If there's a fine-art or lifestyle magazine you'd love to have, and it's not already on this list, please email your suggestion to info@the-folded-leaf.com

We really need your help to start up our company! All money raised from this campaign will go towards purchasing our first bulk shipments of magazines, and covering our packaging and postage costs. By contributing, not only will you be rewarded accordingly; you'll also help to ensure the foundation of our company, so that these magazines will be easily accessible for you in the future. Even if you can't pledge, it would be very much appreciated if you could share our campaign with your friends - on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Google+ and by talking about us to your friends. The more people that hear about The Folded Leaf, the better!

Update: Our website has gone live!  You can go have a look around www.the-folded-leaf.com, create an account and start adding stuff to your wish list. We're still adding functions, so we'll keep you updated! After the indiegogo campaign has finished and we've received our first shipments, you'll be able to make purchases using the site.

We're adding to this list every day. If there's a fine-art or lifestyle magazine you'd love to have, and it's not already on this list, please email your suggestion to info@the-folded-leaf.comWe really need your help to start up our company! All money raised from this campaign will go towards purchasing our first bulk shipments of magazines, and covering our packaging and postage costs. By contributing, not only will you be rewarded accordingly; you'll also help to ensure the foundation of our company, so that these magazines will be easily accessible for you in the future. Even if you can't pledge, it would be very much appreciated if you could share our campaign with your friends - on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Google+ and by talking about us to your friends. The more people that hear about The Folded Leaf, the better!Update: Our website has gone live!  You can go have a look around www.the-folded-leaf.com, create an account and start adding stuff to your wish list. We're still adding functions, so we'll keep you updated! After the indiegogo campaign has finished and we've received our first shipments, you'll be able to make purchases using the site.

story:
Hello Indiegogo! Let's get acquainted.

My name is Katerina Grishina and I'm the founder of CODA, a workshop of handmade goods. 

CODA - is a small workshop where I'm working on the creation of goods with my hands and soul. My goal is to turn my small workshop into a full design studio. Your support would help me to make steps forward to this goal. A successful campaign would allow me to get more professional equipment and to make everything much faster with greater quality and to expand my product line. 

With more than 2 years of experience in handcrafting of notebooks and leather goods I decided to create simply, elegant and genteel notebooks that would serve you as long as you want.  

CODA notebook consist of a leather cover and inner replaceable notebook. So that how you can use it almost forever.

Each one is closing on a strap that would keep your thoughts safely and tight. Also there are pockets where you can carry  useful items such as credit cards, documents, tickets, small papers and any other documents that you usually need.

Handcrafted of waxed genuine leather that shows up on itself all the scrubs with time creating a unique and inimitable character of its owner.

 

 You can choose between large "CODA L" and pocket size "CODA S"

 

CODA L NOTEBOOK is 5.7''x8.6'' (145mm x 220mm) size cover that fits notebook with 90 sheets of usual size (5''x8.4'' / 130mm x 210mm) which is most of manufacturers make or you can order 2 extra notebooks from CODA. It has got 1 pocket and 1 slot for your cards, 1 pocket that fits passport and 1 big compartment that carry the notebook and can fit tickets or other documents and papers that you need.  

This notebook is made for dreamers, travelers and creators who's thoughts are searching ways of expression. It would be perfect for your business or study, for plans, memories and artworks.

You can use CODA L NOTEBOOK as a complete travel book

 

 

CODA L NOTEBOOK with 2 extra notebooks

 

CODA  NOTEBOOK is 4''x6'' (100mm x 150mm) size cover that fits notebook with 50 sheets of usual size (3.5''x5.5'' / 90mm x 140mm) which is most of manufacturers make or you can order 2 extra notebooks from CODA.
It has got one small pocket for your cards and small papers and one main compartment for the notebook that can also fit passport or some cash. 

This notebook would help you with your casual lists, plans, thoughts for the future or everyday sketches. You won't forget to take it anywhere because it comfortable fits in your back pocket. 

Opened CODA S NOTEBOOK

Opened CODA S NOTEBOOK in cognac leather fits passport and cards

CODA S NOTEBOOK fits in your back pocket​

 

You can choose each notebook from 3 colors: black, brown and cognac.

 

Available colors

 

 

 

Shipping details

After the Kickstarter campaign, a survey will be sent where you will be able to provide your mailing address and . The first Early Birds will be mailed after 2 weeks when the campaign will be ended. International shipping takes from 2,5 - 3 weeks to the US and Canada, near 4 weeks to Australia and from 2 weeks to Europe. Other countries - about 3-4 weeks.

 

Something that we can be proud of

Few of our last month responses from the previous campaign


 

Risks and challenges

With years of experience in handcrafting I am confident in my abilities and capacities in making everything highly qualified and ship everything in time. 
If the pledges would be more than the funding goal I've got a team that is very professional in this area that would help me to finish and deliver all in time. 
Some challenges cannot be predicted, so I have created some back-ups for every step of production and distribution.

Your truly all in work ;)

story:
Too much time we spend on household

The modern life is too dynamic, everything we are trying to do is to make more things in a shorter period of time, we are trying to squeeze the time.

We do more and more routine tasks and leave no time for creation/ art/ rest/ outdoor.

If you are young mother and want to devote all your time to your baby - you have less time to clean you home... If your kids are 3-5 years old - you spend HOURS of your time just picking up toys from the floor...

We are trying to get this time by investing in accommodations like robotic vacuum cleaners, laundry machines, different electronic gadgets.

We use plenty of tools to speed up our life but as a result - we do not gain much time using them.

What could be a real solution is an autonomous household robot, which could do the most of cleaning tasks, and not only cleaning the floor, but also put things on its places, remove dust from shelves, watch your house, reheat food, feed pets, water plants and so on...

I would buy such robot, but there are two problems:

First, such robots ARE NOT AFFORDABLE or NOT AVAILABLE yet! For instance, there is no retail price for ASIMO. Robot Romeo is not for sale yet. Pepper robot is for sale for about $2000 but it's more talking toy than household robot. It's not designed for durable household tasks.

OK, let's me to make robot from kit. And here is the second problem:

 Do such kits exist? The answer is NO.

It means that there is NO ROBOT KIT available yet...

Because every serious company is doing only military or rescue robots.

There is one company which did arms mimicking the moves of chief cook and they sell it for $15000... But it's just cooking, what about other tasks?

Well... What I could do about it?

  •  I can sit and wait until somebody creates a household robot and put it on the market. It can take 1-5 years before it happens. Even after this happens the price of robot might be too high.
OR

  • I can design my own robot for all tasks and make a company to produce robot kits. In this case I'll get what I want much sooner and it will permits to free me and my family a lot of time. 
Really, YOUR FREE TIME is PRICELESS...

Of cause I can't propose robot kits now, I'm not there yet, but having one working prototype I can go the next step by starting the campaign to build robot kits for people who would like to build similar robot from kit.


Short Summary

I'm a professional Embedded Software Developer, with background in Physics and I also have good experience in electronics and mechanical design.

My main goal is to give people the opportunity to get a personal autonomous robot, which could be useful for everyday household tasks.

I have been already working on this project for about 3 years on my own in my free time, but I would like to speed up the development and share my blueprints and detailed assembly instructions with anyone who is willing to build such a robot for him(her)self.

Your contribution is very important for me because it could make a huge impact on the future of robotics, people's education in robotics and it will make possible to get an affordable household robot for curious people.

(Preliminary design, actuators are not shown)

What We Need & What You Get

Since I have been already working on this project for 3 years - it's my main hobby project during this time, I devote almost all my free time to it. It is about 20 hours a week. 

I also work full time as an Embedded Software Developer and it slows down the constrution of the robot. 

If I could work on the robot full time, it would speed up the development about 3 times. In order to be able to leave my job and work on robot project I need your help.

So, 70% of the money you contribute will mainly go to my salary for 1 year. I've already spent about $3000 for the robot, and I need about $2000 for the remaining materials and electronic components. 

I'm trying to keep Bill of Materials for the robot below $5000 to make it affordable for many people. All materials I use could be bought in local hardware stores or got from internet stores. No fancy materials are used. The mechanical and circuits design is mostly done, but some parts might need rework and/or optimization.

In case I get funds, my friend (who is working as a full time software developer) agreed to help me to speed up software development for the robot. It can take about 20% of total amount.

About 5% of the money will go to my other friend (who is a technical writer) to review and fix the final version of the assembly instruction manual.

Unfortunately, I can't deliver a robot to everyone because I don't have such facilities to produce kits, but I can create detailed step-by-step instructions and provide all CAD, STL, and circuits files for everyone, as a single piece or in parts.

The full assembly instruction will have about 1000 pages. It will be split into chapters. Each chapter will refer to a specific part of the robot: eyes, head, torso, arms, bottom and hips, wheeled platform.

Even if you don't have enough of money and patience to make full robot you can get the necessary part of manual and use it for you own project.

  • $5: If you are curious about this project but not able to build this robot,  you'll receive the latest updates by email.
  • $25: Wheeled base assembly instruction manual. The wheeled platform itself could be an autonomous robot, suitable for some transportation tasks and also for different experiments with robots. Corresponding STL, CAD, electric circuits for the wheeled base are included.
  • $50: Eyes assembly manual. All plans, CAD, electric schematic for eyes are included.
  • $50: Arm assembly instructions + arm files.
  • $50: Bottom and hips assembly + bottom part files.
  • $100: Full assembly instructions + all design files.

If I don't reach my entire goal I will still be working on this project on my own.

  1. If I collect form $0 to $20000 I would buy the remaining materials and spend the rest of money for software development with my programmer friend. An estimate for the project duration is about 3 years in this case.
  2. If I collect from $20000 to $60000 I would finish prototype, write detailed assembly instructions and continue to design software with my friends in my free time. The time needed to finish the project is about 2 years for this situation.
  3. If I collect from $60000 to $100000 I will leave my permanent job and work full time on the robot project, according to the plan. The estimate of delivery time is about 1+ year.
If I reach or go over my full goal:
  1. In case I collect from $100000 to $150000 I will make video tutorial for the assembly of this robot.
  2. If I collect more than $150000 I'll think about organizing small company for producing kits for this robot.
  3. If I collect more that $200000 I'll surely start the company to produce robot kits. 

The Impact

I'm following the development of robotics in the world for a prolonged period of time and I must admit that I'm not satisfied with what I see. A large amount of robot kits is oriented for kids and school boys/girls with a single goal of education.

On the other hand we have big companies developing finished products that are not affordable for the majority of people.

The only useful robots we have today are robotic vacuum cleaners and lawn mowers.

The robotics labs which create full scale humanoid robots (like Buster, Justin, ASIMO, etc) are still under research and improvement, and they are not oriented to assist you at home or not affordable.

Observing this situation - I realized that all interesting things can pass aside me, and my dream to have a personal robot assistant might never come true unless I design and build my own robot.

I have good experience in the construction of various mechanical things because I started from young age. My father permitted me to repair his motorbike and his car when I was 13-16 years old. At the age of 18 I'd build the walk-behind tractor with 13 h.p. motorcycle engine. I had designed and assembled a gearbox for it to have a reverse shift. Two years later my father and I had built a small tractor with 75h.p. car engine.

I have also started to work as Embedded software developer and since 2006 I mainly work in this area. I was quite good in analogue electronics since childhood, and after I had started to work as an embedded developer I've acquired some valuable experience in digital electronics.

In 2011 I started building a CNC mill of my own design and finished it in 2012. Two years later I had assembled Rostok Max 3D printer from the kit. Since then I have started to use CAD tools systematically, to print parts on my 3D printer.

Around that time the idea of household robot came to my mind. I'm convinced that my experience, skills and knowledge are enough to design and assemble a complex enough robot.

The purpose of this robot is to perform functions of a "mobile intelligent house". To achieve this two conditions are needed: good 3D vision and dexterous human-like arms.

I designed both.


Eyes have proven design and works fine. Video and still frames could be taken from both eyes and processed. Eyes have the sensors of position with a precision of 0.1 degree. 

Another complex thing was the arm. I didn't find an arm with a good design and robustness on the internet. Some of them are good, but not good enough. I have designed a robotic arm which is driven by 24 motors and is able reproduce the majority of human motions.


All other parts of robot are not so sophisticated and could be completed in different ways.

To build it you will need to:

  • Be able to work with hand tools and soldering iron.
  • Have access to a 3D printer and a (CNC) mill.
  • Have spare $5000 for materials and electronics. (instruments price not included)
  • Have a robot assembly manual (from me)
  • Have plenty of free time. 

You'll get a real opportunity to build your own human-like robot, which you would be able to program as you wish.

The complexity and dexterity of this robot is higher than any existing commercial humanoid robot in the world! 

After you complete it you'll be able to maintain or even improve it, thanks to a modular design.

You will learn deeply all aspects of creating complex robotics system and it most probably will define your future employment or business.

This system has a big potential for programmers, as they could design their own software - all the information will be open and available.

I'm pretty sure that Chinese industry will start to make the kits based on these drawings which would also speed up the penetration of robots into masses and increase their affordability.

It might make huge impact on our lives in the nearest 5-10 years.


Risks & Challenges

There are couple of challenges in this project.

The main challenge of this project is software. Mainly it will be the computer vision and correlated hands motion. As far as I know, this problem has already been solved many times by other people and there are a lot of inverse kinematic libraries. I don't see any crucial obstacles on this way.

Another challenge is voice command recognition. This problem was also solved by many robot designers and there exists a lot of examples on the internet (Inmoov, Loki, etc)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are interested in speeding up the spread of robotics among the masses - please share this campaign.

Thanks a lot for your interest and contribution!
