story:
Hey Indiegogo!

We are Flujo, and we are in the business of making innovative electronics. This is our 2nd campaign on Indiegogo, and we are excited to bring you the newest addition to our home workspace gadgetry - The PowerEdge. 

Thank you all for your continued support! 

 

 

 

 

Not Your Average Monitor Stand

 

The Flujo PowerEdge is currently the World’s First Monitor Stand with Modular USB-C Multifunction Docking Station.

Are you worried that the computer accessories you buy for your work-from-home arrangements become white elephants once the COVID-19 blows over? This is where the PowerEdge comes in. It is engineered for modern people who don't only work at home, but also have to zip around town with their laptops. 

No matter where you are, the PowerEdge is designed to suit the new normal, to keep you productive and your cables neatly in place, whilst providing extra connectivity to your computer.  It is your monitor or laptop's new companion.

 

 

 

Who is the PowerEdge for?

The PowerEdge is built for anyone, really. Students, professionals, videomakers, businessmen - literally anyone in the digital world that owns a workspace.

 

 

Although working from home slated to become the new normal, not everyone is equipped to work productively from home. This makes us tempted to buy new computer accessories as a panacea to our home workspace problems, but fear that they become useless after normality resumes. The PowerEdge addresses this, by creating incorporating a modular hub with the monitor stand.  

 

 

The PowerEdge Hub is also the dongle hack that helps keep your workspace organized on what's important and boost your productivity at work. It can not only be used at home but also in your office. It combines all the essential ports that you need (and lack) for the latest Mac devices.   

 

We pit the PowerEdge against existing monitor stands out there. From the available ports, to warranty provided, all the way to the price of PowerEdge, PowerEdge triumph champion.

 

 

The PowerEdge packs innovation and functionality. All you need in a work-desk AND MORE - PowerEdge covers you left, right, centre.

 

 

Low screen position of monitors and laptops forces us to adopt awkward postures, and yet we still wonder how'd we get all those backaches and hunchbacks.

 

Gone are the days of using books and piles of paper. Elevate your screen to eye-level for a healthy and comfortable viewing experience. It is scientifically proven to ease the strain on your eyes and neck with a parallel eye-view. In addition, the added space below allows you to stow away your keyboard and mouse for tidier desktop space. It also provides ventilation for your monitor, laptop, printer, or TV screen to cool down.

 

    

 

Most importantly, it looks much better than a stack of books!

 

What's special about the PowerEdge is its modular grab-and-go design. On its own, the PowerEdge Adaptor Hub is a 10-in-1 that offers multifunctional uses. Slide the Hub off the rack system and now you have a portable adaptor hub to use on-the-go. Perfect for traveling once normal life resumes.

Attaching and detaching the Hub is very simple. Simply pull the hooks upwards and outwards and slot the Hub one side at a time. Release the hooks into the side of the Hub until you hear a 'click' sound. Ensure the Hub is nicely fitted and voila~   

 

 

Our cables are often in a disarray, cluttering our desks, and our laptops and monitors lack the ports that we need for maximum productivity mode.   The PowerEdge keeps your cables neatly in place and keeps you looking sharp and smart.

 

 

 

From our previous campaign with the Signature Pro, we have received lots of feedback on the types of ports that you would like to see in your Flujo device. Hence, we have made a number of new additions in the new PowerEdge!

 

Output:

  • HDMI Version 2.0: 4K@30Hz
  • SD/TF: SD/Micro SD (Up to 104Mbps）
  • USB-A: USB 3.0 × 2 (Up to 5Gbps）
  • USB-C: Power Delivery of 60W Max
  • Audio: 3.5mm
  • RJ45: 10/100/1000Mbps
  • VGA: 1080P

 

Input:

USB-C (Bus Power)

 

Enclosure Material:

Aluminium + ABS

 

Colour:

Silver

 

Power Delivery to your devices

 

Supports 4K HDMI Output

View your laptop on a wide monitor screen, for an optimal working, gaming, or Netflix-ing experience.  

 

Stable Internet Connection

Whether you are in an important zoom meeting or in the middle of an epic boss fight, our Ethernet (RJ45) will not let you down. No more embarrassing disconnections.   

 

SD/MicroSD card readers for easy access to photos on-the-go

With a reading speed as fast as up to 5Gbps, drag and drop photos instantly from your SD/MicroSD card to your devices in a matter of seconds. 

 

Access external drives with USB 3.0

With 2 USB 3.1 ports, you can easily connect your USB devices to your monitor. Transfer data quickly between your computer and external hard drive, smartphone, tablet, or camera at speeds of up to 5 Gbps.  

 

Audio

Use the Audio port to connect your earpiece or headphones to your computer. No matter whether you are home or in a cafe, you will be able to listen to your favorite music or hear your boss's voice during your online meetings. 

 

VGA

Own an older model monitor? No worries, because the PowerEdge is equipped with a VGA display port. You may also hook up the PowerEdge to a projector for a lit viewing experience. 

 

 

One thing for sure - affordability. Despite the various ports that were expensive to integrate, added with the sturdy monitor stand base, we want to keep the Flujo PowerEdge affordable to you. Our Indiegogo tier pricing is exclusive to our backers that support our campaign from Day 1.  

 

 

In the PowerEdge bundle, you will receive the following stuff. Rest assured it will be well-packed with bubble wrap, styrofoam, black foam, scotch tape, plastic wrap, and every protective material we can think of, to secure the package safely.

 

The PowerEdge in the Making

The PowerEdge went through many months of design iterations. Dimensions, material, weight, and available ports were all taken into account to produce an ergonomically useful product that we believe you will love. 

 

 

After the campaign ends, mass production will begin immediately until November. The PowerEdge will reach your doorsteps around December to January, just in time for the end of year festivities. Save all the time thinking about Christmas gifts, because you can get one today as a gift for your techy cousins or relatives who are coming home for the holidays. 

 

Things to note about Shipping

  • Please please please x100000 please reply to the survey address promptly when the campaign ends; we will give up to 3 reminders. In the event of no response, we would ask that delivery time will be longer after batch shipment is sent out
  • Due to the size of the shipment and the current COVID-19 situation, we are not able to provide free shipping
  • Please refrain from providing 95-999, 966-969, 962-965, 006-009, and APO/FPO PO address - we are not able to ship to these addresses
  • For Taiwan and Hong Kong orders, do include your ID or passport number in the survey submission
  • In the event of returned shipment after the unit has been sent out, we ask that you bear the shipping cost for resending 

 

 

 

Sufficiently rested from our previous campaign (the Signature Pro, remember?), we are back with even more gusto. The Flujo team has expanded to a highly capable team of Singaporeans with multidisciplinary skillsets. We are based in Singapore, Shenzhen, Hong Kong, and Australia and have the machinery that has serviced big names like Apple, Foxconn, Huawei, and Samsung.  Prior to the Signature Pro and PowerEdge, Flujo has developed a range of electronics that have received a great response. Now, with the PowerEdge, join us on our journey as we contribute our part in developing a new range of innovative products to be enjoyed by today's tech-savvy society!

 

Join Our Community

 Stay in touch with us for first-hand information about new events & products.    

 

Thank youuuuu <3

A million thank yous for supporting our Indiegogo campaign! Like the Signature Pro, we treasure every single one of your pledges and we will do our utmost to ensure that the PowerEdge reaches your hand in tip-top condition.

story:
Our Story

PetDocNow is a dream that has finally come to fruition. We still need your help and that is why we are here.My team and I have been working day and night to develop a site, PetDocNow.com, in which pet owners all over the country will be more accesible to their veterinarians. We treat our pet's as family and therefore we need to ensure the health of our furry friends. The site will feature veterinarians all over the country showing their location, educational credentials, hours of operations and honors received. The problem is that there is no easy access to veterinarians today. Waiting on hold is the "old fashioned" way of getting things done. When our pets are sick we can't wait 2-5 days and they of course can't take themselves. So this project has been a sincere passion for my team members and I to make vet care more accessible to pet owners and making our pets healthier one click at a time.


The Impact

In recent study done by Bayer Health Care it stressed the need for an online scheduling tool for veterinarians. In our busy lives we don't have the time anymore to make a phone call even as simple as it may seem. The trend in today's day in age is that people no longer need to call for a dinner reservation, no longer need to call to schedule a doctors appointment, book a flight, hotel, or no longer need to wait in line to buy certain things. The internet is changing the way people interact with one another everyday. Pet owners will now get to make informed decisions as to what veterinarian to take there pet to. They will also be able to see what other people say through reviews and also give their own feedback. If we don't get the pledges we need we will continue to strive to get this project up and running. Our pets need us and so do many other people who have animals. "Passion does not stop because of a simple word, no"!


What We Need & What You Get

In order to get this project going we need to raise $25,0000 for the site to be built. Friends and family are doing their part to help as the project costs much more. We are right on schedule but need your help to finish this project and help pet owners all over the country. Help us fight the fight to ensure that all of our pet's are not only healthy but live a long life!



Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help us by following us on twitter @petdocnow or visiting our site to make a pledge that way. The best way you can help is by helping our pets stay healthy by spreading the word about what we are doing. 

Thank you in advance and we will update all of our pledgers as the project unfolds!

story:
OUR GOAL

After many years working with the BlackBerry Enterprise Server, we threw in need of an environment in which the IM infrastructure really belonged to the wearer , whether an organization with hundreds of users, a law firm or just a group of individuals .

Also it was not just the fact that communications go through a server but these had to be really sensitive. It is a fact that BlackBerry Enterprise Server could facilitate archiving of chats between employees and this could generate distrust management level or any of the users of both the IT staff that managed as of the company offering the IT service monitoring and maintenance.

This must to change and the solution it's SS-TALK


Key features SS-Talk Others
Your talks just go through your server
 Yes No
You can manage the users Yes No
You can establish additional encryption password for each chat Yes No
Your talks never can be intercepted Yes No
You can set preferences so that when you finish the conversation, it is also deleted on the device of your interlocutor.  Yes No
The server does not store any data. It doesn't send information that is not encrypted Yes No

MUST INCLUDE

- That communication is transmitted only by the server that the client earmarked for SS -Talk and use asymmetric cryptography for transport.

- The system installed in the server must not be complex or cumbersome , but had to allow the customer to deploy either a VPS or your own server anywhere in the world in a few steps .

- Had to providing security to all users who will use , thus the system administrator ( sysadmin ) may not ever see the messages that users send.

- The confidentiality had to be accompanied by the simplicity of its management. That is, to create and easily manage users for each organization were required to have the system.

Other Key features:

- The user 'Bob' when you start a chat with the contact - named for example 'Mike' , you can set a key that both have agreed previously. When Mike receives a request to start a conversation with Bob introduces the key has been agreed. Messages are encoded in addition between the two devices with this key is impossible for a third party interception of messages even knew the public and private keys to Mike and Bob.

- It gives the user the option to use the same key to start again a chat with the same user so that security is not an impediment to functionality. Although of course you can agree new daily keys for the start of each new chat.

-When adding a contact, thanks to the request of the key at the beginning of each new chat, you avoid the possibility of identity theft occurs. Although this is destined to be valued corporate environments where security much more than comfort. For this reason non-professional environments that the option once put the key to start the new chat and never ask for it again. Giving this feature great flexibility for both the general public as the most demanding corporate environments can modify safety standards as required.

- If one of the two users do not activate the checkbox 'Allow archive of conversations' to start the chat, the conversation will be deleted out of it on both devices automatically.

- You can set a security system in addition to the device by creating a PIN for the start of the application.

- Besides the internal security system SS-Talk, the active conversations, pictures and other stuff are saved using the API's for the iOS and Android systems in encrypted form on the device.

We are committed

We finally provide a solution that allows us to talk privately so as not to be afraid to express ourselves freely for fear that someone is reading our conversations.

Questions? Let's do it.

(You can visit http://www.ss-talk.com for further information)

Thanks for trusting us

story:
Do you remember the last time you hooked up with someone? Do you know where the nearest testing center is, and if you should get tested? How do you properly protect yourself from sexually tranmitted diseases if you're sexually active?

For the last two years I've been collecting ideas for an iPhone app to answer all these questions. Well, I finally got tired of asking questions. It's time to make a solution.

What is TrickTrackr and Why Might I Use it?

TrickTrackr is an app that I've been creating in my spare time to help you keep track of your romantic or intimate social life. If you're like me, you probably don't have a calendar event created on your iPhone for those times you might have gone too far on a date, or even just went on a date. I can't remember what I ate for breakfast last week, let alone the day I dated so and so, what we did, or how far we went.

That's where TrickTrackr comes in. With this app you can quickly log a trick and go back to what you were doing. Or, if you had a really good date you can be more specific. At this point, you might be thinking, "I never hook-up. I don't even really date, so why would I use this app?". Good question! Here's where TrickTrackr is different from your other apps that you might consider using.

The Problem

Our app isn't just a little black book where you store your conquests, in fact, it's focus is quite the opposite. Did you know that the US is on the top ten list of nations with people living with HIV AIDS? (http://www.indexmundi.com/g/r.aspx?t=100&v=35 ) Most of us probably had to go to a "Health Class" in high school where they taught us the birds and the bees. If your school was like mine, they didn't really cover that much except "abstinence before marriage". While that's a great goal, most of us don't really work like that.

The fact of the matter is, that "More than half of all people will have an STD/STI at some point in their lifetime" . (http://www.ashastd.org/std-sti/std-statistics.html ) If you or a friend needed to be responsible and went to your local AIDS Foundation group today to get tested for HIV, they would inform you that the test is only 99% conclusive if you've been abstinent for 6 months. It is our goal to help our users stay educated about safe and responsible ways to connect with each other, and how to manage their risks if they have intimate relations which might have exposed them to any possible sexually transmitted infection.

The Solution

TrickTrackr is first and foremost an answer to a need in the adult community. We believe that it is the obligation of responsible adults to keep inventory of their possible exposures to any sexually transmitted infection in order to properly limit their transmission to others. It is because of this belief that we commit to providing our service for free to anyone in the world regardless of sex, religion, orientation or country. Everyone deserves the opportunity to use TrickTrackr. The basic version will always be free.

How it Works

Here's the main screen

Once you have a profile setup you can start tracking your dates. Then just click on the "Trick" button and you can add as little or as much information as you want, press Save, and you're done.

This is just a sample. This screen will change slighty in the final draft

The sample screen shows you what it would look like if you left all the default options blank. If all you wanted to do was to track that you had a date with someone, then you click Save and you're done. This would be a total of two clicks, so even someone on the go can get back to it later.

You can use the "Track" button to see your dates, how many people you've dated, and when you were with them. The "Test" button will help you find a community center where you can get tested, or allow you to log the results of your test.

We plan to add a "Tips" button to help users educate themselves using quizzes and other informational documentation.

Why I Need Your Help

I've taken some time already to talk to the community in small focus groups to get a sense of what people would want from this program. It's become very clear that there is a demand for this kind of project, but more importantly, people need this kind of application. The longer we wait to get this started, the more people will be in the dark about the risks they are exposing themselves to, and the community will have to resort to using applications which glorify conquests, instead of encouraging responsible actions. It's become clear to me, that our community needs this program now, and I shouldn't delay any longer.

I'd like to ask for your help with funding so I can finish the application by programming it on a full-time basis, instead of when I can get around to it. By using a project planner I've been able to estimate that the basic version would require at least a month (probably more) of my full time attention to get it working the way it should. I'd like more time to perfect it and add all the features that everyone has asked for, but that can't happen until the first basic version is released.

What Are The Funds For?

Most of the funds I'm asking for is to pay the developer, that's me, to be able to work on this full time. I'm only asking for $1800, however, $3200 is a more realistic number if I truly wanted to get a well planned, solidly put together app released in a month. But kickstarter is a place where you ask for a minimum of funding needed, so for now, I'm crossing my fingers that we can get $1800.

We need to pay for focus group meetings, testers, artists, licensing, registrations, marketers, materials, and probably much much more. If we can get $6000, that would set us up long enough that we could execute a plan to make a paid version that would let this grass roots project become self sustaining.

Perks

This is a community project and nothing would make me happier then a group of people anxiously waiting for the app and giving me their feedback on what they think of it. Because it's meant to serve the community I want to make sure that the perks you would get for helping out would actually be interesting to you.

If there's something you want to see as a perk, tell me and I'll find a way to add it!

Here's a link about the book the $100 pledge gets you:

http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/10/24/jacques-pepin-the-origin-of-aids-hiv-_n_1029424.html

FAQ

  • What about privacy? I don't want you selling my information?

The app works off a local database on your phone, so there's no connection to any kind of server that stores your data. The information that you enter could possibly be of future interest to people working in the health industry to find out what people do and how to prevent further spread of disease. However, it would be a long time before I could even consider collecting that data.

Nevertheless, I will never pull any personal data from your app. I have no interest in your contacts and selling that would make me look bad and go against my professional and personal ethics. If I ever do release data collected from your use of the app, I would only collect data on your dating habits, not who you are, how to contact you, or anything of the like.

  • What about security? What prevents someone from stealing all my contacts?

The very first version of TrickTracker will be free and have no log in security. The main reason for this is because I want there to be a measurable difference between the paid version and the free version. Nevertheless, I want people to always have the option to benefit from this app even if they don't pay for it.

If the app becomes well used and further funds come in, then I can upgrade both the paid and the free version with greater security and more features. But for now, the only thing stopping someone from stealing your contacts from the locally stored database is you. You will hold the same responsibility of protecting your TrickTracker contacts that you have protecting your iPhone contacts. Lock your phone.

  • Is this just for the gay community or straight community? Who can use it?

The app is for anyone and everyone. However, I will be marketing the app solely through the gay community at first. The needs of the gay community are what first drove me to create this app and it's a community that I have connections with. I know how to market it there. However, the app is not exclusively built for the gay community. I have many straight friends who are excited to use this app, and we will have options to work their your specific orientation.

  • What's with the name?

In the two years I've been planning for this app I've gone through many different names. This is just the latest one I've settled on. Once we have about a hundred or more people we can start polling for a new name and have the community decide on the official name of the app. Once that is done I'll be renaming all social media and legal documentation to match it.
story_txt:
Do you remember the last time you hooked up with someone? Do you know where the nearest testing center is, and if you should get tested? How do you properly protect yourself from sexually tranmitted diseases if you're sexually active?
For the last two years I've been collecting ideas for an iPhone app to answer all these questions. Well, I finally got tired of asking questions. It's time to make a solution.
What is TrickTrackr and Why Might I Use it?
TrickTrackr is an app that I've been creating in my spare time to help you keep track of your romantic or intimate social life. If you're like me, you probably don't have a calendar event created on your iPhone for those times you might have gone too far on a date, or even just went on a date. I can't remember what I ate for breakfast last week, let alone the day I dated so and so, what we did, or how far we went.
That's where TrickTrackr comes in. With this app you can quickly log a trick and go back to what you were doing. Or, if you had a really good date you can be more specific. At this point, you might be thinking, "I never hook-up. I don't even really date, so why would I use this app?". Good question! Here's where TrickTrackr is different from your other apps that you might consider using.
The Problem
Our app isn't just a little black book where you store your conquests, in fact, it's focus is quite the opposite. Did you know that the US is on the top ten list of nations with people living with HIV AIDS? (http://www.indexmundi.com/g/r.aspx?t=100&v=35 ) Most of us probably had to go to a "Health Class" in high school where they taught us the birds and the bees. If your school was like mine, they didn't really cover that much except "abstinence before marriage". While that's a great goal, most of us don't really work like that.
The fact of the matter is, that "More than half of all people will have an STD/STI at some point in their lifetime" . (http://www.ashastd.org/std-sti/std-statistics.html ) If you or a friend needed to be responsible and went to your local AIDS Foundation group today to get tested for HIV, they would inform you that the test is only 99% conclusive if you've been abstinent for 6 months. It is our goal to help our users stay educated about safe and responsible ways to connect with each other, and how to manage their risks if they have intimate relations which might have exposed them to any possible sexually transmitted infection.
The Solution
TrickTrackr is first and foremost an answer to a need in the adult community. We believe that it is the obligation of responsible adults to keep inventory of their possible exposures to any sexually transmitted infection in order to properly limit their transmission to others. It is because of this belief that we commit to providing our service for free to anyone in the world regardless of sex, religion, orientation or country. Everyone deserves the opportunity to use TrickTrackr. The basic version will always be free.
How it Works

Here's the main screen
Once you have a profile setup you can start tracking your dates. Then just click on the "Trick" button and you can add as little or as much information as you want, press Save, and you're done.

This is just a sample. This screen will change slighty in the final draft
The sample screen shows you what it would look like if you left all the default options blank. If all you wanted to do was to track that you had a date with someone, then you click Save and you're done. This would be a total of two clicks, so even someone on the go can get back to it later.
You can use the "Track" button to see your dates, how many people you've dated, and when you were with them. The "Test" button will help you find a community center where you can get tested, or allow you to log the results of your test.
We plan to add a "Tips" button to help users educate themselves using quizzes and other informational documentation.
Why I Need Your Help
I've taken some time already to talk to the community in small focus groups to get a sense of what people would want from this program. It's become very clear that there is a demand for this kind of project, but more importantly, people need this kind of application. The longer we wait to get this started, the more people will be in the dark about the risks they are exposing themselves to, and the community will have to resort to using applications which glorify conquests, instead of encouraging responsible actions. It's become clear to me, that our community needs this program now, and I shouldn't delay any longer.
I'd like to ask for your help with funding so I can finish the application by programming it on a full-time basis, instead of when I can get around to it. By using a project planner I've been able to estimate that the basic version would require at least a month (probably more) of my full time attention to get it working the way it should. I'd like more time to perfect it and add all the features that everyone has asked for, but that can't happen until the first basic version is released.
What Are The Funds For?
Most of the funds I'm asking for is to pay the developer, that's me, to be able to work on this full time. I'm only asking for $1800, however, $3200 is a more realistic number if I truly wanted to get a well planned, solidly put together app released in a month. But kickstarter is a place where you ask for a minimum of funding needed, so for now, I'm crossing my fingers that we can get $1800.
We need to pay for focus group meetings, testers, artists, licensing, registrations, marketers, materials, and probably much much more. If we can get $6000, that would set us up long enough that we could execute a plan to make a paid version that would let this grass roots project become self sustaining.
Perks
This is a community project and nothing would make me happier then a group of people anxiously waiting for the app and giving me their feedback on what they think of it. Because it's meant to serve the community I want to make sure that the perks you would get for helping out would actually be interesting to you.
If there's something you want to see as a perk, tell me and I'll find a way to add it!
Here's a link about the book the $100 pledge gets you:
http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/10/24/jacques-pepin-the-origin-of-aids-hiv-_n_1029424.html
FAQ


What about privacy? I don't want you selling my information?

The app works off a local database on your phone, so there's no connection to any kind of server that stores your data. The information that you enter could possibly be of future interest to people working in the health industry to find out what people do and how to prevent further spread of disease. However, it would be a long time before I could even consider collecting that data.
Nevertheless, I will never pull any personal data from your app. I have no interest in your contacts and selling that would make me look bad and go against my professional and personal ethics. If I ever do release data collected from your use of the app, I would only collect data on your dating habits, not who you are, how to contact you, or anything of the like.


What about security? What prevents someone from stealing all my contacts?

The very first version of TrickTracker will be free and have no log in security. The main reason for this is because I want there to be a measurable difference between the paid version and the free version. Nevertheless, I want people to always have the option to benefit from this app even if they don't pay for it.
If the app becomes well used and further funds come in, then I can upgrade both the paid and the free version with greater security and more features. But for now, the only thing stopping someone from stealing your contacts from the locally stored database is you. You will hold the same responsibility of protecting your TrickTracker contacts that you have protecting your iPhone contacts. Lock your phone.


Is this just for the gay community or straight community? Who can use it?

The app is for anyone and everyone. However, I will be marketing the app solely through the gay community at first. The needs of the gay community are what first drove me to create this app and it's a community that I have connections with. I know how to market it there. However, the app is not exclusively built for the gay community. I have many straight friends who are excited to use this app, and we will have options to work their your specific orientation.


What's with the name?

In the two years I've been planning for this app I've gone through many different names. This is just the latest one I've settled on. Once we have about a hundred or more people we can start polling for a new name and have the community decide on the official name of the app. Once that is done I'll be renaming all social media and legal documentation to match it.

story:
Go to Our Official Store for DMAF5

Introducing The MINISFORUM

For a long time, Intel® Nuc is known for its excellent performance and light size. It has always been the representative of Mini PC, leading the design of industry products, and is regarded as the king of minis! But it was criticized by fans for the slow performance improvement!

With the release of the AMD® Ryzen ™ Core Series, the Ryzen™  is now equipped with more cores, a stronger display card as well as having a quick response time. With this, it is made suitable for both work and entertainment as it enables you to complete your desired tasks efficiently.

DMAF5 is the first AMD® product designed by our company. Therefore, we have received official support from AMD®. We have listened to the constructive opinions of a large number of customers in the hope that it can set a new benchmark for professionalism. We are committed to creating innovative next-generation mini pc.

Features

  1. Powerful AMD® Ryzen5 and Radeon™Vega 8
  2. High cost performance
  3. Upgrade-friendly
  4. Build-in Intel® WIFI6 
  5. Support 3 screens -4K@60
  6. Dual RJ45 LAN Ports support more industrial uses

Why Choose MINISFORUM

AMD ® Ryzen ™ 5 processor, 4 cores / 8 threads

Equipped with Radeon™Vega 8 Graphics 8 Cores Graphics

Brings a shocking visual effect

Max Turbo Frequency 3.7GHz

Unlocked the TDP, and No CPU throttling under 100% load for 24 hours

Our Mini PC is designed with a press and pop-up clasp, which makes it easy to install additional memory, SSD, HDD and Wi-Fi.

a. Dual channel (SODIMM Slots×2)

Dual-channel RAM is a version of multi-channel memory. All versions of multi-channel RAM increase data transmission speed by adding more communication channels between memory and memory controller.The transmission speed is faster than single channel.

b. M.2 2280  NVMe SSD slot ×1

Support ultra-fast NVMe SSD, you will be able to run the operating system and games faster.

c. 2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot (SATA 3.0 6.0Gb/s) ×1

You can add low-cost, large-capacity hard drives, enjoy the fun of DIY.

Intel® AX200 WLAN belongs to the AX-22260 family, code-named "Cyclone Peak", supports WiFi 6 technology (802.11ax) standard, integrates Bluetooth 5.0 module, supports 5GHz / 2.4GHz dual frequency and multi-user 2x2 MIMO (MU-MIMO), peak bandwidth It is 2.4Gbps, which is at least 37% higher than the current 802.11ac rate. WiFi5 802.11ac standard supports 160Mhz bandwidth.


 

The MINISFORUM mini PC drives up to three independent displays with incredible clarity and maximum productivity in your workflow with excellent triple display solutions using HDMI, DisplayPort as well as USB-C output.

【Dual RJ45 LAN Ports】DMAF5 comes with two Gigabytes LAN ports which provide you much more network usage, such as software router(OpenWRT/DD-WRT/Tomato, etc.), firewall, NAT and network isolation, etc.

The AMD® Ryzen5 3550H processor has a default TDP of 15W, and the power consumption of 15W limits its performance. AMD® officially allows a maximum power consumption of 35W. Of course, extremely clever optimization is required to achieve this goal. Therfore, we have made the following efforts:

a. Use a larger turbofan.

b. Add a thick thermally conductive copper tube and spray graphene on the heat dissipation module.

C. Equipped with power adapter, the maximum power consumption is 65W.

VESA Bracket——The VESA mount is ready to for the easy installation on the back of the VESA compatible televisions TV or monitors.

Multiple types of interface allows bring you to have fun with multi-screens, high-definition playbacks and other functions.

Are you still worried that you won't be able to get after-sale protection after you purchase such electronic products? MINISFORUM has a professional after-sale team so that if you have any issues you can quickly get a professional solution,We also have our own BBS https://bbs.minisforum.com, which we can discuss computer knowledge or you can send emails to our after-sales team at (support@minisforum.com) and we will reply to them promptly.

Deskmini DMAF5 Testing Report

1.Performance comparison of competitive products CPU&GPU

AMD Ryzen®5 processor, 4 cores / 8 threads，Equipped with Radeon™Vega 8 Graphics 8 Cores Graphics，Processor Base Frequency，Max Turbo Frequency 3.7GHz.CPU & GPU, with performance significantly higher than Intel® i5 8250U, higher than Intel® i7 8550U, and the same as Intel® i5 8259U.​

2. Temperature test

• Thanks to super cooling, TDP can be unlocked for higher performance. The following results were tested using AIDA64. • AIDA64 test: stress test CPU / GPU / memory ... 100% load monitoring, for TDP 25W Unlocker, the temperature is maintained at about 61 ° C, the CPU frequency still performs best; for TDP 35W Unlocker, the temperature is maintained at At 75 ° C, the CPU frequency is increased by 0.55Ghz.

• The comparative test model uses the Intel Core® i5 8259U processor with a basic frequency of 2.3 GHz and a maximum turbo frequency of up to 3.80 GHz. Without TDP Unlocker and poor heat dissipation conditions, it is unable to fully utilize the better performance of the CPU.

3. 3DMARK Stress Test

• The following results were tested using 3DMARK 13 • Test items: [ Time Spy Stress Test ] • Test result: 99.3% PASSED.

4. 3DMARK11 TEST

• The DeskMini DMAF5 and the i7 CPU models on the market were tested and compared with 3DMARK11:

5. PCMark 10 TEST

CineBench is a very convincing test system for CPU and graphics card, the latest version is R20. Compared with the maximum 16 cores of R11.5 version, the R15 version can support up to 256 logical cores. In addition, the new version also strengthens the investigation of shaders, anti-aliasing, shadows, lights, and reflection blur. The detection is more accurate. 

• TDP 25W =3503 
• TDP 35W =3893

6. 3DMARK Night Raid TEST

• TDP 25W =5722

• TDP 35W =6528

 

Risks ＆ Challenge

We are a company specializing in the production of the mini PC and we have our own Amazon store. As we have our own factory, we have great advantages in quality control and after-sales service. The reason for our crowdfunding is to build our brand awareness and establish a connection with computer enthusiasts. Our mini PC is ready for mass production.  We will ship in October 2020, during this period we will always optimize the product, stay tuned.

story:
THE POCKET RHINO
 

You understand the importance of carrying a blade on you on a daily basis, regardless of its size. You use it for things like opening boxes, checking inside letters, or being the only person in the room with a knife at family gatherings. You know that those repeatable small tasks are a part of your life, and you embrace them with confidence, knowing that you have the right tool on you. But you don’t always need a large knife for a lot of the daily situations we face. All you need is a compact knife that won’t occupy your precious pocket space and won’t weigh you down during a long day.

 

 

 

We were inspired by nature to create the most unique and useful micro gadget we could to fit your EDC needs. The Pocket Rhino lives up to its name. It is compact enough to disappear in your pocket, and durable enough to go through the toughest of days with you.

 

The Pocket Rhino is the right tool for your daily challenges, and more. It provides reliable cutting time and time again with either it’s incredibly tough D2 steel or its corrosion resistant and durable S35VN steel. It is specially designed for your small but important daily missions such as cutting, slicing, opening, prying, scraping, and fixing anything that comes your way. The Pocket Rhino is the mightiest micro multitool on the market and you won’t want to miss out on it!

 

FEATURES:

 

Razor Sharp Blade:

For the blade, we have selected CPM-S35VN and D2 Heat Treated Stainless Steel for their excellent edge retention and superior corrosion and wear resistance. Both blade options are guaranteed to be sharp out of the box. Thanks to their metallurgic advantages, they can maintain their sharpness for a long period of time and they are guaranteed to bring you the success you deserve on your cutting tasks. Also, both steels are easy to resharpen, which is a great advantage for maintaining the blade and keeping it razor sharp. Its small size and chisel tip also make it a quick task to get it back to its factory sharpness. The G10 Pocket Rhino is featured with D2 blade steel and The Titanium Pocket Rhino is featured with CPM-S35VN blade steel.

 

 

High Quality Handle Materials:

The Pocket Rhino is designed to last and we selected the best materials in the knife industry to ensure that. The handle materials for the Pocket Rhino are of excellent quality and will last you a lifetime. We are offering two exclusive selections for the handle.

 

The G10 Pocket Rhino with stainless steel liners will provide you with extra grippiness while holding and will serve you like new for a long period of time without showing any sign of scratches or wear due to daily use. Thanks to its liner lock mechanism you won't have to worry about it accidentally closing during hard use. The G10 Pocket Rhino is available in three different colors: black, green and orange.

 

The Titanium Pocket Rhino will provide you with an extra lightweight, ultra durable, corrosion resistant, and customizable handle experience. Our titanium handles are created on a CNC machine and are made out of 6al4v Grade 5 titanium alloy, which is the same titanium alloy that is highly preferred in the aero-space industry for its exceptional metallurgic properties. 

 

 

Ceramic Ball Bearings

The Pocket Rhino uses the most advanced technology available in the knife industry. Both versions of the Pocket Rhino are running on caged ceramic bearings to guarantee you an ultra smooth opening and closing experience.

 

Specially Designed Hardware

The Pocket Rhino uses it own original hardware that is specially designed and machined solely for the Rhino. The front pivot screw has a button look, which gives the Rhino a sophisticated and unique look. It also has two slots that are carefully designed to accept 1,5mm x 6mm Tritium Vials, which are a great way to customize your Rhino, and since they produce their own glow you’ll be able to find your Rhino even in complete darkness!. The non-rotating pivot design also provides an easy maintaining experience. The maintenance of the Pocket Rhino is extremely simple. All you need is T8 torx head. Just unscrew the two screws located on the backside of the handle and you are ready for a good cleaning.

 

 

Front Flipper and Thumb studs

The Pocket Rhino is the easiest to open micro blade ever, period. Thanks to its front flipper design, everyone can one hand open this blade easily and without much pressure. The ease of opening the Pocket Rhino is comparable to opening a lighter. The innovative thumb stud design gives users an alternative way of deploying the blade while also acting as stop pins, which provides extra durability for hard daily use. You can open the Pocket Rhino in two different ways, or you can get creative about it and find new ways to open it thanks to its versatile front flipper opening. 

 

 

Bottle Opener

The Pocket Rhino has a built-in bottle opener on the spine of the blade. It is durable and reliable, and will make opening bottles a breeze! And thanks to its unique design, you don't have to open the blade when you want to take a break and have a cool drink.

 

 

Specialized Lanyard Hole

The specially designed lanyard hole of the Pocket Rhino can accept all kinds of 1/4" hexagonal bits, making the Pocket Rhino a bit driver that will be ready for use whenever you need it!

 

 

Versatile Blade Shape

Thanks to its modified chisel tip blade profile and special tip design, the Pocket Rhino is perfect for tasks like scraping and prying. Its blade is much more capable than any other microblade currently on the market and provides a reliable working edge in a compact size.

 

 

 

 

Ultra Compact Design

The Pocket Rhino is the ultimate micro multitool to carry in your EDC. It is capable of accomplishing a huge number of tasks despite its compact form. You can put it on your keychain or throw it to the 5th pocket of your jeans. It occupies such a small space in your pocket that you won't realize it is on you until you need it.

 

 

Dimensions: 

 

Opened Length:            88,5 mm

Closed Length:              57,5 mm

Blade length:                 33 mm

Overall Thickness:       12,5 mm

Blade Thickness:         3.5 mm

G10 Weight:                   63 gr.

Titanium Weight:         67 gr.

Its small size and chisel tip also make it a quick task to get it back to its factory sharpness. The G10 Pocket Rhino is featured with D2 blade steel and The Titanium Pocket Rhino is featured with CPM-S35VN blade steel.  High Quality Handle Materials:The Pocket Rhino is designed to last and we selected the best materials in the knife industry to ensure that. The handle materials for the Pocket Rhino are of excellent quality and will last you a lifetime. We are offering two exclusive selections for the handle. The G10 Pocket Rhino with stainless steel liners will provide you with extra grippiness while holding and will serve you like new for a long period of time without showing any sign of scratches or wear due to daily use. Thanks to its liner lock mechanism you won't have to worry about it accidentally closing during hard use. The G10 Pocket Rhino is available in three different colors: black, green and orange. The Titanium Pocket Rhino will provide you with an extra lightweight, ultra durable, corrosion resistant, and customizable handle experience. Our titanium handles are created on a CNC machine and are made out of 6al4v Grade 5 titanium alloy, which is the same titanium alloy that is highly preferred in the aero-space industry for its exceptional metallurgic properties.   Ceramic Ball BearingsThe Pocket Rhino uses the most advanced technology available in the knife industry. Both versions of the Pocket Rhino are running on caged ceramic bearings to guarantee you an ultra smooth opening and closing experience. Specially Designed HardwareThe Pocket Rhino uses it own original hardware that is specially designed and machined solely for the Rhino. The front pivot screw has a button look, which gives the Rhino a sophisticated and unique look. It also has two slots that are carefully designed to accept 1,5mm x 6mm Tritium Vials, which are a great way to customize your Rhino, and since they produce their own glow you’ll be able to find your Rhino even in complete darkness!. The non-rotating pivot design also provides an easy maintaining experience. The maintenance of the Pocket Rhino is extremely simple. All you need is T8 torx head. Just unscrew the two screws located on the backside of the handle and you are ready for a good cleaning.  Front Flipper and Thumb studsThe Pocket Rhino is the easiest to open micro blade ever, period. Thanks to its front flipper design, everyone can one hand open this blade easily and without much pressure. The ease of opening the Pocket Rhino is comparable to opening a lighter. The innovative thumb stud design gives users an alternative way of deploying the blade while also acting as stop pins, which provides extra durability for hard daily use. You can open the Pocket Rhino in two different ways, or you can get creative about it and find new ways to open it thanks to its versatile front flipper opening.   Bottle OpenerThe Pocket Rhino has a built-in bottle opener on the spine of the blade. It is durable and reliable, and will make opening bottles a breeze! And thanks to its unique design, you don't have to open the blade when you want to take a break and have a cool drink.  Specialized Lanyard HoleThe specially designed lanyard hole of the Pocket Rhino can accept all kinds of 1/4" hexagonal bits, making the Pocket Rhino a bit driver that will be ready for use whenever you need it!  Versatile Blade ShapeThanks to its modified chisel tip blade profile and special tip design, the Pocket Rhino is perfect for tasks like scraping and prying. Its blade is much more capable than any other microblade currently on the market and provides a reliable working edge in a compact size.    Ultra Compact DesignThe Pocket Rhino is the ultimate micro multitool to carry in your EDC. It is capable of accomplishing a huge number of tasks despite its compact form. You can put it on your keychain or throw it to the 5th pocket of your jeans. It occupies such a small space in your pocket that you won't realize it is on you until you need it.  Dimensions:  Opened Length:            88,5 mmClosed Length:              57,5 mmBlade length:                 33 mmOverall Thickness:       12,5 mmBlade Thickness:         3.5 mmG10 Weight:                   63 gr.Titanium Weight:         67 gr.

story:
Learn to Solve Right Out of the Box

HEYKUBE, designed to be fun and challenging, is the only patented smart cube that embeds the solving inside the toy.   The lights and sounds are designed to help you learn the pattern, solve the cube, and improve your time.  Pick it up, turn a side, and start playing. Learning to solve this puzzle is now within your grasp! Unlike other smart cubes no screen or app is required- the fun is in your hands.

HEYKUBE puts the solution in the cube so everyone can learn to solve straight out of the box.  No matter how scrambled, HEYKUBE is designed to teach you how to solve.   It remembers your moves and keeps you solving without having to start over.

 

 

 
HEYKUBE is Programmable - STEM meet TOY
 

Interested in programming HEYKUBE - an open application programming interface (API) takes HEYKUBE to another level. Download the HEYKUBE python library on a Raspberry Pi and start developing. Write music, design a light show, program games, load your own solving algorithms.  Take advantage of the HEYKUBE + Raspberry Pi reward, and your Pi will come preloaded with the HEYKUBE python library. 

 

 

Code algorithms, music, patterns, games with the only cube that lets you take control.  Practice new solutions and create your own ways to play. Share your code with everyone and keep adding to the HEYKUBE Python Library - NOW YOU CAN!  

File this under unexpected, AJ McLean, from the Backstreet Boys loves games and gadgets. He heard about HEYKUBE and wanted to give it a try. So, we invited him over to check it out.  Fun times!

 

 

  

A Smart Cube You Can Use Without a Screen

You know you don't need an app to play with HEYKUBE, but we built one anyway.  The app can send patterns and challenges right to your HEYKUBE, and track your times with millisecond accuracy.  You don't need it to learn to solve, but it's there for you in case you want to check your stats.

 

Your battery will last a very long time. However, if your cube is scrambled and you run out of charge, we have you covered. Charge it, use the solver feature in the app to get back in the game, and HEYKUBE is ready to start tracking your moves again.

 

HEYKUBE - IN THE PRESS

HEYKUBE and our inventors were just featured in the corporate blog for Cypress Semiconductor.   https://bit.ly/3gxSqbm Tech and toy really have converged!

 

 

 

 

HEYKUBE - Two Engineers, Decades of Experience, and an Idea

 

This big idea came with puzzling challenges. How do you fit all of the electronics in a small cube and not have everything twist off?  How do you use an algorithm to solve the cube without using an app and make the learning intuitive?  A few prototypes and patents later, and they did it.

 

The final prototype is the result of careful collaboration between designers, fabricators, software, hardware, and toy industry gurus.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Creating and delivering a brand new product involves a lot of hoops and hurdles. We've minimized the risk by taking our time developing the entire process. We have a first run of the HEYKUBE already geared up for production. Our agreements are in place with suppliers and manufacturers, and our prototype is finalized. We've got some experience on our team and we've engaged the right experts to put it all together. We've left little room for error to make sure all our backers see a very quick delivery. 

We are very proud to make HEYKUBE available to all our backers.  HEYKUBE is the fun without the frustration- it's better.

    Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.  You can use the Indiegogo share tools to let everyone know that HEYKUBE is the smart cube they want to play!

    International Backers: We will ship HEYKUBE to the US, Canada, and the European Union. Please note that duties, handling, fees and taxes applicable to your region are additional.
