story:
CAMPAIGN DESCRIPTION

e-KOINs are both physical and purely “cyber” (digital).  Cyber KOIN is a “ data haven” (treasure chest, vault for information) AND physical Koin is a beautiful, artistic, and functional object. .

We need your help and in turn offer you something one-of-a-kind and one-time-only is for jump starting production and the e-commerce and trading in KOINs worldwide and on a scale and with a social impact like how cell phones, tablets, and social networks came on gangbusters across and around the whole world.

KOINs come in many shapes and sizes. Physical KOINs look like doubloons, shekels, drachmas, and unusual never-seen-before coins.This is very important – you can wear your KOIN and share it physically!  You will be buying them soon over the Internet and in shops and stores, in malls, and at Amazon.

Cyber KOINs, digital, are your personal / corporate data havens in our proprietary cloud which we maintain like Captain Kidd’s buried treasure.  A KOIN is like a safe deposit box and it is ultra-secure. Seriously so. (Thus we are not blabbing out in the open about how this is done, but it is more than just conventional encryption, and we have the professional experience to back up what we say)  KOINs are not bitcoins, let’s be clear about that.  No confusion or mistakes, here!  But you can buy, sell and trade KOINs with friends, partners, anyone, and you can certainly use bitcoins and all the traditional world currencies like dollars, pounds and euros in your transactions.

Technically, a KOIN is a Knowledge Operation Intelligence Network – a big techie phrase that simply means that it can hold and process an enormous amount of your special, private, secret, personal / business / fantasy Information. What kind of information?  Whatever You want to trade, barter, sell, auction. It’s called a “KOIN” because of the “K-O-I-N” meaning, but also because…

Information – properly bundled and packaged, and put on the market for business like anything else – is The New Currency and Futures Market. 

Our motto: “Changing How You Think About Information”

Those of You who get in early, at the beginning - You are the ones who are going to see the biggest gains, fun and profits.  The private information in your KOIN, being handled and protected in our special cloud (not much privacy on the physical KOIN, but there can be special sharable data there, too). Cannot be touched or Taken by persons or entities that you desire to Keep Out. So, the KOIN is the commodity, the security, and the currency of the Future.  Better than what you can do with bitcoins, euros, dollars, yen – they’re only old-fashioned money!  KOINs are the Real Manifestation of Knowledge is Private is Personal is Wealth is Power.

KOINs are getting ready for the Market, and We are Offering You an Early Pass. Better than any Black Friday or Black Monday.  Really. This is your “Gold Sunday” backdoor entry pass.

Do you want to be in at the beginning of the next-gen of private financial security and also have artifacts (the physical KOINs) - that you can keep as treasures or talismans, give as gifts, or flash-off to your friends, and also use as “keys” to get into the deep dark information data haven and the vaults? Or you just  want to hear about it all from your friends “Wow, I was lucky and smart – I bought some bitcoins five years ago!”  (or something similar about a few companies we hear about a lot these past few years.)

Think carefully.  The KOIN that is more valuable than gold or money - because it is like money, it is information that can be traded, given, exchanged, bartered or sold and because it is a work of Art and Beauty.  And with the cyber side of the KOIN, a true Next-Gen Era where Information, properly packaged and protected that leads to whole web-wide worlds of LUX. A KOIN is your ticket to the LUXury Observation Deck.  The V.I.P. bar is open and our service is beautiful.

Other salient points re: KOINs and e-koins.com, luxekoins.com, and the crowdsourcing campaign underway:

Can be used by pre-teens to store and share their imaginary worlds with their friends 

Can be used by teens as another form of "diary" or to share fantasy/adventure, personal or gaming, with friends. 

Can be used to hold collected data that to some may be "gossip" or "trivia" but to others can be special, intimate, important, or of value in trading, not merely sharing, but trading as in selling, bartering, for other data, or for objects, or money. 

A family can put all their critical data on it and if a tornado, hurricane, flood, forest fire, etc. forces a rapid evacuation, they have all that "critical data" on both our Cloud Server Network but also in the "palm of their hand", safely stored. 

Anyone can have super-critical/valuable/personal data stored on both Cloud and the physical KOIN-device, the "coin-like" (galleon-like, doubloon-like) object, which can be protected in their own storage medium (e.g., safe, secure metal/insulated box, their secure EMP-protected box), from not only the usual threats (e.g., theft), but especially(!!!) Secure From EMP Damage. 

EMP = Electromagnetic Pulse. 

EMP = coming inevitably to a continent like North America, courtesy of either the Sun or North Korea or Iran. 

Read up on it at http://amerge.tdyn.org and then understand how a physical KOIN allows you something better than a hard drive, cloud server space, or an ordinary flash-memory stick (USB drive, external hard drive)! 

Can be used as jewelry, not only as a digital storage.communication / trade medium 

Can be used among friends, lovers, purely-business traders, total strangers 

Can be (Will become!) the New Business Card of the 21st Century! 

Can be used by people of all ages but esp. by the elderly to hold all critical health, pharmaceutical, and other life-support information, such as what prescriptions Grandma is taking since she and her spouse and family probably don't remember or even know! (this is a major problem facing docs today, esp. but not only in ER settings - "Now what meds are you taking?"  "Oh, I dunno...some pink ones..." 

Can be used to save the things (information) that people most often forget, and with our smart software it can be better organized for their retrieval and use 

The physical KOIN can be virtually ANY physical design from virtually ANY physical substance 

Remember that "KOIN" stands for and originates form "Knowledge Object Information Network" and this gives a deeper sense of what is going on 

KOIN is NOT!!! "yet another #$%& bitcoin or the equivalent."  Bitcoins are internet currency.  KOINs are information objects that can be traded, shared, sold, bartered, invested, and presumably go up in value if the information in them is valuable to any market.  Bitcoins are junk IMHO and so are all the rest of the internet coins/currency.  We will accept bitcoins just like we accept dollars, pounds, euros, yen - but we will discount them because of the financial risk factors and other hidden costs in dealing with bitcoins and such. 

KOINware and KOINactivity and KOINbusiness is just as much about entertainment and frivolous leisure as it is about serious deep, dark business, or about love in all her myriad forms, or security and safety, or health and medicine, or keeping one's possessions and records organized and intact. 

Our KYBEROS cybersecurity is not simply "encryption" but something more, it is secret, yes, and it is impregnable even to NSA and others, unless one imagines that they can take over a global network of servers in two dozen different countries, not all of which are friendly at all to the USA. 

MORE DETAILS INCLUDING PERKS

We are asking you to fund us $42,000. We need this for the following:
• (for the physical side of KOINs) 3D printer, artistic materials and tools, RFID components, embedded memory components
• (for the cyber side of KOINs) completing the implementation of our compact  & very secure server cloud, both software and hardware, including licensing and services
• advertising and marketing expenses including presentation at a couple of must-go-to conferences and exhibits upcoming in early 2014
• few programmers 

Why so little?

Because (1) so much is already done on the software side and in the overall architecture and design, and (2) we are keeping costs way down by using outside services and partner/subcontractors, such as with the cloud provisions.  No need for all sorts of equipment and overhead.  Also, (3) we are down to the real “final stretch,” the “golden mile”.  We are not starting from zero but we are in the middle of the track and we need the financial equivalent of a big box of Mars and Snicker bars to keep going until the finish line.  OK?

What are the risks of us not completing the tech work and not “delivering” to You, the sponsors, or achieving full and stable business-operation status?

Nil.  Not virtually, but really.  All the software is either done or is a straight-shot to completing.  This is not “R&D” – we are done with that.  What remains is integration, setting things up for web-based services, starting to produce the physical KOIN devices, and getting our KOINs into full “circulation.”  We are coming out with something quite novel and attractive and not subject to being lost in a sea of look-alikes.  and what may emerge out there that is similar – they will not have what we do on the insides, because of our cyber security algorithms and other code.

So what if we don’t reach the whole $42K funding goal? We are confident we will raise enough so that we will have a very visible and solid Base for the whole data haven business with KOINS, including the “Private Information Bank and Trust” operations. We will have enough physical KOINS out there, in physical and online store that will keep up the momentum.  If we have to go slow with out KOIN minting and issuance, then we may go slower, but we are Going and Will Deliver.

What if we have more funding than $42,000? The initial funding is for launch on a small scale and we can use extra funds for marketing, production, distribution, sales and after-sales service and maintaining the cyber security. We keep you posted further developments from time to time.

Why did it take so long if you had started this KOIN-work years ago? We really had to wait and wait until the markets – you – had enough exposure and experience with social networks and then internet currencies like bitcoins  for what KOINS and the whole world of LUX - a software architecture and knowledge-based operating environment behind and underneath them - are all about.

Plus it helped that finally there are the things we need in the way of certain APIs, and our own software already done, and today’s smart phones, and RFID tech.  We had the architecture started in the 90’s and mostly done even ten years ago.  Now the world is ready for LUX, and for Private Information Banking with KOINS in your cloud and in your treasure chest.

NOTE: KOINs will be operating – functioning in cyberspace, maintain in the cloud data haven, and ready for business through the Private Information Bank and Trust offices, and available for public starting on June 21, 2014, 5:51AM ET (10:51AM UTC)

What this means precisely:

The prices will go up between now and then, and you are reserving yours as a binding pre-release / Christmas / New Year special offer. According to your contribution, and also your place in line” (i.e.; how soon you are, an early maker-shaker-mover or a late-comer- coattails- follower), you receive some thing(s) of great and growing value for your Contribution.

Below you can see the list of all the KOINs in our eight pre-defined and complete KOIN Series.  These are the KOIN “minting” that will be conducted, and with KOINs issued for sale, beginning in 2014, and proceeding semi-annually through 2015, 2016 and 2017, each Series being released publicly during a period of three months and in eight different cities worldwide. 

For each KOIN there is, of course, both a cyber (digital) and physical component.  Each Series contains one each of eight basic KOIN types.  Within each Series , each basic type has particular unique cyber and physical features, and the latter includes a unique name and design.  From one Series to the next, there will be upgrades and changes in both cyber and physical features, but there will be a general consistency within each Series. 

The cyber features include differences in ultra secure Kyberos information allocation and the non-Kyberos high-encryption XOR information allocation, all within the iBank Cloud Data Haven, as well as variations in the levels of PIBT services provided to that KOIN. 

The physical designs will reflect both characteristics of the KOIN names, most of which are drawn from historical currencies from ancient through near-modern times, as well as unique artistic features that will be determined by the artists and craftsmen engaged in the minting of the KOINs.





FAQ

[1] E-koin is like Bitcoin? It may look that way at first. Bitcoins are just money, and the value can go up and down and sometimes very erratically.  KOINs contain Information that you create, find, gain, barter, etc.  You can be highly creative, or just be a broker-dealer.  You and the other party make what is in a given KOIN be a valuable commodity or not.  It can be a game or be dead-serious, this information and how you package it.  Physical KOIN is a real thing you can handle and hold.  It has an added value from being artistically unique and creative. 

[2]How does a KOIN work with the information handling?  It is done with several interesting forms of cyber security that you will learn about after you are an owner of a KOIN.  It all works through the internet, yes, but you can store different parts of any one of your KOIN’s private information “chest” on not one but several KOINs in the “Cloud” and – purely as an option, not a requirement - you can safely keep some valuable information also on your physical KOINs.

[3] Do I need a particular device like an Android or iPhone?  You need any one of many devices that can communicate through the internet.

[4] Do I need a special RFID device for my KOINs to work?  No.  Your cyber KOIN does not depend upon RFID or NFC.  Your physical KOIN doesn’t either, but it has the capability to be a “tagged” item that you or others can track via the RFID.  We’ll tell you the details when you get on board as an early ahead-of-the-pack  sponsor.

[5] Can I buy things with KOINS? Sure. You can get Cash from your KOINs. But first you have to do the trade or have one of our licensed PIBT brokers do it for you (PIBT = Private Information Bank and Trust)

[6] Can I have someone manage my KOINs like I can have someone handle my affairs? Absolutely – go back to [5] and then sign up, contribute, and learn about what you get through the PIBT.

[7] How long does it take to do a “business” with my KOINs?  As long as it takes for you and the buyer / seller to negotiate the Deal in a transaction.  

[8] Can I use KOINs for things like cars, houses, tickets, gold coins, and baseball cards, whatever?  Absolutely, nothing is prevented from being used – in any market, anywhere.  You have to either convince the other party, or barter for something else – what’s the mystery?  This is Basic Economics 101, for the past 10,000 years at least.

[9] Are there some merchants already signing up for active trading with KOINs?  Yes, and we will be announcing the lists before the release of KOINs.

[10] How do KOINs connect up with LUX and LUXworlds, also invented and developed and brought to the world?  They work together, but you don’t need all of LUX for doing things and having fun and making exchanges with KOINs.  We’ll be happy to explain LUX more after it comes out in its own way soon.  Then you’ll understand.  For now, focus on KOINs because they are going to give you the kind of rapid and stable increase of value that you missed before.

[11] Do I have to pay to do things with KOINs?  Yes, when it comes to the business and the super-secure online cloud-based cyber storage.  But if you are getting KOINs now, early-on, you are getting that either for free or at a super-discount.

[12] What if I lose the physical KOIN or some of the keys and codes?  For providing the anonymity, there is a big cascade of security, and some things. The cyber side is a little trickier to explain here in just a few words.  Yes, some things are recoverable, they may take longer than proving who you are to a TSA agent or fed agent, but things can be done – or at least tried. The physical KOIN is like jewelry or art – only one of a kind. Every KOIN totally, totally Unique.  (That’s part of the reason we call them also “UniKOINs” – “unique” - get it?

[13]  How can I be sure that my money spent in all these KOINy thingies doesn’t go down the tubes in some kind of crash like what happened with bitcoins and plenty of other things, internet or not?  Well, no guarantees for anything in Life except that the trip is guaranteed to end, eventually.  But, realistically, there are plenty of economic values that go up and down and if you are in at the Start then you can count on things staying worth More than what you put in at the early stage of Today.

[14] How can I best store my physical KOINs?  How would you store “proof” minted gold coins or a Picasso sketch of My (Fairly) Hot Lady? Your favorite toy? 

[15] Where are these Private Information Bank and Trust places?  Are they in different countries?  Are they offshore havens? Can I visit them in person?  Yes, but if we told you where, we’d have to kill you (just kidding!)

[16] How can we be so sure about the safety of the Cyber KOIN data, when everyone in the world, from Amazon to NSA to Z-anybody, gets cyber attacked and hacked over and over? See [15]. 

[17] What variety can I get with the physical KOIN?  What are my choices?  Only what you produce?  No, we like to combine mystery with freedom.  We have our styles and are designing new ones as we speak. Remember, each KOIN is Unique.  But for some of the KOIN types, the buyer can do a custom order, more expensive of course for one or two  than if you order 1000, but with some “licentious freedom” in every design choice, to be sure!

[18] Will the “denomination” types change over time?  Yes. But all previous issues and mints will remain valid and even go up in value – just like with coins, banknotes, stamps and such.

[19] How long before KOINs will really “catch on” and be used by millions?  Well, first of all, we think in terms of billions, not millions.  Hard to say.  When enough people yawn, open their eyes and wake up, then there is more and more noise and then the Whole Wide World (WWW) follows.

[20] How can I learn more over time, after I pledge and contribute my money here, and before I receive cyber and physical forms of my KOINs?  We know who you are and where you are and will keep you posted and happy! (;-))

Finally, being In the KNOW with KOINs can make a big, big difference in more than your financial future! Initial offering price of each KOIN of series 1 will be announced before the release in June. Prices will range from $3 - $10 each. We will be happy to answer any further questions as we move along

The creator Dr. D says

"This needs to be brought to the attention of people in many fields because of the way people can store very critical information in the physical Koin device and also have it secure and un-tamperable on the Cloud. This can be a lifesaver as well as something for fun and entertainment and profit. People in emergency services, medicine, law enforcement, service to the elderly – they need to know about and support KOINs so that we can supply them to, well, nearly everybody."

e-Koins can lead to dates, friendships, and seriously well-matched Relationships

You can put whatever you want on your e-Koin. You can have part of that in the customized, personalized physical Koin that you can give to a friend or prospective mate, or even trade among friends. You can start up a chat with someone over an e-Koin - far better than sitting and just texting from your phones to the person across the table or room!

e-KOINS can be used for health records and esp. in emergencies

Literally everyone can benefit from having some key data in the physical KOIN on in what is stored on the Cloud Server. This does not have to be "personal" data but can be the key hints and clues that a person needs to remember. Certainly it can include current and recent medications! Very important for all people!


We Value Your Comments / Ideas / Suggestions and YOU Will hear from us within 24 hours. E-mail us at info@e-koins.com

UP TO YOU! Comment & Contribute OR Contribute & Comment. Either way we thank you profusely for your support. As a token of our appreciation, you receive generous perks in June, 2014!
story_txt:
CAMPAIGN DESCRIPTION
e-KOINs are both
physical and purely “cyber” (digital).  Cyber KOIN is a “ data haven”
(treasure chest, vault for information) AND physical Koin is a beautiful,
artistic, and functional object. .
We need your help and in
turn offer you something one-of-a-kind and one-time-only is for jump starting
production and the e-commerce and trading in KOINs worldwide and on a scale and
with a social impact like how cell phones, tablets, and social networks came on
gangbusters across and around the whole world.KOINs come in many shapes and sizes. Physical
KOINs look like doubloons, shekels, drachmas, and unusual never-seen-before
coins.This is very important –
you can wear your KOIN and share it physically!  You will be buying them
soon over the Internet and in shops and stores, in malls, and at Amazon. 
Cyber KOINs, digital,
are your personal / corporate data havens in our proprietary cloud which we
maintain like Captain Kidd’s buried treasure. 
A KOIN is like a safe deposit box and it is ultra-secure. Seriously so. (Thus
we are not blabbing out in the open about how this is done, but it is more than
just conventional encryption, and we have the professional experience to back
up what we say)  KOINs are not bitcoins, let’s be clear about that. 
No confusion or mistakes, here!  But you can buy, sell and trade KOINs
with friends, partners, anyone, and you can certainly use bitcoins and all the
traditional world currencies like dollars, pounds and euros in your
transactions.
Technically, a KOIN is a
Knowledge Operation Intelligence Network – a big techie phrase that simply
means that it can hold and process an enormous amount of your special, private,
secret, personal / business / fantasy Information. What kind of
information?  Whatever You want to trade, barter, sell, auction.
It’s called a “KOIN” because of the “K-O-I-N” meaning, but also because…Information –
properly bundled and packaged, and put on the market for business like anything
else – is The New Currency and Futures Market.  Our motto: “Changing How You Think About Information”Those of You who get in early, at the beginning - You are the
ones who are going to see the biggest gains, fun and profits.  The private
information in your KOIN, being handled and protected in our special cloud (not
much privacy on the physical KOIN, but there can be special sharable data
there, too). Cannot be touched or Taken by persons or entities that you desire
to Keep Out. So,
the KOIN is the commodity, the security, and the currency of the Future. 
Better than what you can do with bitcoins, euros, dollars, yen – they’re only
old-fashioned money!  KOINs are the Real Manifestation of Knowledge is Private
is Personal is Wealth is Power.KOINs
are getting ready for the Market, and We are Offering You an Early Pass.
Better than any Black Friday or Black Monday.  Really. This is your “Gold
Sunday” backdoor entry pass. 
Do
you want to be in at the beginning of the next-gen of private financial security
and also have artifacts (the physical KOINs) - that you can keep as treasures
or talismans, give as gifts, or flash-off to your friends, and also use as
“keys” to get into the deep dark information data haven and the vaults? Or you
just  want to hear about it all from your friends “Wow, I was lucky and
smart – I bought some bitcoins five years ago!”  (or something similar
about a few companies we hear about a lot these past few years.)
Think
carefully.  The KOIN that is more valuable than gold or money - because it
is like money, it is information that can be traded, given, exchanged, bartered
or sold and because it is a work of Art and Beauty.  And with the cyber
side of the KOIN, a true Next-Gen Era where Information, properly packaged and
protected that leads to whole web-wide worlds of LUX. A KOIN is your ticket to
the LUXury Observation Deck.  The V.I.P. bar is open and our service is
beautiful.Other salient points re: KOINs and e-koins.com, luxekoins.com, and the crowdsourcing campaign underway:Can be used by pre-teens to store and share their imaginary worlds with their friends Can be used by teens as another form of "diary" or to share fantasy/adventure, personal or gaming, with friends. Can be used to hold collected data that to some may be "gossip" or "trivia" but to others can be special, intimate, important, or of value in trading, not merely sharing, but trading as in selling, bartering, for other data, or for objects, or money. A family can put all their critical data on it and if a tornado, hurricane, flood, forest fire, etc. forces a rapid evacuation, they have all that "critical data" on both our Cloud Server Network but also in the "palm of their hand", safely stored. Anyone can have super-critical/valuable/personal data stored on both Cloud and the physical KOIN-device, the "coin-like" (galleon-like, doubloon-like) object, which can be protected in their own storage medium (e.g., safe, secure metal/insulated box, their secure EMP-protected box), from not only the usual threats (e.g., theft), but especially(!!!) Secure From EMP Damage. EMP = Electromagnetic Pulse. EMP = coming inevitably to a continent like North America, courtesy of either the Sun or North Korea or Iran. Read up on it at http://amerge.tdyn.org and then understand how a physical KOIN allows you something better than a hard drive, cloud server space, or an ordinary flash-memory stick (USB drive, external hard drive)! Can be used as jewelry, not only as a digital storage.communication / trade medium Can be used among friends, lovers, purely-business traders, total strangers Can be (Will become!) the New Business Card of the 21st Century! Can be used by people of all ages but esp. by the elderly to hold all critical health, pharmaceutical, and other life-support information, such as what prescriptions Grandma is taking since she and her spouse and family probably don't remember or even know! (this is a major problem facing docs today, esp. but not only in ER settings - "Now what meds are you taking?"  "Oh, I dunno...some pink ones..." Can be used to save the things (information) that people most often forget, and with our smart software it can be better organized for their retrieval and use The physical KOIN can be virtually ANY physical design from virtually ANY physical substance Remember that "KOIN" stands for and originates form "Knowledge Object Information Network" and this gives a deeper sense of what is going on KOIN is NOT!!! "yet another #$%& bitcoin or the equivalent."  Bitcoins are internet currency.  KOINs are information objects that can be traded, shared, sold, bartered, invested, and presumably go up in value if the information in them is valuable to any market.  Bitcoins are junk IMHO and so are all the rest of the internet coins/currency.  We will accept bitcoins just like we accept dollars, pounds, euros, yen - but we will discount them because of the financial risk factors and other hidden costs in dealing with bitcoins and such. KOINware and KOINactivity and KOINbusiness is just as much about entertainment and frivolous leisure as it is about serious deep, dark business, or about love in all her myriad forms, or security and safety, or health and medicine, or keeping one's possessions and records organized and intact. Our KYBEROS cybersecurity is not simply "encryption" but something more, it is secret, yes, and it is impregnable even to NSA and others, unless one imagines that they can take over a global network of servers in two dozen different countries, not all of which are friendly at all to the USA. MORE DETAILS INCLUDING PERKS
We are asking you to fund us $42,000. We
need this for the following:
• (for the physical side of KOINs) 3D printer, artistic materials and tools,
RFID components, embedded memory components 
• (for the cyber side of KOINs) completing the implementation of our compact  & very secure
server cloud, both software and hardware, including licensing and services 
• advertising and marketing expenses including presentation at a couple of
must-go-to conferences and exhibits upcoming in early 2014
• few programmers Why so little?
Because
(1) so much is already done on the software side and in the overall
architecture and design, and (2) we are keeping costs way down by using outside
services and partner/subcontractors, such as with the cloud provisions. 
No need for all sorts of equipment and overhead.  Also, (3) we are down to
the real “final stretch,” the “golden mile”.  We are not starting from
zero but we are in the middle of the track and we need the financial equivalent
of a big box of Mars and Snicker bars to keep going until the finish line. 
OK?
What
are the risks of us not completing the tech work and not “delivering” to You,
the sponsors, or achieving full and stable business-operation status?
Nil. 
Not virtually, but really.  All the software is either done or is a
straight-shot to completing.  This is not “R&D” – we are done with
that.  What remains is integration, setting things up for web-based
services, starting to produce the physical KOIN devices, and getting our KOINs
into full “circulation.”  We are coming out with something quite novel and attractive and not
subject to being lost in a sea of look-alikes.  and what may emerge out
there that is similar – they will not have what we do on the insides, because
of our cyber security algorithms and other code.
So
what if we don’t reach the whole $42K funding goal? We are confident we will
raise enough so that we will have a very visible and solid Base for the whole
data haven business with KOINS, including the “Private Information Bank and
Trust” operations. We will have enough physical KOINS out there, in physical
and online store that will keep up the momentum.  If we have to go slow
with out KOIN minting and issuance, then we may go slower, but we are Going and
Will Deliver.
What
if we have more funding than $42,000? The initial funding is for launch on a small
scale and we can use extra funds for marketing, production,
distribution, sales and after-sales service and maintaining the cyber security.
We keep you posted further developments from time to time. 
Why
did it take so long if you had started this KOIN-work years ago? We really had
to wait and wait until the markets – you – had enough exposure and experience
with social networks and then internet currencies like bitcoins  for what
KOINS and the whole world of LUX - a software architecture and knowledge-based
operating environment behind and underneath them - are all about.
Plus
it helped that finally there are the things we need in the way of certain APIs,
and our own software already done, and today’s smart phones, and RFID
tech.  We had the architecture started in the 90’s and mostly done even
ten years ago.  Now the world is ready for LUX, and for Private
Information Banking with KOINS in your cloud and in your treasure
chest. 
NOTE:
KOINs will be operating – functioning in cyberspace, maintain in the cloud data
haven, and ready for business through the Private Information Bank and Trust
offices, and available for public starting on June 21, 2014,
5:51AM ET (10:51AM UTC)
What
this means precisely:
The
prices will go up between now and then, and you are reserving yours as a
binding pre-release / Christmas / New Year special offer. According to your contribution, and also
your place in line” (i.e.; how soon you are, an early maker-shaker-mover or a
late-comer- coattails- follower), you receive some thing(s) of great and
growing value for your Contribution. 
Below
you can see the list of all the KOINs in our eight pre-defined and complete
KOIN Series.  These are the KOIN “minting” that will be conducted, and
with KOINs issued for sale, beginning in 2014, and proceeding semi-annually
through 2015, 2016 and 2017, each Series being released publicly during a
period of three months and in eight different cities worldwide.  
For
each KOIN there is, of course, both a cyber (digital) and physical
component.  Each Series contains one each of eight basic KOIN types. 
Within each Series , each basic type has particular unique cyber and physical
features, and the latter includes a unique name and design.  From one
Series to the next, there will be upgrades and changes in both cyber and physical
features, but there will be a general consistency within each Series.  
The
cyber features include differences in ultra secure Kyberos information
allocation and the non-Kyberos high-encryption XOR information allocation, all
within the iBank Cloud Data Haven, as well as variations in the levels of PIBT
services provided to that KOIN.  
The
physical designs will reflect both characteristics of the KOIN names, most of
which are drawn from historical currencies from ancient through near-modern
times, as well as unique artistic features that will be determined by the
artists and craftsmen engaged in the minting of the KOINs.FAQ
[1] E-koin is like Bitcoin? It may look that way at first. Bitcoins are just
money, and the value can go up and down and sometimes very erratically. 
KOINs contain Information that you create, find, gain, barter, etc.  You
can be highly creative, or just be a broker-dealer.  You and the other party make what is in a given KOIN be a valuable commodity or not.  It can be a
game or be dead-serious, this information and how you package it. 
Physical KOIN is a real thing you can handle and hold.  It has an added
value from being artistically unique and creative.  
[2]How does a KOIN work with the
information handling?  It is done with several interesting forms of cyber
security that you will learn about after you are an owner of a KOIN.  It
all works through the internet, yes, but you can store different parts of any
one of your KOIN’s private information “chest” on not one but several KOINs in
the “Cloud” and – purely as an option, not a requirement - you can safely keep
some valuable information also on your physical KOINs.
[3]
Do I need a particular device like an Android or iPhone?  You need any one
of many devices that can communicate through the internet.
[4]
Do I need a special RFID device for my KOINs to work?  No.  Your
cyber KOIN does not depend upon RFID or NFC.  Your physical KOIN doesn’t
either, but it has the capability to be a “tagged” item that you or others can
track via the RFID.  We’ll tell you the details when you get on board as an
early ahead-of-the-pack  sponsor.
[5]
Can I buy things with KOINS? Sure. You can get Cash from your KOINs. But first
you have to do the trade or have one of our licensed PIBT brokers do it for you
(PIBT = Private Information Bank and Trust) 
[6]
Can I have someone manage my KOINs like I can have someone handle my
affairs? Absolutely – go back to [5] and then sign up,
contribute, and learn about what you get through the PIBT.
[7]
How long does it take to do a “business” with my KOINs?  As long as it takes
for you and the buyer / seller to negotiate the Deal in a transaction.  
[8]
Can I use KOINs for things like cars, houses, tickets, gold coins, and
baseball cards, whatever?  Absolutely, nothing is prevented from being used – in any market, anywhere.  You have to either convince the other
party, or barter for something else – what’s the mystery?  This is Basic
Economics 101, for the past 10,000 years at least.
[9]
Are there some merchants already signing up for active trading with
KOINs?  Yes, and we will be announcing the lists before the release of KOINs.
[10]
How do KOINs connect up with LUX and LUXworlds, also invented and developed and
brought to the world?  They work together, but you
don’t need all of LUX for doing things and having fun and making exchanges with
KOINs.  We’ll be happy to explain LUX more after it comes out in its own
way soon.  Then you’ll understand.  For now, focus on KOINs because
they are going to give you the kind of rapid and stable increase of value that
you missed before. 
[11]
Do I have to pay to do things with KOINs?  Yes, when it comes to the
business and the super-secure online cloud-based cyber storage.  But if you
are getting KOINs now, early-on, you are getting that either for free or at a
super-discount.
[12]
What if I lose the physical KOIN or some of the keys and
codes?  For providing the anonymity, there is a big cascade of
security, and some things. The cyber side is a little trickier to explain here
in just a few words.  Yes, some things are recoverable, they may take
longer than proving who you are to a TSA agent or fed agent, but things can be
done – or at least tried. The physical KOIN is like jewelry or art – only one
of a kind. Every KOIN totally, totally Unique.  (That’s part of the reason
we call them also “UniKOINs” – “unique” - get it?
[13] 
How can I be sure that my money spent in all these KOINy thingies doesn’t go
down the tubes in some kind of crash like what happened with bitcoins and plenty of
other things, internet or not?  Well, no guarantees for anything in Life
except that the trip is guaranteed to end, eventually.  But,
realistically, there are plenty of economic values that go up and down and if
you are in at the Start then you can count on things staying worth More than
what you put in at the early stage of Today.
[14]
How can I best store my physical KOINs?  How would you store “proof”
minted gold coins or a Picasso sketch of My
(Fairly) Hot Lady? Your favorite toy?  
[15]
Where are these Private Information Bank and Trust places?  Are they in
different countries?  Are they offshore havens? Can I visit them in
person?  Yes, but if we told you where, we’d have to kill you (just
kidding!)
[16]
How can we be so sure about the safety of the Cyber KOIN data, when everyone in
the world, from Amazon to NSA to Z-anybody, gets cyber attacked and hacked over
and over? See [15].  
[17]
What variety can I get with the physical KOIN?  What are my choices? 
Only what you produce?  No, we like to combine mystery with freedom. 
We have our styles and are designing new ones as we speak. Remember, each KOIN
is Unique.  But for some of the KOIN types, the buyer can do a custom
order, more expensive of course for one or two  than if you order 1000,
but with some “licentious freedom” in every design choice, to be sure!
[18]
Will the “denomination” types change over time?  Yes. But all previous
issues and mints will remain valid and even go up in value – just like with
coins, banknotes, stamps and such.
[19]
How long before KOINs will really “catch on” and be used by millions? 
Well, first of all, we think in terms of billions, not millions.  Hard to
say.  When enough people yawn, open their eyes and wake up, then there is
more and more noise and then the Whole Wide World (WWW) follows. 
[20]
How can I learn more over time, after I pledge and contribute my money here,
and before I receive cyber and physical forms of my KOINs?  We know who
you are and where you are and will keep you posted and happy! (;-))
Finally,
being In the KNOW with KOINs can make a big, big difference in more than your
financial future! Initial offering price of each KOIN of series 1 will be announced before the release in June. Prices will range from $3 - $10 each. We will be happy to answer any further questions as we move
along The creator Dr. D says"This needs to be brought to the attention of people in many fields because of the way people can store very critical information in the physical Koin device and also have it secure and un-tamperable on the Cloud. This can be a lifesaver as well as something for fun and entertainment and profit. People in emergency services, medicine, law enforcement, service to the elderly – they need to know about and support KOINs so that we can supply them to, well, nearly everybody."e-Koins can lead to dates, friendships, and seriously well-matched RelationshipsYou can put whatever you want on your e-Koin. You can have part of that in the customized, personalized physical Koin that you can give to a friend or prospective mate, or even trade among friends. You can start up a chat with someone over an e-Koin - far better than sitting and just texting from your phones to the person across the table or room!e-KOINS can be used for health records and esp. in emergenciesLiterally everyone can benefit from having some key data in the physical KOIN on in what is stored on the Cloud Server. This does not have to be "personal" data but can be the key hints and clues that a person needs to remember. Certainly it can include current and recent medications! Very important for all people!We Value Your Comments / Ideas / Suggestions and YOU Will hear from us within 24 hours. E-mail us at info@e-koins.comUP TO YOU! Comment & Contribute OR Contribute & Comment. Either way we thank you profusely for your support. As a token of our appreciation, you receive generous perks in June, 2014!

story:
The Story

  • Have you ever spent hours on a phone with a call center executive?
  • Ever spent time being put on hold by a call center executive?
  • Ever faced difficulty with communicating with the person on the other end of the line, especially when dealing with personal information?

If the answer is Yes! for any of the above, then we have the right solution for you. Sirvices is trying to revolutionize the way customer support is provided to a customer. Our team is made up of 3 engineering management graduates from Duke University who have spent months together in conceptualizing and building the perfect solution that seeks to solve all of the above problems.

With your support, we will build a product that will save your time & energy. What are you waiting for ... help us help you.

Our mutually beneficial relationship

  • Your support can do wonders to our campaign, spread the word and get people involved. Reach out to us at teamsirvices@gmail.com and give us your feedback.
  • In addition, we are looking to raise $5000 in order to support our marketing campaign and spend this money on web based services which will be used to host our application, process and securely store all your personal data.
  • Each dollar can make a difference and we will go all the way to reach out to our supporters with goodies and much more as mentioned in our perks report! :)
  • If we do end up not reaching our goal, we will dig deep into our pockets and will ensure that our initiative will go on.

Your Impact

Your support will help us develop our initial prototype and showcase it to prospective customers. 

Anirudh, our founder has five and a half years of experience in software development and will kickstart the initial development of our prototype. We will need your support for us to be able to market the product effectively to a wider audience.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our campaign with people around you and raise your voice to support it. Provide your valuable feedback on how we can build a better product for you. Feel free to reach out to us at teamsirvices@gmail.com

story:
First of all, thanks for reading this, it means a lot to me.

Who am I?

I'm Dhaivat Pandya. I am in the ninth grade, and I love to develop software that makes lives easier.

Demo

Check out a demo of NimbleNotes in action right here!
(But, before that, please read the rest of the document) 

Why NimbleNotes?

NimbleNotes is being created because of problems that I face (and you probably face, too), and here they are:

  • I spent half my time messing around with margins, font sizes and colors in Word instead of actually getting work done
  • Word has a bajillion options, only two or three of which we all care about, and I have to go hunting for them every time
  • I needed something that would allow me to write across many computers, and still access the same data
  • I also wanted easy sharing of whatever I wrote across many different websites (Facebook, Twitter, etc.), and not just to other users of the service
  • I hate logins (and I'm sure you do too!).
  • Many services require people to make accounts in order to view things I've shared with them, which is insane
  • Images need to be simple to put in
  • Not all of my family members are computer savvy, but, I still want to be able to share notes and images with them and they shouldn't have to create accounts, or navigate a complex interface
  • I didn't want an application just to take notes; it had to be usuable for writing long pieces as well
  • The application had to be extremely user friendly, yet it cannot compromise my productivity in any way

I realized slowly that there was nothing that satisfied all of these criteria. So, I set out to develop something for myself. 

I got a prototype working, and it solved a lot of these problems for me, and I wanted to take it further because I realized that these problems were common and needed to be solved. I called the solution NimbleNotes. NimbleNotes does these really, really well:

  • Beautiful, well thought out interface
  • It is INCREDIBLY easy to use
  • Keeps the writer extremely productive
  • Only the stuff you need, no cruft
  • All the stuff's in the cloud; you can access it from anywhere!
  • No logins
  • Despite having no logins, it keeps track of your notes for you
  • Images are as simple as drag and drop or copy and paste, no uploading and hunting for files. Images are central to the application, not just something tacked on.
  • Two click sharing on Facebook, Twitter and Email
  • Despite trying its best to be perfectly usable to everyone (for both reading other's notes and writing your own), it doesn't weigh you down in productivity


Here's a demo, right here!
To turn this prototype into an amazing and unique product that will reach your hands, we need *your* help. 

Firstly, we want to create mobile apps for the iPhone, the iPad, Android and Windows Phone 7 so you can write wherever you are, and then be able to pick up on it later. 

We also need some software to get the website perfect for your consumption (like drawing, password-protected notes, etc.), and we need a scalable hosting provider so we can keep NimbleNotes on the air, all the time. 

We'll also have several themes by launch, many of which are dark text on light background.

And, of course, we need trademarks and a bunch of other legal stuff that's required.

So, as a list:

  • A Mac
  • Some software licenses
  • Testing hardware
  • Apple developer ID
  • Legal stuff

After crunching some numbers, we've come out to the minimum cost of $4100. 

Please pledge, so you can use and enjoy the awesome NimbleNotes!
And, pass on the word!

For your efforts, we've come out with some pretty cool rewards:

Perks

  • $5 - Free copy of one app as soon as they hit the App Store/Android Market!
  • $25 - Beta Tester! You get the apps before everyone else, AND you tell us how you'd like it! And, all of the above.
  • $100 - This one's awesome! You get a great NimbleNotes t-shirt, and all of the above! (please add $15 for shipping outside the 'States)
  • $250 - Direct SUPPORT from me!! And, all of the above.
  • $750 - Spot for you and/or your company on our "Sponsored By" page, or, a quote from you and your name on our "Sponsored by" page. And, all of the above.
  • $1000 - Your company gets its logo, in all its glory on our Sponsored By page, and you get a spot at the bottom of the share page, and your URL!!!! Holy moly! And, all of the above.

Make sure you check out the rewards panel at the left!

Thanks a lot for reading this, and please pledge if you can, and pass on the word!

(For pledging, consider using PayPal, so we get to work by using the funds immediately!)

The application had to be extremely user friendly, yet it cannot compromise my productivity in any way



I realized slowly that there was nothing that satisfied all of these criteria. So, I set out to develop something for myself. 

I got a prototype working, and it solved a lot of these problems for me, and I wanted to take it further because I realized that these problems were common and needed to be solved. I called the solution NimbleNotes. NimbleNotes does these really, really well:



Beautiful, well thought out interface
It is INCREDIBLY easy to use
Keeps the writer extremely productive
Only the stuff you need, no cruft
All the stuff's in the cloud; you can access it from anywhere!
No logins
Despite having no logins, it keeps track of your notes for you
Images are as simple as drag and drop or copy and paste, no uploading and hunting for files. Images are central to the application, not just something tacked on.
Two click sharing on Facebook, Twitter and Email

Despite trying its best to be perfectly usable to everyone (for both reading other's notes and writing your own), it doesn't weigh you down in productivity








Here's a demo, right here!


To turn this prototype into an amazing and unique product that will reach your hands, we need *your* help. 


Firstly, we want to create mobile apps for the iPhone, the iPad, Android and Windows Phone 7 so you can write wherever you are, and then be able to pick up on it later. 

We also need some software to get the website perfect for your consumption (like drawing, password-protected notes, etc.), and we need a scalable hosting provider so we can keep NimbleNotes on the air, all the time. 

We'll also have several themes by launch, many of which are dark text on light background.

And, of course, we need trademarks and a bunch of other legal stuff that's required.

So, as a list:


A Mac

Some software licenses

Testing hardware

Apple developer ID

Legal stuff



After crunching some numbers, we've come out to the minimum cost of $4100. 

Please pledge, so you can use and enjoy the awesome NimbleNotes!
And, pass on the word!

For your efforts, we've come out with some pretty cool rewards:
Perks

$5 - Free copy of one app as soon as they hit the App Store/Android Market!

$25 - Beta Tester! You get the apps before everyone else, AND you tell us how you'd like it! And, all of the above.

$100 - This one's awesome! You get a great NimbleNotes t-shirt, and all of the above! (please add $15 for shipping outside the 'States)

$250 - Direct SUPPORT from me!! And, all of the above.

$750 - Spot for you and/or your company on our "Sponsored By" page, or, a quote from you and your name on our "Sponsored by" page. And, all of the above.

$1000 - Your company gets its logo, in all its glory on our Sponsored By page, and you get a spot at the bottom of the share page, and your URL!!!! Holy moly! And, all of the above.




Make sure you check out the rewards panel at the left!

Thanks a lot for reading this, and please pledge if you can, and pass on the word!

(For pledging, consider using PayPal, so we get to work by using the funds immediately!)

story:
What is PayMe?

PayMe is an innovative social application that will allow you to easily manage and track your debts and shared expenses. You lent your friend some money? Paid for the whole pizza? Friend is out of cash and sending a wire transfer for $2.39 seems like an overkill? Don't collect it just now. Track it!

Tracking shared expenses is often better than paying it up instantly. Searching your pockets for a change to pay your friend up is troublesome. Better write it down somewhere and wait for it to get reduced by some future debts or stack up to more manageable amount. You can use a sheet of paper, create spreadsheet on your computer or create a memo on your phone. Or you can use PayMe. 

The main difference between existing debt trackers and our app is that every single transaction need to be accepted by both sides, so you never miss a dime! Are you afraid that some of your friends might not be honest with you? Or maybe just forget that you paid them up already and add you a debt by a mistake? Most of current debt tracking apps work as a private, non-social list. If you add a debt, your debtor doesn't even know it - you track it just for yourself. There are some alternatives that offer exchanging transactions with your friends, but they don't offer you an option to verify incoming debts in any way - they just magically appear in your profile. Yes, you can see the history, but after a month you wouldn't remember if debt "beer at the bar" is valid or not. In PayMe, all new debts have pending status. You can either accept them or, if you believe your friend is mistaken, you can reject them (optionally providing a reason). This way when you look at the debt "beer at the bar" that is 3 months old, you don't need to remember the whole situation. If the debt's status is accepted it means that you have already reviewed this one and found it correct, so no need to dwell on it again. Cool, isn't it?

With PayMe you will be able to:

  • Create and manage your profile
  • Find and connect with your friends within app
  • Create and receive transactions
  • Review incoming transactions, accepting ones that you agree with and reject ones that you don't
  • Browse transaction history, filter it by person, title, date or status
  • View statistics and summaries for each friend separately and overall
  • Track debts among friends who don't have their PayMe account using our unique ImaginaryFriend feature
  • Easily create transactions wherever you are with our native mobile apps (Android, iPhone and Windows Phone)

How much will it cost?

Unlimitted access to all features provided by our app will be completely FREE. We don't know yet what course will our project take and how will it change in time, but we can promise you that we won't implement any premium features. Our supporters will get an extra profile icon or will be rewarded in other way, but when we implement something that actually makes our app more useful, we make it available to everyone.

Ok, so if it's free, why are we doing it?

First of all, because we need that kind of app too. We are 3 computer programmers, just after graduation and we know what it means to be a student. We actually created first version of this app before as a school project and are successfuly using it to this day. And it's so helpful, that keeping it only to ourselves seemed a little selfish. Plus having a website that looks nice, works well and has some people actually using it could really boost our resumes ;)

Why do we need funding?

First of all, we want to host our site on a faster server. Our current plan is good for now, but it won't hold once we go live with full version of application. We are working on PayMe in our free time so obviously we won't pay ourselves any salary, but stuff like photos or some programming libraries are paid for if used publicly and we don't have enough money to fund it all. Of course there are free alternatives, but the outcome quality would be significantly lower. Moverover, we'd like to spend some money to advertise PayMe and make sure more people would hear about us. This project can last only if people are actually using it, so please help us make that happen!

Ourcampaign is using flexible funding, because we're going to need all the money we can get. If our goal amount isn't reached, we'll just host PayMe on slower server and spend less on photos libraries or advertising. But it would be still a lot better than using what we have now.

There are also perks of course! 

Lowest perks include special icon in your PayMe profile and early access. 

For contributions of $50 and more you'll also get our PayMe t-shirt and will be signed to our Contributors list. You'll have beta access to all our new features and more! I

If you really like our project and want to make a donation of $200 and more, you'll become out VIP member. Apart from t-shirt, you'll get an additional gift from us (we want to suprise you so we won't tell you what it is). VIP members are people who spent a lot of money to help make someone else's dream come true so they need to be rewarded whenever possible. We will never forget it.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate any money, thats ok. There are other ways you can help us. First of all, you can spread the word. Tell your friends about PayMe and about this campaign. Use Indiegogo share tools and share it on Facebook or Twitter.

You can also like our Facebook page:

www.facebook.com/paymeapp/

And Google+:

https://plus.google.com/107116705330363588721

story:
JOIN THE EQUIL THANK YOU PROGRAM

Get $25 off.

CLICK HERE TO LEARN MORE


WE ARE SHIPPING NEXT WEEK!



Introducing Equil Smartpen 2. 

Where tradition meets progress, you meet your equilibrium.

From paper to digital, the Equil Smartpen 2 lets you seamlessly create, capture, edit and share your ideas from paper to digital to the cloud.




Simply write or draw on any paper and watch your creation appear on your Android, iOS, Mac and Windows devices and save and sync to Dropbox, Evernote and iCloud for any time, anywhere accessibility.




STRETCH GOALS

Help us reach our Stretch Goals by taking advantage of our Thank You Program.


HOW IT WORKS

Take notes or make sketches with real ink on any paper surface and quickly and easily push them to the cloud.

It doesn't use special paper, but instead uses ultrasound and infrared to accurately pinpoint the pen's position on paper of your choosing, then sends that information straight to your favorite device.

Equil is compatible with Android, iOS, Mac and Windows!


USING EQUIL

Learning how to use the Equil Smartpen 2 is simple.



NOTE VS. SKETCH



EQUIL NOTE

It lets you write notes and diagram ideas with standard ball-point ink and paper and capture them to your favorite device in real-time. Draw on paper as small as a sticky note or as large as A4/Letter.


Hand Writing Recognition

Stop spending time typing up your handwritten notes! With Equil Note’s handwriting recognition feature, transform your notes into editable text to email to your team, or convert selected content to enhance readability.

Equil Note Features 

  • Enhance your notes with color, text, images and backgrounds 
  • Easily navigate between pages and notebooks 
  • Tag notes for easy searching 
  • Send notes to colleagues, family and friends 
  • Import photos, video, maps and add audio 

Equil Note is available on iOS, Mac OS, Android and Windows.


EQUIL SKETCH

Create editable, layered compositions that easily export to PSD and PDF form.

The drawing app for the serious and the spontaneous – Equil Sketch is designed for artists, interior, landscape, fashion and graphic designers, students and hobbyists. 

Equil Sketch Features

  • Connect your Equil Smartpen 2 for a realistic digital version of what you draw on paper, with 600 levels of pressure sensitivity
  • Choose from a collection of brushes and colors
  • Import photos and add images as backgrounds
  • Add shapes and lines
  • Work in layers to overlay ideas
  • Reorder, duplicate, resize and adjust opacity for each layer

Equil Sketch is available on iOS for both iPhone and iPad.



EDITING

Editing your smartpen notes is easy with Equil Smartpen 2.



EDIT ANYWHERE



SHARING

Sharing your smartpen notes is easy with Equil Smartpen.



SHARE AND COLLABORATE

Write with a real, ballpoint pen, on any surface and seamlessly share on you favorite digital channel. 


We know you have great ideas, and cloud integration will help you share them with the world.

Equil Sharing Features

  • Sync your devices (iOS and Android) using iCloud or Dropbox
  • Export layered files to PSD (Photoshop File Format)
  • Share through email or post to Facebook and Twitter
  • Sync your application between devices (iOS, OSX, Win, Android) using iCloud or Dropbox
  • Sync your notes to Evernote to access them from anywhere
  • Post to Facebook and Twitter


EQUIL FEATURES

Explore the built in features on Equil Smartpen 2, designed to give you the greatest writing experience. 



COMPATIBILITY

Equil Smartpen 2 is compatible with devices you already own.


INSIDE THE BOX

Smartpen 2 comes with everything you need, minus the paper.


SMARTPEN 1 VS. SMARTPEN 2

Smartpen 2 is leaps ahead.



FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS


Do I always need to use the pen and receiver as a set?

Yes. The pen sends its signals to the receiver. The receiver sends your pen strokes to your mobile device or computer, or stores them in its memory any time your device is not showing the Equil app - so you never miss any notes!

How can I connect Equil to my mac or PC?

You can pair the Equil receiver to your mac or PC using Bluetooth.

Do I need my phone/tablet on to record my notes?

No! The receiver has built in memory allowing you to record unlimited* pages while on the go, and then import them into your device later. (up to 10,000 pages of typical notes)

What size of paper do I need?

The Equil Smartpen 2 can capture notes on paper up to A4/Letter or as small as a sticky note.

What is that button for on the pen?

The pen goes to sleep if you are not writing for a while. Press the button to wake it up. The same button also allows you to perform gestures for making new pages, or going back and forth between saved pages of notes.

story:
Two students and one teacher strive to change the ways of farming, so that the farmers will be able to produce more crops. We come from River Ridge Middle School in a small town in southwest Wisconsin. We entered the Samsung Solve for Tomorrow contest with a seedling of hope and overnight, it seems, our vision is coming true.

Our two students were asked to identify a problem in the community and within 24 hours they had an idea. They wanted to stop the wasting of corn and soil during rainfall. In order to do this, they had to think of a plausible and reliable solution. Their idea: create a gene gun to infuse bamboo, which has a strong root system, with corn.

We are in need of more funds to make this concept into a product and reality. Any extra funds left over will go to our technology committee in order to purchase more laptops and other technology needed for our school. 

As a small school in rural Wisconsin, we face the struggle of getting our dream out to other communities. We are hoping that through this campaign, our problem and our solution will be heard. 

Any amount will help our cause, even a few dollars. What helps even more though, is spreading the word. Thank you so much!

story:
We just love the Apple Magic Mouse and, as designers, we use it every day. Some time ago we came up with an idea to make this device more comfortable, precise and quiet. 

None of the solutions offered on the market met our expectations, so we decided to act on our own. We wanted to create something simple and elegant, yet practical, that matches the smart design of other Apple products.

And here is our minimalist mousepad inspired by the iconic style of Dieter Rams.

The idea behind our product is quite simple: the combination of a refined mousepad and a special mouse add-on makes friction minimal and gives the impression of the mouse “floating” on the surface of the pad.

 

Detailed design and materials make all the difference. 

Clean and simple

Minimalist design perfectly matches Mac computers.

Premium materials 

No compromises on quality. We carefully select the materials used.

Special coating

The tactile coating is fully compatible with the Magic Mouse.

 

Modern minimalism 

Laser-cut steel sheet coated with nano-ceramic conversion layer. Finished using the sputtering method. Effect: resistance to abrasion and UV radiation.

Discreet branding - no logo on gliding surface.

 

Subtle base 

Beautiful light-grey foam with anti-slip properties.

 

PureShape mousepad and SmartSlider add-on are a dream team for all problems encountered when working with the Apple Magic Mouse all day.

See how it works (30 sec. video):

 

We designed SmartSlider for the first and second generation of the Apple Magic Mouse.

Each set includes both versions.

Packaging

The PureShape mousepad packaging has been carefully designed. 
They say “God is in the Details", so we made it with love:)

Protect your Magic Mouse during travel with our Protector. No more scratches on the glossy surface. Just put it on the mouse before throwing it in your bag.

You can even recharge the mouse with the protector on:)

3 colors to choose: light gray, yellow or black.

Hello. We are Jakub and Jarek - founders of Moonimal.
We’re passionate designers and good friends ever since our school days.

We share the same professional path because we have a similar sensibility
when it comes to life and esthetics.

We both admire Dieter Rams and Richard Sapper.

We both strive to reach the optimal compilation between form and functionality.
Based on simplicity.

That’s why we created Moonimal. 
Moonimal is all about crafting highly functional accessories so you can achieve
harmony in your workspace.

We started with a mousepad for Mac users.
But our heads are filled with other ideas on how to make
your work life more functional… and beautiful.

Stay tuned!

 

We were looking for a solution that would improve the comfort of working with the Apple Magic Mouse and at the same time fit into the minimalist aesthetics of our desks. None of the solutions offered on the market had met our expectations, i.e. neither the cheap foam mousepads (ugly!) nor the more expensive aluminum pads (loud scratching noises!). We decided to act on our own. We’ve worked through dozens of prototypes and researched various materials. After a year of testing, we cannot imagine using the Apple Magic Mouse without our mousepad combined with the SmartSlider:) Now we are ready to show our product to the Kickstarter community.

 

Your support will help us cover the costs of our first production run. 
It will also give us a kick to make next minimalistic products and build the moonimal brand.

If you can, help us spread the word!

story:
The Quick and Dirty:

Today we do everything FAST. From fast food, to faster internet to a fast buck, we gotta have it now. The problem with FAST is this, we are not only missing a lot, as we put the pedal to the metal, we are also HITTING A LOT MORE KIDS!

My name is Angela Moragne (more-rainy). I am founder of a family owned company called That Salsa Lady. We work to eliminate food deserts by bringing fresh selections closer to those who need it most. I happen to also be grandma and legal guardian to our sales director, Dennis. He is 12. YEP! 12! I know cool right?!

Our company has been around for almost 4 yrs and Dennis has been right with us growing, learning and charming everyone he meets. So imagine our shock when he was struck and almost killed by a hit and run driver of a stolen SUV only seconds from our home. 

We did everything right. The police were notified, we contacted the media, even our local officials. Still no suspects. 

In the meantime, we didnt want this happening to another kid and want safety measures installed at this very intersection. To our dismay, we found in order for our intersections to be safer; our tax dollars can pay for many things we disapprove of but NOT for speed humps which increase safety, decrease injuries and keep our kids/families safe. Talk about a bummer! <sad face>

By contributing what you can, getting your friends, frenemies, colleagues, fams and fans to do so as often as you can for the next 60 days, YOU ALL become part owner of a movement which allows EVERY NEIGHBORHOOD who cannot afford to pay for safe intersections a means to do so and BE SAFE!

Here is the deal:

We estimate the initial costs for 4 speed humps to be $10,000. It is our hope to raise enough money to install them at 2 different intersections before Thanksgiving. 

Once we get going in this, it is our desire to keep this effort going across the country and world to ensure no other child has a fate like Dennis'. Would you wanna be hit by a truck let alone by folks who RAN AWAY and left you to die? Of course not. 

Because we cannot stop them, let's work to SLOW their ROLL!

    What is in it for you?

    Only you can answer that question. What is in it for our kids, a longer, happier, safer neighborhood experience in a world where cars may drive fast but they are forced to Slow Yo Roll whenever and wherever kids live and play. 

    The Downside:

    The upside is obvious, we get the funding, install the speed humps, so kids and cars never impact one another. The downside is, nothing happens, not enough folks care to contribute and another kid is struck due to speeding vehicles. 

    The truth is most of us go a bit too fast. We dont wanna miss a thing. Again the problem is the one thing we want to miss, injuring a kid, we HIT because on that particular day, you just had to get somewhere sooner than later and there was not a speed hump to say "HEY! Slow YO ROLL!", "KIDS are playing here!" 

    It was not there because this campaign failed and we failed our kids! No one wants that!

    Wanna do more? Here is how!

    SHARE, TWEET, LIKE, PIN, CARRIER PIGEON this campaign to every person, news/media outlet and space station you can! 


    Then CONTRIBUTE until you cannot anymore! Let's keep our kids safe! Tell everyone to -

    SLOW YO ROLL!

story:
Life is best when simple things work...

When we create our designs we use a number of tools and it was while we were designing some of the others that we thought it was about time we looked at one of those tools in a new light. 

The Ruler is a classic example of a design that's remained unchanged for generations. Aside from evolving from wood to metal and then to plastic, the core design is the same as it was when our grandparents went to school.

Well, not anymore...

Allow us to present the 30° Ruler 

What's different?

The key change we've added is a 30° slope on the ruler's face. It's a simple, yet incredibly effective, update and it makes the 30° Ruler soooo much easier to use.

Easy Reading

The 30° Ruler does away with teeny measurements, instead opting for large fonts and clear indications. This means you can read the measurements at a distance and you'll always be sure to make your mark.

Places its measurements at a comfortable 30° degree angle. This simple improvement means you no longer have to lean over to use the device, thus improving your posture and at the same time making your life easier. 

Good posture will help in later life and reduce pain from neck and backache.

Easy to grab

Easier to pick up from any surface than a traditional ruler.

Non-Slip ​

3D construction inherently non-slip and will keep its place perfectly every time.

Safe for Cutting

Tough material and 3D angle keep your fingers from knife sharp end.

Durable​

Perfect combination of Aerospace grade aluminum and superb engineering resulting in the right balance of great looks, strength, precision and lightweight portability.

Laser Targeted

A deep everlasting finish is not the way traditional rulers are made. Laser-engraving is complex, time consuming and comes at a price... but then the 30° Ruler is not just any ruler.

Two  in one

Simple, yet effective design we have created a ruler that incorporates two different measurements on both sides.

Your choice of measurements​

Our lovely backers will have the options of 3 different measurements and 2 lengths of S/L.

story:
Meet the developer

Hi I'm Orpheus, the creator of Rhyme Coach. I'm a regular guy who wanted to give everyone the power to learn how to rhyme, record and share cool videos with their friends, and have an awesome time in the palms of their hands. So I learned to code and built the app myself. I hope that you'll enjoy and support what I've created for you!

What is Rhyme Coach?

Rhyme Coach is an app that allows you to record videos of yourself rhyming over original beats, and share them instantly with your friends. That's cool because there's no other app that does that. But the COOLEST part about Rhyme Coach is the Rhyme Engine which teaches you to freestyle rhyme (create hip hop songs on the spot) by providing you with an endless stream of rhyming words and phrases.

You learn by ascending through 3 levels of difficulty that use Rhyme Theory, a process that embeds rhymes in your mind. If you already know how to rhyme, the more difficult levels will help you to practice and improve your skills.

In short, it's both a revolutionary social music video recording studio that teaches you a cool skill, and an awesome party game.

You've been to the app store, so you know that THERE IS NO APP LIKE RHYME COACH OUT THERE!

Inspiration on a Napkin

After co-founding a creative online community of people who shared original videos of themselves rhyming, I was blown away to see how many average people wanted to learn to rhyme and enjoyed sharing their videos with friends.  I also encountered countless serious artists who needed an easier way to express themselves through their art online. I wanted to make it simple for both the pros and the novices to learn to rhyme/sharpen skills, and record & share their videos with friends.

I came up with the idea for Rhyme Coach while out at night with friends and sketched out the app on a napkin. After learning how many tens of thousands of dollars it would cost to hire a developer I decided to learn how to do it myself. It took 6 months of day and night effort, coding, testing, and designing, and today the app is a reality. 

Rhyme Engine 

The proprietary Rhyme Engine is at the center of what makes Rhyme Coach work. 

When people learn how to freestyle rhyme they listen to a beat with their friends and throw words out at each other to rhyme with. This can be tough to do for a beginner! Rhyme Coach's proprietary Rhyme Engine generates an endless, continuous stream of rhymes that both a pro and a novice can use to freestyle rhyme on the spot. 

The Rhyme Engine will provide you with a prompt word and a rhyme list. In the first example below, the prompt word is "Grind", and there are 5 rhyming phrases below it to help you to rhyme. The Rhyme Engine automatically syncs up to the beat to provide you with fresh rhymes at an appropriate interval. 

The Rhyme Engine works differently depending upon the difficulty level you set:

On LEVEL 1 the RHYME ENGINE gives you rhyming phrases that you can read to the rhythm until you're comfortable enough to get creative and add your own flair.

On LEVEL 2 the RHYME ENGINE gives you only rhyming words, which is more challenging and allows you to be more creative.

 

On LEVEL 3 the RHYME ENGINE gives you only prompt words, so that you can completely freestyle through your video.

Rhyme Theory

Rhyme Coach uses Rhyme Theory, a 3 step neuro-linguistic process that will teach you to freestyle if you're a beginner, or sharpen your skills if you're advanced.

    1. Embedding: Embed rhyme families and anchor phrases in your mind.

     2. Association: Associate rhyme families and anchor phrases to rhyme.

     3. Freestyle: Randomly access rhyme families and anchor phrases at will.

Each of the 3 levels of difficulty on Rhyme Coach correspond to a step in Rhyme Theory.

Recording & Sharing

Rhyme Coach is easy and intuitive to use. To record, you just hit a button and the app automatically records video for you. 

When you're done share the video on your social media accounts with the touch of a button!

Music

Rhyme Coach allows you to select from a stylistically diverse catalogue of beats to rhyme on. There's something for everyone, and with the touch of a button you can preview or load the beat. 

Rhyme Coach features beats from Grammy Award Winning Super Producer, Omen, who's worked with Drake, Lil' Wayne and Ludacris. 

You Will Make the Difference

You have to power to help take Rhyme Coach to the finish line.

Finishing the iPhone App: I will hire a co-developer on a short term basis to assist me with backend technical quality assurance so that the iPhone app is the perfect possible product, and so that all of you will have a phenomenal user experience. Rhyme Coach can only become a reality with your help to get this professional assistance.

The Android Version: I taught myself to program for the iOS, so I'll need to hire and work with an expert Android developer to help me translate Rhyme Coach into an Android version for all of you out there with Android phones. With your help Rhyme Coach will also be available on Android in no time!

I've done all that I can on my own, and with your help Rhyme Coach will be perfected and available for everyone to enjoy!

Thank You!
