story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Brandon and I've created Print To Point, a service that will provide convenient printing and entrepreneurship for anyone, including college students. 
  • Print To Point is a peer-to-peer print-sharing company that provides safe and secure access to printing capabilities anywhere.
  • Backers will be able to help launch the mobile application for iOS and Android devices. I've already done the ground work and created the wireframing. We are months away from becoming available in app stores.

THE BREAKDOWN

Print To Point hires Print Agents (contractors with mobile printers and printing materials stored in backpacks, purses, bags, etc.) who are located throughout various cities.  

 

The concept uses a cloud-based application in which potential clients, aka customers, can upload and print various documents or photos via the Print To Point app, as either a pick-up or delivery preference.

(Screen shot above is an example. Taco Bell is not affiliated with the product.)

Once a Customer is ready to print, he or she can meet the closest Print Agent to their location OR have their document(s) delivered to them at their location.

Print Agents are easily accessible inside the app and are recognizable with Print To Point logos on backpacks, cars,T-Shirts, and/or hats, including profile pictures within the app.

In a nutshell, Print To Point is your personal document delivery service. Print To Point’s target audience includes college students, businesses, travelers, entertainers, professionals, etc.—virtually anybody who may need printing at their fingertips. Have you ever run out of ink, paper, or you just don't own a printer at all? Print To Point is here to save the day.

Not only will this app make printing documents easy for anyone, It will also provide opportunity for individuals, including college students, to make money while attending classes on campuses or various locations as Print Agents.

Currently, printing is stationary and is only accessible by traveling to a location such as FedEx and/or other print labs. Now printing comes to you via Print to Point, an app and website that is very user-friendly.

  

Risks & Challenges

  • Question: How will you establish Print Agents?
    • Answer: Initially, we will target college students, Uber and Lyft drivers who want to make money part-time as Print Agents. 
  • Question: What are your marketing and advertising strategies? 
    • Answer: We will target college students and ride-sharing drivers to start. There is a significant amount of ride-sharing drivers who mainly service college students. Imagine a ride-sharing provider, driving a student to school and being able to print his or her essay for class ... how convenient is that? OR, that student who doesn't own a printer, who  wants to get extra rest before class and avoid going to the print lab in the morning to print his or her paper. He or she can have their assignment delivered to their dorm/apartment/or even his or her classroom, at a tap of a button.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this campaign on all of your social media platforms.
  • Do you have a young adult in college or know someone who is? Check out the perks section above. We are providing Print To Point Starter Kits: An easy way for college students to make money while going to class.

story:
ABOUT OUR PURPOSE

I am Armen Jaghatspanyan, resident of Armenia. I am an engineer. 

It is known that internal combustion engines are used for constructing vehicles. I invented a new type of internal combustion rotary-piston engine and got a patent for it. It is a very economic engine which consumes too much less fuel than existing engines and, accordingly, emissions of pollutants are less. We need investments to create real working models (prototypes) of this engine. It's the first step of our long way in making better world. We sent proposals to several investors asking to help us in construction of models. But  most of them want to see quick results, which is practically not possible. It takes time and resources.

We do not want you to overload You by detailed technical information. Jast a notice that the principle of working of new engine is based on principle of working of Wankel engine which is a great invention created by Walter Freude and Felix Wankel. Unfortunately the Wankel rotary engine did not show clear advantages over piston internal combustion engine and also had notable shortcomings, which are holding back the massive use of these engines in the industry. But a potentially wide range of possible design solutions provide a wide field of engineering searches. So after a long theoretical research I found that the new engine fixes disadvantages of Wankel engine, providing high efficiency.

 Just imagine a car with this engine, which uses more than two times less fuel and almost does not pollute the atmosphere!


THIS CAMPAIGN IS VERY, VERY IMPORTANT FOR US

It's several months that we (people who support me, my family and I) look for investors to do this job. But the idea seems so unbelievable  to them that many of our requests are left unanswered. People just do not give us a chance to present an evidence such as calculations, drawings, descriptions, or finally the whole patented document. So I hope that our campaign will bring us the desired result because a little below I will represent to our future funders what invention it is, how it can work, what changes and improvements can it bring to humanity.


HOW MUCH FUNDS DO WE NEED, WHAT FOR AND WHAT WILL WE DO

To achieve our first goal, creating prototypes (models) of engine, we need 100000$. By the truth this amount is not big, comparing with the job that we will do. According to my calculations the amount will be enough to construct few working models of new engine. I need the working model-prototypes to test and prove that it is a real, working, useful invention. In nearest future we will need a cooperation in fields of mechanical engineering and energetics. Let me give more specific information in next title.


SOME INFORMATION ABOUT ENGINES AND THEIR COMPARISON

Modern internal combustion engines have 22-28% efficiency, moreover, the high percentage concerns to diesel engines, and the low percentage concerns to gasoline  engines. Car producers make marketing tricks which form a wrong opinion about the efficiency of internal combustion engine, identifying following concepts: "engine efficiency" and "vehicle efficiency". So before searching in internet about information above, remember that "engine efficiency" and "vehicle efficiency" are different concepts. I mention this because I found such controversial articles in internet which confuse real and false numbers.

Modern hybrid cars have about 40% efficiency. But hybrid cars use not only an internal combustion engine, but also an electric motor-generator and a powerful accumulator. Mentioned 40% efficiency is due to motor-generator and accumulator. Car producers introduce this as an increase of engine efficiency. But during last 40-50 years the efficiency of internal combustion engine got a real increase of only 2-3%. So the efficiency of internal combustion engine of hybrid cars stays the same 22-28%. Just imagine what effect we able to get replacing the hybrid car's engine to a new, which has  the same power but consumes more than 2 times less fuel. 

Of course many people may think why to construct a new internal combustion engine if it's possible to use electric motors.Some information about electric motors. The usage of electric motors certainly is our future. But before it's widely usage people must solve problems of getting ecologically clean electricity in large quantities. Now people get electricity mostly by nuclear power stations or by gas, oil or coal burning. Burning of these materials is dangerous for health. And the nuclear power stations may cause to unpredictable consequences. Also a problem is the produced energy which must not be less than vehicles with electric motors need to consume. So there are two important problems to solve to widely use electric motors: first is the issue of electricity, and the second are fast rechargeable motors. Accordingly, the widely usage of electromobiles is possible after 50 or 60 years. This can mean that INTERNAL COMBUSTION ENGINES HAVE A LONG LIFE OF USAGE YET.

NOW ABOUT THE NEW ENGINE. From constructive point of view, the new type of internal combustion engine joins to category of rotary-piston engines.

Currently for transport, aviation and other industries is widely used the traditional internal combustion piston engine with a crank connecting rod mechanism. By several reasons, it doesn’t manage to considerably increase the coefficient of efficiency of piston engine, which is why the most portion of energy of expended fuel losses as heat. An alternative to piston engine could be, so-called, the Wankel engine, which has a number of advantages against to piston engine. But in connection with the constructional features of the Wankel engine, it failed to achieve the desired economy of fuel yet. For this reason, the Wankel engine is not widely used.

I have done theoretical analysis of new engine, based on analytical calculations. There are received exceptional results, which prove that the technical characteristics of new engine considerably exceed the characteristics of piston engine and the Wankel engine. Here is the most important characteristic of new engine: with the same displacement volume the output torque (power) of new engine is 3.2 times greater than the output torque (power) of piston engine. It follows that the new engine, having a 3.2 times smaller displacement volume than piston engine, will have the same power and consume more than 2 times less fuel for doing the same work.

 https://www.facebook.com/patentengine

To imagine the working principle of engine, watch our video which includes an animation with describtion.


IN CASE IF WE WILL NOT REACH OUR GOAL

I hope so much that we will reach our goal. But otherwise we will not surrender. By gathered amount we will construct at least one or two models of new engine.

By creating this campaign I want not only find investments, but also make people to pay attention to this important invention. I believe this is another important goal which needs to be absolutely achieved.

In any case our contributors will receive their perks. 


FUNDING AND SHARING OF OUR CAMPAIGN

Every contribution, even little, is very important for us. Every cent counts. Sharing any information about our campaign is also very important and we think it is also a contribution. Tell about us to world. May be You are not able to make funds for us at this time, but someone else can and he just needs You to inform about him about our idea.


HOW TO CONTRIBUTE

To make a donation, click the "contribute now" button on the right hand side of the screen. Select a perk, or make a contribution. Thank you so much for Your support!


PERKS

Our contributors will be mentioned in our updates at first. We chose perks very carefully. Though there were two reasons which did not allow us offer deserved and necessary perks to our future contributors. That reasons are: 

1. our activity, which is constructing few models of new engine ( so we can not offer our contributors something material which concerns to the new engine because we will not make a production, we will do a scientific research),

2. very high fees of Armenian postal services, which will compel us pay a high fee for sending a perk equal to amount of donation.

So we found other ways to thank our contributors donated up to 20$. We hope our funders will like it. 

Donations 21$ and over will let us work with postal service. 

Also contributors donated 100$ and over, periodically will receive mailing about progress of our planned project. 

About 7-10$ from Your contributions we will be spent to ship Your item.

Also we hope to get not only contributors, but also good friends during this process. 

We present You the offered perks.

1. Amount: 5$

A big BIG THANK YOU!

Dear contributor. Every donation is very important for us. Every dollar, even every cent counts. As You know what type of  invention it is, You may guess, unfortunately for low donations we can give only our many thanks. Check our updates and find your name! Thank to all of You!

story_txt:
ABOUT OUR PURPOSE
I am Armen Jaghatspanyan, resident of Armenia. I am an engineer. 
It is known that internal combustion engines are used for
constructing vehicles. I invented a new type of internal combustion rotary-piston
engine and got a patent for it. It is a very economic engine which consumes too
much less fuel than existing engines and, accordingly, emissions of pollutants
are less. We need investments to create real working models (prototypes) of this engine.
It's the first step of our long way in making better world. We sent proposals to several investors asking to help us in construction of models. But  most of them want to see quick results, which is practically not possible. It takes time and resources.

We do not want you to overload You by detailed technical information. Jast a notice that the principle of working of new engine is based on principle of working of Wankel engine which is a great invention created by Walter Freude and Felix Wankel. Unfortunately the Wankel rotary engine did not show clear advantages over piston internal combustion engine and also had notable shortcomings, which are holding back the massive use of these engines in the industry. But a potentially wide range of possible design solutions provide a wide field of engineering searches. So after a long theoretical research I found that the new engine fixes disadvantages of Wankel engine, providing high efficiency.
 Just imagine a car
with this engine, which uses more than two times less fuel and almost does not
pollute the atmosphere!




THIS
CAMPAIGN IS VERY, VERY IMPORTANT FOR US

It's several months that we (people who support me, my
family and I) look for investors to do this job. But the idea seems so
unbelievable  to them that many of our requests
are left unanswered. People just do not give us a chance to present an evidence
such as calculations, drawings, descriptions, or finally the whole patented
document. So I hope that our campaign will bring us the desired result because a
little below I will represent to our future funders what invention it is, how
it can work, what changes and improvements can it bring to humanity.


HOW MUCH
FUNDS DO WE NEED, WHAT FOR AND WHAT WILL WE DO

To achieve our first goal, creating prototypes (models) of engine, we
need 100000$. By the truth this amount is not big, comparing with the job that
we will do. According to my calculations the amount will be enough to construct
few working models of new engine. I need the working model-prototypes to test and prove that it is a real,
working, useful invention. In nearest future we will need a cooperation in fields of
mechanical engineering and energetics. Let me give more specific
information in next title.


SOME
INFORMATION ABOUT ENGINES AND THEIR COMPARISON

Modern internal combustion engines have 22-28% efficiency,
moreover, the high percentage concerns to diesel engines, and the low
percentage concerns to gasoline  engines.
Car producers make marketing tricks which form a wrong opinion about the efficiency
of internal combustion engine, identifying following concepts: "engine
efficiency" and "vehicle efficiency". So before searching in
internet about information above, remember that "engine efficiency"
and "vehicle efficiency" are different concepts. I mention this
because I found such controversial articles in internet which confuse real and
false numbers. 
Modern hybrid cars have about 40% efficiency. But hybrid
cars use not only an internal combustion engine, but also an electric
motor-generator and a powerful accumulator. Mentioned 40% efficiency is due to
motor-generator and accumulator. Car producers introduce this as
an increase of engine efficiency. But during last 40-50 years the efficiency of
internal combustion engine got a real increase of only 2-3%. So the efficiency of internal combustion engine of hybrid cars stays the same 22-28%. Just imagine what effect we able to get replacing the hybrid car's engine to a new, which has  the same power but consumes more than 2 times less fuel. 

Of course many people may think why to construct a new internal
combustion engine if it's possible to use electric motors.Some information
about electric motors. The usage of electric motors certainly is our future. But
before it's widely usage people must solve problems of getting ecologically
clean electricity in large quantities. Now people get electricity mostly by
nuclear
power stations or by gas, oil or coal burning. Burning of these materials is dangerous
for health. And the nuclear power stations may cause to unpredictable
consequences. Also a problem is the produced energy which must not be less than
vehicles with electric motors need to consume. So there are two important
problems to solve to widely use electric motors: first is the issue of
electricity, and the second are fast rechargeable motors. Accordingly, the widely
usage of electromobiles is possible after 50 or 60 years. This can mean that INTERNAL COMBUSTION ENGINES HAVE A LONG LIFE OF USAGE YET.

NOW ABOUT THE NEW ENGINE. From
constructive point of view, the new type of internal combustion engine joins to
category of rotary-piston engines. 
Currently for transport,
aviation and other industries is widely used the traditional internal
combustion piston engine with a crank connecting rod mechanism.
By several reasons, it doesn’t manage to considerably increase the coefficient
of efficiency of piston engine, which is why the most portion of energy of
expended fuel losses as heat. An alternative to piston engine could be,
so-called, the Wankel engine, which has a number of advantages against
to piston engine. But in connection with the constructional features of the
Wankel engine, it failed to achieve the desired economy of fuel yet. For this
reason, the Wankel engine is not widely used. 
I have done theoretical
analysis of new engine, based on analytical calculations. There are received
exceptional results, which prove that the technical characteristics of new
engine considerably exceed the characteristics of piston engine and the Wankel
engine. Here is the most important characteristic of new engine: with the same
displacement volume the output torque (power) of new engine is 3.2 times
greater than the output torque (power) of piston engine. It follows that the
new engine, having a 3.2 times smaller displacement volume than piston engine,
will have the same power and consume more than 2 times less fuel for doing the same
work.

To imagine the working principle of engine, watch our video which includes an animation with describtion.

I hope so much that we will reach our goal. But otherwise we

By creating this campaign I want not only find investments,

story:
Challenge Someone!


The Impact

Your contribution to this project will help to create an entirely new web and mobile experience! Wigbee is a place where friends interact through challenges, united by a common goal or competition. With your help, Wigbee will promote real life interactions and accomplishments through the web. It is time to start using the web as a tool for challenging yourself, your friends, or the world!  

What is Wigbee?

Wigbee is an exciting new website and mobile app that allows users to create challenges, invite other users to participate, and track the challenges as they progress. Users can add point rewards or wagers for the winner of each challenge as incentives.

Examples:  Challenge your buddies to “sing an original song,” challenge yourself to “run 100 miles in a month,” challenge your class to “build the best Mentos geyser.”

Our innovative software makes it simple for participants to post progress or show they completed the challenge through videos, photos, web links, check-ins and more. The possibilities are completely user-created and endless!

Why We Need Startup Money & What You Get

We are excited to announce that we will be launching our test site (alpha) this July followed by the public release later this summer. Once Wigbee goes live, we will begin generating revenue from the purchase of additional Wigbee points. Until then, there are a few things that we just can’t pay for by ourselves. These include:

  • Getting Wigbee its own server space

    • We are currently sharing space on our web developer’s account. To prepare for growth, Wigbee needs to find its own server very soon. This costs money.

  • Finding and contracting an enthusiastic marketing team member

    • We have a great product, but we need to market it! We need your help bringing a new marketing team member onboard. 


These are two crucial steps towards creating a vibrant Wigbee community on a server that is prepared for growth. Play a part in Wigbee’s future! In return for generosity, backers will receive unique Wigbee rewards and in-site privileges.   

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t help us fund our dream, you can still help us make some noise on the web!  

  • Like us on Facebook.com/Wigbee.

  • Share the link to our funding drive with your friends.

  • Casually slip the word “Wigbee” into your conversations.


Please help Wigbee.com and Wigbee Mobile go live in July of 2012! I challenge you to help us make a difference.

Who are we?

We are three highly motivated and experienced individuals working without pay. We are driven only by our vision for Wigbee and the prospect of this idea taking flight. We believe that life is the ultimate journey made up of a series of fun and exciting challenges. Wigbee is our way of encouraging everyone to shape their own journey by challenging themselves, challenging their friends or challenging the world.

Let us introduce ourselves:

Tim Osborn - I am an engineering PhD student in the field of computational nanotechnology. I thrive on expressing my creativity in technical ways and have a strong entrepreneurial spirit. I enjoy any form of competition and am driven by my curious nature. Since developing the idea behind Wigbee, I wake up with a renewed sense of purpose; driven by the vast possibilities that this project presents. I hope that my enthusiasm becomes contagious and that Wigbee inspires everyone to create more wonderful life experience.


Jesse Murphy - I'm a freelance web designer.  I’ve been creating websites for individuals, artists, small businesses, non-profits, and national organizations for over 10 years.

You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus. - Mark Twain

Zak Dziczkowski - I am a mobile applications developer and teach web/mobile development at Columbus State in Columbus, Ohio. Developing for web and mobile devices is like having a blank canvas and a brush. You are only limited to what you can think up!

Please help Wigbee.com and Wigbee Mobile go live in July of 2012! I challenge you to help us make a difference.
Who are we?
We are three highly motivated and experienced individuals working without pay. We are driven only by our vision for Wigbee and the prospect of this idea taking flight. We believe that life is the ultimate journey made up of a series of fun and exciting challenges. Wigbee is our way of encouraging everyone to shape their own journey by challenging themselves, challenging their friends or challenging the world. Let us introduce ourselves: Tim Osborn - I am an engineering PhD student in the field of computational nanotechnology. I thrive on expressing my creativity in technical ways and have a strong entrepreneurial spirit. I enjoy any form of competition and am driven by my curious nature. Since developing the idea behind Wigbee, I wake up with a renewed sense of purpose; driven by the vast possibilities that this project presents. I hope that my enthusiasm becomes contagious and that Wigbee inspires everyone to create more wonderful life experience. Jesse Murphy - I'm a freelance web designer.  I’ve been creating websites for individuals, artists, small businesses, non-profits, and national organizations for over 10 years. You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus. - Mark Twain Zak Dziczkowski - I am a mobile applications developer and teach web/mobile development at Columbus State in Columbus, Ohio. Developing for web and mobile devices is like having a blank canvas and a brush. You are only limited to what you can think up!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it’s important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it’s going. Be transparent and specific—people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don’t reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
TIME TO SEND A GREETING CARD

There are so many occasions to surprise someone with SendCard.

Check the categories below:

  • Christmas - When the gifts are on their way, you can send Holiday wishes that shine forever.
  • Birthday - Send innovative card that is remarkable and will be remembered.
  • Wedding - Vows are forever - make your wishes for bride and groom living forever as well.
  • Newborn - Send the greetings that can be presented again to the child at their sweet 16!
  • Love - You are serious about that significant person, so they deserve your words for eternity.
  • Thank You - Being grateful is powerful, express your gratitude with permanent card.
  • Sorry - If you messed up, make your apology meaningful, when you really mean it.
  • Have a nice day - Everyday you can write something nice in a very unique way.
  • Mother’s Day - The one person, who always believes in you - send her remarkable wishes.
  • Congratulations - Congratulate with the card and make the success more thrilling.
  • New Home - Congratulate the family on a new place to live with a card that is unforgettable.
  • New Job - Send eternal card to mark new phase of someone’s life.
  • Graduation - Graduating from college or university is worth to make the wishes stay forever.

The SendCard website will be launched with 5 exciting categories: birthday, wedding, newborn, congratulations and love. Further occasions will be added subsequently to make SendCard suitable for every occasion.

 

GREETINGS ARE IN BLOCKCHAIN

Our main technical goal is to keep greeting cards for eternity and make them easy to send.

Blockchain is a technology that disrupted computer science over the last years. The technology utilizes features like:

Durable medium
It is a paper and pen of digital era. Data written in blockchain is persistent and is kept for eternity.
High availability
Data is accessible 24/7 in blockchain network. There is no single point of failure. Additionally, information is automatically backed up on many computers (blockchain nodes), so data is safe.
Transparency
When it runs as a public network, it is independent of any corporation or government.

Due to its advantages, blockchain was quickly adopted as a base for cryptocurrencies. Among many implementations available, we selected ones, that operate as public, distributed networks with high reputation:

IOTA

Innovative blockchain focusing on Internet of Things. Enabling quick and secure data communication between machines and humans.

ETHEREUM

Revolutionary blockchain focusing on smart contracts. Popular among software developers building high quality distributed apps. Famous from crypto-kitties.

BITCOIN

First and the most valuable blockchain. Developed in 2008 by Satoshi Nakamoto, quickly reached market cap of more than $100.000.000.000.

 

OUTSTANDING TECH FEATURES

We want to bring advantages of blockchain to everybody, who sends wishes from the bottom of their hearts.

To accomplish technical goals, keep greeting cards for eternity and make them easily available, we decided to take the following approach:

Web portal

Website that is easy to navigate, no installation, no accounts, no subscription required.

Responsive design

Adapted to use on any device, including mobile, tablet, laptop and desktop.

Greetings

Content of greetings is stored permanently in blockchain of your choice: Bitcoin, Ethereum or IOTA.

Artwork

Card templates are stored permanently in IOTA network as binaries of vector graphic files.

No additional fees

We cover all cryptocurrency fees related to publishing greetings and cards in blockchain.

Notifications

Card recipients will receive an e-mail about a card, with link to view it on www.SendCard.io

User experience

The website is user-friendly and ready to use on mobiles, tablets, PCs and MACs.

Transparency

Used blockchains are public, so cards can be viewed directly in blockchain explorer.

 

WHAT IS SO UNIQUE IN SENDCARD?

Experience full meaning of forever with greeting cards.

The SendCard cards are one of a kind not only because they are sent into the blockchain and stay there forever, we added some extra sauce to sending electronic cards:

  • Each card is prepared exclusively for SendCard and we carefully select the designs.
  • Card preparation is easy and self-explaining, 5 steps and the card is on its way to the receiver.
  • Focus on sending the card without creating user account: no logins or passwords.
  • Not feeling creative today? Don’t worry, our card creator suggests greetings for each occasion.
  • We order designs from young artists to promote new talents and diversity.
  • Use SendCard comfortably on each device, the cards always look great.

 

SPECIAL OFFER FOR YOU

Pledge now to get benefits of early adopters and claim your discount.

  • Get exceptional personalized cards available only for Indiegogo backers.
  • Get service cheaper than regular price, with up to 50% discount.
  • Price guarantee - by pledging now, you get a fixed price. Even when Bitcoin value will go the moon, you will get the service with initial Indiegogo price. Followers outside Indiegogo may not be as lucky.

 

BACK UP AND GET AMAZING PRIZES

Backers can choose vouchers for all available categories or unique cards that will be personalized individually.

$2 USD $3 (33% off)

 Premium card in IOTA

Receive electronic voucher for Premium Card of your choice in IOTA blockchain with 33% discount.
With the voucher, you get access to the SendCard website. There you select preferable category and premium card, add greetings, provide e-mail of the receiver. Your IOTA premium card will be delivered to the person and published in blockchain to stay there forever.

Voucher is active for one premium card from all categories available on SendCard website.

Ethereum Greeting Card

$5 USD $8 (37% off)

Receive electronic voucher for Ethereum Greeting Card. The voucher includes regular and premium cards, so the backer can choose any card from SendCard website that will be delivered to receiver's e-mail and stored in Ethereum- well-known blockchain- to stay there forever.
With the voucher, you get access to the SendCard website, where you select the card you like, add greetings and provide e-mail of the receiver.

This is an Early-Bird limited offer, price is subject to change in the next round of this perk.

A few examples of the card designs to select from are presented at the top of the campaign page.

$20 USD $40 (50% off)

 Ethereum Card x5

Receive electronic voucher for bundle of 5 Ethereum Greeting Cards with 50% discount. The voucher includes regular and premium cards, so the backer can choose any card from SendCard website that will be delivered to receiver's e-mail and stored in Ethereum- well-known blockchain- to stay there forever.

With the voucher, you get access to the SendCard website, where you select the card you like, add greetings and provide e-mail of the receiver.

Price is subject to change in the next round of this perk.

A few examples of the card designs to select from are presented at the top of the campaign page.

$39 USD

Indiegogo Exclusive

 Personalized Ethereum Card
Receive an e-voucher for personalized card for Birthday or Love category, with wishes stored in the famous Ethereum blockchain. Our designer adds information provided by you: name/nick for birthday card or the name of your beloved person to the love card.  You choose from the specially designed  cards presented below:

$149 USD $199 (25% off)

 Bitcoin Greeting Card

Receive an electronic voucher for the Bitcoin Greeting Card. The voucher includes regular and premium cards, so the backer can choose any card from SendCard website that will be delivered to receivers e-mail and stored in Bitcoin- the legendary blockchain- to stay there forever.
With the voucher, you get access to the SendCard website, where you select the card you like, add greetings and provide e-mail of the receiver.

This is an Early-Bird limited offer, price is subject to change in the next round of this perk.

A few examples of the card designs to select from are presented at the top of the campaign page.

Personalized Bitcoin Card

$199

Indiegogo Exclusive

Receive an e-voucher for personalized card from Wedding or Newborn category with wishes stored in the legendary Bitcoin blockchain. Our designer adds information provided by you: the date for a wedding card or the name and date for a newborn card.  You choose from the specially designed  cards presented below:

$499 USD

Indiegogo Exclusive

 Individual card design in BTC (Bitcoin)

Claim this perk and get electronic voucher for exclusive individual card. Select occasion and our designer will prepare and deliver 3 individually designed cards. Select one and send unique card with wishes stored in the legendary Bitcoin. The card prepared for you will not be offered on the website, so you are the only one to ever send permanent wishes using that card. The special person who receives the card will be the only one to ever get it.

This is one-time offer, claim this perk to make sure exclusive Bitcoin card is yours.

For more information like the validity of the vouchers please see the FAQ section.

 

WE DELIVER SENDCARD TO YOU

Oh yes, we proudly do.

Name Agnieszka Holownia-Niedzielska
Role Project Manager
Field of expertise    Business Development
Feature People-oriented cat person
Name Bartosz Niedzielski
Role Tech Expert
Field of expertise    Certified Developer
Feature Action figures collector
Name Mathew Kus
Role Blockchain Expert
Field of expertise    Strategic Advisory
Feature Photo geek

OUR VALUES

We make world-changing blockchain technology available for everyday use.

SendCard is our way to make the world a better and more innovative place:

  • There are so many creative artists and we want to promote their art and deliver unique graphics to SendCard users.
  • It is eco-friendly to use digitalized form for permanent storage of important messages, we deliver this opportunity to everyone.
  • Blockchain is changing the world. To benefit from it, there is no need to develop programming or trading skills. SendCard is a way to get to know incredible possibility with no tech knowledge.

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

Crowdfunding is the best way to verify the idea and make product better.

Indiegogo campaign has an unique advantage of supporting innovative and out-of-the-box projects. This platform has very smart community, that not just selects perks, but contributes to the project. We would like to use this advantage to:

  • Validate idea with community - we think SendCard.io is a great project. Before going live, Indiegogo will help us to verify the vision and assumptions.
  • Receive feedback, that will help us to start with better service, make it easier to use, make it more appealing and enjoyable.
  • Reduce financial risk - by service presale, we can cover partially cost of infrastructure, web design, programming and UX, offering a fair remuneration to young graphic designers.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Every product that uses new technology may face technical or legal challenges, our task is to mitigate them.

Team identified three potential sources of risk for SendCard.io project:

  • Cryptocurrency hype - if Bitcoin or Ethereum price will skyrocket, it will be more expensive to store information in these blockchains, resulting with increase in the price of the service. This does not affect Indiegogo backers, who get price guarantee, but will make future of the service questionable.
  • Time - SendCard.io uses very innovative approach and even though we plan tasks as precisely as possible, we can meet technical obstacles, that can not be foreseen and it could extend delivery time.
  • Legal aspects may change, e.g. cryptocurrencies might be delegalized or law might be tightened up (e.g. only banks will have right to use cryptocurrency), so SendCard.io will no longer be able to operate.

SendCard.io team is aware of related risks and is actively working to mitigate them. In case of seeing the risk of occurrence, we will upfront inform the community. We take responsibility for the project, because we are convinced about its success and we will make our best effort to deliver it according to the promise.

 

WHAT'S NEXT?

Progress is on track, we put a lot of work into this project so far and we believe in its success on Indiegogo.

  • As of 31st of July, we have a solid vision, frontend is ready in 85%, backend is ready in 70% and marketing is well-planned.
  • We believe in the success of Indiegogo campaign and look forward for your support.
  • After finalizing the campaign, www.SendCard.io will operate commercially.
  • The next step in SendCard development is mobile an app.

Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/SendCard.io

story:
We as active users of the desktop 3D-printing technology have always wanted to print more safely and stably while also being able to extend the service life of our 3D-printers themselves. It all began more than a year ago when the number of 3D-printers at our factory started to rapidly increase. And the more we used them the more shortcomings were becoming apparent:

              

                       

The issues above (You can find specific description below) set us a task of finding a solution. Unfortunately, we couldn’t find a proper off-the-shelf product (on account of the size, the price and the functional shortcomings) so, as we weren’t willing to lose neither space, nor money, nor functionality, we had to create it ourselves. 

And now we’re happy to introduce


MiniHood is a compact, affordable and effective way of preserving your health, extending your 3D-printer’s service life and improving the printing quality.


When MiniHood is set:



The advantages of MiniHood:

·  The assembly takes less than 10 minutes. Manual included.

·  2 fan speed modes.

·  A unique system of detachable three-level filters.

·  A uniform air circulation system.

·  Compactness

·  Possibility of independent finishing

·  Affordability

·  The development and creation of MiniHood employs modern personal production methods: 3D-printing and laser cutting


MiniHood is a set of parts consisting of:

·  Laser cutted acrylic plastic panels

·  3d printed plastic parts

·  Fans

·  Detachable filters

·  Power supply 


You can choose one of the two models: 


“Fit” 

MiniHood Fit was specifically designed for MakerBot Replicator 2, MakerBot Replicator 2X, Ultimaker 2 (+), Ultimaker 2 Extended (+)

Assembled:

As a kit:

MakerBot Replicator 2, MakerBot Replicator 2X

Ultimaker 2 (+), Ultimaker 2 Extended (+)


“Box”

It fits almost all the popular 3D-printers: MakerBot, Ultimaker, Zortrax, Witbox, FlageForge, Makergear, LulzBot, DeltaWASP, CraftBot, Wanhao, ROBO 3D, Rostock MAX, BEETHEFIRST, Prusa i3 (and other Prusa models), the popular models from the RepRap family and many others.

MiniHood Box comes in 6 sizes:





Assembled:

Classic 50x50x50 cm


As a kit:

Classic 50x50x50 cm


      


Electronics

All MiniHood electronics is separete from printer.

Currently we are testing 32-36 and 42-48 CFM fans, which provide compleate air change inside the box in about 20 minutes. You can set speed mode for the fans.

We intend to set a timer for the fans, so it can be on, when needed (after your print is finished or just before).


Featured on:


Why we need your help

We have been working on this project for 8 months from a concept to the design that can fit everyone. 


In order to continue working effectively in this direction we need to see that our project is useful not only to us but also to the ones we’ve been developing it for. We want the safe, quality, gentle 3D-printing to be accessible to all. To each one who backs us we are ready to offer up to 40% discount off the retail price depending on the purchasing option you choose.

To be specific, your backing money will go towards the production of plastic parts, the final finishing of the system, the creation of a tuned up production chain, a quality control system and last but not least, efficient filter cartridges production.


Help us make this project Open-Source, spread the word.


        Below you will find specific description of problems and solutions.

Problems we faced:

1)  Harmful substances

Having 4-10 printers working at once made our modest (20m2) room gain a strong characteristic smell, despite the fact that we were using the “clean” PLA plastic. The ABS plastic and other materials evolve the much more harmful volatile matters and particles that can accumulate in your body and in time become the cause of serious illnesses. Even one non-constantly working 3D-printer can have a negative impact on health.

At first we tried out the most obvious way of fighting the harmful emissions – aeration of the room. Apart from the fact that it’s not the most effective method, the risk of distortion of the 3D-models being printed increased drastically if the temperature outside dropped lower than 18o C (~65o F). In other words, we had to decide between our health and quality printing without deformation.

2)  Deformation of models

For us as a company that provides the 3D-printing service and depends on the stability of the equipment’s performance it was one of the major issues for a long time. Not even counting the external impacts, the temperature itself can remain room-level and still be inadequate for stable printing especially if the matter concerns deformation-sensitive plastic or a lengthy printing process.

The easiest solution is to create an enclosed chamber for your 3D-printer from the material at hand: a box or a bag. However, to seal it hermetically you’ll need to “pack” the gadget up really thoroughly thus complicating the access to the needed parts and making it more space-occupying. Plus, you lose the ability to follow the printing process visually.

3)  Operating environment

In time 3D-printers tend to accumulate a lot of dust and other particles, which complicates the maintenance and accelerates the wear. Being the owners of a lot of printers and having to service them we’ve learnt this first-hand.

Besides, there’s always the risk of foreign matters, pets or body parts getting inside during the printing process, which naturally isn’t going to do any good.

4)  The noise

Surely, the noise of working equipment serves as a source of constant irritation. Depending on the model, it can be almost imperceptible or it can be rather loud. However, even the most insignificant noise in large portions can be bad for your health.

Solutions we found:

1) Design

The transparent acrylic plastic panels (2, 3 and 4 mm thick) serve as the framework for MiniHood. The plastic elements and bracings are printed using PLA plastic. The fans with filtering elements are placed on the top and on the bottom creating uniform air circulation inside. The airflow enters at the top and escapes at the bottom providing maximum filtration of the settling particles.

·  The corner parts on the “Box” model hold the panels together making the construction airtight and inflexible.

·  The front handles do the same job for the “Fit” model.

Both models have air distributors that redirect the airflow away from the build platform and to the sides creating the proper circulation while not causing any deformations.

2) Filters

·  The entrance filter is a primary strainer protecting from dust, large and medium particles. It consists of a coal filter and an anti-dust filter. It screens the internal machinery, thus extending its service life and the gaps between maintenance works.

·  The escape filter is a fine gage strainer that consists of 3 different layers. Such filters are used for air purification in hospital wards, administrative buildings, hotels, in food and drug industries. It prevents the emission of the smallest particles, down to the size of 1-2 microns. It also neutralizes the smell.

We now consulting with an expert to bring a simple, but efficient filtration materials together, to provide a 60-70% filtration rank. Although our filter will have its limits with ultra fine particles, but in the other hand, anybody will be able to make it by himself. We plan to deal with ultra fine particles in the future, like an addition to the existing system.


3) Compactness and mobility

Minihood is easily assembled and disassembled and it doesn’t take up much space.

·  When disassembled, The “Fit” model is a set of one bent and several flat panels. When assembled it increases the overall dimensions of your printer slightly, following its contour.

·  The disassembled “Box” model consists of several rectangular panels and plastic parts. When assembled it becomes a confined space with your printer inside.

4) Operating modes

Minihood was designed to work with two fan speed modes. Hence you can control the volume and the speed of the airflow according to the print speed, printing material, outside temperature or any other factors. You can change the fan’s speed at any moment.

5) Affordability and possibility of finishing

One of the key goals while creating MiniHood was to make it affordable for a large number of 3D-printer owners. This applies to the cost as well as physical accessibility, literally:

·  MiniHood costs a few times less than any analogues in the market

·  In order to let anyone regardless of their location purchase MiniHood while not spending a fortune on delivery we offer the following purchasing options:

1)  Digital version (blueprints and models)

2)  Hybrid version (the digital version + ready-made filters and electronics)

Upon purchasing the digital or the hybrid version you are able to finish MiniHood by adding the elements you need or changing the size and construction depending on your needs. This makes the design of MiniHood truly versatile.

·  If our campaign achieves the goal of $6000, on the 1st of April 2017 we will make the MiniHood blueprints and 3D-models open-source. So that literally anyone could use our solution.


About us

We’ve been selling 3D equipment and offering the services of 3D-printing, 3D-modelling and small-lot production for over 3 years. We are a small team keen on 3D technologies and new methods of personal production. You can visit our websites: 3dminifactory.ru and 3dmf.ru or check out our Instagram profile: Instagram.com/3dminifactory


The risks:

Several prototypes of this system have been working at our mini-factory for more than six months without any problems.

The risks are low because:

·  The design of the electronic components is very simple technically and it’s been developed and produced under the control of an experienced engineer.

·  We get the materials from a tried supplier with whom we’ve been collaborating for over a year on various projects (laser cutting, 3D-printing, silicone mould casting).

·  We print a lot and have a large printer fleet so we do have the experience needed for large-scale projects

·  We have picked out several suppliers for filters and electronic elements so even if the stock is low we are not expecting any problems with provision – the materials and components are not that rare.

·  Despite all of the above we might still experience some problems as any other project might. For example, there is a risk of a minor delay in certification, in production of electronic components and in the supply of the needed materials. But we will make every effort to minimize the risks and will keep you well posted on all the updates of our project. 


If you have any questions, please email us at info@3dminifactory.ru



          Help us make this project Open-Source, spread the word.
story_txt:
We as
active users of the desktop 3D-printing technology have always wanted to print
more safely and stably while also being able to extend the service life of our 3D-printers
themselves. It all began more than a year ago when the number of 3D-printers at
our factory started to rapidly increase. And the more we used them the more
shortcomings were becoming apparent:
              



                       
The issues
above (You can find specific description below) set us a task of finding a solution. Unfortunately, we couldn’t find a
proper off-the-shelf product (on account of the size, the price and the functional
shortcomings) so, as we weren’t willing to lose neither space, nor money, nor
functionality, we had to create it ourselves. 

And now we’re happy to introduce














MiniHood is
a compact, affordable and effective way of preserving your health, extending
your 3D-printer’s service life and improving the printing quality.

When
MiniHood is set:



The
advantages of MiniHood:
· 
The
assembly takes less than 10 minutes. Manual included.
· 
2
fan speed modes.
· 
A
unique system of detachable three-level filters.
· 
A
uniform air circulation system.
· 
Compactness
· 
Possibility
of independent finishing
· 
Affordability
· 
The
development and creation of MiniHood employs modern personal production methods:
3D-printing and laser cutting



MiniHood is
a set of parts consisting of:
· 
Laser cutted acrylic
plastic panels
·  3d printed plastic
parts
· 
Fans
· 
Detachable
filters
· 
Power
supply 


You can
choose one of the two models: 

“Fit” 

MiniHood Fit was specifically
designed for MakerBot Replicator 2, MakerBot Replicator 2X, Ultimaker 2 (+), Ultimaker
2 Extended (+)
Assembled:


As a kit:MakerBot Replicator 2, MakerBot Replicator 2X
Ultimaker 2 (+), Ultimaker 2 Extended (+)



“Box”


It fits almost all the popular 3D-printers: MakerBot,
Ultimaker, Zortrax, Witbox, FlageForge, Makergear, LulzBot, DeltaWASP,
CraftBot, Wanhao, ROBO 3D, Rostock MAX, BEETHEFIRST, Prusa i3 (and other Prusa
models), the popular models from the RepRap family and many others.

MiniHood Box comes in 6 sizes:













Assembled:
Classic 50x50x50 cm


As a kit:Classic 50x50x50 cm


      
Electronics




All MiniHood electronics is separete from printer.
Currently we are testing 32-36 and 42-48 CFM fans, which provide compleate air change inside the box in about 20 minutes. You can set speed mode for the fans.
We intend to set a timer for the fans, so it can be on, when needed (after your print is finished or just before).













Featured on:






Why we need
your help
We have been
working on this project for 8 months from a concept to the design that can fit
everyone. 


In order to continue working effectively in this direction we need to
see that our project is useful not only to us but also to the ones we’ve been
developing it for. We want the safe, quality, gentle 3D-printing to be
accessible to all. To each one who backs us we are ready to offer up to 40%
discount off the retail price depending on the purchasing option you choose.
To be
specific, your backing money will go towards the production of plastic parts,
the final finishing of the system, the creation of a tuned up production chain,
a quality control system and last but not least, efficient filter cartridges production.

Help us make this project Open-Source, spread the word.

story:
Organicer is a smart planner that elevates note taking to a whole new level by bridging the gap between your hand-written and digital notes. By capturing your daily handwritten plan with the Organicer app, you can check, change or mark tasks on the go without carrying a planner with you. Transferring your checklists from paper to phone have never been easier! 



Organicer app works on both - iOS and Android platform.

 

While putting pen to paper will always be appealing, digital calenders are becoming more and more handy. Organicer found the way that serves as a bridge between paper and digital notes. 

Handwritten notes from the paper planner are transferred to mobile APP with the help of QR codes: 







Organicer app works on both - iOS and Android platform.
 


A weekly 6.00 AM to 9.30 PM table is here for you to organise your appointments and daily action plan into hourly sections. With a little help of your phone you can take a snap and transfer your appointments into Organicer app. 

Organicer app will automatically recognize filled spaces and set reminders in your phone. You can always choose how much time before each appointment a reminder should be made. 
 


Each daily layout comes with a checklist to get a more transparent overview of what are your daily must-dos. Either you can use it for shopping, tasks that needs to be tackled, steps in a project etc. You can name the tags yourself.

You can create unlimited tags in Organicer app. There are 3 icons under a checklist in a planner’s daily layout. Set tag names for these 3 icons – for example Shopping, Tasks, Projects. If you write down shopping items you need to buy, draw an X across the icon you set for shopping. You can easily edit your lists in Organicer app – either change them, share them with a friend or mark them as done. 
 


There is a blank blacklined space positioned under the date in everyday layout. That is a place for your brainstorming and writing down your thoughts. Taking a snap with your phone will transfer your thoughts into the Organicer app. 

Storing your notes in the app have many advantages. They are easy to edit, manageable and light to carry since they are in your phone. You can always add more of them directly in your phone. 
 


The best part about Organicer checklists and notes is that they can be instantly shared amongs your friends and family. When a task on a shared list is marked as completed it will immediately notify and update everyone else with the list.

 

Our commitment to make a difference in the world we live in and those coming behind us is manifested in our active participation in causes that protect the environment and empower people around the globe. Considering Ines's background in social work, Sasha's involvement in eco and fair-trade products and their passion for travelling in was inevitable that there had to be a greater value added to the planner. 

They were amazed by the impact Barefoot College projects have on different layers of everyday life in rural communities in developing countries. In June 2018, Ines and Sasha travelled to Tanzania, East Africa as part of the Organicer research task. They have visited the Barefoot College's educational centre and a village where their project Solar Mama's is active. They also met Mr. Xavier Juncadella, a head coordinator of Barefoot College for East Africa. 

"When a dream comes with tennacity, hard work, planning, clear objective and is mixed up with good sould you get Organicer," Xavier Juncadella (East African Coordinator - Barefoot College International​)

We believe that the liberating power of education can help people take control of their lives and live purposefully and this is the main reason why we support the Barefoot College.  
 

 

We are a team of 4 friends from Slovenia. Our paths crossed already in teenage years yet our professional lifes merged with the birth of Organicer, in 2017. Ines is a social worker with an artistic soul and David owns a small print shop, is a web developer and designer. David enthraled Ines for graphic design and they started collaborating on various projects. Sasha with his outstanding communication skills, tons of experience in fair-trade projects and a kind soul, fits perfectly to the pair. And then there is  unreplaceable Nika who takes care for organisational means regarding time management and controlling. 
 

Left to right: Ines Mulec, David Sovec (Founders), Nika Starovasnik, Sasha Segula (Team Members)

 

Ines was a full-time student and being a student nowadays demands having a planner. She tried to find the perfect one but soon realised it does not exist. David's working table was always covered in self ad notes and piles of unorganised papers. He as an IT guy, had a total chaos in his office, but had his meetings well organised in his mobile app. They both looked at their needs and realised developing a smart planner would make their lives considerably easier and more productive. With that realisation, Ines's growing designing skills and David's IT knowledge – the idea of Organicer was born. Firstly, creating a functional planner with a good look - secondly, fulfilling the regular planner with an awesome app to keep your data handy in your pocket - and last but not least, contributing to improve the access to education in developing countries. Voila – Organicer has it all!

story:
Strawberry4Pi consists of a shield/baseboard with a Raspbian preinstalled  and an App for your smartphone which allows you to control your electronic devices and projects as services in a few minutes, easier and safer than ever. With no coding required.

We have developed two versions. S4Pi Zero and S4Pi Shield A/B.

  • Strawberry4Pi Zero has 4 relays, power supply 100v-220v, temperature sensor and wifi configuration button.
  • Strawberry4Pi shield A/B has 4 relays, temperature sensor, wifi configuration button and 5v output/input.

You can find two options of hardware. A baseboard for Raspberry Pi Zero W with power supply included and a shield option for Raspberry Pi A/B

  1. Download Raspbian OS with S4Pi Client
  2. Plug S4Pi into your Raspberry Pi
  3. Install the App on your Smartphone

Strawberry4Pi is extremely flexible. It allows the users to create multiple services, managing as many Strawberry4Pi simultaneously as needed, working together as a sole device, even when they are not in the same location. 

    

S4Pi has 4 relays called Pins. As an example, if you wanted to control all your entire garden, you would install as many Strawberry4Pi as you need around your garden, on your lights, pool, watering tools, heaters, garage door… create new services for each one and group the pins as you wish. This way you will have created a new virtual switch to control those pins simultaneously. The unused Pins could be used to create other services with different behaviors!

Strawberry4Pi boards come with an on-board temperature sensor allowing you to create thermostats from the App and triggering actions to control the services previously created. Control your heating, air conditioning systems, temperature in dog kennels,   green-house roof windows... The Day-Night sensor allows you to turn on and off any service automatically when it is dusk or dawn.

Create thermostats and get temperature data from your Strawberry4Pi straight into your S4Pi app. Switch your custom services whenever you want or automatically. Also you can use the Eco Mode to save energy on preselected time schedules.

Enjoy Strawberry4Pi App's friendly user experience, smooth, easy and effective interface, everything smartly thought out to control your services in the easiest way. Create timers, share your services with your friends, receive notification of any event, create thermostats... keep everything under control.   

   App completely free and improving its functionality continuously.

 

Strawberry4Pi could be used in a lot of circustances to solve or improve a process, it gives the users the possibility to automate actions, open and close, move up/down, switch on/off, activate-deactivate... for confort, security, energy savings, accesibility.  You can install Strawberry4Pi anywhere your imagination can think of. Farms, houses, buildings, gardens... and use it to build solutions to make your life and that of those you care about easier. Teach kids electronics and software development.   

Use Strawberry4Pi to control everything you can imagine. Do it easily from the app or even easier! Supported by Cindy, our voice assistant embedded in Google assistant. "OK Google, Cindy turn on my service" Amazing!   

 

Install DIN adaptor for Strawberry4Pi Zero with power supply included. The best option for a professional environment. 

Strawberry4Pi is composed of professionals from differing sectors with ample experience, guaranteeing a high level of know-how in the many aspects of the project and beyond the product itself.   

Install Strawberry4Pi wherever you want. We've developed a 3D printed case for you. Download files and print your case in a few minutes.

If you are a developer of course you can add your custom codes into the Strawberry4Pi platform to adapt it to any requirement you have.  You can also integrate Strawberry4Pi with other platforms like Arduino and trigger you projects from your Strawberry4Pi App.​

S4Pi software uses four gpios for Strawberry4Pi's relays, one for a temperature sensor and four additional gpios to allow to you create your custom developments.

You can find in our Raspbian image everything you need to start to develope your projects. Don't waste your time with solutions too difficult.

We’ve started the campaign with some amazing Early Perks discounts. Save up to 42% on your Strawberry4Pi. This early perks will end the 6th of October 2019. After you will be able to find the standard perks with a lower discount. Get your S4Pi before early bird time is over!!!

Strawberry4Pi is formed by professionals from different sectors with an ample experience, guaranteeing a high level of know-how in the many aspects of the project and beyond the product itself.

story_txt:
Strawberry4Pi consists of a shield/baseboard with a Raspbian preinstalled  and an App for your smartphone which allows you to control your electronic devices and projects as services in a few minutes, easier and safer than ever. With no coding required.We have developed two versions. S4Pi Zero and S4Pi Shield A/B.

Strawberry4Pi Zero has 4 relays, power supply 100v-220v, temperature sensor and wifi configuration button.

Strawberry4Pi shield A/B has 4 relays, temperature sensor, wifi configuration button and 5v output/input.
You can find two options of hardware. A baseboard for Raspberry Pi Zero W with power supply included and a shield option for Raspberry Pi A/B
Download Raspbian OS with S4Pi Client
Plug S4Pi into your Raspberry Pi
Install the App on your Smartphone
Strawberry4Pi is extremely flexible. It allows the users to create multiple services, managing as many Strawberry4Pi simultaneously as needed, working together as a sole device, even when they are not in the same location.     S4Pi has 4 relays called Pins. As an example, if you wanted to control all your entire garden, you would install as many Strawberry4Pi as you need around your garden, on your lights, pool, watering tools, heaters, garage door… create new services for each one and group the pins as you wish. This way you will have created a new virtual switch to control those pins simultaneously. The unused Pins could be used to create other services with different behaviors!Strawberry4Pi boards come with an on-board temperature sensor allowing you to create thermostats from the App and triggering actions to control the services previously created. Control your heating, air conditioning systems, temperature in dog kennels,   green-house roof windows... The Day-Night sensor allows you to turn on and off any service automatically when it is dusk or dawn.Create thermostats and get temperature data from your Strawberry4Pi straight into your S4Pi app. Switch your custom services whenever you want or automatically. Also you can use the Eco Mode to save energy on preselected time schedules.Enjoy Strawberry4Pi App's friendly user experience, smooth, easy and effective interface, everything smartly thought out to control your services in the easiest way. Create timers, share your services with your friends, receive notification of any event, create thermostats... keep everything under control.      App completely free and improving its functionality continuously. Strawberry4Pi could be used in a lot of circustances to solve or improve a process, it gives the users the possibility to automate actions, open and close, move up/down, switch on/off, activate-deactivate... for confort, security, energy savings, accesibility.  You can install Strawberry4Pi anywhere your imagination can think of. Farms, houses, buildings, gardens... and use it to build solutions to make your life and that of those you care about easier. Teach kids electronics and software development.   Use Strawberry4Pi to control everything you can imagine. Do it easily from the app or even easier! Supported by Cindy, our voice assistant embedded in Google assistant. "OK Google, Cindy turn on my service" Amazing!    Install DIN adaptor for Strawberry4Pi Zero with power supply included. The best option for a professional environment. Strawberry4Pi is composed of professionals from differing sectors with ample experience, guaranteeing a high level of know-how in the many aspects of the project and beyond the product itself.   Install Strawberry4Pi wherever you want. We've developed a 3D printed case for you. Download files and print your case in a few minutes.If you are a developer of course you can add your custom codes into the Strawberry4Pi platform to adapt it to any requirement you have.  You can also integrate Strawberry4Pi with other platforms like Arduino and trigger you projects from your Strawberry4Pi App.​S4Pi software uses four gpios for Strawberry4Pi's relays, one for a temperature sensor and four additional gpios to allow to you create your custom developments.You can find in our Raspbian image everything you need to start to develope your projects. Don't waste your time with solutions too difficult.We’ve started the campaign with some amazing Early Perks discounts. Save up to 42% on your Strawberry4Pi. This early perks will end the 6th of October 2019. After you will be able to find the standard perks with a lower discount. story:
How it all started.

 

 

About three and a half years ago I started to work for a robotics company. I could see the writing on the wall: automation was coming and nothing could stop it. 

Where was the place for human work and innovation? 

Robots can do anything as long as you have years of development available and a service support system to keep them going. Be that as it may, what makes human work so special?


As humans, we learn quickly and can switch from task to task without years of development & very little training. 

 

I started to drive for a ride share service and saw the perfect mechanism for human work to thrive again. The only problem with working with the ride share service was the challenge of the car and license. Barriers were keeping it from being a work solution for everyone.

 

 

I thought, “How can this be more accessible to everyone?”

I began to try and resolve how we could remove these barriers. This way everyone could have access to work that fit their lives and gave them what they needed to thrive no matter where they were in the world.

I realized that the largest area of needed work is the cleaning and maintenance of any given location. It’s a big challenge for businesses and workers. These challenges include:

  • Businesses have trouble balancing quality, quantity, and value
  • The tasks at hand aren’t always bountiful
  • When there are tasks, they’re need to be done effectively and efficiently
  • There’s also not a set price for this kind of work
  • Crazy hours 

With all of this, you have a recipe for constant turnover and quality challenges.

Welcome to the Fare Wage family.

We are so excited to bring technology and people together to change the way the world works!

We’re here to put an end to the endless road blocks that keep people from their full earning potential. At Fare Wage we promise that you will only be judged by the quality of your work. 
That’s why we’ve set up our business with four simple responsibilities:

  • Task Manager: Company or business hiring. Typically CEO or HR
  • Task Creator: Upper management
  • Task Approver: Individual(s) responsible for task being complete
  • Tasker: You. This role is the human doing the job.

Task Managers, Creators, and Approvers don't have any access to Tasker's personal information.

They only see your completed tasks in the area with your user ID number and optional user name. This eliminates any partiality or bias on the part of the company or the quality manager. They simply look for completion and rate the quality.

This puts the responsibility on the Tasker. As a Tasker,  strive to always put your best foot forward in your work. Fare Wage will help Taskers with training, basic process and etiquette in every area that you have tasks available.

 

 

Once untimed tasks are completed at a company location, more training becomes available to the Tasker. When you complete and pass any new training for tasks in a location, then those additional new tasks become available the next time you're near the same location.

This is what makes Fare Wage such a perfect solution. 

First, we remove the cost associated with interviewing, hiring, and training. 
Secondly, we reduce overall cost again by using the contractor identification. 
This frees the company to pay a higher rate per task while still saving them more than half the cost of a full time position. The hourly earning potential of the Tasker is greater, due to the fact that they can complete multiple tasks per hour (one hour x 3 tasks = $45) Yes, individuals make more money, but never has that freedom and wealth been made available to the average worker.

 

 

This desire to empower is why we, at Fare Wage, decided to have people fund the launch in their own cities and counties. We want you to see first hand, the change you can create in your life and lives around you. 

 

 

 

Taskers are only limited by government regulations and requirements as to the amount of time an individual can work continuously. 

The goal of Fare Wage is to make it possible for each Tasker to be able to earn 2 to 3 times what a living wage would pay per hour. 

This will vary depending on the cost of living in your local economy.

As far as required work hours -- there are none!

 

 

We only require Taskers login once a day to maintain their active status and see how many opportunities are available. Otherwise, you can set your Tasker user status to vacation mode until you’re ready to work again! This way, you can build your work around life instead of building your life around work.

Together, let’s change the way the world works!

story:
Who We Are

As a writer, I've always struggled to make ends meet.  Original work can be a challenge to market, while you're lucky if any of your fanwork catches enough attention to get a commission tossed your way. It didn't take long for me to realize that this wasn't a problem unique to writers.

In fact, it seemed that the more creators I talked to, the worse the problem was. Artists had their work reposted and undervalued, musicians were lucky to get some ad revenue (let alone a sold song), videographers had their ad revenue arbitrarily cut-off as policies changed, and so on.

As I rallied more creators, we began to brainstorm. WritScrib was born not long after, with a plan to help creators earn a living on their work.

Here's some of our launch-day features:

  • Separate feeds: In addition to your main feed that shows the posts of the people you follow, you can keep an infinite number of tabs open for private messages, tags, and groups. Simply click on the tab that you want to switch to, and that replaces your feed. No more clicking off to other pages or having to re-enter the same search over and over!
  • Groups: Do you want to talk to people about your favorite subject? Create a group about it! Groups can be public or invite-only. Posts made in the group don't show up anywhere else unless you tag it. It's a perfect way to reduce clutter for your followers while still posting WIPs of your work to your dedicated fans.
  • Chips: Each Chip is valued at $0.10 USD. If you like a post, you can Chip-In as many Chips as you want. Those Chips go to the user who created that post. Once someone has at least 50 Chips, they can sell them back to the site! $1.10 gets you 10 Chips to spend. If you're looking to support a creator but can't afford $5/month, how about $0.10? Support your favorite creators without breaking your bank account! 
  • Badges and Emoticons: Show off how many Chips you've earned/purchased! Every 1,000 Chips, you unlock a new badge, and every 5,000 Chips unlocks another 10 emoticons for you to use.
  • Open Communication: We'll have a public Feedback Group for you guys to send us your complaints and suggestions. If enough people support a post in that group, we'll respond! Have an idea or gripe but don't want to be public with it? Don't worry, you can still e-mail us.
  • And More!

We've already got the website, and we've got the basic design:

But we can't do this alone. 

Why We Need Your Help

Starting up a website of this scale requires a little bit of seed money to get it started. That's where you come in.

We're looking for $15,000 to cover the beta build (and final launch) of the website. This covers putting the website together, a small widget that we need to develop, and start-up hosting costs. We've already got the design out of the way and the rest of the features at a ready-to-implement state. We only need this extra push to get this site launched!

Cost Breakdown

  • $4,000 for site setup and custom plugin costs
  • $7,200 for one year of continued programming support
  • $70/mo + reserve for startup server hosting costs

As a bonus, anyone who chips-in at least $5 will be able to get early access to our site through a closed beta. Higher reward-tiers will net you the opportunity to suggest a feature that you want implemented into the site, a chance to talk one-on-one with someone from our team, and the ability to unlock one of the chip-tiers early!

Busking Online

Imagine that you are an artist that's grappling with your social media. You have a decent following on Patreon--but that's only bringing in around $100/month, nowhere near enough for you to live off of. You make some Youtube ad revenue, and you occasionally earn a few commissions.

Now, imagine that you create a WritScrib account.

Any doodle, any vent post, any joke that you make could potential get Chips. Someone finds your drawing from 6 months back and likes it? You make some money on it. Someone thinks you made an insightful comment? You make some money on it. This steady trickle of Chips has no cut-off date: once you make a post, it can keep earning Chips until you delete it or disable receiving Chips on it. This means that a dedicated blogger who is actively posting new creative content has a higher chance of earning money, and this pay can only help when added to your other sources of revenue. This puts a real monetary incentive behind maintaining a strong social media presence.

Risks & Challenges

At this stage, our biggest risks are a lack of funding, and a lack of interest. We've assembled a talented team that can complete the job, but without the means to pay them, that can quickly fall through.

Our second biggest risk comes during testing: if we discover through our beta testing that our costs outweigh our revenue, we may have to revise our strategy by adjusting fees, ads, or donation drives. We'll disclose our costs and revenue during the beta so that our users understand why we're doing what we're doing.

Should we fail to meet our funding goal, we will complete as much of the site as we can before approaching local investors with our prototype.

From speaking to a wide variety of creators, we've found a mostly interested community with a few skeptical voices. We're hoping that interest outweighs skepticism! If people aren't interested, however, we'll open up to the creative community at large for feedback to see what they are looking for in a social network, then revise our strategy to better fit the audience that we want to serve.

I'm a Broke Artist, How Can I Help?

We know that many of the people who will be interested in our social network also happen to be the least likely to have spare income. If you can't spare any money for our campaign, please consider sharing it on Tumblr, Twitter, and wherever else! Just don't be too annoying about it.

Additionally, you can come hang out on our discord. While we can't guarantee that your suggestions will make it into our launch, we can listen and let you know if we have something similar in the works. Or, you can come hang out! We want to remain as open as possible.
