story:
Monitor your internet connection and get actionable information

Whether for our homes or small businesses, there has been no way for us to continuously and independently monitor the quality of our internet connection and connected devices.So we built monitor-io.

It's easy to use, takes less than a minute to install, and lets beginners and experts troubleshoot with ease. The information tracked will allow you to quickly diagnose any problems you may have and give you the "right" data for your internet service provider. 

After two years of development and months of closed beta testing, we're very excited and ready to ship our first batch of product!

Your privacy is extremely important to us. All our measurements are done without accessing any of your personal information or data. Our privacy policy may be found here.

Use cases

Home internet - For anyone who uses the internet for streaming, VoIP or other applications

Gaming - Detect the internet errors causing network lag and game interruptions (see Why Gamers Need More Than Speedtest)

Smart homes - See the status of your IoT device connectivity 

IoT/Equipment installers - Don't get blamed for poor internet performance, quickly segment end-user problems

Small business - Verify that your internet service is always available for you and your customers

Work at home/Remote worker - Make sure local internet connectivity is not the problem

Vacation homes - Remotely monitor the internet service that connects to your sensors, cameras, alarm systems, etc.

Elder care - Monitor your parents' internet connection so you can provide remote support 

 

How does monitor-io work?

It starts with super easy installation:

Step 1: Connect monitor-io device to your router

Step 2: Register it with the monitor-io service

Step 3: (optional) Download our alerting app and choose the alerts you are interested in on the portal

That's it! Our software begins executing continuous lightweight performance tests with our regional cloud servers around the globe. 

These tests measure the quality and reliability of your internet connectivity by detecting subtle issues and interruptions that cause poor video quality, game lag, clipped or dropped (VoIP) calls and other problems with your business or home internet connection. We test around the clock using only a negligible amount of network bandwidth so that you can continue to use your internet without interruption. Our software also detects what devices connect and disconnect from your home network. 

The results are stored and analyzed in our cloud for you to access anytime from anywhere. When your network performance degrades or other issues are detected, notifications can be sent to our alerting app on your smart device or via email/SMS.

 

What does monitor-io do?

 

See internet connectivity status right from the device or the web

A quick glance at the device will give you the status of the internet connection. Not near the device? No problem. You can look it up on the web.

 

 

Continuously track internet performance

Get a quick visual view of how your internet connection has performed over the last 24 hours as well as analysis of any issues. Is the performance only poor during the evenings? You will have the data.

 

Track your internet performance over time

Review historical patterns about the quality of your internet service. Is the performance poor only during the week? We have the data for you and your ISP.

 

Troubleshoot internet connectivity issues

Don't go reboot everything when your internet is down. Run a quick test to see if the problem is inside or outside your home.

 

Get notified of your internet status even when you are not at home

Receive notifications of outages, degradation or critical devices falling off the network via email or the alerting app (iPhone and Android). You decide what is important to you.

 

Measure Wi-Fi speed within your home at different locations

Think you have a poor signal at a particular spot or where you are about to install a new IoT device? Need to find the best location for your wireless router? Run our independent Wi-Fi speed test within your home.

 

 

Get alerted if an unknown device connects to your home network

Someone on your network? Get alerted if a new or unknown device accesses your network. Yes, you can also track when your children come home or when they turned off the game console.

 

Monitor and track how long a device is online or offline

Having intermittent issues with an IoT gadget? Check to see if it is always connected to the network.

 

Receive reports about your internet and IoT connections 

Periodic status reports of your internet service quality and IoT connectivity are delivered right to your email.

 

Installation and setup

The box contains the monitor-io device, a USB cable for power and an Ethernet cable. The monitor-io device hooks up directly to your router and gets power from the USB port on the router. The monitor-io device works with any router.

Once connected, register the device and get ready to monitor your internet service quality. Download the alerting app to get alerts on your smart device.

 

Timeline

 

Evolution of the product design

 

 

 

Feedback from our beta users

 

"Thanks to monitor-io we were able to detect a computer virus on one of our network’s workstations that was spewing out random emails at all hours and clogging our network. However, even after we got rid of the virus we continued to have a poor, spotty & slow connection. We realized that we had outgrown our service and needed to increase our bandwidth and move to a more reliable internet connection. So this month we’re moving our ISP from [ed: ISP name deleted] at 10 Mbps to [ed: ISP name deleted] at 50 Mbps, upgradable to 100 Mbps and at a much lower monthly cost. Thank you for letting me sample this device, it was a big help in identifying our problems and solving them. As a small-to-medium size business owner, I can say this is a very valuable tool that helped us save money and become more efficient." – Patti G. (VP/CFO) – FL

“I love this device. Now I know exactly which devices are on my network, how it's performing, and when I have trouble with [ed: ISP name deleted] (regularly), I can prove it's THEIR network that is at fault not something in my house. Thank you for this product!!!” – Burt M. – CT

“Very Helpful Product - easy to set up & easy to use. Default Reports & diagnostics & available notifications very helpful for those like me who understand the basics but might otherwise be described as a bit technically challenged. I used to think I didn't have enough going on to need something like this (i.e. not a big gamer and don't do a lot of streaming). Now that I have it, and use it, I wouldn't think of doing without it. Much better visibility on Network Performance and solving vexing Network vs Device questions. Made me much smarter & troubleshooting a lot easier. Highly Satisfied!” – David W. – NJ

"Pros: 1) Super easy to install (Bonus: Came in minimal packaging - very green) 2) iOS App, on-line access and local network access makes it easy to configure/change options on the fly 3) I know when my high-schoolers friends all showed up to the party and registered their devices 4) Was able to debug and report a couple of broadband connectivity issues to my ISP within the first couple of months .... Cons: 1) I want the device to be colored metallic - they dont have it on the road-map (yet)" – Tej K. – CA

“Solid product for troubleshooting when the internet goes out” – Venkat D. – NY

“Perfect solution for my home and for my mother-in-law. Makes troubleshooting the glitches at home easy, quick and fun. Saves me even more time now that I don't have to do "house calls' to troubleshoot my mother-in-laws frequent "outages".” – Jim Z. – FL

“Terrific product and service - our internet connections have never been consistent despite our ISPs insistence - with monitor-io I know exactly what is happening and have been able to use this to get better service and save $ ... kids love it to!” – David M. – NY

“Loved being able to keep an eye on my network and devices while we were away over the holidays!!” – Emily M. – NY 

 “Good insight and easy to use - I particularly like the live notifications when a new device is added to my network.” – Ben Z. – CA  

 

Tech Specs

We built our device from off-the-shelf parts and tuned it for the special purpose of running our software to make accurate measurements to our servers in the cloud. For those who are curious the device is made up of the following:

  • Processor: H3 Quad-Core Cortex-A7 ARM 
  • RAM: 512MB DDR3 
  • Connectivity: 10/100 Mbps Ethernet* 
  • OS: Debian Linux

*Because we are never in the data path AND our testing requires so little bandwidth, we can easily support any speed home network (even 1 Gbps or higher).

Data Usage: Our tests are lightweight (about 14Kbps) and run continuously. Over the month the device will consume an equivalent of about one HD movie (less than 5 GB). So if your internet connection has tight caps (e.g., broadband over cellular), you may want to hook up the device periodically to test quality and turn it off at other times.

 

How is monitor-io different? 

The monitor-io device executes performance tests continuously to measure the quality of your internet connectivity using only a negligible amount of network bandwidth. This is done using advanced packet exchange sequences (not pings) that can detect numerous traffic impairments that impact performance -- packet loss, data errors, reordering, high delay variation, etc. We follow several IETF (Internet Engineering Task Force) IPPM (Internet Protocol Performance Measurements) workgroup standards. Our methodology is more comprehensive than ping and more specific than speed tests. More information on our methodology here.

We consider it extremely important to emphasize that we do not use ARP spoofing/poisoning or expect to become your DHCP server. We never alter routing, sit in the data path or access your router. Just as other networked home devices, we connect behind your router/firewall. More feature comparisons to existing solutions may be found below.

 

Risks and challenges

Production delays: While we have made every effort to secure parts from reliable suppliers, there is always a possibility that these suppliers may have trouble supplying parts in a timely fashion.

Unexpected technical issues: While we have been running our beta program in different environments, it is possible that we may come across unique network environments we have not seen in the past. We will obviously endeavor to address these as soon as we can and highlight them for new buyers.

VAT and other taxes: While we are setup to ship globally, backers will be responsible for any VAT and other taxes that may be required within their countries.

We provide a 1 year warranty for the product. The backer is responsible for shipping the product to monitor-io.

FAQs

  • Why did you launch on a crowdfunding site?

We were looking for a platform that had a broad reach so we can gauge interest across countries. The use of the platform reduced some of the logistics so we can focus on the experience of our new customers. We expect to move to a traditional e-commerce model within 60 days.

  • What if I have multiple networks?

In most cases you would need only one unit, installed behind your primary internet access router. However, if you run multiple networks in your home or business, you can install a unit wherever you want a network monitoring point.

  • Will the device have access to my private information?

No, we take our customer privacy extremely seriously and do not access your personal information on any of your devices. We also do not look at personal information traveling on your network. Here is our Privacy Policy.

  • Do you run speed tests all the time?

No, doing speed tests would require us to flood the network. This would slow down your connection and defeat the purpose of evaluating your network performance.

  • What if I want to buy more than 6 units?

Contact us at support@monitor-io.com. Thanks for your interest.

  • Can the service tell me if any of my devices went offline?

Yes, once you let the service know that you want a particular device to be monitored, we will notify you when the device drops off the network.

  • Can monitor-io tell me if my network went down?

Yes, monitor-io will alert you if your home can no longer access the internet.

  • Will this service use a lot of my bandwidth?

No, the monitor-io service is specifically designed to use very little bandwidth. Our testing requires approximately 14 Kbps, less than a single low-bitrate VoIP (Voice over IP) phone call.

  • Will monitor-io help me troubleshoot my internet issues?

Yes, monitor-io can help you troubleshoot your Internet issues and help you diagnose your problem.

  • How do I access the information and reports about my network?

You can access the monitor-io service from anywhere at my.monitor-io.com.

  • What does monitor-io not do?

While some network devices can be very intrusive and interfere with normal network behavior, we follow a strict do-no-harm philosophy (and we believe “control” functions are best suited for the router/firewall already in the data path). 
- monitor-io does not redirect your data or alter your routing. 
- monitor-io does not change your router settings. 
- monitor-io is not a firewall and will not block any traffic from the internet. 
- monitor-io does not look at your personal information or any data going across your network. 
- monitor-io does not prevent access to any websites. 
- monitor-io does not block devices from accessing your network (although we provide information about what is or is no longer connected to it).

  • How do I install monitor-io?

It’s very easy and only takes a few minutes! The monitor-io device is typically connected to the main internet access router of your home. All it takes is to connect an Ethernet cable to a LAN port on your router and a USB cable for power (both are provided).

  • Will I be able to troubleshoot WIFI issues in my home?

Yes. The monitor-io unit provides a tool to test the speed of your wi-fi connection from any point in your home. This is an entirely in-home test, not using servers outside. You can use this tool to determine if there is a problem with your wi-fi connectivity, where in your house you get the best signal, and where is the optimal location for your wi-fi router.

  • Can monitor-io tell me if my home network has internet access problems?

Yes, and monitor-io can alert you when you start having access issues...not just when it becomes a complete outage.

  • Can you help me track when my children are offline?

Yes. Although we don’t look at their data or block their access, we do provide graphs informing you of exactly when their devices were and were not connected. We can also alert you if one of their devices connects to the network during any of your “restricted” time frames (e.g., after 11 PM on a school night).

  • How is monitor-io testing different?

We designed a very lightweight set of internet tests that run continuously 24x7. Unlike an occasional speed test that checks for a maximum bandwidth at a specific moment in time, our quality and reliability testing is always looking for any network errors or impairments that may impact you while you are using the internet.

  • What is the purpose of the display on the monitor-io unit?

The multicolor status display provides an immediate across-the-room confirmation about whether a perceived internet issue is real or not. The obvious benefit is not having to waste time troubleshooting your internet connection if the problem is one of the many other things that can appear similar (e.g., a browser issue, computer problem, poor wi-fi, slow website, overloaded video source,...).

  • Where can I get the technical details about your test methodology?

Our testing methodology may be found here.

  • What can I do if my country is not listed in the shipping locations?

We are constantly adding countries to our list to ship to. Please join our waiting list and we will inform you when your country is added.

  • What is the difference between a consumer and a business account?

There is no difference in the technology, the only difference is the number of devices you can register to a single account and the management interface. A non-business account supports a maximum of 5 devices. However there is no limit to the number of consumer accounts that can be created, each with 5 devices or less. For example if you were to buy a 6-pack for consumer use you would need to register them on at least 2 consumer accounts.

  • What are the additional costs for the business support package beyond 25 units and after the first year?

The business support package fees are described here.

 

About  monitor-io

Krishnamurty Kambhampati (KK) founded monitor-io two years ago. As a successful entrepreneur, KK has a long history of building internet systems and services for successful large-scale networks.

As a smart home aficionado and early adopter, he found himself very frustrated by internet performance problems and IoT connectivity issues. His knack for problem solving motivated him to pursue a solution for these common headaches that affect countless internet users. His journey led him to build a team of network technology experts who shared his belief in making smart network monitoring and simplified troubleshooting available to all.
​
The product, after two years of hard work, is a simple and intuitive device that provides advanced verification of your internet service and home network connectivity. It was built to reduce the time, energy and complexity of detecting, diagnosing and troubleshooting internet issues at home. We are extremely proud to share this product with the world and to introduce everyone to continuous network monitoring.

Monitor your internet connection and get actionable informationWhether for our homes or small businesses, there has been no way for us to continuously and independently monitor the quality of our internet connection and connected devices.So we built monitor-io.It's easy to use, takes less than a minute to install, and lets beginners and experts troubleshoot with ease. The information tracked will allow you to quickly diagnose any problems you may have and give you the "right" data for your internet service provider. After two years of development and months of closed beta testing, we're very excited and ready to ship our first batch of product!Your privacy is extremely important to us. All our measurements are done without accessing any of your personal information or data. Our privacy policy may be found here.Use casesHome internet - For anyone who uses the internet for streaming, VoIP or other applicationsGaming - Detect the internet errors causing network lag and game interruptions (see Why Gamers Need More Than Speedtest)Smart homes - See the status of your IoT device connectivity IoT/Equipment installers - Don't get blamed for poor internet performance, quickly segment end-user problemsSmall business - Verify that your internet service is always available for you and your customersWork at home/Remote worker - Make sure local internet connectivity is not the problemVacation homes - Remotely monitor the internet service that connects to your sensors, cameras, alarm systems, etc.Elder care - Monitor your parents' internet connection so you can provide remote support  How does monitor-io work?It starts with super easy installation:Step 1: Connect monitor-io device to your routerStep 2: Register it with the monitor-io serviceStep 3: (optional) Download our alerting app and choose the alerts you are interested in on the portalThat's it! Our software begins executing continuous lightweight performance tests with our regional cloud servers around the globe. These tests measure the quality and reliability of your internet connectivity by detecting subtle issues and interruptions that cause poor video quality, game lag, clipped or dropped (VoIP) calls and other problems with your business or home internet connection. We test around the clock using only a negligible amount of network bandwidth so that you can continue to use your internet without interruption. Our software also detects what devices connect and disconnect from your home network. The results are stored and analyzed in our cloud for you to access anytime from anywhere. When your network performance degrades or other issues are detected, notifications can be sent to our alerting app on your smart device or via email/SMS. What does monitor-io do? See internet connectivity status right from the device or the webA quick glance at the device will give you the status of the internet connection. Not near the device? No problem. You can look it up on the web.  Continuously track internet performanceGet a quick visual view of how your internet connection has performed over the last 24 hours as well as analysis of any issues. Is the performance only poor during the evenings? You will have the data. Track your internet performance over timeReview historical patterns about the quality of your internet service. Is the performance poor only during the week? We have the data for you and your ISP. Troubleshoot internet connectivity issuesDon't go reboot everything when your internet is down. Run a quick test to see if the problem is inside or outside your home. Get notified of your internet status even when you are not at homeReceive notifications of outages, degradation or critical devices falling off the network via email or the alerting app (iPhone and Android). You decide what is important to you. Measure Wi-Fi speed within your home at different locationsThink you have a poor signal at a particular spot or where you are about to install a new IoT device? Need to find the best location for your wireless router? Run our independent Wi-Fi speed test within your home.  Get alerted if an unknown device connects to your home networkSomeone on your network? Get alerted if a new or unknown device accesses your network. Yes, you can also track when your children come home or when they turned off the game console. Monitor and track how long a device is online or offlineHaving intermittent issues with an IoT gadget? Check to see if it is always connected to the network. Receive reports about your internet and IoT connections Periodic status reports of your internet service quality and IoT connectivity are delivered right to your email. Installation and setupThe box contains the monitor-io device, a USB cable for power and an Ethernet cable. The monitor-io device hooks up directly to your router and gets power from the USB port on the router. The monitor-io device works with any router.Once connected, register the device and get ready to monitor your internet service quality. Download the alerting app to get alerts on your smart device. Timeline Evolution of the product design

story:
About Us

  • Matt Edmonds and Ty Simpson are the developers of this project. They have the background and track record you need to be able to pull off a project of this scale.
  • Matt developed a private, invitation only, Print on Demand platform called Rapid Creator to upload designs onto a range of products with direct Amazon integration, which has been running for 3 years.
  • He was doing Amazon Print on Demand before Amazon launched "Merch", and has sold hundreds of thousands of Print on Demand products on Amazon alone. He has taken the key learnings from this platform to create Single Upload.
  • Ty has been in the Print on Demand industry even longer, with several years of experience  including Vice President at Cafe Press. He is CEO of a company that specializes in multi-channel integrations https://Monetyze.com
  • Ty has great contacts throughout the industry and has been the driving force behind getting official integrations in place, with the full endorsement of each of the platforms we have approached.
  • We have partnered with Kentucky based Prints Express, that Matt co-owns. It is the print company backing the Rapid Creator program and does a great job of quickly printing and shipping quality products.
  • They are the production partner behind the Etsy and Amazon integrations and have good pricing, (much better than Printful, saving $4 per unisex tshirt as an example) without the high integration costs that other platforms charge just for automated Etsy product creation and fulfilment.
  • We have 6 fulltime developers working on our Systems.

The Offering and Opportunity

  • We are already well down the path of completing our initial release of Single Upload, which is currently in Beta Test for some of the platforms.
  • This campaign is your opportunity to get involved early and for us to assess the resources we will require when we do our planned launch in June 2018, based on those that have shown commitment to our project.

​

While the initial integrations are:

  • Etsy
  • Spreadshirt
  • Cafepress
  • Amazon Seller Central (Gold Plan or higher)
  • Merch via Tee Lance

We are actively progressing other integrations through discussions at a senior level with other Print on Demand platforms, with the plan to have full integrations with all of the key platforms that you would want your designs on during 2018. More announcements will follow when it is appropriate to do so.

  • You can get involved for as little as $99 for a 1 year membership for up to 1,000 designs per month which works out at less than 1 cent per design to be uploaded to multiple platforms!
  • Note that to get the Amazon Seller  Central integration included, you would need to purchase our Gold Plan ($299/year) or higher. This has been limited to ensure we can continue to deliver products within Amazon timeframes, as we have for the past 3 Christmas Seasons.
  • Seller Central uploads are limited by Amazon to 2,000 ASINs (SKUs) per week.
  • Merch integration is via Tee Lance, which will be available in 2 versions:

1. Tee Lance Light - $15 / month for Merch integration

2. Tee Lance Full System - $27 / month includes advanced features such as finding copycats of your designs across the internet.

  • Tee Lance subscription is purchased separately from the plans offered in this campaign. We will contact those that join the campaign to notify them of how to join Teelance and integrate it with Single Upload.

What the Funding Will be Used For

  • The funding raised in this campaign goes towards our significant development costs to build the system, future planned features  and additional integrations of Single Upload into more platforms.
  • This isn't a one time project, but an ongoing development that we will spend the next few years adding to and refining, without charging users more for the additional services.
  • The price you lock in now is what you will pay in the future.
  • This project is progressing regardless of the amount of funding received. This is just our opportunity to let you know that your prayers have been answered and Single Upload will be available soon to designers that have backed this project.
  • Note that places in our first release are strictly limited to ensure that we can meet user expectations.

Key Features

  • We have built this solution with bulk upload functionality, to minimize the amount of time taken to upload all of your designs everywhere.
  • We even have template creation solutions to create hundreds of scalable designs at a time in just a few minutes. You can quickly and easily meet your daily merch quotas, even in the highest tiers using this system to rapidly scale winning designs.
  • Upload designs in Merch 4,500 x 5,400 pixel format and we will automatically reformat them for all platforms and product types to be uploaded.
  • Guaranteed delivery within Amazon timeframes. The only POD platform offering this.
  • The project includes full integration into USPTO database, automating the process of checking your designs and warning you when others attempt to Trademark designs that may impact your ability to sell yours in the future.
  • We don't want to give away all our secrets before officially launching, but you can rest assured that https://singleupload.com will be the one platform that you will want to upload all of your designs to, with all of the features you need.

Affiliate Program

Once you have purchased a plan you are eligible to use the Indiegogo affiliate system to promote this campaign and get paid  20% of the sales value as credit in Single Upload, to pay for product purchases for our Amazon and Etsy integrations.

Plan Summary

Choose the plan that is right for you using the details below, then select that plan on the right. There are significant savings available in this campaign compared with the subscription costs when we officially launch.

Ty has great contacts throughout the industry and has been the driving force behind getting official integrations in place, with the full endorsement of each of the platforms we have approached.
We have partnered with Kentucky based Prints Express, that Matt co-owns. It is the print company backing the Rapid Creator program and does a great job of quickly printing and shipping quality products.
They are the production partner behind the Etsy and Amazon integrations and have good pricing, (much better than Printful, saving $4 per unisex tshirt as an example) without the high integration costs that other platforms charge just for automated Etsy product creation and fulfilment.
We have 6 fulltime developers working on our Systems.

The Offering and Opportunity

We are already well down the path of completing our initial release of Single Upload, which is currently in Beta Test for some of the platforms.
This campaign is your opportunity to get involved early and for us to assess the resources we will require when we do our planned launch in June 2018, based on those that have shown commitment to our project.

​
While the initial integrations are:

Etsy
Spreadshirt
Cafepress
Amazon Seller Central (Gold Plan or higher)
Merch via Tee Lance

We are actively progressing other integrations through discussions at a senior level with other Print on Demand platforms, with the plan to have full integrations with all of the key platforms that you would want your designs on during 2018. More announcements will follow when it is appropriate to do so.

You can get involved for as little as $99 for a 1 year membership for up to 1,000 designs per month which works out at less than 1 cent per design to be uploaded to multiple platforms!
Note that to get the Amazon Seller  Central integration included, you would need to purchase our Gold Plan ($299/year) or higher. This has been limited to ensure we can continue to deliver products within Amazon timeframes, as we have for the past 3 Christmas Seasons.
Seller Central uploads are limited by Amazon to 2,000 ASINs (SKUs) per week.
Merch integration is via Tee Lance, which will be available in 2 versions:

1. Tee Lance Light - $15 / month for Merch integration
2. Tee Lance Full System - $27 / month includes advanced features such as finding copycats of your designs across the internet.
Tee Lance subscription is purchased separately from the plans offered in this campaign. We will contact those that join the campaign to notify them of how to join Teelance and integrate it with Single Upload.
What the Funding Will be Used For

The funding raised in this campaign goes towards our significant development costs to build the system, future planned features  and additional integrations of Single Upload into more platforms.
This isn't a one time project, but an ongoing development that we will spend the next few years adding to and refining, without charging users more for the additional services.
The price you lock in now is what you will pay in the future.
This project is progressing regardless of the amount of funding received. This is just our opportunity to let you know that your prayers have been answered and Single Upload will be available soon to designers that have backed this project.
Note that places in our first release are strictly limited to ensure that we can meet user expectations.

Key Features

We have built this solution with bulk upload functionality, to minimize the amount of time taken to upload all of your designs everywhere.
We even have template creation solutions to create hundreds of scalable designs at a time in just a few minutes. You can quickly and easily meet your daily merch quotas, even in the highest tiers using this system to rapidly scale winning designs.
Upload designs in Merch 4,500 x 5,400 pixel format and we will automatically reformat them for all platforms and product types to be uploaded.
Guaranteed delivery within Amazon timeframes. The only POD platform offering this.
The project includes full integration into USPTO database, automating the process of checking your designs and warning you when others attempt to Trademark designs that may impact your ability to sell yours in the future.
We don't want to give away all our secrets before officially launching, but you can rest assured that https://singleupload.com will be the one platform that you will want to upload all of your designs to, with all of the features you need.

Affiliate Program
Once you have purchased a plan you are eligible to use the Indiegogo affiliate system to promote this campaign and get paid  20% of the sales value as credit in Single Upload, to pay for product purchases for our Amazon and Etsy integrations.
Plan Summary
Choose the plan that is right for you using the details below, then select that plan on the right. There are significant savings available in this campaign compared with the subscription costs when we officially launch.

story:
ABOUT FOCUS PLANNER 

"Focus Planner's scientific goal-setting methods help you to smartly increase your productivity, time management and problem solving."

This is not just a ordinary planner, but this planner combination of Your Daily Roadmap + Goal & Target Setting + Problem Solving

PUBLISHED IN NEWS 

ON The Daily Wiz!

Top 5 most promising UK crowdfunding projects

The Focus Planner is very helpful for both recording and storing your daily, monthly, and yearly notes, goals, and events. This is the first time that any planner has been designed with problem-solving strategies. So, you can ask Focus Planner how to solve your problems when nobody else can. It combines a best-in-class professional paper planner with goal-setting, life-changing, and tracking features without any fuss or problems. Using it daily will allow you to manage your time far more effectively than most people ever do. Why? Because you start each day knowing exactly what you have to do and how much time you have to do it.  

Studies show that less than 10% of us will actually achieve our goals and progress according to our plans each year. That means that 90%+ of us fall short. This is due to a lack of right tools with proper processes or strategies. But this does not mean that we have to become masters of goal-making strategies or planning; if you don't know, then don't worry........... The Focus Planner will do this for you and, with help of this planner, you will reach your destination more easily and happily.

                                                            Set of Focus Planner

 

The Focus Planner Advantage :

01. GOAL ACHIEVEMENT STRATEGY : Strategy is like your blueprint for success. TRIZ based scientific planning for achieving goal strategy for your personal and professional problem

02. GANTT CHART MANAGEMENT : You can make your own projects gantt chart for tracking your Individual tasks, length of time,real completion time, planning time, keep in-line project schedule etc.

03. FINANCE TRACKING : Keeping a balanced budget can help you stay on track and sleep better at night.adding up all your accounts, and outlining budget and savings goals

04. HABITS TRACKER : Track you old and new habits easily. This makes you regular, achievable, focusing on your each tasks .

05. LIFE VISUALIZE : Visualize your future and career and get focused to achieve that.

06. MONTHLY GOAL SETTING : Visualize your monthly goal and to do lists and task plan your valuable time for entire month.

07. WEEKLY PLANNER : The Foucs planner weekly overview allows you to track your weekly schedule and you can keep your daily activities more focused and more productive

08. 30 DAYS CHALLENGE : Getting comfortable with discomfort is crucial to success. Give yourself 30 days challenge every month and come closer to your goal

09. SELF REFLECTION : To make sure you keep the connection with yourself for self-reflection. It’s essential to find what you think and how you can be better every time

10. FAILURE MODE ANALYSIS : You can understand your failure by systematic method to identified which factors are wrong for you

11. STAY MOTIVATED : Inspiration quotes and proper self tracking process will help give you the energy that you need to get going and work towards your goals.


What's inside the The Focus Planner? 



The focus planner has the following layouts:

·  Stress management techniques

·  Time management techniques

·  Times wasters : Successful people avoid

·  Mind mapping for life goal

·  Goal achieving strategies for your life 

·  Gantt chart ( Plan and track you project and planning)

·  Yearly Bill Tracker

·  Yearly Expense/Income details

·  Monthly Goals (one for each month)

·  Monthly Goal achieving strategies  (one for each month)

·  Monthly Problem solving strategies  (one for each month)

·  30 Day Challenge (one for each month)

·  Weekly Inspiration- a motivational quote

·  Weekly + Daily Plan - Get Organized with investing in a daily planner

·  Weekly progress Gantt chart - designed for tracking your weekly importance activities

·  Daily task tracker : Track your daily routing activities

·  Monthly over view - (one for each month)

·  Failure mode effective analysis- (one for each month - Analyse last month failure task )

·  Meeting Notes - make the most of all your face-to-face meetings with great notes

·  Your satisfaction total level (one for each month)

·  Monthly Money Planner (one for each month)

·  A blank layout - since some ideas are meant to be shared

In addition to the useful design, you’ll also discover these other wonderful features such as:

·  Over 272 pages. This means you’ll always have space for your next great idea. 

·  Back pocket for keeping things

·  Pen Holder

·  Two page markers.

·   Date-free Planner - Start using the planner any day of the year without wasting pages.

·  High quality leather cover, with acid-free paper.

·  5.75” x 8.25” size  - A perfect size at your-desk or in a meeting.

· 11 set of free stickers with focus planner 

Use of focus planner


Understanding details of focus planner


                                                                       To do lists

                                                   Usage: Life mind mapping page
                                                              Usage: Gantt Chart
                                                             Usage: Yearly Bill Tracker
                                                      Usage: Monthly To Do List
                                                         Usage: Monthly Goal Setting
                                                     Usage: Weekly - Daily To Do Task
                                                              Usage: Monthly Reflection
                                            Usage: Monthly Income-Expense page

Who can benefit from this planner? 

For those who want to plan creatively : This focus planner gives individuals the opportunity to do brainstorming, activities listing, create ideas, list out to-do lists, use weekly gantt chart to compete your tasks, put yourself in action mode and improve performance. 

For those who have very tight schedule: This focus planner gives individuals the opportunity with weekly challenge, reflection and daily task trackers sections provide the opportunity for personal reflection and progressing nicely with tight schedule.  

For those who are in education : This focus planner gives individuals students the opportunity and be up to date with daily to do tasks, daily task trackers, brainstorming ideas section and problem solving strategies section to help out you problems effectively.  

For those who are working professional : This focus planner gives employer, boss, manager, worker or any professionals the opportunity and managing their daily to do tasks, planning their work and balancing personal life with work as well as enhancing with 30 days challenge, keeping bird eye on progress and make solid planning and execution.


What is inside Focus Planner? 


                                  

            

                

                                                       

                            



Risks & Challenges

We are a multiple award winning product design and development startup firm. We are working towards building a creative and an effective environment around us. We have experience in producing and manufacturing books and magazines, and have a good network of people to help us to achieve that. We have well established relationships with our printers and book binders. We have produced different book products already welcomed by different consumers. The biggest risk at this point is timing; but we have already synchronized the system will do everything we can to get these focus planners delivered as quickly as possible or even before time, but there are always events outside of our control (i.e. weather) that could delay in shipping.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot financially contribute to the campaign for any reason, then no worries, just share this indiegogo project with friends and shoot us and e-mail at dfocusplanner@gmail.com and we will add you to the list of people who will receive the Digital PDF! :)

story:
Overview 

The ability to create a mobile site in under 2 minutes.
Have the look and feel of a mobile app with a Scroll CMS mobile site.

Who is Scroll CMS for? Scroll CMS can be used by anyone and everyone. We don't just offer to businesses or corporates. Scroll CMS is designed to help you take your content and give mobile users easy access to everything and even have your site published onto the Apple App Store or Google Play Store.

Scroll CMS is a development by Logic1 Systems which has fully funded the development to this point, and will continue to fund the development. We have a long list of features, improvements and refinements we want to make to Scroll CMS before we release it to the public. The funding helps us put everything we have into Scroll CMS to make it the best mobile CMS solution possible. It also allows those who want to be involved to be a part of the projects BETA testing and have a say in the features, improvements and refinements during development.

If you have watched our preview of the current BETA you will see we have achieved a lot to this point but we want it to be perfect. 

Here are some areas we are still working on. You can find out more by registering for your free account or pledging now!

  • Increase the number of colour themes available
  • Give users the ability to choose from a selection of default mobile site templates
  • Improve CMS management UI and make it as easy to use as possible
  • Integrated support for social media sites
  • Mobile site usage analytics
  • Increase number of supported file types for uploads
  • Add photo and video gallery module

Other videos:




Want to help but can't contribute

If you would still like to help but can't contribute we would appreciate it if you could do any one of the following.

  • Share this page using Indiegogo
  • Like our Facebook page and share our links
  • Visit our website and tell your friends 

Thanks for all your support!


What you get for contributing

Every contribution is important to us. You will stay in the know as we develop and extend our offerings.

Everything in the lower pledge level PLUS:

You will get BETA access to Scroll CMS prior to public release.

$25 - On the wall

Everything in the lower pledge level PLUS:

Have your chosen name published on our wall of thanks on scrollcms.com

$50 - In the door first

Everything in the lower pledge level PLUS:

Part of an advanced mailing list for new features up for consideration and voting rights.
A personalised thank you letter from our team.

$75 - Discount please

Everything in the lower pledge level PLUS:

50% discount on an upgraded account for your first 12 months.

$100 - Larger discount please

Everything in the lower pledge level PLUS:

50% discount on an upgraded account for your first 24 months and a constant 25% discount on your updated account after the 24 months.

$150 - Feature contributor

Everything in the lower pledge level PLUS:

50% discount on an upgraded account for the life of your mobile site. Get features you want into consideration for our future features list.

$250 - On the app store

Everything in the lower pledge level PLUS:

Free publish of your mobile site onto the Google Play and Apple App Stores.*

$500 - Funding partner

Everything in the lower pledge level PLUS:

Special mention and photo on our website as a funding partner. $150 gift voucher to use for upgrading your account.

$1,000 - Let's connect

Everything in the lower pledge level PLUS:

Video conference with a member of our development team to discuss use of your mobile site and let us help you make it amazing!
Apply your discounts to another mobile site. That's right you get all the benefits on two mobile sites.

$2,500 - We love you...

Everything in the lower pledge level PLUS:

Use all your benefits over five mobile sites. Direct access to our development team to discuss your desired features and priority for feature voting.


* Successful publishing of application onto Apple App Store is based on Apple's approval of content.

story:
MCJOY produces incredibly light, smooth and creamy foam even with non-dairy milk in about 1 min. This versatile frother has four buttons for different modes of foam temperature and density, to make either hot cappuccinos and lattes, cold frappes and coffees, cheese tea or warm milk as you like it. Superior to most, it uses electromagnetic coils instead of motor to drive the whisk to set new standards for noise level and portability of milk foamers. Made of premium stainless steel, it prevents staining, rusting or breaking and looks fabulous in the kitchen or the office.

MCJOY is a versatile milk frother that enables you to select four different modes for milk froth with a simple push on the button - hot or cold foam, cream top for milk tea and heated chocolate milk. With MCJOY, you can DIY a wide range of beverages at home that cost less and taste better than Starbucks.  

You are one MCJOY away from being your own barista. MCJOY is ideal for you to easily make hot or cold coffees, teas and drinks with a layer of milk foam on top, such as latte and cappuccino, macchiato, cheese tea, hot cocoa and more.  

MCJOY is phenomenal in being silent, compact yet powerful thanks to its proprietary motorless design. While 99% of the milk frothers feature motors to drive the whisk which can be noisy, bulky and inefficient, MCJOY applies the principle of electromagnetic induction to whip the liquid.

Just add milk to the cup, put on the lid and press the button, it creates perfectly uniform and creamy milk foam in 90 seconds or less. This mighty-yet-small milk frother fits easily in any kitchen cupboard and looks appealing on the counter.

The jug is free of any electronic components so after the milk is frothed, it is easily detachable from the electromagnetic power base, extremely lightweight to hold in your hand and flexibly maneuverable when pouring the foam out, especially while you are trying to create latte art.

It leaves little to no residue after use and can be easily rinsed under flowing tap water or cleaned using a dishwasher.

 

MCJOY’s jug has a large capacity ideal for two small cups of coffee or one large cup. There are two measure marks on the jug to indicate the maximum levels for milk frothing (150ml/5.1fl oz) and milk heating (250ml/8.5fl oz).

It features a safety switch off function which will automatically shutdown when the frothing or heating is done.

The cable and the whisk can be fixed on the slots under the bottom side of the base for a neat storage.

MCJOY has been always focusing on the quality control and new product development. Our factory has been certified by BSCI & ISO9001:2015. Our product liability evaluation lab is equipped with 20 testing equipment which are responsible for the new product evaluation such as basic performance, technical features and safe transportation etc. 

And our QC staffs are involved with the whole production process to ensure each product complies with the client requirements and standards. Our R&D team has over 20 Engineers and we have got 100 patents covering invention, outer appearance and utility model.
story_txt: MCJOY produces incredibly light, smooth and creamy foam even with non-dairy milk in about 1 min. This versatile frother has four buttons for different modes of foam temperature and density, to make either hot cappuccinos and lattes, cold frappes and coffees, cheese tea or warm milk as you like it. Superior to most, it uses electromagnetic coils instead of motor to drive the whisk to set new standards for noise level and portability of milk foamers. Made of premium stainless steel, it prevents staining, rusting or breaking and looks fabulous in the kitchen or the office.MCJOY is a versatile milk frother that enables you to select four different modes for milk froth with a simple push on the button - hot or cold foam, cream top for milk tea and heated chocolate milk. With MCJOY, you can DIY a wide range of beverages at home that cost less and taste better than Starbucks.  You are one MCJOY away from being your own barista. MCJOY is ideal for you to easily make hot or cold coffees, teas and drinks with a layer of milk foam on top, such as latte and cappuccino, macchiato, cheese tea, hot cocoa and more.  MCJOY is phenomenal in being silent, compact yet powerful thanks to its proprietary motorless design. While 99% of the milk frothers feature motors to drive the whisk which can be noisy, bulky and inefficient, MCJOY applies the principle of electromagnetic induction to whip the liquid.Just add milk to the cup, put on the lid and press the button, it creates perfectly uniform and creamy milk foam in 90 seconds or less. This mighty-yet-small milk frother fits easily in any kitchen cupboard and looks appealing on the counter.The jug is free of any electronic components so after the milk is frothed, it is easily detachable from the electromagnetic power base, extremely lightweight to hold in your hand and flexibly maneuverable when pouring the foam out, especially while you are trying to create latte art.It leaves little to no residue after use and can be easily rinsed under flowing tap water or cleaned using a dishwasher. MCJOY’s jug has a large capacity ideal for two small cups of coffee or one large cup. There are two measure marks on the jug to indicate the maximum levels for milk frothing (150ml/5.1fl oz) and milk heating (250ml/8.5fl oz).It features a safety switch off function which will automatically shutdown when the frothing or heating is done.The cable and the whisk can be fixed on the slots under the bottom side of the base for a neat storage.MCJOY has been always focusing on the quality control and new product development. Our factory has been certified by BSCI & ISO9001:2015. Our product liability evaluation lab is equipped with 20 testing equipment which are responsible for the new product evaluation such as basic performance, technical features and safe transportation etc. And our QC staffs are involved with the whole production process to ensure each product complies with the client requirements and standards. Our R&D team has over 20 Engineers and we have got 100 patents covering invention, outer appearance and utility model.

story:
We will be shipping out the reward based on the order sequences. So hurry and grab yours now!! Act fast and get it first! 

As promised, we’ve shipped out three batch of early shipping orders! The next batch of 11" shipment will begin on Feb 11st.

 

The real feedback from the early shipping backer! 

Check out his review video to see the real feedback from the real customer.

Chesona H1 Pro is the world’s first iPad Pro keyboard with a 5-in-1 hub and a detachable case, boosting your productivity on the go. Chesona H1 Pro is compatible with the iPad Pro  11" and 12.9".

A lot of people will tell you that the iPad Pro is mighty powerful, but sorely lacking in ports. Needing to lug a dongle with you everywhere is no fun. That’s where the 5-in-1 hub keyboard case of Chesona comes into play. With our all-in-one hub design, you can connect your iPad Pro to the external monitor, TV, gaming mouse, hard drive, headphone, camera, or more devices like never before.

To provide the best working experience, we decided to go with popular output ports (HDMI, USB-C, USB-A, 3.5mm Audio) most requested by users. It is made to provide a true laptop-like functionality no matter where you need to be. And, let’s see how these ports help...



It provides a perfect solution for extends your screen in a variety of resolutions including 4K@30Hz and 2K@60Hz via the HDMI port.


In addition to USB-C ports, H1 Pro also comes with TWO USB-A Ports which allow you to expand your storage space with USB drive or connect with a mouse(Require iOS 13.0) for precise control and navigation.


It also supports up to 60W power delivery pass-through charging through H1 Pro. Efficient charging at home, in the office or on the go for optimal charging performance of the fast-charging feature.

  • 60W Power Delivery  = Charging your iPad Pro 11" and iPad Pro 12.9" to full takes about 2.35 hours and 2.65 hours.

     

Plug the headphone in for more immersive enjoyment. Connect devices that use a standard 3.5 mm audio plug — like headphones or speakers.

 

 




Type in comfort with the  Chesona H1 Pro Keyboard. It performs like a traditional laptop keyboard and is built with the newest tech, including a full mechanical keyset, backlit keys, optimum spacing for fast, and fluid typing. 



Our Keyboard provides a dedicated row of function keys and smart iOS shortcuts at your fingertips to get you the most laptop-like typing experience on iPad Pro.


LED backlit keys that provide a consistent and confident typing experience in low to no light conditions. Three levels of light to meet your visibility needs, and allowing you to control your workspace... wherever that may be.



The keyboard and case can be easily detached to accommodate different uses and work environments. Whenever you don’t need typing, detach the keyboard and enjoy your beautiful iPad Pro screen with nothing standing in the way. 

 


Connecting to iPad Pro is a Snap —— Just like Apple's Smart Keyboard Folio. No plug. No pairing. The 6-pins connector transfers both data and power between iPad Pro and the keyboard. Batteries aren’t included in H1 Pro. Place your iPad Pro into the base and your keyboard instantly pairs and powers on.

 


Chesona H1 Pro offers a quality keyboard and a detachable & durable case that all seamlessly into one piece. It’s effortless and portable for your on-the-go daily routine! Simply close the lid and go, and it will never slow you down.

 

 

Drawing on the iPad Pro with the Apple Pencil feels fantastic. And the Chesona H1 Pro is made to make that transition seamlessly! It delivers convenient charging and storage in one to enhance your creativity. We made the product very simple and very easy to use for Apple Pencil users!


Unlike most cases, H1 Pro is compatible with wireless charging for Apple Pencil. Easy to charge by attaching Apple Pencil on top of the tablet.  



Put it back into the slot once you finished. Built-in pen slot for the Apple Pencil to stay in. So your Apple Pencil is stored safely when it’s not in use and is right where you need it when inspiration strikes.


The Chesona H1 Pro is a though and very safe keyboard case for iPad Pro. Tough polycarbonate and soft silicone combine in the case to deliver unmatched protection. A removable case deflects impact energy and absorbs shock from accidental fall. 


3D printing prototype sample review (not mass production unit)
 

3D printing prototype sample review (not mass production unit)

 


Share our campaign on one or more social platforms, and leave your comment about the product, you will receive a FREE iPad Screen Flim with each Chesona H1 Pre-Order! 

From now until the end of the campaign, you can refer your friends to get amazing prizes in the following way. Please note that our friend can only use one referral link for one order.

Option:

  • Copy your unique sharing referral link
  • Share your unique sharing referral link with your friends and ask them to join the Chesona family by placing an order for H1 Pro on Indiegogo.
  • You'll receive FREE referral prizes including shipping! Types of prizes vary depending on how many referral orders are tracked via Indiegogo.

 

We are Chesona, we are based in New York and we are professional in making high-quality keyboard cases for tablets! It has been five years since our first product was sold on Amazon, and our product line has received countless praises.

This is the first time we have launched an event at Indiegogo, and we hope to use this method to give back to our old customers who have been supporting us for a long time and also reach the people in the world who are interested in our newest inventions.

 


Feel free to send us a message for your questions.

story:
Pre-order Now at Kono Store

The best low profile mechanical keyboard for gaming and productivity —  fast switches and superior comfort refine your performance. Enjoy typing on all of your devices without compromise.

Untether your digital life with the wireless Hexgears Venture. Our newest slim mechanical keyboard packs superior batteries, multi-device Bluetooth capabilities, and RGB lighting features into a low profile metal-reinforced frame. Game without compromise no matter where life takes you; Venture’s high performance hardware makes departures from your desk easier than ever.

  • Full-size layout in a low profile form factor
  • 4-device Bluetooth Low Energy (4.x+ LE compatible) memory
  • Advanced per-key RGB lighting and light ring
  • Battery life: 4 weeks without RGB (2-3 hours per day), up to 16 hours with per-key RGB
  • Future-proof USB C port for wired mode and charging
  • Accessories: Mac keycaps and Mac mode included
  • 6-key rollover (anti-ghosting) in BT mode, NKRO / 1000 Hz polling when wired
  • Dimensions & weight: 17" x 5.5" x 1" — 1.57 lb.

 

Please send all questions to info@hexgears.org — this allows us to have conversations in a shared US support system. Inquiries on Indiegogo will be directed there as well. When the campaign closes, backers will be emailed a voucher code to redeem at Kono Store (our US partner). You must use your voucher on Kono to claim your reward.

Wireless keyboards let you choose your input experience. Want to game on the couch? Sure, and you can control compatible home theater devices while you’re there. Need to set up a presentation away from your desk? No problem — just unplug the keyboard and take it along. Wired devices (we launched a few this year) are useful for immobile work and stationary gaming, but you can’t beat wireless flexibility.

Keyboard switches directly affect your keyboarding performance and comfort. Mechanical switches, which have discrete metal contacts and springs, are better than mushy rubber domes in a few vital ways. Mechanical durability is remarkable; Venture’s Kailh Choc switches are rated for 70 million presses. While you can rest assured that your switches will stand the test of time, there’s something more important to consider.

Personalization is the key to your satisfaction as a typist or gamer, and mechanical keyboards deliver it. Three different switch options are available in the Venture — linear (red), tactile (brown), and tactile clicky (white, retooled). Each imparts a unique fingertip sensation, or form of tactile feedback, and doesn’t need to be bottomed out to activate. This results in slightly faster input, which is good for gaming. Regular rubber domes are squishy, unsatisfying, and almost always force you to press all the way down. View Venture’s features (below) to learn more and make a Choc switch selection.

 

Most wireless keyboards are compromised by poor design choices. Some optimize for battery life at the expense of key feel and features. Others alter keys to save space, creating an unfamiliar layout, or use a custom dongle that is incompatible with a range of devices. In rare cases, those trade-offs are worthwhile. Most of the time they’re not.

Nonstandard key sizes and other quirks can slow people down. Most companies fail to recognize that some of us want a familiar layout, which hurts the entire tech ecosystem. We created the 108-key Venture to avoid those pitfalls and innovate.

The Hexgears X-1 marked our debut in the US; it was also Hexgears’ first Kickstarter. Amazing backers and helpful reviewers pointed out potential changes. Some of the ideas weren’t right for the X-1, which we envisioned as an ultra-portable keyboard. The concept worked well as it was — an X-1 even went to the South Pole on a research expedition.

Most of those suggestions found a new home in the Venture. Mac keycaps were requested, and they'll be included with every Venture in the final production keyset.  Larger batteries, sculpted keycaps, and new RGB features (like a light ring) were added. Wireless subsystem updates and other tweaks are also complete. Even the manual will be improved vs. the X-1. Read about Venture’s compelling features below.

 

Venture can remember 4 paired devices and switch between them in a couple of seconds — phones, laptops, and more are fair game. This is convenient if you multitask with different devices, as you won’t need multiple keyboards. Venture’s carefully tuned Bluetooth Low Energy chip saves power, offers wide compatibility, and responds quickly while gaming. It operates at the fastest possible polling rate for high performance low latency input.

 

Dual 2000 mAh rechargeable cells are included with the keyboard (for a total of 4000 mAh). That’s a lot of power — more than most smartphones. With RGB lighting disabled, the keyboard lasts 4 weeks with 2-3 hours of use per day. That runtime can even be extended.

Venture’s batteries are user-replaceable via a compartment on the back of the keyboard. You can swap in standard AA cells or compatible rechargeable units. This increases endurance on the go and allows you to replace batteries if they degrade.

 

The Venture includes per-key RGB lighting, which is configured onboard. This ensures functionality with all keyboard-compatible Bluetooth LE devices. It’s also the first wireless keyboard with an RGB light ring. Numerous animations for the keys and light ring are built in.

Battery life varies based on brightness, light settings, and use. We estimate up to 16 hours with the stock rainbow wave pattern. If the light ring is enabled with per-key lighting, that estimate changes to 7 hours — a full day of work or gaming.

 

Three Choc switch options are available in the Venture. You must select a switch on Kono Store after the campaign closes (see Important Information above for details). Choosing a switch can be tough, so we're including some descriptions and raw data to help.

  •  Choc Brown: gentle, smooth tactile switch (quiet, general purpose)
  •  Choc Red: easy to press linear switch (quietest, great for gaming)
  •  Choc White: sharp sounding clicky switch with amazing tactility (loudest, retooled)

If that jargon doesn't make sense, or you need more details, read the following:

  • Brown / tactile switches have a tangible “bump” when pressed, but no click. They’re a familiar option for typists and gamers — most keyboards are tactile.
  • Red / linear switches don’t have a tactile bump or a click. That can be advantageous if you prefer uninhibited keypresses and extra smoothness during a press.
  • White / clicky switches make sharp clicking noises. They also have a delightful tactile bump. Check with your coworkers, or family, before introducing a clicky keyboard. These were retooled for better performance in the X-1 campaign. They’re gloriously loud!

 

The Venture's upper case is machine-finished aluminum, which is carefully textured and anodized for color. Its lower shell is durable injection molded plastic. This ensures solid Bluetooth signal penetration and reduces lower case wear.

We're including Mac keycaps for the bottom row — this is paired with a firmware Mac mode that swaps the modifier keys. Those were the most requested add-ons during the X-1 project.

Hexgears builds high quality equipment for elite gamers and disciplined workers. Gaming is a lifestyle, so each of our products is developed based on feedback from eSports players and keyboarding experts. Peak performance and ultimate control are our calling cards.

We're here to help you dominate at the perfect price. Don’t lose a match because you have a cheap peripheral, and don’t get cheated by branding. The difference between victory and defeat can be a split-second. Play faster, longer, and better with Hexgears.

 

Risks and challenges

Hexgears launched several keyboards in the United States, but our company is still young. Global trade issues such as tariffs and government sanctions could impact Venture production.

Our team designed and produced the X-1, which was very educational, but this will be our first Venture manufacturing run. We constructed and carefully tested a working prototype. Even so, every product is different and has its own set of challenges. Right now we're validating production samples — and everything is looking great. We're almost ready to build keyboards, but we need your help to fund production and implement a slight keycap set redesign.

Partnering with Kono Store for support and distribution reduces overall risk, as they have an existing logistics network and support system (which we're using in the States). We are not the same company — though many people confuse that fact. After Kono piloted the X-1, and gained experience, smooth Venture fulfillment is expected.

Contact info@hexgears.org with any questions or concerns.
