story:
Time is your most precious resource. Yet you irreversibly waste it away. It always feels like you're running behind on something.

emit uses the psychology of time scarcity and auto-suggestion to help you become more productive and take control of your time. 

A simple and intuitive smartwatch that influences you to take action towards achieving your goals.

Timekeeping on phones and traditional smartwatches have to be done amidst all the noise and clutter of other apps which insidiously eat into your time. The best way to prioritize your goals over all other distractions is simple! Write down your targets, set a time frame to it and wear it on you to keep focused. 

Don't let time fly away before its too late. Own time. Own emit.

Viewing time as a countdown makes you perceive it as scarce, which influences your mind to be more proactive and value time more. You will become more realistic with your timelines, and stick to your schedule. 
 

START RIGHT 


See countdown to wake-up time rather than absolute time to feel energised for the day. Just seeing normal time doesn't have any context to you personally. 

Stay disciplined with your sleep with a constant reminder of time remaining before starting your day.
 

LEAVE ON TIME

 

Know how far away your next event is so you’re always on schedule. Keep track of your day itinerary with a simple tap.
 

ARRIVE ON TIME


Always on time. Everywhere. Having a countdown on your wrist helps to condition your mind so you become more punctual.

Seeing your most important tasks, events and goals on your wrist encourages you to be more conscientious in choosing the things that matter most to you. It reminds you of your priorities and compels you into action. 
 

PLAN

 

Note your goals physically to give you a vision. Set your mind on a target so that you can direct all your mind space towards it. 


EXECUTE

Implement your plans with hard work by staying focused. Having your goal on your body keeps you on the right track whilst others procrastinate away on their phones and other distractions. 


SUCCEED 

Achieve your targets within the set time-frame. Small moments of procrastination avoided quickly compound to greater results.  

You often start a project with a lot of passion, only to lose motivation along the way because the momentum fades or other aspects of life knock us down. emit has a progress face dedicated to intuitively show the time progress made within a long term mission so you stay dedicated.
 

MOTIVATION

Schedule times for tasks so you adhere to them. Setting aside time to perform a task ensures that you are prepared for it and committed to it. 
 

CONSISTENCY   


Remind yourself of the bigger picture and your progress. The key to success is a lot of consistency and discipline which you can attain by reminding yourself of your end goal and your journey so far.


RESULTS

Effortlessly convert your plans to reality. Observing progress has shown to encourage us to be more adherent to our long-term goals. 

Keep yourself inspired by realistically planning look-forwards in life. emit can also remind you of the things in your life that make the struggle worthwhile.

 

ASPIRE

Dare to dream big. Dare to write down your dreams. Physically noting your goals makes it more realistic to you, pushing you to work harder towards them. 
 

LOOK-FORWARD 

 

Use your look-forwards to change your mind-set and recharge your mood. If you're having a bad day or week, remind yourself of the great things the future holds for you. 



REALIZE 

 

Make your dreams come true by wearing them on you. Aspire, achieve and go beyond. 

 

emit is a minimal smartwatch that focuses purely on timekeeping. Its core function is to change your mindset in regards to time. It syncs to your phone so you can easily select events on your calendar that you would like countdowns to. It also shows countdowns in different intuitive ways. 

Overview of features

 

 

emit syncs to both Android and iOS phones with free dedicated phone apps that enable you to easily add faces either manually or by selecting calendar events. emit sets up to 10 simultaneous countdowns such that you choose the things that really matter to you.

The app includes the following features: 
- Synchronise events from calendars to your emit 
- Add a range of calendars into the app 
- Manually add / edit faces to your emit 
- To-do list and choosing what items are displayed on the emit 
- Set vibrating alarms on your emit 
- See details about your emit including battery level and model number  

 


Supported Calendars


The app is compatible with calendar applications such as Google Calendar, iCal and Outlook so you have all your calendars in one place, and can choose your desired events to which you would like a countdown on your emit.

 

E.g. of emit's faces: 1 Day/Night countdown, 7 Event countdowns, 1 Progress & 1 Timer

 

 Here is a video of the emit setup experience using our current prototypes:

Body Dimensions: Approx. 42 x 42 x 10 mm     
Body Colour: Black
Weight: Approx. 60 g
Build: Zinc Alloy
Band Material: Silicone
Display: 1.3" IPS LCD touchscreen 240*240 pixels
Multi-touch: Yes
Bluetooth: 4.0, LE, aptX
Battery: Non-removable Li-Ion 340 mAh battery
Chipset: MTK2502

 

 

emit's core ethos is to de-clutter your life and enable you to focus on the things that really matter to you. Keeping that in mind, we have designed emit to be minimal, yet, distinct. 

 

emit represents the pioneering spirit of change.

 

Simple sophistication.

 

Timeless Fashion.

 

Its all about perspective.

 


Clean and intelligent design to let you focus on the important things.

 


Refined style that exudes early adopter behaviour.
 

We have designed emit's user-interface and the hardware. We have tested different prototypes and are excited to get emits in the hands of people around the world.

Exploding View of emit's Planned Components

 

 


emit's Sketches and Prototypes


We now need the help of our Kickstarter community to raise funds to place a minimum order quantity with our suppliers in Shenzhen, China. Having collaborated with manufacturers and suppliers, we expect to begin production of emits as soon as December 2018 (approximately 10 days after finishing the Kickstarter campaign). After manufacturing our cases and assembling the electronics, we will test our sample units for quality control.

Overview of production processes


After completing our testing process, we will oversee the packaging so our backers have a special experience of unboxing their emits. We will then start delivering emits to our backers by May 2019!


 

We are engineering students from Imperial College London who were looking for a tool to better manage our time. We realized people could better perceive the value of time if shown as the remaining amount they had to their next event, or end of their day, instead of as an absolute value. Our mission is to help people accomplish their most important goals and dreams by proactively allocating appropriate amounts of time to each of them. 

Having designed and manufactured a range of products from Bosch hand-tools to electric scooters and a robotic arm as part of our Mechanical Engineering degree, we have developed a passion for building cool new products. We have expertise on custom building and retailing PCs and developing consumer-end apps (in foodtech and edutech) as previous ventures. 

We work on emit full-time and envision emit evolving into a smartwatch with analytics that tracks users' adherence to their goals and helps suggest how to improve on this. Our Kickstarter campaign is the first step to proving that there is a community of realistic optimists who are willing to look at time in a new way to achieve their dreams. 

Join us on the time revolution! 

 


 

We have done a lot of research on how one’s behaviour with time can drastically improve their quality of life. If we hit our stretch goal of $30,000, we will create a book of ways in which you can hack time management. The book will detail our findings how topics such as mindfulness, the psychology of scarcity and others have been incorporated into the everyday lives of successful people. We are excited to put together a simple list of practical steps you too can take to ensure you use your time wisely.

 


Example first page of time hack booklet

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The overall project involves hardware development, firmware development, manufacturing, packaging and shipping. Although we have a very hardworking team, there are still unforeseeable factors that we cannot control. Our chips and internal components that come from a range of different suppliers can have different lead times, which may cause delays in the manufacturing timelines. We have accounted for contingency periods if this were to happen. 
We will continue to improve our software (both watch firmware, and phone app) throughout the launch to improve functionality. We have also incorporated multiple redundancies to insure against shipment delays such that our overall timeline of beginning delivery of emits by May 2019 is adhered to.

We will always keep our backers informed about any delays to the project and how we’re working to solve them. We really appreciate all the support for emit and can’t wait to get it out to all of our backers.
 

Spread the love

It'll be awesome if you spread word about the time revolution and share emit's campaign with your friends and family who need to change their perspective on time!
story_txt:
Time is your most precious resource. Yet you irreversibly waste it away. It always feels like you're running behind on something.emit uses the psychology of time scarcity and auto-suggestion to help you become more productive and take control of your time. A simple and intuitive smartwatch that influences you to take action towards achieving your goals.


Timekeeping on phones and traditional smartwatches have to be done amidst all the noise and clutter of other apps which insidiously eat into your time. The best way to prioritize your goals over all other distractions is simple! Write down your targets, set a time frame to it and wear it on you to keep focused. 
Don't let time fly away before its too late. Own time. Own emit.

Viewing time as a countdown makes you perceive it as scarce, which influences your mind to be more proactive and value time more. You will become more realistic with your timelines, and stick to your schedule.  

START RIGHT 

See countdown to wake-up time rather than absolute time to feel energised for the day. Just seeing normal time doesn't have any context to you personally. Stay disciplined with your sleep with a constant reminder of time remaining before starting your day. 
LEAVE ON TIME

 
Know how far away your next event is so you’re always on schedule. Keep track of your day itinerary with a simple tap. 
ARRIVE ON TIME

Always on time. Everywhere. Having a countdown on your wrist helps to condition your mind so you become more punctual.

Seeing your most important tasks, events and goals on your wrist encourages you to be more conscientious in choosing the things that matter most to you. It reminds you of your priorities and compels you into action.  
PLAN

 
Note your goals physically to give you a vision. Set your mind on a target so that you can direct all your mind space towards it. 

EXECUTE


Implement your plans with hard work by staying focused. Having your goal on your body keeps you on the right track whilst others procrastinate away on their phones and other distractions. 

SUCCEED 


Achieve your targets within the set time-frame. Small moments of procrastination avoided quickly compound to greater results.  
You often start a project with a lot of passion, only to lose motivation along the way because the momentum fades or other aspects of life knock us down. emit has a progress face dedicated to intuitively show the time progress made within a long term mission so you stay dedicated. 
MOTIVATION

Schedule times for tasks so you adhere to them. Setting aside time to perform a task ensures that you are prepared for it and committed to it.  
CONSISTENCY   

Remind yourself of the bigger picture and your progress. The key to success is a lot of consistency and discipline which you can attain by reminding yourself of your end goal and your journey so far.

RESULTS


Effortlessly convert your plans to reality. Observing progress has shown to encourage us to be more adherent to our long-term goals. 

Keep yourself inspired by realistically planning look-forwards in life. emit can also remind you of the things in your life that make the struggle worthwhile.
 
ASPIRE

Dare to dream big. Dare to write down your dreams. Physically noting your goals makes it more realistic to you, pushing you to work harder towards them.  

LOOK-FORWARD  
Use your look-forwards to change your mind-set and recharge your mood. If you're having a bad day or week, remind yourself of the great things the future holds for you. 

REALIZE 


 
Make your dreams come true by wearing them on you. Aspire, achieve and go beyond.

story:
What is Fidget Knob ?

Fidget Knob is a futuristic gadget you attach on the back of your cell phone. It uses patent pending technology and has a simple design based on ergonomics. Its unique haptic technology will ease stress and sooth your body and soul!
 

　

Why Fidget Knob?

Fidget Knob is a fun calming fidget toy not only for adults, but also for teens and children. If you fidget around with it, you’ll find calmness in your daily life. We’ve listed articles that mention the many advantages of general fidget toys below but why not get a Fidget Knob and experience it for yourself?


 

How to use your Fidget Knob?

There are 7 ways you can use and enjoy your Fidget Knob.
　

　

　

　

　

  

...and more
 

Where can I use it?

You can use your Fidget Knob in almost any daily situation. The Fidget Knob is with you to help keep you calm and focused throughout the day! Use it …

　

　

　


Stretch Goal

We’d like to achieve the following goals to develop Fidget Knob and deliver a fun soothing experience to as many people as possible.


Timeline

The Fidget Knob is based on a new patent pending technology created in 2016. The concept was to create a desk toy that would provide a fun and new experience to the user. After many design ideas, prototypes, and endless research of ergonomics and stress relieving material, we finalized the current prototype. We launched the Fidget Knob campaign this fall to bring the Fidget Knob to as many people as possible around the globe.


The Team

This project is led by Masa Yamanaka, the president of Vanguard Industries, Inc., and his team. Masa has vast experience in developing solutions based on HCD (Human Centered Design) and is passionate about solving people’s everyday problems through technology. Product planning, design, and development will be conducted in Tokyo, while production will be implemented in Nagoya with a well respected partner manufacturing company. Vanguard thrives to bring innovative products to the world based on Japanese technology, design, and craftsmanship.

   

 

Risks & Challenges

It’s the first time we’re conducting a crowd funding campaign but we have full confidence in making this project a success and satisfying our backers as not only does our team, but also our partner companies, have many years of experience and know-how in the development and manufacturing of innovative products. We’ve created many designs and prototypes of the Fidget Knob to get to this stage and are fully committed to this project. As we are always innovating, there is a possibility that the design and specifications will be modified to make it a better product. The production and shipment schedule could also be delayed based on the campaign results and situation. But even in that case we promise we will communicate with our backers faithfully so that the process is transparent and we will handle all issues that come our way in a truthful manner so that we meet the expectations of our supporters.
 

Other Ways You Can Help. Spread the Word! #fidgetknob

Please share this campaign with friends and family to grow our community with #fidgetknob.
Let’s make this futuristic knob a reality!


 

FAQ

Where will the products be shipped?
- We will ship to the US, Canada, and Japan.

I don’t live in any of these countries. Can I still buy them?
- We do have plans to deliver outside of these countries as well.

Do you have more more information on the effects of Fidget toys?
- Please refer to the following links;

 Link: What Makes a Good Fidget?
 Link: The Body-Brain Connection: How Fidgeting Sharpens Focus
 Link: Squirm with purpose: Fidgeting is helpful for ADHD patients, study shows
 Link: The Benefits of Fidgeting for Students With ADHD

How do I provide feedback?
- If you have any feedback on the Fidget Knob, please let us know. We’re passionate about making our products better so we will definitely consider implementing your suggestions.

Other Questions?
- Please send us a message or leave us a comment!

Link: INDIEGOGO Help Center

Disclaimer

Vanguard Industries Inc. or its associates are not responsible for any damage to properties or personal injuries while using Fidget Knob. Fidget Knob is not intended for unsupervised play by young children. Fidget Knob components include small parts which pose a possible choking hazard if accidentally disassembled and swallowed. This will ensure your Fidget Knob will remain intact for your continued enjoyment.

story:
Small Business Connecticut/U.S.A.

http://SmallBizUSA.org

3.1M Americans lost their jobs last year because their small businesses failed. 

We're changing that.


We have a 3 pronged approach to making an impact in America's most important economic sector, Small Business. However, we can't do it without your help.
Our Core Strategy:
1. To affordably bring Corporate America's tools to Small Businesses while delivering on the business owners success.                                                                (We currently boast a 100% success rate with the 60+ businesses we serve.)
2. To certify and educate Small Business Consultants and Advisors in order to eliminate risk for Small Business owners. We've found that over 90% of the advisors we touch are unqualified and unprepared to consult small businesses.
3. To be a loud voice with lawmakers and help them understand the ripple effect of their decisions. Most policy makers don't understand small business. Small Business Owners needs someone advocating for them in government. Through our collaboration with government, non-profit organizations and the community, we're doing just that.

Please help support our growth. Our goal of $200,000 helps us have a virtual presence in every state, $2M will give us a physical presence in 39 states in 5 years, which makes a significant difference with our 3rd initiative. Your support protects our pricing and our growth, Even the smallest donation makes a difference! Whether it's $10 or $10,000, your help is appreciated!

              Founder and President, Colleen Ferrary

'Thank you for your support! Let's be a spark in the universe together!' We have a proven ability to make a difference. We need your help to do it.' 
Small Business CT has created a proven program that weaves 4 key elements of success into a structured program that not only supports, but holds business owners accountable to their success. The key elements include a proven, comprehensive marketing library and a 52 week program that serve as our foundation. It also includes Peer Advisory Boards, Advisors (available twice a week to answers any questions our members may have,) and HR Outsourcing (which supplies solutions to people problems and leadership coaching.)
With Small Business USA, small business owners across the nation will no longer feel alone and will discover more structured paths to success!
Small Business CT is making a huge difference for members in CT. Being ranked 47th out of 50 states, Connecticut is a valuable proving ground. We currently have a 100% success rate and more and more businesses and organizations refer us every day. 
The most important part of our program, is the price. We have a commitment to keep our program affordable to EVERY small business owner.... That's why we need your help.

              When a small business owner fails, more than a job is lost. 


Why do they fail?

We counted 48 reasons. Our program not only solves every one of them, but does so while giving the business owner a sense of community and support.       

       85% of these FUNDED  entrepreneurs on Indiegogo will fail.

    Remember the last business you recall closing in your home town?    

You may not have been an expert, but I bet you could have given them some valuable advice to help them be more successful? Did you?            We do. 

4 Key Elements:

1. Peer Advisory Boards

Peer Advisory Boards have a 25% sales impact on small businesses. Our members now have their own Board of Directors made up of non-competing peers. Their board will promote and protect them.


2. Marketing Program     

We all know the effect of a solid marketing strategy, but most entrepreneurs can't afford $50,000 to have access  to one. We make our PROVEN program accessible to every member and give them the support they need to navigate through it while holding them accountable. 

         Our program is the most comprehensive program available.                         It's results are consistent, proven and relevant for every business!

3. Access to Experienced, Talented Consultants 8 times a month
                            YES, UNQUALIFIED CONSULTANTS HATE US! 

We happen to have noticed a problem with small business owners being sweet talked by hordes of silver-tongued consultants and advisers...an unqualified consultant can destroy a small business! We vet all of our advisers and make them accessible to answer questions 8 times a month for our members.

4. HR Outsourcing                              

Lastly, you didn't start a business to have to deal with people problems. We help every member through people problems, state and local laws, and leadership challenges. We have seen UNBELIEVABLE results spanning from sales increases to giving our owners back A LOT OF TIME in their day.

We're an active part of the community. Today, you will be too!

                                      Community helping Community.

Because our focus is in bringing communities together, Small Business US has committed 3% of our fundraising efforts here today to our community partners as well. Of every $100 we raise today, we are giving $3 to our community partners to help. 

Here they are: 

Proud Nation -   Helping and finding creative and physical ways to                                                     help underprivileged children learn and soar!

CT Youth Forum - Helping high school students eliminate preconceptions and grow as leaders together despite social and economic differences.

Sadie-Mae Foundation - Helping bring animals home to families



Our price is important to us. If we outprice small businesses, we can't help them. If we leverage investors, we must raise our price. This is why this funding project is so important to small business success. Our first 3 months in a state will be at $197/mo, after it will be $248. Whatever they join at will be their price for life. It's that important.

How do we stay profitable? Because we leverage the community, we can offer these services at the cost of hiring a consultant for just one hour. Consultants know that when a small business succeeds, they become able to afford consultants, so they enjoy supporting our group. 

Although we launched first in CT, the amount of crowd-funding will dictate our rate of growth. 

  • For every $200,000 raised, we can fund one more state.
  • The initial funding will cover our initial investment costs and position us to launch our next community. We are currently poised to launch in NY and MA at the close of this campaign. Our total goal is $2M. $2M gets us to 39 states in 5 years. That's a pretty big spark!

Our Board of Directors are mostly seasoned, successful small business owners who have grown their businesses successfully for a number of years. We also boast corporate experience to help deliver big resources to small businesses.

Growth Strategy: : Recent statistic shows that 5% of America owns their own business but 60% of America is thinking about starting one. We expect to launch 2 more states in 2014. In 2014, we will also invest in the infrastructure necessary to launch 10 new locations in 2015. Because it's necessary to establish a geographic location (office) in other states, it makes it impossible to fund a new state without raising prices. This is a commitment we're not going to negotiate. Small Business is an important emerging market and our strategy is strong and tested.

Testimonials: You can see our recent testimonials on our member blog site. We hope to continue to add more every day! Testimonials (If you go there, PLEASE come back and donate!)


The Impact

We have the ability to improve success rates in small business, screen quality next level support, and help improve people's lives. Small Businesses are fueling the American economy: 99.7 of all employer firms are considered Small Businesses vs. Corporations and this number continues to grow.

  • Small Businesses account for 55.4% of all U.S. Sales and 55% of all American jobs
  • The number of small businesses has increased by 49% since 1982. As Big businesses downsize, the number of start-ups has grown.

Yes, there are resources available through SBA to help small businesses, but if you've ever owned your own business, you know time is valuable. More importantly, you have to know what questions to ask to be able to receive help. Small Business America not only lends help defining the problem, but the Board program helps hold business owners accountable to their own success.

A Small Business Connecticut/America charter membership costs $197/mo ( a price locked in for life) and will raise to $248/mo after our initial 3 month introduction into a new location.

About Us:

You can certainly learn about me and the Board of Directors on our site. I'd like to share something more important to me: My motivation.

I grew up in a single parent home. My mother owned a real estate agency. It was very successful in the height of its life. When my mother fell ill, there were no provisions, leadership or structure in place. I watched her business crumble and our lives change. I swore because of this, I would never own my own business. What I didn't realize at the time, but can see clearly now, is the lack of well-rounded information that could have resulted in a far different outcome.

Fast forward 23 years. I've paid my dues in Corporate America. I grew tired of making more money for the corporation while they continued to ask more from my team (of over 3,000 employees) Meanwhile, they had the most profitable year ever and I handed out raises that were embarrassing to give to great employees because they were so low. 

So, I want Small Business US to be a spark in the Universe.

       I want to create an affordable program that can help America,                                                                       not take from it. 

I want to surround myself with people who feel the same. I want to leverage the tools I've been given in my corporate career and share them with a greater population.

 I ask my Board of Directors to always keep us working from a place of honesty, goodness, philanthropy and good will - never from a place of greed. I'm realistic in knowing that a company has to have assets and profit to protect its team through economic tides, but I also believe a company will grow faster and those rewards will still be met when you keep your community and your team first. 

I am asking you to help fund our project so that we may start strong and help small businesses succeed.

                     Every donation is greatly appreciated. Thank you!



Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!!!  
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools if you don't feel you can contribute at this time!

.
story_txt:
Small Business Connecticut/U.S.A.http://SmallBizUSA.org3.1M Americans lost their jobs last year because their small businesses failed. We're changing that.We have a 3 pronged approach to making an impact in America's most important economic sector, Small Business. However, we can't do it without your help.Our Core Strategy:1. To affordably bring Corporate America's tools to Small Businesses while delivering on the business owners success.                                                                (We currently boast a 100% success rate with the 60+ businesses we serve.)
2. To certify and educate Small Business Consultants and Advisors in order to eliminate risk for Small Business owners. We've found that over 90% of the advisors we touch are unqualified and unprepared to consult small businesses.
3. To be a loud voice with lawmakers and help them understand the ripple effect of their decisions. Most policy makers don't understand small business. Small Business Owners needs someone advocating for them in government. Through our collaboration with government, non-profit organizations and the community, we're doing just that.Please help support our growth. Our goal of $200,000 helps us have a virtual presence in every state, $2M will give us a physical presence in 39 states in 5 years, which makes a significant difference with our 3rd initiative. Your support protects our pricing and our growth, Even the smallest donation makes a difference! Whether it's $10 or $10,000, your help is appreciated!              Founder and President, Colleen Ferrary'Thank you for your support! Let's be a spark in the universe together!' We have a proven ability to make a difference. We need your help to do it.' 

Small Business CT has created a proven program that weaves 4 key elements of success into a structured program that not only supports, but holds business owners accountable to their success. The key elements include a proven, comprehensive marketing library and a 52 week program that serve as our foundation. It also includes Peer Advisory Boards, Advisors (available twice a week to answers any questions our members may have,) and HR Outsourcing (which supplies solutions to people problems and leadership coaching.)With Small Business USA, small business owners across the nation will no longer feel alone and will discover more structured paths to success!Small Business CT is making a huge difference for members in CT. Being ranked 47th out of 50 states, Connecticut is a valuable proving ground. We currently have a 100% success rate and more and more businesses and organizations refer us every day. The most important part of our program, is the price. We have a commitment to keep our program affordable to EVERY small business owner.... That's why we need your help.              When a small business owner fails, more than a job is lost. Why do they fail?We counted 48 reasons. Our program not only solves every one of them, but does so while giving the business owner a sense of community and support.              85% of these FUNDED  entrepreneurs on Indiegogo will fail.    Remember the last business you recall closing in your home town?    You may not have been an expert, but I bet you could have given them some valuable advice to help them be more successful? Did you?            We do. 4 Key Elements:1. Peer Advisory BoardsPeer Advisory Boards have a 25% sales impact on small businesses. Our members now have their own Board of Directors made up of non-competing peers. Their board will promote and protect them.2. Marketing Program     We all know the effect of a solid marketing strategy, but most entrepreneurs can't afford $50,000 to have access  to one. We make our PROVEN program accessible to every member and give them the support they need to navigate through it while holding them accountable.          Our program is the most comprehensive program available.                         It's results are consistent, proven and relevant for every business!3. Access to Experienced, Talented Consultants 8 times a month                            YES, UNQUALIFIED CONSULTANTS HATE US! We happen to have noticed a problem with small business owners being sweet talked by hordes of silver-tongued consultants and advisers...an unqualified consultant can destroy a small business! We vet all of our advisers and make them accessible to answer questions 8 times a month for our members.4. HR Outsourcing                              Lastly, you didn't start a business to have to deal with people problems. We help every member through people problems, state and local laws, and leadership challenges. We have seen UNBELIEVABLE results spanning from sales increases to giving our owners back A LOT OF TIME in their day.We're an active part of the community. Today, you will be too!

                                      Community helping Community.
Because our focus is in bringing communities together, Small Business US has committed 3% of our fundraising efforts here today to our community partners as well. Of every $100 we raise today, we are giving $3 to our community partners to help. 
Here they are: 
Proud Nation -   Helping and finding creative and physical ways to                                                     help underprivileged children learn and soar!
CT Youth Forum - Helping high school students eliminate preconceptions and grow as leaders together despite social and economic differences.
Sadie-Mae Foundation - Helping bring animals home to families





Our price is important to us. If we outprice small businesses, we can't help them. If we leverage investors, we must raise our price. This is why this funding project is so important to small business success. Our first 3 months in a state will be at $197/mo, after it will be $248. Whatever they join at will be their price for life. It's that important.
How do we stay profitable? Because we leverage the community, we can offer these services at the cost of hiring a consultant for just one hour. Consultants know that when a small business succeeds, they become able to afford consultants, so they enjoy supporting our group. 

Although we launched first in CT, the amount of crowd-funding will dictate our rate of growth. 



For every $200,000 raised, we can fund one more state.

The initial funding will cover our initial investment costs and position us to launch our next community. We are currently poised to launch in NY and MA at the close of this campaign. Our total goal is $2M. $2M gets us to 39 states in 5 years. That's a pretty big spark!

Our Board of Directors are mostly seasoned, successful small business owners who have grown their businesses successfully for a number of years. We also boast corporate experience to help deliver big resources to small businesses.
Growth Strategy: : Recent statistic shows that 5% of America owns their own business but 60% of America is thinking about starting one. We expect to launch 2 more states in 2014. In 2014, we will also invest in the infrastructure necessary to launch 10 new locations in 2015. Because it's necessary to establish a geographic location (office) in other states, it makes it impossible to fund a new state without raising prices. This is a commitment we're not going to negotiate. Small Business is an important emerging market and our strategy is strong and tested.
Testimonials: You can see our recent testimonials on our member blog site. We hope to continue to add more every day! Testimonials (If you go there, PLEASE come back and donate!)



The Impact
We have the ability to improve success rates in small business, screen quality next level support, and help improve people's lives. Small Businesses are fueling the American economy: 99.7 of all employer firms are considered Small Businesses vs. Corporations and this number continues to grow.

Small Businesses account for 55.4% of all U.S. Sales and 55% of all American jobs
The number of small businesses has increased by 49% since 1982. As Big businesses downsize, the number of start-ups has grown.

Yes, there are resources available through SBA to help small businesses, but if you've ever owned your own business, you know time is valuable. More importantly, you have to know what questions to ask to be able to receive help. Small Business America not only lends help defining the problem, but the Board program helps hold business owners accountable to their own success.
A Small Business Connecticut/America charter membership costs $197/mo ( a price locked in for life) and will raise to $248/mo after our initial 3 month introduction into a new location.

What I didn't realize at the time, but can see clearly now, is the lack of well-rounded information that could have resulted in a far different outcome.
Fast forward 23 years. I've paid my dues in Corporate America. I grew tired of making more money for the corporation while they continued to ask more from my team (of over 3,000 employees) Meanwhile, they had the most profitable year ever and I handed out raises that were embarrassing to give to great employees because they were so low. 
So, I want Small Business US to be a spark in the Universe.
       I want to create an affordable program that can help America,                                                                       not take from it. 
I want to surround myself with people who feel the same. I want to leverage the tools I've been given in my corporate career and share them with a greater population.
 I ask my Board of Directors to always keep us working from a place of honesty, goodness, philanthropy and good will - never from a place of greed. I'm realistic in knowing that a company has to have assets and profit to protect its team through economic tides, but I also believe a company will grow faster and those rewards will still be met when you keep your community and your team first. 
I am asking you to help fund our project so that we may start strong and help small businesses succeed.
                     Every donation is greatly appreciated. Thank you!


Other Ways You Can Help

Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!!!  
Please use the Indiegogo share tools if you don't feel you can contribute at this time!

story:
Finally, A Solution For Email Overload

 

Alison is a revolutionary artificial intelligence personality that proactively handles your email.

Imagine having a personal assistant that takes care of the majority of your emails for you. Alison does not wait for you to ask her a question, she reaches out to you on her own. If she thinks an email could be spam, she will ask you if you know the person that sent it. Want to schedule an email to be sent 3 days from now at 12pm? Just ask her to do it.  Only want to hear from certain people for the next week? Tell her and she’ll handle it.

You can think of Alison as an advanced version of Apple’s Siri, or Amazon’s Alexa. But instead of giving you sass, turning on music, or ordering a pizza, she is optimized to alleviate your pain from email overload.

Alison has a deep understanding of the world that no other system on the market has. She knows for example a dog is a living animal that can hurt other living things, a file is used to store data, or that a bedroom is used for sleeping. This is critical, so when she analyzes your email, she can understand ambiguous sentences and the context of what is being talked about. Alison will be the first A.I. on the market to understand context and be able to have an actual conversation with you. 

Alison lives in the cloud so she continually learns how to best serve you. The more you use her the more helpful she becomes as she learns your habits and how you use email.

Skeptical? Don’t be. Check out our demo videos below:

 

 
 
 
 
 
 

How Does Alison Work?

 

It’s simple. All you need to do is connect your email inbox to the app so she can start to process your email flow. She’ll learn how you use email and start helping you right away. If you only want her help for specific tasks, just let her know. She can dynamically change how she interacts with you based on your preferences.

Each time Alison processes one of your emails she uses one email credit. Alison will continue processing emails until all of your available credits are exhausted.

For example, the intro package comes with 30 email credits to be used over one month. Alison will process and perform notifications and tasks for the last 30 emails in your inbox. Once 30 emails are processed for the month, you will have to wait until the next month for the email credits to reload. Higher tier subscriptions will allow for more email processing per month.

 

Why Does The World Need This?

 

The average person spends 30 hours of the week reading and responding to email.

The McKinsey Global Institute found that an average person spends 30 hours a week reading and responding to email. That’s by far the most time-consuming activity at 28% of our time. Alison will filter, respond and handle the bulk of your email for you. Imagine the time you would save over the course of a year (650 hours) once you are freed from reactive, low-value work.

And...Less than half of emails deserve attention.

According to SaneBox’s internal data, the average inbox contains only 38% important, relevant emails. This means 62% of the emails in the average inbox are not important and are a complete waste of your time to check.

Think of all the time you lose each day, week and month, reading low quality email? We’re talking hundreds of hours over the course of a year. Those hours are much better spent on productive work, or better yet quality rest and relaxation with friends and family.

There’s more content coming into our inboxes than we could ever hope to consume in a lifetime. We all have the problem of trying to filter through the noise to focus on the most important and relevant messages. As the amount of information continues to expand this problem will only worsen.

Alison is your information gatekeeper. She weeds out the irrelevant noise. And makes sure your mental bandwidth is only taken up by messages that matter.

 

What’s Coming Next?

 

The current version of Alison only works with gmail and requires you to have an internet browser open. With your help we can start to roll out the next set of features so Alison can be used on all platforms and mobile devices.

Here’s a brief road map of what we plan to develop next:

Upgrades For Alison

We want to beef up Alison’s capabilities so she can handle almost any situation. This involves feeding her a massive amount of email data sets so she is familiar with almost every type of email conversation.

We will analyze things like the Enron email corpus and other publicly available data sets to ensure that all types of situations can be handled.

Develop The Windows Application

The Microsoft Windows application will run on any Windows operating system and allow Alison to automatically ask you questions or notify you of emails quickly. You won't have to have a browser open. 

Develop The Android and iOs Applications

We will be developing applications for Android and iOs so that Alison can talk to you proactively on your phone, anytime and anywhere.

 

Why Do We Need You?

 

Processing Costs and New Servers

It costs around $10-$15 to analyze and process one gigabyte of email data. Part of your contributions will go directly towards the hardware, storage and computation costs necessary to support Alison’s workflow.

Right now we outsource most of that processing to 3rd party cloud companies such as Amazon and Microsoft. Our hope is that your donations will also allow us to buy our own servers to process your data so we don’t have to pay 3rd party prices. If our processing costs go down, Alison gets cheaper for everyone.

Team Funding & Support Staff

To quickly finish and deliver the features and and applications detailed above, we need to bring on new developers and system administrators. Having a team that can support us with testing, quality assurance, and hardware support will increase your experience with Alison dramatically.

Right now we are a team of 2. With your help we can expand the team to 4-5 people and deliver a high quality product much quicker.

 

Alison’s Beginnings

 

Dan Clark, our lead developer, started working on the artificial intelligence system that powers Alison in 2006. Being a lifelong Star Trek nerd, his dream since he was a teenager was to create an intelligent, semi-conscious or fully-conscious software personality that was aware of itself and the people it was interacting with. This was a massive undertaking that involved understanding language/grammar/semantics, how the brain functions, conversational flow, concepts, logic, hypotheticals, awareness and much more. Slowly over time, each piece of the system was built and integrated together.

Dan has been writing software for 20 years, worked for multiple Fortune 100 companies and designed, created, and successfully deployed over a dozen enterprise applications. He has almost 2 decades of full stack development, working on everything from back end databases and server development to front end user interface development.

Alison is his passion project and we want to finally bring it into the light!

 

Challenges Ahead

 

The underlying technology for Alison has been under development for over 10 years. Our team has read over 100 books on everything from linguistics to behaviorism. We have wrote over 150,000 lines of code to build Alison, and are confident that any hurdles will be overcome.

But there is no doubt that there will be challenges along the way. This project has a lot of complexity.

Some challenges we foresee are things like:

  • Special formatting of certain emails that cause processing issues
  • Large attachments with incorrectly labeled extensions or meaningless text
  • Very large mailboxes
  • Mixed language emails

To resolve some of the challenges mentioned above, we have a number of solutions in place to handle them.

For example, emails with large attachments will have only a certain portion of the text ingested so that the back end servers are not overtaxed. All data being ingested will be measured down to the byte so that the system’s baseline performance is maintained. The system also has a number of fail safes to stop processing if the data it is analyzing is meaningless (or garbage).

 

F.A.Q.

 

Does Alison work with all email clients?

Right now she only integrates with gmail accounts. With your help we can expand her capabilities to include all email clients.

Are there settings? Can I adjust how often she talks to me? Say I get 100 emails a day. Will she start talking to me every single time I get a new email?

Yes, there are settings. You will be able to adjust how much she talks to you, the types of emails you care about, etc by just talking to her.

Can you set a time of the day for her to talk to you and batch your email decisions?

Absolutely. Just tell her: “Only tell me about emails between 8pm and 10pm.”

Can she delete emails? Send emails?

Yes and Yes.

How does she read the email? Does she only look at the gmail “primary” box or does she look at every single email that comes in?

Currently, she will only look at your ‘Primary’ email folder. In the future, she will be able to look at any folder.

How does she learn about you?

You can tell her things about yourself and soon she will start asking you about how your day is going, your friends and family, etc to learn more about you.

What types of suggestions will she make?

She will ask you about people or companies to determine if you know them so she can filter messages for you. She will try to handle appointments for you, automatically respond to emails for you (if you tell her to do so), and act as an assistant that handles your email so you don’t have to check it or think about it at all.

What if you ignore her and don’t answer 100 emails? Will she keep pestering you about unanswered emails?

She will not continually ask you about unanswered questions or emails, unless you tell her to.

How does Allison deal with attachments? Can she analyze those?

Yes. She can process and understand text within certain types of attachments, such as Microsoft Word, PDF, Text files, HTML, and PowerPoint.

 

Privacy Concerns

 

Securing your data is highly important to us. We encrypt the connection from your browser to our servers using HTTPs. Connections to your email provider also use HTTPs. No one can view your data in either direction as it moves. We also encrypt the entire filesystem that your data resides on. Your data would be meaningless to anyone who could potentially gain access to it.

Your data within the database is secured using multiple layers of access protection. Only login credentials can permit access.

We do not and never will sell your data to any 3rd party.

Your data can be removed from our systems at anytime by request.

story:
At the moment we are producing and shipping out all Bobby backpacks to our Kickstarter and Indiegogo backers. This is our TOP priority at the moment, and we will have the Backpack available after all backers have received their backpack, which will be in November. 

Would you like to be the first to order a Bobby backpack on our webshop in November? Please send us a mail at bobby@xd-design.com with your preferred color, quantity and delivery country. We will make sure to contact you right before the backpacks will be become available, so you are sure to not miss out! 

Bobby, The best Anti-Theft Backpack!

Every day 400.000 pick pocket incidents occur worldwide. Never worry about this happening to you with the Bobby Anti-Theft backpack. Key features as cut-proof material, hidden zipper closures and secret pockets will keep your belongings safe during your commutes.

Besides being the safest backpack it is also the the most convenient backpack with features such as: an integrated USB charging port, weight balance, water repellent fabric, illuminating safety strips and luggage strap.

Learn all about this revolutionary new product on this page

Please note that all pledges are including shipping costs (worldwide), so we will not charge extra shipping costs. The Pledge amount is the total.

Is the Bobby suitable for school or college? The answer is again YES! When already having your laptop and tablet in the backpack, you still have plenty of room for many books of different sizes and formats. We have tested this with different formats and sizes of books:

story:
What FindMeEvidence is all about

Did you know that medical doctors fail to find answers to 41% of the questions they pursue in daily medical routine? Studies show that web search engines could help answer some of these questions, but their results are of sometimes dubious quality and finding the right answer takes too long. Specialized medical search engines are often locked away behind a paywall and cannot be accessed by many medical professionals. This situation leaves many medical questions unanswered, potentially leading to less-then-ideal care decisions.

Our goal is to improve the quality of global health care a bit by creating FindMeEvidence, a freely available, open-source search engine that helps medical doctors (and patients) find relevant information right when they need it. 

FindMeEvidence can revolutionize medical information search because:

  • It is optimized for the needs of medical professionals
  • It is ideal for doing quick searches in busy situations (such as during patient care). Text snippets containing answers are shown right in the result list, so you usually don't have to visit remote websites to read through the full text.
  • It has a good signal/noise ratio: only content relevant for making medical decisions is fed into the search engine.
  • It works well on mobile devices so you can access information everywhere (e.g., if you are a doctor, you can use it while visiting patients)
  • It has built-in translation features. Many good sources of evidence are available in English only, and non-native speakers benefit from  assistance in formulating queries and understanding results.
  • It is light-weight, freely available and open-source. If needed, you can easily install a local version adapted to your needs or the needs of your organisation.

Who we are

The development of FindMeEvidence is coordinated by Dr. Matthias Samwald, a researcher in biomedical informatics and multidisciplinary geek at the Medical University of Vienna, Austria. Matthias originally started out as a neuroscientist but decided to leave the lab in favour of computer-based work, because he figured that this is where most paradigm-shifting changes in medicine will happen in the 21st century. He previously worked with a wide variety of research institutions and companies, such as Yale University and Creative Commons. He is a member of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

Matthias is supported by Dr. Claus-Dieter Volko, who is a medical doctor and a computer scientist in one person. He is passionate about applying his rare mixture of skills in a project that can have a real impact on patient care.

What we need & What you get

We have already created an early prototype of the software. However, there are still lots of things that require a full-time development effort for a few months in order to realize the full potential of the system.

We need at least 7500€ to create a '1.0' release that can be used in clinical settings. One of the most important goals here -- as with any search engine -- is to further optimize ranking of results, so that most relevant results always come first.

This is a not-for-profit project. The FindMeEvidence search engine and all other project results will be made openly available - hopefully benefiting you, your family and everyone else. We want this project to have an impact on health care on a global scale.

Other ways in which you can help

Even if you cannot donate money, you can still help to drive the development of FindMeEvidence.

  • Share a link to this page with your social network!
  • If you are a developer and have experience with information retrieval and search engines, contact us and become a project committer!
  • If you are a medical professional, you can help us tremendously by trying out FindMeEvidence in your daily routine and telling us what needs to be improved! Please contact us!

References

Ely JW, Osheroff JA, Maviglia SM, Rosenbaum ME. Patient-Care Questions that Physicians Are Unable to Answer. J Am Med Inform Assoc. 2007;14(4):407–14.

Kritz M, Gschwandtner M, Stefanov V, Hanbury A, Samwald M. Utilization and Perceived Problems of Online Medical Resources and Search Tools Among Different Groups of European Physicians. Journal of Medical Internet Research. 2013;15(6):e122.

Links

Development prototype of the FindMeEvidence systems (already partially working)

Issue tracker in Google Code

story:
Our mission is to provide an alternative way for consumers to purchase Ink for their desktop printer! 

It's time for us to stop getting ripped off from the big box stores and on-line retailers!!!!

Currently Consumers are forced to experience:

  • Extreme High Costs for ink cartridges
  • Panicking when you need something printed and you find out that you are out of ink
  • Still having to run to big box stores to buy ink
  • Ordering online and having to wait 2 days
  • Forced to buy a 4 pack of color cartridges when you just need 1 color.

 

These Hassles and Frustrations are why we started Unlimited Ink Club.

We are a subscription based Ink & Toner provider who has eliminated the Hassle, Frustration and most importantly the High Cost associated with buying ink for your desktop printer.

For just $10 per month, you get unlimited ink, unlimited printing, and with our ink monitoring software talking directly to you printer we know when your running low before you do. This allows us to ship you a new ink cartridge before you run out.

 

Spreading the Word

We want to let the Nation know that there is an alternative to having to pay excessive amounts for INK at the big box stores.

Campaign Funding:

  • With the funding proceeds that we earn we plan on spreading the word about Unlimited Ink Club through traditional marketing campaigns, as well as social media
  • Additionally, we are excitited to offer our early contributors' exclusive acces to rate discounts.

Disrupting an old stale Industry

It is time for someone to start challenging the big box brands and online retailers. For so many years, they have taken advantage of consumers by overcharging them for a product that is usually purchased on a reactionary basis.

By joining our CLUB your contribution will impact the industry by:

  • No longer being forced to pay a premium price for ink
  • No more having to buy a 4-pack of ink to get a bulk pricing rate when you only need 1 color.
  • No longer having to run to a big box store or paying expedited shipping for Ink

Additional benefits for joining Unlimited Ink Club include:

  • Month to Month membership with no hidden fees or long-term contracts.
  • Products are backed by a 100% performance guarantee
  • Keeping reusable, non-biodegradable materials out of landfills while promoting environmental initiatives through using our re-manufactured cartridges.

story:
• Sharing your writing in real time is easy, with a press of a button, you can start a meeting and share the link. Anyone with that link can connect and watch
  • You can stay connected anywhere, anyone can watch what you write all in real time
  • The eBeam Smartpen even comes with a stylus nib to make it an all-in-one pen & stylus solution that can be used on any display or on any flat surface without making a mark
  • You can write with eBeam Smartpen on any chatting app or memo app by simply downloading eBeam Keyboard app. You can write, draw or take memo even without dedicated app opened. 

 

The Company

Luidia is a world leader in interactive and digital capture technology with eBeam product families. Since 2003 we have focused on providing innovative solutions . At Luidia we believe in personal commitment and true engagement to what we do. We hope this love for our work shows in the premium quality of our products. We develop solutions that allow users to transform their everyday surfaces into smart solutions.

story:
Who am I?

I'm Jason, and it's about time for me to use my mechanical aptitude for something I really love. I live on the central coast of California and have a passion for innovation. I used to have a fabrication business where we spent hours per week plugging in cords that had accidentally come unplugged. I decided to invent a unique inexpensive solution to this problem.

What is the Locking Extension Cord?

Excellent question! As anyone from a contractor to a home do it your selfer would know extension cord disconnects are frustrating and costly if you have employees spending hours per week re-plugging them in and if you tie them in knots then you know the cost is a failed strain relief and a frayed cord. The Locking Cord is a streamlined, simple, and inexpensive design that makes the locking cord a reality.

But enough talk...I'll let the picture speak for itself.

How does the Locking Extension Cord work?

I designed the lock to be as functional and simple as possible. It also integrates perfectly with all existing male plugs. The lock is simply an extra tab formed on the already existing receptacle with a dimple that will drop into the holes on any male plug blade to create a very inexpensive positive lock.

Then the release is a simple wedge design the will flex the locked tabs away from the male blade to enable your cord to be unplugged.

Project Progress

The initial prototype shown in the video and pictures was made using manual forming of the receptacle’s and various tooling and molding of the female end. We are now in the stage of production tooling and UL approvals. Your pledges will help take this product to the job sites and homes of many people who want an inexpensive solution to cords coming unplugged! If you pledge $20 I will send you one 25’ 12 Gauge cord from our first UL approved production run! Or pledge $35 to receive the two 25’ 12 Gauge cords. As well as a life time discount on our website. 

Our current production version will have a colored housing and the release button will be clear with an LED light to ensure it has power.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Everest Planner is an all-in-one daily planner (the 2nd half year of 2018 from July to December) based on the UNIQUE system that will help you set goals, be more organized and increase your productivity! It´s a complex tool with all the function you need so by getting it, you won´t have to carry around any other notebooks, journals etc. ALSO for every planner you buy, we'll plant one tree.

Our story began about two years ago. We both started feeling lost in our day-to-day life. We had so much on our to-do list but we felt like we are moving nowhere towards our goals and dreams. We believed that we aspired for more in our lives. The change was necessary as we wanted to get back on right track. So we started studying the lifehacks described by the top-performing, the most achieving people in the world.

We read tons of books trying to figure out what we were missing in our lives. After thorough research, we combined the proven methods to set goals, be effective and increase productivity with the basic function every planner should have, like scheduling the meetings, taking (a lot of) notes etc. so you won´t have to carry around any other journal or notebook. We built several prototypes and gave it for testing to our friends and family. We've implemented the feedback and finally created the nowadays' version of Everest Planner! 

On our way to a better self, we managed to identify several key elements that lead a person to live successful and happier life. We came to a conclusion that the difference between those who accomplish their dreams and those who don't is a conscious decision to write down your goals, set a long-term vision and proactively take action. We implemented all those findings into the Everest Planner. 

As the old saying goes, content is the king. But we have made sure that the user's experience will be extraordinary by involving several extra features. Let's check them out!

And now let's take a look inside...

There are four key parts - setting the vision and the goals at the start of the planner, daily layout, weekly reflection and monthly overview. All of them combine the tools you need in order to achieve great things. Click on THIS LINK to have a look at planner from inside.


We created a unique system that will guide you on your way of developing the long-term vision and the goals for next 6 months. It consists of 5 steps: 

1. Creating a 5 years' vision defined in 5 key areas of your life: Personal growth, Career, Relationships, Daily routine, and Health. We will guide you through this process by using a set of well-chosen questions.

2. The secret step - We won't spoil you a surprise of finding it out on your own. This step works the best if you are not prepared for it beforehand, so you can look forward to it after securing your own Everest Planner.

3. Goals for nexť 6 months - Based on your vision, you will set goals for next 6 months in each of the 5 key areas of your life. Plus you´ll get one bonus goal! 

4. Focus is the key - This tool will help you choose one goal for the next six months that has a potential to help you the most to get closer to your long-term vision 

5. Actionable steps - Now you need to break your main focus for next six months (from the point 4) into actionable steps on the monthly and weekly basis. This way you'll make sure that you will stay on the right track during the next six months. 

Thanks to our daily layout, you can plan your meetings, build new habits, remind yourself to relax or exercise and express a gratitude. Setting two most important tasks every day (and finishing them as first) will help you become more focused and more productive.

Unlike many other journals or planners, Everest Planner offers you a lot of space for notes on an everyday basis.​

The weekly layout enables you to reflect on the past week. At the end of every week, you get to answer a different (let's say bonus) question that will also help you move forward. Preparing the to-do list on the next page is based on setting the priorities, again. Our reward system will make completing the tasks more fun.

You need to have a clear vision of what you are going to face the following month. This overview will serve you as a great tool. 

By the way, that's the reason why we have two ribbon markers. You can have the first one on the current day and the second one on the current month.

Our goal is to help as many people as possible and also to help our planet. That's why we decided that besides bringing you the planner that will set you on a journey to become the best version of yourself, we are also going to plant a tree for every planner you buy.  

Join us in our mission to make this world a better place!

 

In case you have any question, feel free to contact us via email: hello@everestnotes.com or our Facebook page. 

Risks and challenges

We fully understand the risks coming with a crowdfunding campaign. That´s why we´ve prepared for them in advance. Besides our main manufacturer, we have two backup manufacturers ready to print thousands of planners. We are shipping the planners right after your order.

We fully understand the risks coming with a crowdfunding campaign. That´s why we´ve prepared for them in advance. Besides our main manufacturer, we have two backup manufacturers ready to print thousands of planners. We are shipping the planners right after your order.

story:
What is ZCure?

ZCure is a reliable, professional post-curing tool for SLA printing.

With consumers in mind, we design it as simple as possible.

Surround the chamber with 72 multi-directional LEDS which emit the optimal wavelength of light to maximize material properties.

 

Upgrade of UV light

 

Set it and Forget it

With the help of integrated timer, you just need simply set the appropriate time, press the start button, then you can go away and forget it.

While you’re away, the ZCure will get to work, trigger the post-curing reaction, bring parts to their maximum mechanical properties.

Once time is up, parts are fully cured and ready for peak performance

Specifications

Rewards

Stretch Goals

Production Timeline 

Risks & Challenges

  • Procurement risk: This is mainly caused by the suppliers' delay. To minimize the risk, we always have backup suppliers. 
  • Design risk: This risk is relatively low because al of the design was already done.
  • Shipping risk: This is mainly caused by the different countries' customs and may result in a delay.
