Migeran in 60 Seconds
(top)

Migeran is a runtime and development environment that allows you to write iOS applications in Java.

Migeran is designed for:

  • Java Developers, who want to develop iOS Apps
  • Android Developers, who want to port their Android Apps to iOS
  • Project Managers, who want to improve their Team's productivity when creating Apps for both iOS and Android

Migeran is better than other frameworks:

  • Includes Unique Tools, like: On Device Debugging, Automated Binding Generator and first class IDE Integration
  • Reduce cost and complexity through code sharing: Migeran allows you to write the business logic in common Java code to share between Android and iOS. Platform specific parts of the iOS version can be developed in Java, Objective-C, C/C++ or even assembly.

Contests

Goal-Code Contest
(top)

The Migeran Campaign's goal is set to $51.966. There are 2 reasons for this. The first 3 people who send in the correct answers to contest@migeran.com and also share the Migeran Campaign on Twitter, Facebook and G+, will get a Migeran T-Shirt.

To be eiligible for the T-Shirt, you should include the correct answer and proof that you shared the Migeran Campaign on Twitter, Facebook and G+ as well. You don't have to be a contributor to win, but we recommend you to use Indiegogo's sharing tools, so you also enter the Sharing Contest at the same time.

Sharing Contest: Spread the Word and Earn Rewards
(top)

With Indiegogo's tools we can easily track where visitors to our campaign came from. This allows us to announce the Migeran Sharing Contest.

In order for Indiegogo's tracking technology to work, you have to use the Share buttons up at the top of our campaign (right under the video) and you have to be logged in.

Important Tip! You don't have to be a contributor to earn rewards! Just be sure to be logged in when you share our campaign, using the share buttons, of course.

About Us
(top)

Migeran Ltd was founded by Dr. Annamaria Mattasits and Gergely Kis, both mobile industry veterans.

In the last 10 years we worked as developers, architects and project managers on all major mobile platforms. In the past 6 years we were managing our software consulting business, where we created mobile apps for various platforms including iOS, Android and BlackBerry. We enhanced the Android platform on multiple different hardware devices, and also successfully built complex enterprise solutions based on Java EE, web & mobile technologies.

We started Migeran Ltd to build the best tools for software developers. The Migeran Development Tools finally allows developers to write iOS Apps in Java without any compromise in productivity or ease of development.

Annamaria is the cool head behind Migeran’s success. Her down to earth, practical attitude gives us the edge to meet hard deadlines and face big challenges.

Gergely is in charge of building the best products for developers. His strong vision led to Migeran: a Complete Development Environment to finally make iOS App development in Java fun and productive.

We have a team of great developers, who are working tirelessly to make Migeran even better.

For Developers
(top)

With Migeran, Java and Android developers can unlock the wonders of the iOS World, while still using the tools they know best:

  • Real, native iOS Apps can be written in Java
  • The runtime is based on Dalvik from Android
  • Eclipse support for editing, on device debugging and testing Migeran apps and libraries
  • Straightforward integration with native iOS tools for UI design and reusing Objective-C components

iOS Developers can join the party as well:

  • Keep using the standard iOS development tools, like Xcode
  • Use Migeran's Automated Binding Generator to export your Objective-C components to the rest of the team.
  • Concentrate on the most exciting challenges in the project: design stunning UI components and make clever optimizations.
  • Enjoy the increased productivity of the team while cooperating with fellow Java developers

For Project Managers
(top)

With the standard development tools, targeting both Android and iOS means the development of the same app twice, with 2 different teams.

This leads to increased management overhead, that could be avoided with the right tools.

With Migeran, you work with a single team:

  • Shorten Time to Market: Build the application for Android and iOS at the same time.
  • Cut costs through code reuse: The common logic is shared between platforms.
  • With Migeran your existing Java and Android developers can become iOS developers as well.
  • Migeran provides all the tools for efficient Java development on iOS.

Available in the App Store
(top)

The first Migeran App is already in the App Store and more are on the way!

The Road Ahead
(top)

Roadmap to Migeran 1.0

Right after the Indiegogo Campaign ends, we will release the first beta version to the campaign contributors with Early Access membership. This Beta 1 will include:
  • Updated runtime to Android KitKat
  • Support for iOS 7.1
In March 2014 we will release the second beta to the Early Access members with updates and improvements. After some polishing the final Migeran 1.0 will be released in April 2014. This release will be available to the general public as well.

Maintenance Releases

Maintenance releases are scheduled to follow new iOS releases. In case of critical bugs special maintenance releases will be made.

Customer Driven Roadmap

Future feature releases will be based on customer priorities. We do have a few features planned, but ultimately our customers (and campaign conributors) decide the order in which these features will be implemented:
  • IntelliJ Support: We love Eclipse, but IntelliJ is also a great IDE, that is very popular among developers. Now, that Android Studio is based on IntelliJ, more and more Android developers will get to know it as well. We plan to port our IDE features to IntelliJ to make it a first class Migeran IDE.
  • Gradle Support: Currently the Migeran Build System is based on Ant. We plan to add Gradle support to make the integration with Android projects even easier.
  • Migeran for Mac: Migeran's technology is not limited to iOS, it can be used on the desktop as well.
  • Your Feature: We are committed to make Migeran the ideal development environment. This means that we will implement the features based on our customers' requests and priorities.

Migeran in Action: Your First App in 3 Minutes
(top)

Check out Migeran in action on the video below:

Robust Flexibility
(top)

If you look at a Migeran App's architecture, the most important thing to notice is flexibility. With Migeran, the developers are not locked into a single tool. Rather, Migeran provides a platform to combine multiple development environments:

  • You can use Migeran's Runtime based on Dalvik from Android, with full access to the standard iOS API
  • You can also use any 3rd party native libraries
  • At the same time, the vast number of Java libraries are also accessible
  • Finally, you can not only write your application code in Java, but you also have the option to implement parts of the app in native code – in Objective-C, C++ or even assembly

Migeran provides an integrated workflow to make these options feel natural, not an afterthought.

Bug Hunting: On Device Debugging
(top)

Watch our screencast about on device debugging below:

Nat/J: Our Bridge is Yours
(top)

Nat/J is the Java to native bridge of Migeran. Unlike JNI, it is very easy to use – you can configure the native bindings declaratively using annotations – without even writing a single line of native code.

Nat/J also has full support for the Objective-C features, so the whole iOS API can be represented in Java. And finally, with Nat/J you don't even have to write the annotated Java code by hand – just use the integrated Nat/J Generator from Eclipse to create the binding classes automatically.

The Nat/J Generator of course works with any Objective-C library, not just the standard iOS APIs, so if you already invested in native iOS components, you can quickly make them available in your Migeran projects as well.

Eclipse & Xcode: The Best of Both Worlds
(top)

Eclipse is one of the best Java IDEs. Xcode is the tool for Objective-C development.

Migeran brings these two worlds together in a seamless, productive workflow:

  • Create your Migeran project in Eclipse, and an associated Xcode project is created automatically.

  • The Xcode project is automatically updated, if source files are changed in Eclipse.

  • Java developers can continue to work in their familiar environment, and only start Xcode to design user interfaces.

  • Objective-C and iOS experts can dive into Xcode: implement native components and make them available for the Java developers.

UI Design: The Beauty on the Surface
(top)

Xcode includes Interface Builder, a full featured user interface designer solution. It is unfortunately strongly tied to the Objective-C language.

Migeran lets Java developers to leverage the power of Interface Builder without learning Objective-C itself:

  • Migeran generates the necessary Objective-C stub classes automatically to work with Interface Builder.

  • You can just create a new screen right from Eclipse, edit the UI in Xcode, then write the action logic in Java in a matter of a few seconds.

  • Outlets and actions connected to the stub classes are reflected in the Java source.

  • Naturally, manual modifications in the Java classes are preserved.

  • We implemented a solution, which works not only with the straightforward case of a single UIViewController for a XIB file, but also with complex cases including multiple linked classes and Storyboards.

  • You can even go wild and implement hybrid classes: one part in Objective-C and the other part in Java.

Testing & Deployment: Tame the Inner Beast
(top)

A straightforward test & deployment setup is essential for efficient development. With Migeran, everything is set up for you:

  • Every Migeran project is pre-configured with separate unit testing and acceptance testing configurations.

  • JUnit tests can be executed from Eclipse

  • The acceptance testing configuration uses Frank to enable a Behavior Driven Development workflow.

  • The build system includes a distribution build task to enable easy deployments to the App Store and to beta testers.

The Droid Inside
(top)

In order to make porting Android apps to iOS even easier, Migeran includes an Android Compatibility Library, which implements the core Android APIs for iOS.

There are a lot of APIs that will be supported, like:

  • the Android Logger – which is used by every Android app
  • The Android 2D graphics and OpenGL API
  • Or a lightweight implementation of core APIs like Binder, Intents, or Resources – just to support more of the higher level APIs.

This library is a work in progress, and we count on the developer community to work with us so we can set the right priorities for our development efforts.

The Migeran Difference
(top)

Migeran is not your average Indiegogo Project.

It is not just an idea, we already have a working version, that is currently evaluated by selected beta testers.

We started this campaign to present Migeran to a wider audience, and to get the valuable input of early adopters, so we can build the best possible product for our customers.

Contributors to this campaign will get huge discounts on Migeran subscription prices, and also the opportunity to get their hands on the next Migeran beta release, right after the end of this campaign.

Perks with Subscriptions
(top)

Migeran is licensed with a simple, developer seat based subscription model. The term of each subscription is 1 year. We have a single version, which includes all software features. Larger subscriptions include more additional services.

Every subscriber also gets feature votes, which can be used to influence the direction of Migeran development. We will allocate more resources to such up-voted features than others.

With each subscription, a perpetual, royalty free license is granted for those Migeran versions that were released while the subscription was active. These versions may be used after the subscription ends, but no other services (e.g. updates, customer support, project assistance) are provided.

Pro Subscription

The Pro subscription includes email support with a next business day reaction time SLA. It also includes 5 feature votes intead of the 2 included in the Starter subscription. Pro subscribers also get access to pre-release versions of Migeran. The Migeran Academy (with high quality training material) and Project Assistance service is available to Pro subscribers at extra cost.

Enterprise Subscription

The Enterprise subscription includes premium support with a next business day reaction time SLA. It also includes 10 feature votes instead of the 5 included in the Pro subscription. Enterprise subscribers also get access to pre-release versions of Migeran. Access to the Migeran Academy is also included. Project Assistance service is available to Enterprise subscribers at extra cost.

Perks for Teams
(top)

If you are considering Migeran for your Team, we have prepared 3 options for you.

Team (5 subscriptions)

You get 5 Enterprise subscriptions at 55% discount, and 4 hours of online Project Assistance. You also get a total of 75 feature votes.

Large Team (25 subscriptions)

You get 25 Enterprise subscriptions at 60% discount, and 8 hours of online Project Assistance. You also get a total of 400 feature votes. There are only 5 available from this reward.

XXL Team (75 subscriptions)

You get 75 Enterprise subscriptions at 66% discount, and a total of 1000 feature votes. You also get a 3 day on-site Project Assistance session (excluding travel and accommodations) with one of Migeran's lead engineers. There are only 3 available from this reward.

Perks to Support Migeran
(top)

If you are not ready to commit to a Migeran subscription just yet, we have other perks for you as well:
  • Supporter: for $25, you will get 15% discount from the Starter subscription when Migeran 1.0 is released.
  • T-Shirt: for $49, you will get a Migeran T-Shirt and 15% discount from the Starter subscription when Migeran 1.0 is released.

Migeran Support Levels
(top)

Migeran offers 3 support levels:
  • Community Support will be an internet forum dedicated to Migeran. Migeran Ltd support engineers will monitor and answer questions posted on the forum, but there is no SLA provided for the response times.
  • Email Support is included in Pro subscriptions. According to the SLA, Migeran Ltd support engineers will respond to each request by the end of the next business day.
  • Premium Support is included in Enterprise subscriptions. The key difference is, that Premium Support is not limited to email or the phone. Our support engineers will work with you to resolve the problems by any means necessary, including: screen sharing sessions to reproduce the issues on your system or even conference calls with the actual Migeran developers.
    According to the SLA, Migeran Ltd support engineers will respond to each request by the end of the next business day.

Project Assistance
(top)

When starting to work with a new framework or a new platform, there are always corner cases and though business problems that can take a lot of time to resolve, even with superb documentation and training material.

This is where Project Assistance can help you: when it is not clear which design pattern or implementation technique should be used to find an optimal solution.

Our experienced engineers will work with you remotely using screen sharing, help with the design, implementation and testing of your application. We also offer Project Assistance sessions designed for specific project phases, for example: Kick-Off, Requirement Analysis, Design, Rapid Prototyping, Implementation, Deployment and Project Review.

Project Assistance is charged on an hourly basis. For more information, please contact us at: support@migeran.com.

VAT: Perks in the EU
(top)

Migeran Ltd is based in the United Kingdom, therefore we have to charge 20% VAT each customer from the UK.

If you are from another EU member state and you have an EU VAT number, then we do not charge VAT, but we will need your EU VAT number. We will ask for it in a separate email, after you sent the order through Indiegogo.

If you are from another EU member state and you do not have an EU VAT number, then we also have to charge 20% VAT.

If you are not from the EU, then no VAT will be charged.

If we need to charge VAT, you have 2 options:

  • We entered the required amount into the description of each perk. You can add this amount to your contribution, and you are done.
  • If you forgot to add the VAT to your order, don't worry. When Migeran 1.0 is released, you will be directed to our web store to complete the order and pay the remaining VAT.

If you have any questions regarding VAT or anything else, do not hesitate to contact us at: support@migeran.com.

You get 75 Enterprise subscriptions at 66% discount, and a total of 1000 feature votes. You also get a 3 day on-site Project Assistance session (excluding travel and accommodations) with one of Migeran's lead engineers.

There are only 3 available from this reward.



Perks to Support Migeran(top)


If you are not ready to commit to a Migeran subscription just yet, we have other perks for you as well:



Supporter: for $25, you will get 15% discount from the Starter subscription when Migeran 1.0 is released.

T-Shirt: for $49, you will get a Migeran T-Shirt and 15% discount from the Starter subscription when Migeran 1.0 is released.


Migeran Support Levels(top)


Migeran offers 3 support levels:



Community Support will be an internet forum dedicated to Migeran. Migeran Ltd support engineers will monitor and answer questions posted on the forum, but there is no SLA provided for the response times.

Email Support is included in Pro subscriptions. According to the SLA, Migeran Ltd support engineers will respond to each request by the end of the next business day.

Premium Support is included in Enterprise subscriptions. The key difference is, that Premium Support is not limited to email or the phone. Our support engineers will work with you to resolve the problems by any means necessary, including: screen sharing sessions to reproduce the issues on your system or even conference calls with the actual Migeran developers.
	According to the SLA, Migeran Ltd support engineers will respond to each request by the end of the next business day.


Project Assistance(top)


When starting to work with a new framework or a new platform, there are always corner cases and though business problems that can take a lot of time to resolve, even with superb documentation and training material. 


This is where Project Assistance can help you: when it is not clear which design pattern or implementation technique should be used to find an optimal solution.

Our experienced engineers will work with you remotely using screen sharing, help with the design, implementation and testing of your application. We also offer Project Assistance sessions designed for specific project phases, for example: Kick-Off, Requirement Analysis, Design, Rapid Prototyping, Implementation, Deployment and Project Review.


Project Assistance is charged on an hourly basis. For more information, please contact us at: support@migeran.com.


VAT: Perks in the EU(top)


Migeran Ltd is based in the United Kingdom, therefore we have to charge 20% VAT each customer from the UK.


If you are from another EU member state and you have an EU VAT number, then we do not charge VAT, but we will need your EU VAT number. We will ask for it in a separate email, after you sent the order through Indiegogo.


If you are from another EU member state and you do not have an EU VAT number, then we also have to charge 20% VAT.


If you are not from the EU, then no VAT will be charged.


If we need to charge VAT, you have 2 options:


We entered the required amount into the description of each perk. You can add this amount to your contribution, and you are done.
If you forgot to add the VAT to your order, don't worry. When Migeran 1.0 is released, you will be directed to our web store to complete the order and pay the remaining VAT.

If you have any questions regarding VAT or anything else, do not hesitate to contact us at: support@migeran.com.

story:
WIC is Shutdown because of the Shutdown

WIC is a program to help Women, Infants and Children in need.  Because of the federal shutdown, they're not getting any help buying formula and other necessities.

  • I am NOT affiliated with the Maryland Food Bank.
  • My family HAS been helped by food stamps and WIC in the past
  • I can't stand by and watch the poor suffer because of idiots who can't govern.
  • We need to act fast - since they're hurting NOW not in 45 days.

What We Need & What You Get

Here's what I'm doing:

  • $14,600 is just about exactly enough to buy 1 month's worth of formula for 100 mothers & their babies (I'm assuming 4 bottles per day, with a 1 week supply running around $36).
  • What you get:  The satisfaction of knowing you helped feed a child in need without the need for thanks.  
  • If we don't meet the goal, the money is STILL going to the Maryland Food Bank.
  • If we DO meet our goal, it's enough for 1 week of bottle feeding - and donating it to the food bank.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • if you can't help here, or don't want to - please go to:
    http://www.mdfoodbank.org/site/c.mgLPIYOzGlF/b.5551677/k.BF32/Home.htm
  • They can help you find out what you can do to help beyond donating money (or even how to donate directly)

story:
Macbook Pro is stunning, it has a lot of ground-breaking features, but you need multiple dongles to take advantage of many of them. Buying all these dongles from the Apple store can be costly, not to mention it is a hassle to carry so many things. That’s why we set out to create the Miizer Hub, the best wireless charging Type-C Hub to unlock the unlimited possibilities of Macbook Pro and other Type-C devices.

Miizer Hub is the only Type-C hub you will ever need, featuring ports for HDMI, two Type-Cs and two USB-A, along with SD, MicroSD, 1GB Ethernet, and 3.5mm headphone jack, which will allow your iPad Pro to connect to anything you can think of. It also works with other devices with Type-C ports including Macbook Pro, Surface Go, Android Phones etc, allowing you to unlock all the features for your devices with Miizer Hub.

Unlock All Possibilities Of Macbook

The Miizer Hub works with your computer that features Type-C ports, including new Macbook Pro, Microsoft Surface Go etc. When more and more devices compromises functionality for looks, Miizer Hub provides all the ports you need and more. At the same time you can maintain the clean look of your device as it is.

Wireless Charging for Apple Watch & iPhone 

Just when you thought that Miizer Hub already has a lot of features, it can do even more. Miizer Hub also features wireless charging functionality for your new iPhone and Apple Watch, this is the true multi-tool that you need to have.

Turn Android Phone Into Workstation

Mobility, productivity and practicality are crucial elements for those who are successful. Thanks to the great TV-out features a lot of phones have nowadays, simply use Miizer Hub to connect your Android phone to a monitor and instantly transfer it into a computer powerhouse.

Interchangeable Charging Heads For Other Phones 

Even if your phone doesn’t have wireless charging functionality, we still got you covered, Miizer Hub comes with interchangeable magnetic charging heads for your other phones to charge. Regardless of what type of phones you are using, when it comes to charging your phone, this has you covered.

Ultimate Connectivity

It includes ports for HDMI, two Type-Cs and two USB-A, along with SD, MicroSD, Ethernet, and 3.5mm headphone jack, which will allow your devices like Macbook Pro or iPad Pro to connect to anything you can think of. With all these I/Os crammed together in one, it satisfies all your needs!

Use it With iPad Pro

With Apple products we know it is as much about form as it is about function, and the Miizer Hub matches the new iPad Pro’s industrial design for one seamless look.

Great Flexibility 

Hubs that connect directly to the Macbook Pro or iPad Pro without a cable can sometimes cause damage to the port if snapped off with force. With Miizer Hub, we’ve designed a cable with more flexibility, so you don’t have to worry about it snapping off and destroying your Type-C port.

Removable Charging Pad

Nope, we are not done yet. The wireless charging pad is actually removable, so if you just want a thin, small charging pad on your desk, the Miizer Hub is your best choice.

Use Miizer To Wirelessly Charge Your iPhone & Apple Watch

Use Miizer's Magnetic Charging Port To Charge Other Phones

Use Miizer With iPad Pro

Starting a brand new project is not easy, because we really love the new iPad Pro and at the same time we are aware of the fact Type-C port is without a doubt the future, that gives us such a mission to make the perfect hub for it. After numerous sleepless night and hundreds and thousands of scratches, here we are, the Miizer Hub.

Miizer is a consumer electronics firm founded in 2016 with the objective of bringing consumers affordable and high-quality peripheral devices with the latest technologies. At Miizer, we strive for excellence in product development through innovative and creative approaches, providing thoughtful and effective solutions for everyone.

We are confident that we can send the Miizer hub to our supporters on time. Before establishing the Miizer, our team members are veterans in production. We know all the processes for mass production. We also have a good command of logistics. Before we launch the Miize hub, we have completed the modification of the mold and sent it to the media for feedback. During the crowd-funding period, we will make a few minor modifications and adjustments based on the recommendations. To ensure that you receive the perfect hub, we will perform the most rigorous production, quality control and functional testing.

Although there will always be inevitable accidents during the mass production phase, we will always keep pace with you and release updates in time to maintain our brand reputation.

story:
EXOvault Mouse

Artwork in your hand every day. 

We're proud to introduce our latest creation, the EXOvault Mouse!

The EXOvault Mouse is a high-performance, wireless Bluetooth computer mouse precision machined from aerospace grade 6061 aluminum and premium hardwood that has been designed to provide a more beautiful user experience. 

Machined from solid you will want to take it apart to see the beautiful details. 

EXOvault believes every day objects can be art. We have made a sculpture you can hold and use everyday.

Tech Specs

The functionality of the EXOvault mouse will be state of the art. We will use Omron switches for the buttons and PixArt sensors for both the scroll wheel and main movement tracking.  We will have three channels of communication with 2.4g and Bluetooth. The PixArt sensor will track on almost any surface, including glass. It will track up 40 inches per second, 10g of acceleration and up to 3000cpi resolution. Your EXOvault mouse will have brains equal to its beauty.  Our scroll wheel will be optically tracked you will experience no jumping while scrolling. Your scrolling has never be so smooth. This mouse will contain a rechargeable lithium ion battery that can charge via USB. 

Our mouse is completely ambidextrous with two main buttons and two side buttons. 

Our Story

EXOvault is a tiny team of craftsmen and designers based in New York, addicted to creating objects that make life more beautiful. The company was founded in 2010 and has delivered more than 10,000 precision machined phone cases, glasses, and briefcases - hewn from the finest materials - to happy customers around the world. 

Our founder, Jonathan Schipper, has been an artist, engineer, designer, and maker for his entire life. He conceived EXOvault in order to combine the beauty and excitement of sculpture with everyday objects. 

EXOvault derives it's inspiration from art and believes in giving back to artists.  We fund Highly Authorized, an Arts Center in Ellenville, NY that provides a subsidized art making and viewing facility. Highly Authorized is EXOvault's home and passion. By supporting this project you will be supporting young aspiring artist and creators.  You can find out more at www.HighlyAuthorized.com

story:
What is ecopay®?

ecopay® is the world’s first green processor and inventor of the green sale. ecopay® payment processing is a bankcard company, specifically developed to raise money for environmental education and related programs. ecopay® is a transaction based processing method, written specifically for all credit and debit transactions, at the merchant/consumer level , and supported through a proprietary funds routing and transfer program designed to directly fund environmental educational programs. ecopay® will be able to process all credit and debit card based sales and donate 5-15% of the transaction fees to environmental education through the green machine and ecoswiper®. The ecopay® program will cost both the consumer and the merchant NOTHING additional.

ecopay®’s Green Machine

ecopay®’s Green Machine is the ideal choice for merchants and consumers who want to have credit card processing and help the environment without any cost to the customer. The ecopay® Green machine efficiently processes debit and credit payments on the ecopay® platform fundraising application. The ecopay® Green machine’s backlit display, easily read menu prompts, and intuitive ATM-style interface reduce the chances of entry errors by customers or clerks. In addition, the terminal’s integrated thermal printer and internal Visa approved PIN pad keep your countertop clutter-free. So no matter how your business grows, ecopay® has the perfect terminal to fit your needs.Tthe green machine is not wireless, it is a stationary unit for countertop application with phone or I.P.

ecopay®’s ecoswiper®

ecopay®’s ecoswiper® makes it possible to convert a mobile device into a secure POS terminal to process credit cards. Merchants and consumers can now quickly and securely process electronic transactions on mobile devices, regardless of location and help the environment at the same time. In addition to using our secure & encrypted, magnetic stripe card reader, you can also get rid of the paper receipt and a percentage of the sale goes to the environment each and every time you use the ecoswiper®. The light-weight ecoswiper® simply plugs into your devices' standard headphone jack and becomes an easy and effective way to quickly grow your sales or collect money while helping the environment. If you are an A/C company on the go or the C.E.O. of the household, we can help you collect funds and help the environment at the same time. Each and every transaction requires no paper, email it and you're done. Also know you just raised money for the environment as well as help save trees.

ecopay® P.O.S. Kit

ecopay® S.E.D. (Solar Educational Display) 

The world’s first solar powered desktop educational display – you can put this in your home, auto, office, kitchen counter, or desk. This display will solar charge and revolve from interior or natural light, no batteries ever required. This one of a kind solar display is part of our unique ecopay® Point-of-Sale (P.O.S.) kit, which goes along with ecopay®’s Green Program for processing transactions while educating customers across the United States about the environment when they use their credit or debit cards. When your family, friends, or coworkers come to your home, office, or auto they will see the solar educational display (S.E.D.) and open up more conversation. That is ecopay®’s simple goal – communicating and educating with people to share the vision and message.

Where do the Funds go and who Benefits? 

ecopay® will handle the credit card processing to fund environmental efforts to educate and inform locally, regionally, and nationally. ecopay® recognizes it all begins in our communities and with our everyday lives, with simple participation. ecopay® can begin to educate and inform people, schools, and your community about the environment and sustainability; the things we can all do to help our planet. Each and every time you swipe with one of the green machines or ecoswiper® you help the environment at no cost to you while saving trees. People swipe everyday already, let us switch to ecopay® and add it to our everyday lives. No additional cost to merchants, and no cost at all to the customer.

Why We Need You? 

ecopay® looks forward to seeing the benefit from this fundraising program. With your support and participation we can achieve great success for greatly needed programs in your area. We are almost there, we just need some last help to fire up the manufacturing line, and get our ecoswiper® and green machine out to the world. We appreciate your support and look foward to giving you ecopay®.

Don’t Take Our Word for It

“I have been involved with the environment for over 30 years. I have never seen such a need for environmental solutions like today. Not just a one a time solution, but a renewable solution to a renewable problem. As a responsible society we must help and participate as custodians of Mother Earth. It is our duty, this program costs you nothing – but will benefit your local and national school’s environmental programs with everything. I find ecopayⓇ to be a financially consistent answer to this environmental necessity. I hope you bring ecopayⓇ into your everyday life and hope that when you shop at a participating ecopayⓇ merchant you are part of the solution to benefit your local community.”

Eugene Tseng, UCLA Professor Director of Environmental Studies http://www.ucla.edu/

“I believe in ecopay® and what it stands for. This is the right time, and the right place. At Green Seal, the largest and oldest Environmental Seal of Approval in the United States, we share the same environmental message to bring about awareness that ecopay® does. I look forward to working on the vision ecopay® has put together for all of us.”

Gary Petersen Chair, Green Seal Board of Directors http://www.greenseal.org/

Our Values

ecopay® will cost both the merchant and consumer nothing additional. A percentage of all monies generated will go directly to environmental education. ecopay® is the integral link between the environment and electronic payments for buyers and sellers. ecopay® can be counted on to bring bold ideas and advanced technologies to our customers that will ensure their success in the rapidly evolving electronic universe. ecopay® will exceed our customers’ expectations and build winning relationships through the exceptional quality, unquestioned integrity, and passionate commitment of our ecopay® team members to help us win the environmental way. With your help and participation we start an eco-movement for payment processing, ecopay®.

Help Us Help the Environment

 It is with the greatest esteem, as a C.E.O. of ecopay® to introduce ecopay®’s ecoswiper® and the green machine through our green payment processing. ecopay® will take a time tested process of merchant payment services to build a national and international brand for the world’s first green payment processing solution. ecopay® has designed a proprietary platform to directly raise monies to fund and educate businesses, consumers, and schools on environmental programs. The ecopay® fundraising program will be available to the market effective immediately. The ecopay® program will cost the merchants nothing additional, the ecopay® program will the cost the consumer nothing. What it will do for the environmental programs is everything. ecopay® looks forward to seeing the benefit from this fundraising program and know you and your community were a part of it, With your support and participation we can achieve great success for greatly needed programs in your area. We are almost there, we just need some last help to fire up the manufacturing line, and get the ecoswiper® out to the world. We appreciate your support and look foward to giving you ecopay®.

Sincerely,

Dan DeVore

CEO/Founder

With your help and participation we start an eco-movement for payment processing, ecopay®.Help Us Help the Environment It is with the greatest esteem, as a C.E.O. of ecopay® to introduce ecopay®’s ecoswiper® and the green machine through our green payment processing. ecopay® will take a time tested process of merchant payment services to build a national and international brand for the world’s first green payment processing solution. ecopay® has designed a proprietary platform to directly raise monies to fund and educate businesses, consumers, and schools on environmental programs. The ecopay® fundraising program will be available to the market effective immediately. The ecopay® program will cost the merchants nothing additional, the ecopay® program will the cost the consumer nothing. What it will do for the environmental programs is everything. ecopay® looks forward to seeing the benefit from this fundraising program and know you and your community were a part of it, With your support and participation we can achieve great success for greatly needed programs in your area. We are almost there, we just need some last help to fire up the manufacturing line, and get the ecoswiper® out to the world. We appreciate your support and look foward to giving you ecopay®.Sincerely,Dan DeVoreCEO/Founder

story:
Cards that will bring life back to your Agile Retrospectives

Retrospective Poker packages great Retrospective techniques for Scrum teams into a card game that is perfect for having fun team activities while focusing on continuous improvement.

 

Engage your team in the discussion before your Retrospective

It is easy to get your team excited about the upcoming Retrospective - just give them a chance to choose the topics they would like to discuss.

 

You can also adjust the deck before giving it to the team. Only pick the techniques you would like them to focus on, or only those you are ready to run.

 

Make it more entertaining by playing a "roulette" version of the Retrospective Poker - put your deck face down and ask someone to pick a card randomly.

One of my teams would nominate a new person each sprint to randomly pick a card from the deck.

 

Use the deck and the brochure as your cheatsheet for all techniques

When you are not sure what Retrospective to run, glance through the Retrospective Poker deck to get a reminder of what's available to you.

 

The deck comes with short instructions brochure that will guide you through preparing and running all techniques in the deck. You can always bring it with you as a cheatsheet for your session as it fits nicely into the case.

 

You can choose the technique based on the time you have available. You can also make a decision based on how comfortable you are running this Retrospective type given your Scrum Master experience and team maturity.

Bring the cards with you to the Retrospective to always know what to focus your discussion on.

 

20 effective Retrospective techniques in a single deck

The Retrospective Poker deck consists of 20 techniques and each of them focuses on variety of topics. As a Scrum Master you will find plenty of opportunities to direct the discussion in a way that would bring the most value. 

 

Essential information on each card 

Each card contains valuable information you and your team need to decide what technique to run for your Retrospective. It is brief and to the point.

No need to read long explanations to understand what this technique will bring into your discussion.

 

High quality paper 

It is easy to handle the cards thanks to quality materials used. Text is crisp, images are high quality, colors are bright.

The cards have high gloss covering to ensure they do not stick to each other and are easy to shuffle.

 

Step-by-step guide

Retrospective Poker cards can bring even more value, when packaged together with Retrospectives: A Scrum Master's Guide. It is an e-book that will help Scrum Masters with any level of experience to run productive and fun Retrospectives.

The book is a great addition to the cards (or vise-versa) and will include greater detail for each technique: 

  • Situational guide. Short explanation will help you understand what team and situation each technique works best for to help you adapt your approach.
  • Preparation guide. See exactly how much time and what you need to prepare for the session.
  • Step-by-step instructions. Clear instructions will guide you through the session even if you never run a retrospective before.
  • Speaking cues. To make sure your team understands various aspects of each technique, explanation examples are given for each step of your retrospective.
  • Technique modifications. Almost every technique can be modified to be reused in a new way and provide different results thanks to additional examples.
  • Facilitator's notes. Notes based on real-life challenges and situations are added to help you make your retrospective technique a success!

This is by far my favorite perk that includes both the cards and the book - it is a real value package!

Impact on Agile community

Agile space is very competitive and fast moving. And yet, we still lack strong Scrum Masters. I feel it is in a way due to lack of practical tools that new Scrum Masters can use to learn new skills and acquire the knowledge to become successful and elevate their teams.

Retrospective Poker is my first step at helping Scrum Masters around the world to expand their toolbox and start bringing more positive changes to their teams.

 

Don't see the perk you want?

I can combine any number of Retro Poker decks and/or guides for you. Just contact me.
*Contact me via Indiegogo, leave a comment on this campaign or send me a direct email at d.bagina@gmail.com.

 

Timeline

Stretch goals

My initial funding goal of C$2,500 will allow me to order a big batch of card decks including the brochures and packaging that is necessary to make the cost of production reasonable.

But it doesn't stop there. I would love to expand Retrospective Poker and make it more accessible. To do that, I have prepared some stretch goals that I will be able to achieve depending on the amount of funds collected.

 C$2,750

Accessible cards with large font for people with visual impairments.
*All backers  will be able to choose what type of deck they want to receive before the first shipment goes out.

 C$3,500

French translation for the Retrospective Poker deck and brochure. 
*All backers  will be able to choose what language they want to receive before the first shipment goes out.

 C$6,000

Expansion of Retrospective Poker with ten more techniques. 
*Will unlock a new perk. All backers will be able to get the expansion for the lowest price possible.

But wait, there's more! I have more ideas, let's just get here first.

Become a part of Retrospective Poker initiative with your contribution. Share this page with anyone you think will benefit from Retrospective Poker.

 

 

Who am I?

Let others tell you about me 乁⁞ ◑ ͜ر ◑ ⁞ㄏ

 [Daria] has a very unique talent of finding creative solutions to solve problems whether its visual facilitation or through simulation games that she contributes with to the overall Agile community.
-- Kajany Varatharajah, CSM, CSP 

 She is also a creative problem solver, always coming up with new tools, games or fun drawings to help teams uncover issues, identify action items in retros, and teach on various Agile topics. Her incredible artistic skills benefit her creative solutions.
-- Chris Beaudoin, CSM, CPO 

 Daria is also very creative and has, what I believe is, a hidden talent for data visualization. Having play-tested the "Gotta Build Them All" Agile board game she created during the company's hackathon event, and having witnessed the many beautiful Agile-based visual representations she's effortlessly crafted during our seasons of working together, I was amazed at her ability. 
-- Parker Aldric Mar, Software Engineer 

Retrospective Poker © Darya Bagina, 2018
